# <a name="required-diagnostic-data-for-office"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-103">Obavezni dijagnostički podaci za Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-103">Required diagnostic data for Office</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-104">Da biste videli listu Office proizvoda koji su obuhvaćeni ovim informacijama o privatnosti, pogledajte članak [„Dostupne kontrole privatnosti za Office proizvode“](products-versions-privacy-controls.md).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-104">For a list of Office products covered by this privacy information, see [Privacy controls available for Office products](products-versions-privacy-controls.md).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-105">Dijagnostički podaci se koriste da bi Office bio bezbedan i ažuriran, da bi se otkrili i otklonili problemi i da bi se poboljšao proizvod.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-105">Diagnostic data is used to keep Office secure and up-to-date, detect, diagnose and fix problems, and also make product improvements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-106">Ti podaci ne sadrže korisničko ime ili adresu e-pošte, sadržaj korisničkih datoteka ili informacije o aplikacijama nevezanim za Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-106">This data does not include a user's name or email address, the content of the user's files, or information about apps unrelated to Office.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-107">Ovi dijagnostički podaci se prikupljaju i šalju korporaciji Microsoft u vezi sa Office klijentskim softverom pokrenutim na uređaju korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-107">This diagnostic data is collected and sent to Microsoft about Office client software running on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-108">Neki dijagnostički podaci su obavezni, a neki su opcionalni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-108">Some diagnostic data is required, while some diagnostic data is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-109">Možete da izaberete da li ćete nam slati obavezne ili opcionalne dijagnostičke podatke pomoću kontrole privatnosti, kao što su postavke smernica organizacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-109">We give you the ability to choose whether to send us required or optional diagnostic data through the use of privacy controls, such as policy settings for organizations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-110">Možete da vidite dijagnostičke podatke koji nam se šalju koristeći prikaz dijagnostičkih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-110">You can see the diagnostic data being sent to us by using the Diagnostic Data Viewer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-111">***Obavezni dijagnostički podaci*** su minimalni podaci neophodni da bi Office bio bezbedan, ažuriran i da radi kao što se očekuje na uređaju na kome je instaliran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-111">***Required diagnostic data*** is the minimum data necessary to help keep Office secure, up-to-date, and performing as expected on the device it's installed on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-112">Obavezni dijagnostički podaci pomažu u identifikovanju problema sa sistemom Office koji su možda povezani sa konfiguracijom uređaja ili softvera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-112">Required diagnostic data helps to identify problems with Office that may be related to a device or software configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-113">Na primer, oni mogu da pomognu da odredite da li neka funkcija sistema Office pada češće na određenoj verziji operativnog sistema, zbog novih funkcija, ili kada su određene funkcije sistema Office onemogućene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-113">For example, it can help determine if an Office feature crashes more frequently on a particular operating system version, with newly introduced features, or when certain Office features are disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-114">Obavezni dijagnostički podaci pomažu nam da otkrijemo, ustanovimo i rešimo probleme brže, tako da se smanji uticaj na korisnike ili organizacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-114">Required diagnostic data helps us detect, diagnose, and fix these problems more quickly so the impact to users or organizations is reduced.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-115">Za više informacija o dijagnostičkim podacima pogledajte sledeće članke:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-115">For more information about diagnostic data, see the following articles:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-116">Opcionalni dijagnostički podaci za Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-116">Optional diagnostic data for Office</span></span>](optional-diagnostic-data.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-117">Korišćenje Prikazivača dijagnostičkih podataka uz Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-117">Using the Diagnostic Data Viewer with Office</span></span>](https://support.microsoft.com/office/cf761ce9-d805-4c60-a339-4e07f3182855)

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-118">Ako ste administrator organizacije, možda će vas zanimati i sledeći članci:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-118">If you're the admin for your organization, you might also be interested in the following articles:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-119">Pregled kontrola privatnosti za Microsoft 365 Apps za velika preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-119">Overview of privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise</span></span>](overview-privacy-controls.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-120">Korišćenje postavki smernica za upravljanje kontrolama privatnosti za Microsoft 365 Apps za velika preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-120">Use policy settings to manage privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise</span></span>](manage-privacy-controls.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-121">Korišćenje željenih opcija za upravljanje kontrolama privatnosti u sistemu Office za Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-121">Use preferences to manage privacy controls for Office for Mac</span></span>](mac-privacy-preferences.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-122">Korišćenje željenih opcija za upravljanje kontrolama privatnosti u sistemu Office za iOS uređaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-122">Use preferences to manage privacy controls for Office on iOS devices</span></span>](ios-privacy-preferences.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-123">Korišćenje regulatornih postavki za upravljanje kontrolama privatnosti za Office na Android uređajima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-123">Use policy settings to manage privacy controls for Office on Android devices</span></span>](android-privacy-controls.md)

## <a name="categories-and-data-fields-that-are-common-for-all-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-167">Kategorije i polja podataka koje su zajedničke za sve događaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-167">Categories and data fields that are common for all events</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-168">Postoje određene informacije o događajima koje su zajedničke za sve događaje, bez obzira na kategoriju ili podtip podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-168">There is some information about events that is common to all events, regardless of category or data subtype.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-169">Ove zajedničke informacije, koje se ponekad nazivaju *ugovori podataka*, organizovane su u kategorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-169">This common information, which is sometimes referred to as *data contracts*, is organized into categories.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-170">Svaka kategorija sadrži polja, a ova polja čine metapodatke i svojstva pojedinačnih događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-170">Each category contains fields, and these fields are the metadata and properties of an individual event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-171">Možete da vidite ove informacije tako što ćete koristiti „Prikazivač dijagnostičkih podataka“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-171">You can view this information by using the Diagnostic Data Viewer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-172">Kategorije prikupljenih informacija o događajima mogu biti podeljene u dve grupe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-172">The categories of information that is collected about events can be divided into two groups:</span></span>

  - [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-173">Informacije koje su zajedničke za sve događaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-173">Information common to all events</span></span>](#information-common-to-all-events)
  - [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-174">Informacije koje posebno podržavaju prikupljanje dijagnostičkih podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-174">Information that specifically supports diagnostic data collection</span></span>](#information-that-specifically-supports-diagnostic-data-collection)

### <a name="information-common-to-all-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-175">*Informacije koje su zajedničke za sve događaje*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-175">*Information common to all events*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-176">Informacije koje su zajedničke za sve događaje se prikupljaju u sledećim kategorijama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-176">Information common to all events is collected in the following categories.</span></span>

#### <a name="app"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-177">Aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-177">App</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-178">Informacije o aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-178">Information about the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-179">Sva polja su konstantna za sve sesije određene verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-179">All fields are constant for all sessions of a given application version.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-180">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-180">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-181">**Grana** -Grana na kojoj je nastala određena verzija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-181">**Branch** - The branch that the given build came from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-182">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo na kojem je tipu grane određena verzija nastala tako da možemo da ispravno usmerimo popravke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-182">Allows us to determine what type of branch a given build came from so that we can correctly target fixes.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-183">**Tip instalacije** – brojač koji utvrđuje način na koji je korisnik instalirao aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-183">**InstallType** - An enumerator that identifies how the user installed the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-184">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo da li određeni mehanizmi instalacije prave probleme koji se ne vide u drugim mehanizmima za instalaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-184">Allows us to determine if specific install mechanisms are creating issues that are not seen in other installation mechanisms.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-185">**Ime** - ime aplikacije koja pruža podatke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-185">**Name** - The name of the application that is providing the data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-186">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koja aplikacija ima problem, tako da znamo kako da ga popravimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-186">Allows us to identify which application is showing an issue so we know how to address it.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-187">**Platforma** - široka klasifikacija platforme na kojoj je aplikacija pokrenuta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-187">**Platform** - The broad classification of the platform on which the app is running.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-188">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo na kojim platformama se javlja problem tako da možemo ispravno da damo prioritet rešavanju tog problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-188">Allows us to identify on which platforms an issue may be occurring so that we can correctly prioritize the issue.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-189">**Verzija** - verzija aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-189">**Version** - The version of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-190">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koje verzije proizvoda ispoljavaju problem tako da možemo ispravno da damo prioritet rešavanju tog problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-190">Allows us to identify which versions of the product are showing an issue so that we can correctly prioritize it.</span></span>

#### <a name="client"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-191">Klijent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-191">Client</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-192">Identifikator povezan sa instancom sistema Office na uređaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-192">Identifier related to an Office instance on a device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-193">Konstantan za sve sesije svih aplikacija određene verzije instalacije za paketi koji sadrže više aplikacija ili konstantan za sve sesije određene verzija aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-193">Constant for all sessions of all apps of a given installation version for multi-app suites, or constant for all sessions of a given application version.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-194">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-194">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-195">**Id** -Jedinstveni identifikator dodeljen klijentu u trenutku instaliranja sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-195">**Id** - Unique identifier assigned to a client at install time of Office.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-196">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo da li problemi utiču na određeni skup instalacija i na koliko korisnika oni utiču.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-196">Allows us to identify whether issues are impacting a select set of installs and how many users are impacted.</span></span>

#### <a name="consent"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-197">Pristanak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-197">Consent</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-198">Informacije o pristanku korisnika na prikupljanje dijagnostičkih podataka i povezanih iskustva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-198">Information regarding the users consent for diagnostic data and connected experiences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-199">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-199">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-200">**ControllerConnectedServicesSourceLocation** – ukazuje na to kako je izvršen izbor korisnika za opcionalna povezana iskustva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-200">**ControllerConnectedServicesSourceLocation** – Indicates how the user's choice for optional connected experiences was made</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-201">**ControllerConnectedServicesState** – ukazuje na to da li korisnik ima pristup opcionalnim povezanim iskustvima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-201">**ControllerConnectedServicesState** – Indicates whether the user has access to optional connected experiences</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-202">**Vreme pristanka za prikupljanje podataka o kontroleru statusa povezanih usluga** – Ukazuje na to kada je korisnik odabrao status opcionalnih povezanih iskustava.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-202">**ControllerConnectedServicesStateConsentTime** – Indicates when the user chose the status of optional connected experiences.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-203">Datum će se pojaviti kao tip datuma koji ljudi mogu da pročitaju ili kao računarski kodirani datum koji izgleda kao veliki broj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-203">The date will appear as either a human readable date or as a machine encoded date that looks like a large number.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-204">**Vreme pristanka za prikupljanje dijagnostičkih podataka** – ukazuje na to kada je korisnik obezbedio pristanak za prikupljanje dijagnostičkih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-204">**DiagnosticConsentConsentTime** – Indicates when the user provided the consent for diagnostic data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-205">Datum će se pojaviti kao tip datuma koji ljudi mogu da pročitaju ili kao računarski kodirani datum koji izgleda kao veliki broj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-205">The date will appear as either a human readable date or as a machine encoded date that looks like a large number.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-206">**Nivo pristanka za prikupljanje dijagnostičkih podataka** – označava na koji je nivo prikupljanja dijagnostičkih podataka korisnika dao pristanak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-206">**DiagnosticConsentLevel** – Indicates what level of diagnostic data consent the user has given</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-207">**DiagnosticConsentLevelSourceLocation** – označava način na koji je korisnik dao pristanak za dijagnostičke podatke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-207">**DiagnosticConsentLevelSourceLocation** – Indicates how the user had provided the consent for diagnostic data</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-208">**DownloadContentSourceLocation** – označava kako je korisnik napravio odabir omogućavanja ili onemogućavanja povezanih iskustava koja preuzimaju onlajn sadržaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-208">**DownloadContentSourceLocation** – Indicates how the user made the choice to enable or disable connected experiences that that download online content</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-209">**Status preuzetog sadržaja** – ukazuje na to da li je korisnik odabrao da omogući ili onemogući povezana iskustva koja preuzimaju sadržaj na mreži</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-209">**DownloadContentState** – Indicates whether the user has chosen to enable or disable connected experiences that download online content</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-210">**Vreme pristanka na prikupljanje podataka o statusu preuzetog sadržaja** – ukazuje na to kada je korisnik napravio izbor da omogući ili onemogući povezana iskustva koja preuzimaju sadržaj na mreži</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-210">**DownloadContentStateConsentTime** – Indicates when the user made the choice to enable or disable connected experiences that download online content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-211">Datum će se pojaviti kao tip datuma koji ljudi mogu da pročitaju ili kao računarski kodirani datum koji izgleda kao veliki broj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-211">The date will appear as either a human readable date or as a machine encoded date that looks like a large number.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-212">**Status povezanih usluga** – ukazuje na to da li je korisnik odabrao da koristi ili ne koristi sva povezana iskustva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-212">**ServiceConnectionState** – Indicates whether the user has chosen to use or not use all connected experiences</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-213">**Vreme pristanka za prikupljanje podataka o statusu povezanih usluga** – Ukazuje na to kada je korisnik odabrao da li da koristi sva povezana iskustva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-213">**ServiceConnectionStateConsentTime** – Indicates when the user chose whether to use all connected experiences.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-214">Datum će se pojaviti kao tip datuma koji ljudi mogu da pročitaju ili kao računarski kodirani datum koji izgleda kao veliki broj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-214">The date will appear as either a human readable date or as a machine encoded date that looks like a large number.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-215">**Izvorna lokacija statusa povezanih usluga** – ukazuje na to kako je korisnik napravio izbor da li želi da koristi sva povezane iskustva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-215">**ServiceConnectionStateSourceLocation** – Indicates how the user provided the choice whether to use all connected experiences</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-216">**UserCategoryValue ―** određuje vrstu korisnika koji daje pristanak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-216">**UserCategoryValue –** Identified the type of user who made the consent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-217">Jedan od MSAUser, AADUser ili LocalDeviceUser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-217">One of MSAUser, AADUser or LocalDeviceUser</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-218">**UserContentDependentSourceLocation** – ukazuje na to kako je korisnik napravio izbor da omogući ili onemogući povezana iskustva koja analiziraju sadržaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-218">**UserContentDependentSourceLocation** – Indicates how the user's choice to enable or disable was made for connected experiences that analyze content</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-219">**Status analize sadržaja povezanih iskustava korisnika** – ukazuje na to da li je korisnik odabrao da omogući ili onemogući povezana iskustva koja analiziraju sadržaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-219">**UserContentDependentState** – Indicates whether the user has chosen to enable or disable connected experiences that analyze content</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-220">**Vreme pristanka za prikupljanje podataka o statusu analize sadržaja povezanih iskustava korisnika** – Ukazuje na kada je korisnik napravio izbor da omogući ili onemogući povezana iskustva koja analiziraju sadržaj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-220">**UserContentDependentStateConsentTime** – Indicates when the user chose to enable or disable connected experiences that analyze content was made.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-221">Datum će se pojaviti kao tip datuma koji ljudi mogu da pročitaju ili kao računarski kodirani datum koji izgleda kao veliki broj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-221">The date will appear as either a human readable date or as a machine encoded date that looks like a large number.</span></span>

#### <a name="device"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-222">Uređaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-222">Device</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-223">Informacije o operativnom sistemu i izdanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-223">Information about the operating system and build.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-224">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-224">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-225">**Izdanje operativnog sistema** - broj izdanja operativnog sistema instaliranog na uređaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-225">**OsBuild** - The build number of the operating system installed on the device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-226">Omogućava nam da otkrijemo da li problemi utiču na pojedinačne servisne pakete ili verzije određenog operativnog sistema drugačije od drugih kako bismo dali prioritet rešavanju problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-226">Allows us to identify whether issues are impacting individual service packs or versions of a given operating system differently than others so we can prioritize issues.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-227">**Verzija operativnog sistema** - verzija operativnog sistema instaliranog na uređaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-227">**OsVersion** - The major version of the operating system installed on the device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-228">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo da li problemi utiču na jednu određenu verziju operativnog sistema više nego na druge kako bismo dali prioritet rešavanju problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-228">Allows us to determine if issues are impacting a particular operating system version more than other so we can prioritize issues.</span></span>

#### <a name="legacy"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-229">Zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-229">Legacy</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-230">Pruža Id aplikacije i verziju operativnog sistema za kompatibilnost sa postojećim zastarelim metodama prikupljanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-230">Provides an App ID and OS version for compatibility with existing legacy collection practices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-231">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-231">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-232">**ID aplikacije** – vrednost brojača koja predstavlja aplikaciju koja šalje podatke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-232">**AppId** - An enumerator value representing which application is sending the data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-233">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koja aplikacija ima problem, tako da znamo kako da ga popravimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-233">Allows us to identify which application is showing an issue so we know how to address it.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-234">**Okruženje operativnog sistema** – brojač koja ukazuje na kojem operativnom sistemu je sesija pokrenuta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-234">**OsEnv** - An enumerator indicating which operating system the session is running on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-235">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo na kojem operativnom sistemu se problem ispoljava kako bismo dali prioritet rešavanju problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-235">Allows us to identify which operating system an issue happening on so we can prioritize issues.</span></span>

#### <a name="release"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-236">Izdanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-236">Release</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-237">Informacije koje se odnose na kanal izdanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-237">Information related to the release channel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-238">Sva polja su konstantna za sve sesije svih aplikacija određene verzije instalacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-238">All fields are constant for all sessions of all apps of a given installation version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-239">Određuje grupu uređaja sve u jednoj fazi ciklusa izdavanja proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-239">Identifies a group of devices all in one phase of a product release cycle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-240">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-240">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-241">**Publika** - određuje podgrupu korisnika u okviru određene grupe korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-241">**Audience** - Identifies a sub-audience of a given audience group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-242">Omogućava nam da pratimo podskupove grupa korisnika radi procene rasprostranjenosti i određivanja prioriteta problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-242">Allows us to track subsets of audience groups to evaluate prevalence and prioritization of issues.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-243">**Grupa korisnika** - određuje iz kog kruga podaci dolaze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-243">**AudienceGroup** - Identifies the ring where data is coming from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-244">Omogućava nam da objavimo funkcije u fazama i ustanovimo potencijalne probleme pre nego što dospeju do većina korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-244">Allows us to roll out features in a staged fashion and identify potential issues before they reach most users.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-245">**Kanal** - kanal putem kojeg se proizvod objavljuje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-245">**Channel** - The channel that the product is being released through.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-246">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo da li problem utiče na jedan od naših distributivnih kanala drugačije nego na druge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-246">Allows us to identify if an issue is impacting one of our rollout channels differently than others.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-247">**Ogranak** - određuje ogranak proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-247">**Fork** - Identifies the fork of the product.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-248">Omogućava mehanizam za grupisanje podataka u okviru skupa verzija radi utvrđivanja problema vezanih za određeno izdanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-248">Allows a mechanism to aggregate data across a set of build numbers to identify issues related to a given release.</span></span>

#### <a name="session"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-249">Sesija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-249">Session</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-250">Informacije o procesu sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-250">Information about the process session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-251">Sva polja su konstantna za ovu sesiju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-251">All fields are constant for this session.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-252">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-252">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-253">**AB konfiguracije** - određuje skup letova koji se izvršavaju u određenoj sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-253">**ABConfigs** - Identifies the set of flights that are running in a given session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-254">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koji pojedinačni letovi se izvršavaju u sesiji, tako da možemo utvrditi da li je let izvor problema koji utiče na korisnike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-254">Allows us to identify which individual flights are running on a session so that we can determine if a flight is the source of an issue impacting users.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-255">**EcsETag** – indikator iz sistema letova koji predstavlja letove poslate na računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-255">**EcsETag** - An indicator from the flighting system that represents the flights sent to the machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-256">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koji letovi mogu da utiču na određenu sesiju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-256">Allows us to identify what flights might be impacting a given session.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-257">**Zastavice** – zastavice za praćenje maske bitova koje se mogu primeniti na celu sesiju, trenutno prevashodno usmerene na uzorkovanje i opcije dijagnostičkih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-257">**Flags** - Bitmask tracking flags applicable to an entire session, currently primarily focused on sampling and diagnostic data options.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-258">Omogućava nam da kontrolišemo ponašanje određene sesije u odnosu na dijagnostičke podatke koje ona generiše.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-258">Allows us to control how a given session behaves in relation to the diagnostic data that the session generates.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-259">**HostAppName** –prepoznaje ime aplikacije hosta koje pokreće potaplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-259">**HostAppName** - Identifies the host app name that launches a sub-app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-260">Aplikacije kao što su Office Mobile (Android) mogu da pokrenu podaplikacije za Word, Excel i PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-260">Apps like Office Mobile (Android) can launch Word, Excel, and PowerPoint sub-apps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-261">Za takve podaplikacije, aplikacija host je Office – Emobajl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-261">For such sub-apps, the host app is OfficeMobile</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-262">**Hostssionid** –jedinstveno identifikuje sesiju hosta aplikacije za podaplikaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-262">**HostSessionId** - Uniquely identifies the host app session for a sub-app</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-263">**Id** – jedinstveno identifikuje određenu sesiju podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-263">**Id** - Uniquely identifies a given session of data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-264">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo uticaj problema procenom broja sesija na koje problem utiče i da li postoje funkcije koje su zajedničke za ove sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-264">Allows us to identify the impact of issues by evaluating the number of sessions that are impacted and if there are common features of those sessions.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-265">**Id utiska** - određuje skup letova koji se izvršavaju u određenoj sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-265">**ImpressionId** - Identifies the set of flights that are running in a given session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-266">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koji pojedinačni letovi se izvršavaju u sesiji, tako da možemo utvrditi da li je let izvor problema koji utiče na korisnike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-266">Allows us to identify which individual flights are running on a session so that we can determine if a flight is the source of an issue impacting users.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-267">**Merenje omogućeno** – zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li se podaci trenutne sesije uzorkuju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-267">**MeasuresEnabled** - Flag indicating if the current sessions data is sampled or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-268">Omogućava nam da odredimo kako statistički proceniti podatke koji su prikupljeni u određenoj sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-268">Allows us to determine how to statistically evaluate the data that is gathered from the given session.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-269">**SamplingClientIdValue** – ID klijenta kojim se utvrđuje da li je deo uzorkovanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-269">**SamplingClientIdValue** - The ID of the client used to determine if it is part of sampling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-270">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo zašto je pojedinačna sesija uključena ili isključena iz uzoraka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-270">Allows us to determine why an individual session was included or excluded from sampling.</span></span>
  
 - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-271">**SubAppName** – za aplikaciju Office za mobilne uređaje ovo polje predstavlja temeljnu aplikaciju koja se koristi za otvaranje dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-271">**SubAppName** - For Office Mobile app, this field represents the underlying application being used to open a document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-272">Na primer, ako otvorite dokument programa Word u aplikaciji Office, to polje će prijaviti vrednost „Word“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-272">For example, if you open a Word document in Office app, this field will report the value of “Word”.</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-273">**VirtualizationType** – vrsta vizuelizacije ako se Office radi u jednoj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-273">**VirtualizationType** - Type of virtualization if Office is running in one.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-274">Moguće vrednosti su:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-274">The possible values are:</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-275">0 = Nijedno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-275">0 = None</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-276">1 = Windows virtuelna radna površina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-276">1 = Windows Virtual Desktop</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-277">2 = Application Guard Windows zaštitnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-277">2 = Windows Defender Application Guard</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-278">3 = Windows Core OS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-278">3 = Windows Core OS</span></span>

#### <a name="user"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-279">Korisnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-279">User</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-280">Pruža informacije o zakupcu za jedinice za čuvanje zaliha komercijalnog softvera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-280">Provides tenant information for commercial software SKUs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-281">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-281">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-282">**Heš primarnog identiteta** – identifikator pod pseudonimom koji predstavlja trenutnog korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-282">**PrimaryIdentityHash** – A pseudonymous identifier that represents the current user.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-283">**Mesto primarnog identiteta** – tip identiteta sadržanog u hešu primarnog identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-283">**PrimaryIdentitySpace** – The type of identity contained in the PrimaryIdentityHash.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-284">Jedan od MASCID, OrgIdCID ili UserObjectId.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-284">One of MASCID, OrgIdCID or UserObjectId.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-285">**Grupa zakupca** - tip zakupca kome pripada pretplata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-285">**TenantGroup** - The type of the tenant that the subscription belongs to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-286">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo probleme i otkrijemo da li je problem rasprostranjen ili izolovan u skupu korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-286">Allows us to classify issues and identify whether a problem is widespread or isolated to a set of users.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-287">**ID zakupca** – zakupac sa kojim je povezana pretplata korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-287">**TenantId** - The tenant that a user's subscription is tied to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-288">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo probleme i otkrijemo da li je problem široko rasprostranjen ili izolovan skup korisnika ili određenog zakupca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-288">Allows us to classify issues and identify whether a problem is widespread or isolated to a set of users or a specific tenant.</span></span>

### <a name="information-that-specifically-supports-diagnostic-data-collection"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-289">*Informacije koje posebno podržavaju prikupljanje dijagnostičkih podataka*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-289">*Information that specifically supports diagnostic data collection*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-290">Informacije koje posebno podržavaju prikupljanje dijagnostičkih podataka se prikupljaju u sledećim kategorijama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-290">Information that specifically supports diagnostic data collection is collected in the following categories.</span></span>

#### <a name="activity"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-291">Aktivnost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-291">Activity</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-292">Informacije koje služe za razumevanje uspešnosti samog procesa prikupljanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-292">Information to understand the success of the collection event itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-293">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-293">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-294">**Režim grupisanja** - govori sistemu kako da grupiše rezultate aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-294">**AggMode** - Tells the system how to aggregate activity results.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-295">Omogućava nam da smanjimo količinu informacija koje se otpremaju sa računara korisnika tako što grupišemo rezultate aktivnosti u jedan događaj koji se šalje povremeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-295">Allows us to reduce the amount of information uploaded from a user's machine by aggregating activity results into a single event that gets sent periodically.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-296">**Broj** - koliko puta se aktivnost izvršila ako se broj izračunava iz grupisanog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-296">**Count** - The number of times the activity happened if the count is from an aggregated event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-297">Omogućava nam da odredimo koliko često se aktivnost uspešno ili neuspešno izvršila u odnosu na režim grupisanja aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-297">Allows us to determine how often an activity succeeded or failed based on the aggregation mode of the activity.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-298">**CV** - vrednost koja određuje odnos između aktivnosti i podaktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-298">**CV** - A value that identifies the relationship between activities and sub-activities.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-299">Omogućava nam da obnovimo odnos između ugnežđenih aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-299">Allows us to rebuild the relationship between nested activities.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-300">**Trajanje** - koliko vremena je bilo potrebno za izvršavanje aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-300">**Duration** - The length of time the activity took to execute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-301">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo probleme sa performansama koje negativno utiču na iskustvo korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-301">Allows us to identify performance issues that are negatively impacting the user's experience.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-302">**Result.Code** – Aplikacijom određen kôd koji služi za identifikaciju određenog rezultata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-302">**Result.Code** - An application defined code to identify a given result.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-303">Omogućava nam da odredimo preciznije detalje određenog neuspeha, kao što je kôd greške koji se može koristiti za klasifikaciju i rešavanje problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-303">Allows us to determine more specific details of a given failure such as a failure code that can be used to classify and fix issues.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-304">**Rezultat.Oznaka** - oznaka celog broja koji određuje lokaciju u kodu gde je rezultat generisan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-304">**Result.Tag** - An integer tag that identifies the location in code where the result was generated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-305">Omogućava nam da jasno odredimo lokaciju u kôdu na kojoj je rezultat generisan što omogućava klasifikaciju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-305">Allows us to distinctly identify the location in code where a result was generated which enables classification of failures.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-306">**Result.Type** – tip kôda rezultata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-306">**Result.Type** - The type of the result code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-307">Određuje koji tip koda rezultata je poslat tako da vrednost može da se ispravno tumači.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-307">Identifies what type of result code was sent so that the value can be correctly interpreted.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-308">**Uspeh** – zastavica koja označava da li je aktivnost uspešno izvršena ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-308">**Success** - A flag indicating if the activity succeeded or failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-309">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo da li se radnje koje korisnik preduzima u proizvodu uspešno izvršavaju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-309">Allows us to determine if actions the user takes in the product are succeeding or failing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-310">To nam omogućava da prepoznamo probleme koji utiču na korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-310">This allows us to identify issues that are impacting the user.</span></span>

#### <a name="application"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-311">Aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-311">Application</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-312">Informacije o instalaciji aplikacije iz koje se događaji prikupljaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-312">Information about the installation of the application from which the events are being gathered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-313">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-313">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-314">**Arhitektura** - arhitektura aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-314">**Architecture** - The architecture of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-315">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo greške koje mogu biti specifične za arhitekturu aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-315">Let's us classify errors that might be specific to an architecture of the application.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-316">**Verzija „Klikni i pokreni“ paketa** - broj verzije „Klikni i pokreni“ paketa putem kojeg je aplikacija instalirana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-316">**Click2RunPackageVersion** - The version number of the Click-To-Run package that installed the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-317">Omogućava nam da identifikujemo koja je verzija programa za instaliranje korišćena za instalaciju sistema Office, tako da možemo identifikovati probleme povezane sa podešavanjem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-317">Allows us to identify which version of the installer was used to install Office so we can identify setup-related issues.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-318">**Distribucioni kanal** - kanal putem kojeg je aplikacija implementirana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-318">**DistributionChannel** - The channel where the app was deployed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-319">Omogućava nam da podelimo dolazne podatke kako bismo utvrdili da li problemi utiču na korisnike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-319">Allows us to partition incoming data so we can determine if issues are impacting audiences.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-320">**Metod instalacije** - Da li je trenutna verzija sistema Office instalirana nadogradnjom, vraćanjem na prethodnu verziju ili novom instalacijom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-320">**InstallMethod** - Whether the current build of Office was upgraded from an older build, rolled back to an older build, or a fresh install.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-321">**Je „Klikni i pokreni“ instalacija** – zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je instalacija tipa „Klikni i pokreni“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-321">**IsClickToRunInstall** - Flag indicating if install was a click to run install.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-322">Omogućava nam da prepoznamo probleme koje mogu biti specifični za mehanizam „Klikni i Pokreni“ instalacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-322">Allows us to identify issues that might be specific to the Click-To-Run install mechanism.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-323">**IsDebug** – Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li verzija sistema Office predstavlja izdanje za otklanjanje grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-323">**IsDebug** - Flag indicating if the Office build is a Debug build.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-324">Omogućava nam da otkrijemo da li problemi dolaze iz verzija za otklanjanje grešaka koje mogu da se ponašaju drugačije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-324">Allows us to identify if issues are coming from Debug builds, which may behave differently.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-325">**Je instalirano na spoljašnjem uređaju za skladištenje** – zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je sistem Office instaliran na spoljašnjem uređaju za skladištenje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-325">**IsInstalledOnExternalStorage** - Flag indicating if Office was installed on an external storage device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-326">Omogućava nam da odredimo da li uzrok problema može biti vezan za spoljni prostor za skladištenje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-326">Let's us determine if issues can be traced to an external storage location.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-327">**Je OEM Instalacija** – zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je Office instalirao proizvođač originalne opreme (OEM).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-327">**IsOEMInstalled** - Flag indicating if Office was installed by an original equipment manufacturer (OEM).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-328">Omogućava nam da odredimo da li je aplikaciju instalirao OEM, što nam može pomoći da klasifikujemo i identifikujemo probleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-328">Let's us determine if the application was installed by an OEM, which can help us classify and identify issues.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-329">**Prethodna verzija** - verzija sistema Office koja je prethodno bila instalirana na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-329">**PreviousVersion** - The version of Office that was previously installed on the machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-330">Omogućava nam da vratimo prethodnu verziju ako aktuelna verzija ima problem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-330">Allows us to roll back to a previous version if the current one has an issue.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-331">**Ime izvršne datoteke procesa** - ime izvršne datoteke aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-331">**ProcessFileName** - The name of the application filename.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-332">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo ime izvršne datoteke koja generiše podatke pošto može postojati nekoliko različitih imena izvršne datoteke procesa koja se pojavljuju pod istim imenom aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-332">Allows us to identify the name of the executable that is generating the data as there may be several different process filenames reporting as the same app name.</span></span>

#### <a name="client"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-333">Klijent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-333">Client</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-334">Informacije o Office aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-334">Information about the Office client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-335">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-335">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-336">**Vreme prvog pokretanja** – Kada je klijent prvi put pokrenut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-336">**FirstRunTime** - The first time the client was run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-337">Omogućava nam da razumemo koliko dugo je korisnik imao instaliran sistem Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-337">Allows us to understand how long the client has had Office installed.</span></span>

#### <a name="device"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-338">Uređaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-338">Device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-339">Informacije o mogućnostima i konfiguraciji uređaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-339">Information about device configuration and capabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-340">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-340">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-341">**Podaci uređaja za digitalizaciju** – informacije o uređaju za digitalizaciju koji računar koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-341">**DigitizerInfo** - Information on the digitizer used by the machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-342">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo podatke na osnovu okretanja uređaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-342">Allows us to classify data based on device pivot.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-343">**Veličina i oblik uređaja** - određuje koje veličine i oblika je uređaj koji šalje infomacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-343">**FormFactor** - Identifies what form factor the device sending the info is.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-344">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo podatke na osnovu okretanja uređaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-344">Allows us to classify data based on device pivot.</span></span>
