#### <a name="event"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-391">Događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-391">Event</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-392">Informacije specifične za određeni događaj, uključujući i njegov jedinstveni identifikator u okviru sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-392">Event-specific information, including its unique identifier in the session.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-393">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-393">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-394">**Ugovor** - Lista svih ugovora koji događaj sprovodi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-394">**Contract** - A list of any contracts that the event is implementing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-395">Omogućava nam da razmotrimo koji podaci su deo pojedinačnog događaja, tako da efikasno možemo da ih obradimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-395">Allows us to evaluate what data is part of the individual event so that we can process it effectively.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-396">**CV** - Vrednost koja nam omogućava da identifikujemo događaje koji su povezani jedan sa drugim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-396">**CV** - A value that allows us to identify events that are related to one another.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-397">Koristi se za dijagnostiku da nam omogući da identifikujemo obrasce srodnog ponašanja ili srodnih događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-397">Used for diagnostics to allow us to identify patterns of related behavior or related events.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-398">**Zastavice** - Informacije koje se koriste da izmene način odgovara određenog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-398">**Flags** - Information used to alter how a given event responds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-399">Koristi se za upravljanje načina na koji se određeni događaj tretira u svrhu otpremanja podataka korporaciji Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-399">Used to manage how a given event is treated for the purposes of uploading the data to Microsoft.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-400">**Id** - Jedinstveni identifikator događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-400">**Id** - A unique identifier for the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-401">Omogućava nam da jedinstveno identifikujemo događaje koji primamo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-401">Allows us to uniquely identify the events that are being received.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-402">**Level** – označava tip događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-402">**Level** - denotes the type of event.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-403">**Ime** - Ime događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-403">**Name** - The name of the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-404">Omogućava da identifikujemo događaj koji je klijent poslao.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-404">Allows us to identify the event that was being sent from the client.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-405">**Pravilo** – Identifikator pravila koji je generisao podatke ako su generisani po pravilu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-405">**Rule** - An identifier of the rule that generated the data if it was generated by a rule.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-406">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo izvor dela podataka, kako bismo mogli da proverimo valjanost i upravljamo parametrima tog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-406">Allows us to identify the source of a piece of data so that we can validate and manage that events parameters</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-407">**Id pravila** – Identifikator pravila koje je generisalo podatke ako su generisani po pravilu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-407">**RuleId** - The identifier of the rule that generated the data if it was generated by a rule.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-408">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo izvor dela podataka, kako bismo mogli da proverimo valjanost i upravljamo parametrima tog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-408">Allows us to identify the source of a piece of data so that we can validate and manage that events parameters.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-409">**Interfejs pravila** - Bilo koji interfejs koji određeno pravilo implementira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-409">**RuleInterfaces** - Any interfaces that are implemented by the specific rule.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-410">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo i uvezemo podatke zasnovane na njihovoj strukturi, što pojednostavljuje obradu podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-410">Allows us to classify and import the data based on its structure, which simplifies data processing.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-411">**Verzija pravila** – Identifikator pravila koje je generisalo podatke ako su generisani po pravilu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-411">**RuleVersion** - The identifier of the rule that generated the data if it was generated by a rule.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-412">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo izvor dela podataka, kako bismo mogli da proverimo valjanost i upravljamo parametrima tog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-412">Allows us to identify the source of a piece of data so that we can validate and manage that events parameters.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-413">**Brzina uzorka** – pokazatelj koliki procenat korisnika šalje taj deo podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-413">**SampleRate** - An indication of what percentage of users are sending this piece of data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-414">To nam omogućava da uradimo statističku analizu podataka i za vrlo česte tačke podataka ne zahteva slanje od svih korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-414">This allows us to do statistical analysis of the data and for very common data points not require that to be sent by all users.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-415">**Verzija šeme** – Verzija šeme koja se koristi za generisanje dijagnostičkih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-415">**SchemaVersion** - The version of the schema used to generate diagnostic data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-416">Obavezno za upravljanje podacima koji su poslati od klijenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-416">Required to manage data being sent from the client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-417">Ovo omogućava povremene promene podataka koje svaki klijent šalje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-417">This allows changes over time in what data is being sent from each client.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-418">**Redosled** - Brojač koji identifikuje redosled prema kojem je događaj generisan na klijentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-418">**Sequence** - A counter that identifies the order that an event was generated on the client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-419">Omogućava da se primljeni podaci poređaju tako da možemo da utvrdimo koji su koraci možda doveli do problema koji utiče na klijente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-419">Allows the data being received to be ordered so that we can identify what steps may have led to an issue that is impacting clients.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-420">**Izvor** -Izvorni kanal koji je korišćen za otpremanje podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-420">**Source** - The source pipeline that was used to upload the data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-421">Obavezno za praćenje svih naš otpremnih kanala za celokupno zdravlje i za pomoć u prepoznavanju problema sa otpremnih kanala.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-421">Required to monitor each of our upload pipelines for overall health and to help identify issues with the upload pipeline.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-422">To nam omogućava praćenje pojedinačnih otpremnih kanala kako bismo obezbedili njihovu usaglašenost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-422">This allows us to monitor individual upload pipelines to make sure they remain compliant.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-423">**Vreme** – Vreme generisanja događaja na klijentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-423">**Time** - The time that the event was generated on the client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-424">Omogućava nam da sinhronizujemo i proverimo redosled događaja generisanih na klijentu, kao i da uspostavimo pokazatelje performansi za uputstva korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-424">Allows us to synchronize and validate the order of events generated on the client and establish performance metrics for user instructions.</span></span> 

#### <a name="host"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-425">Domaćin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-425">Host</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-426">Informacije o aplikaciji koja sadrži ugrađenu aplikaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-426">Information about an application that hosts an embedded application</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-427">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-427">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-428">**ID** -Jedinstveni identifikator koji ugrađena aplikacija pripisuje aplikaciji koja je domaćin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-428">**Id** - The unique identifier attributed to the host application by the embedded application.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-429">**ID sesije** – univerzalni jedinstveni identifikator za sesiju domaćina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-429">**SessionId** - The globally unique identifier for the host's session.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-430">**Verzija** – Identifikator verzije primarne izvršne datoteke domaćina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-430">**Version** - The version identifier of the host's primary executable.</span></span>

#### <a name="legacy"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-431">Zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-431">Legacy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-432">Informacije koje su neophodne za kompatibilnost starih sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-432">Information needed for legacy system compatibility.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-433">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-433">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-434">**Izdanje operativnog sistema** - Specifičan broj izdanja operativnog sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-434">**OsBuild** - The specific build number of the operating system.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-435">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo iz koje verzije operativnog sistema potiču dijagnostički podaci kako bismo odredili prioritet problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-435">Allows us to determine which version of the operating system the diagnostic data is coming from in order to prioritize issues.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-436">**Broj revizije izdanja operativnog sistema** - broj revizije za izdanje operativnog sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-436">**OsBuildRevision** - The revision number of the build of the operating system.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-437">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo iz koje verzije operativnog sistema potiču dijagnostički podaci kako bismo odredili prioritet problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-437">Allows us to determine which version of the operating system the diagnostic data is coming from in order to prioritize issues.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-438">**Međuverzija operativnog sistema** - Međuverzija operativnog sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-438">**OsMinorVersion** - The minor version of the operating system.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-439">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo iz koje verzije operativnog sistema potiču dijagnostički podaci kako bismo odredili prioritet problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-439">Allows us to determine which version of the operating system the diagnostic data is coming from in order to prioritize issues.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-440">**Niska verzije operativnog sistema** – Objedinjena niska koja predstavlja broj izdanja operativnog sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-440">**OsVersionString** - A unified string representing the operating system build number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-441">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo iz koje verzije operativnog sistema potiču dijagnostički podaci kako bismo odredili prioritet problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-441">Allows us to determine which version of the operating system the diagnostic data is coming from in order to prioritize issues.</span></span>

#### <a name="session"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-442">Sesija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-442">Session</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-443">Informacije o procesu sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-443">Information about the process session.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-444">Ova kategorija sadrži sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-444">This category contains the following fields:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-445">**Delta AB konfiguracija** - Prati razlike između podataka trenutne AB konfiguracije i prethodne vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-445">**ABConfigsDelta** - Tracks the difference between the current ABConfigs data and the previous value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-446">Omogućava nam da pratimo nove letove na računaru kako bi utvrdili da li je novi let odgovoran za problem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-446">Allows us to track what new flights are on the machine to help identify if a new flight is responsible for an issue.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-447">**Klasifikacija prikupljenih podataka** - Klase informacija koje sesija može da prikupi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-447">**CollectibleClassification** - The classes of information the session can collect.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-448">Omogućava filtriranje sesija na osnovu podataka koje bi one imale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-448">Allows filtering of sessions based on the data they would have.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-449">**Onemogućavanje telemetrije** – Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je aktiviran ključ za onemogućavanje telemetrije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-449">**DisableTelemetry** - Flag indicating if the DisableTelemetry key is set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-450">Omogućava nam da znamo ako sesija nije prijavljivala dijagnostičke podatke koji ne spadaju u metapodatke osnovnih usluga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-450">Allows us to know if a session was not reporting diagnostic data other than EssentialServiceMetadata.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-451">**Id vrednost klijenta za uzorkovanje** - Vrednost ključa koji se koristi za određivanje uzorkovanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-451">**SamplingClientIdValue** - The value of the key used to determine sampling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-452">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo zašto je sesija uzorkovana ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-452">Allows us to determine why a session was sampled or not.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-453">**Id vrednost uređaja za uzorkovanje** - Vrednost ključa koji se koristi za određivanje uzorkovanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-453">**SamplingDeviceIdValue** - The value of the key used to determine sampling.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-454">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo zašto je sesija uzorkovana ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-454">Allows us to determine why a session was sampled or not.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-455">**Ključ uzorkovanja** -ključ koji se koristi za određivanje da li je sesija uzorkovana ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-455">**SamplingKey** - The key used to determine whether the session is sampled or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-456">Omogućava nam da razumemo kako pojedinačne sesije prave izbor da li su uzorkovane ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-456">Allows us to understand how individual sessions are making their choice of whether they are sampled or not.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-457">**Metoda uzorkovanja** - Metoda koja se koristi za određivanje smernica za uzorkovanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-457">**SamplingMethod** - The method used to determine sampling policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-458">Omogućava nam da razumemo koji podaci potiču iz sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-458">Allows us to understand what data is coming from a session.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-459">**K vrednost uzorkovanja sesije** – Napredni metapodaci uzorkovanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-459">**SamplingSessionKValue** - Advanced sampling metadata.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-460">Koriste se za procenu statističkog značenja primljenih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-460">Used to help evaluate statistical meaning of data that is received.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-461">**N vrednost uzorkovanja sesije** – Napredni metapodaci uzorkovanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-461">**SamplingSessionNValue** - Advanced sampling metadata.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-462">Koriste se za procenu statističkog značenja primljenih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-462">Used to help evaluate statistical meaning of data that is received.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-463">**Redosled** - Jedinstveni numerički identifikator za sesiju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-463">**Sequence** - A unique numeric identifier for the session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-464">Omogućava redosled sesija za analizu problema koji može da nastane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-464">Allows the ordering of sessions for analysis of the issues might have occurred.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-465">**Početak** – Vreme pokretanja procesa sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-465">**Start** - The boot time of the process session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-466">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo kada je sesija počela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-466">Allows us to establish when the session started.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-467">**Nivo dozvole za telemetriju** – Vrednost koja ukazuje na nivo prikupljanja dijagnostičkih podataka koji je korisnik dozvolio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-467">**TelemetryPermissionLevel** - Value indicating what level of diagnostic data the user has opted into.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-468">Omogućava nam da razumemo koji nivo dijagnostičkih podataka da očekujemo od sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-468">Allows us to understand what level of diagnostic data to expect from a session.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-469">**Razlika između vremenskih zona u minutima** - Razlika u minutima između lokalnog vremena i UTC vremena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-469">**TimeZoneBiasInMinutes** - The difference in minutes between UTC and the local time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-470">Omogućava normalizaciju UTC vremena u lokalno vreme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-470">Allows normalization of UTC times back to the local time.</span></span>

## <a name="data-fields-that-are-common-for-onenote-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-471">Polja podataka koja su uobičajena za OneNote događaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-471">Data fields that are common for OneNote events</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-472">Sledeća polja podataka su uobičajena za sve događaje za OneNote u sistemu Mac, iOS i Android.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-472">The following data fields are common for all events for OneNote on Mac, iOS, and Android.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-473">Kada koristite prikazivač podataka za dijagnostiku, pojaviće se događaji za OneNote u usluzi Mac, iOS i Android sa nazivom Aktivnosti, ReportData ili Neočekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-473">When using the Diagnostic Data Viewer, events for OneNote on Mac, iOS, and Android will appear to have a name of Activity, ReportData, or Unexpected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-474">Da biste pronašli stvarno ime događaja, izaberite događaj, a zatim pogledajte polje Ime događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-474">To find the actual event name, select the event, and then look at the EventName field.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-475">**Activity_ActivityType** -  Označava vrstu ovog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-475">**Activity_ActivityType** -  Indicates the type of this activity event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-476">Aktivnost može biti normalna aktivnost ili aktivnost visokih vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-476">An activity can be a normal activity or a high value activity.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-477">**Activity_AggMode** - Pokazuje sistemu kako da grupiše rezultate aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-477">**Activity_AggMode** -  Tells the system how to aggregate activity results.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-478">Omogućava nam da smanjimo količinu informacija koje se otpremaju sa računara korisnika tako što grupišemo rezultate aktivnosti u jedan događaj koji se šalje povremeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-478">Allows us to reduce the amount of information uploaded from a user's machine by aggregating activity results into a single event that gets sent periodically.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-479">**Activity_Count** - Koliko puta se aktivnost izvršila ako se broj izračunava iz grupisanog događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-479">**Activity_Count** -  The number of times the activity happened if the count is from an aggregated event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-480">Omogućava nam da odredimo koliko često se aktivnost uspešno ili neuspešno izvršila u odnosu na režim grupisanja aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-480">Allows us to determine how often an activity succeeded or failed based on the aggregation mode of the activity.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-481">**Activity_CV** - Vrednost koja određuje odnos između aktivnosti i podaktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-481">**Activity_CV** -  A value that identifies the relationship between activities and sub-activities.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-482">Omogućava nam da obnovimo odnos između ugnježđenih aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-482">Allows us to rebuild the relationship between nested activities.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-483">**Activity_DetachedDurationInMicroseconds** – Vreme trajanja kada aktivnost miruje i ne radi nijedan stvarni posao, ali vreme se i dalje računa prema vremenu ukupne aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-483">**Activity_DetachedDurationInMicroseconds** -  The length of time an activity is idle and not doing any real work, but the time is still count towards the total activity's time.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-484">**Activity_DurationInMicroseconds** - Koliko vremena je bilo potrebno za izvršavanje aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-484">**Activity_DurationInMicroseconds** -  The length of time the activity took to execute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-485">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo probleme sa performansama koje negativno utiču na iskustvo korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-485">Allows us to identify performance issues that are negatively impacting the user's experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-486">**Activity_Expiration** – Datum u numeričkom formatu označava kada će ovaj događaj prestati da se šalje od klijenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-486">**Activity_Expiration** -  A date in numerical format indicates when this event will be stop sending from clients</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-487">**Activity_FailCount** – Koliko puta ova aktivnost nije uspela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-487">**Activity_FailCount** -  The number of times this activity has failed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-488">**Activity_Name** – Skraćeno ime događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-488">**Activity_Name** -  A short name of an event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-489">Omogućava da identifikujemo događaj koji je klijent poslao.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-489">Allows us to identify the event that was being sent from the client.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-490">**Activity_Namespace** – Prostor imena događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-490">**Activity_Namespace** -  A namespace of an event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-491">Dozvoljava grupisanje događaja u grupe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-491">Allows us to group the event into groups.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-492">**Activity_Reason** - Niska koja pokazuje razlog zbog kojeg se aktivnost završava određenim rezultatom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-492">**Activity_Reason** -  A string indicating the reason causing an activity to ends with a particular result.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-493">**Activity_Result** - Zastavica koja ukazuje da li je aktivnost uspela, nije uspela ili neočekivano nije uspela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-493">**Activity_Result** -  A flag indicating if the activity succeeded, failed, or unexpectedly failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-494">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo da li se radnje koje korisnik preduzima u proizvodu uspešno izvršavaju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-494">Allows us to determine if actions the user takes in the product are succeeding or failing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-495">To nam omogućava da prepoznamo probleme koji utiču na korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-495">This allows us to identify issues that are impacting the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-496">**Activity_State** – Zastavica koja označava da li je događaj početak korisničke aktivnosti ili kraj korisničke aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-496">**Activity_State** -  A flag indicates whether an event is a start of a user activity or an end of a user activity.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-497">**Activity_FailCount** – Koliko puta je ova aktivnost uspela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-497">**Activity_SucceedCount** -  The number of times this activity succeeded.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-498">**Kôd greške** – Označava kôd greške ako je dostupan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-498">**ErrorCode** -  Indicates an error code if available.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-499">**Kôd greške2** – Označava drugi kôd greške ako je dostupan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-499">**ErrorCode2** -  Indicates a second error code if available.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-500">**Kôd greške3** – Označava treći kôd greške ako je dostupan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-500">**ErrorCode3** -  Indicates a third error code if available.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-501">**Oznaka greške** – Ukazuje na oznaku koja se odnosi na kôd greške ako je dostupna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-501">**ErrorTag** -  Indicates the tag associated in code of an error if available.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-502">**ErrorType** – Ukazuje na tip greške ako je dostupan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-502">**ErrorType** -  Indicates the type of an error if available.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-503">**EventName** - Jedinstveno ime događaja programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-503">**EventName** -  A unique name of a OneNote's event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-504">OneNote događaji koriste ovo prilagođeno polje da bi naveli jedinstveno ime zahvaljujući inženjerskom ograničenju u prošlosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-504">OneNote events use this custom field to specify a unique name due to an engineering limitation in the past.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-505">**ExpFeatures** - Ukazuje na to da li korisnik uključuje eksperimentalne funkcije u aplikaciji OneNote ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-505">**ExpFeatures** -  Indicates whether a user has turn-on an experimental-feature switch in OneNote app or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-506">**ExpirationDate** – Datum u numeričkom formatu označava kada će ovaj događaj prestati da se šalje od klijenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-506">**ExpirationDate** -  A date in numerical format indicates when this event will be stop sending from clients</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-507">**IsConsumer** – Ukazuje na to da li je korisnik potrošač ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-507">**IsConsumer** -  Indicates whether a user is consumer or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-508">**IsEdu** – Ukazuje na to da li je korisnik u zakupcu obrazovanja ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-508">**IsEdu** -  Indicates whether a user is a user in education tenant or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-509">**IsIW** – Ukazuje na to da li je korisnik korporativni koristnik ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-509">**IsIW** -  Indicates whether a user is an enterprise user or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-510">**IsMsftInternal** – Ukazuje na to da li je korisnik Microsoft službenik ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-510">**IsMsftInternal** -  Indicates whether a user is a Microsoft employee or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-511">**IsPremiumUser** – Ukazuje na to da li korisnik ima Premium licencu ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-511">**IsPremiumUser** -  Indicates whether a user has premium license or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-512">**Namespace** – Prostor imena događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-512">**Namespace** -  A namespace of the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-513">Dozvoljava grupisanje događaja u grupe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-513">Allows us to group the event into groups.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-514">**Release_AppStore** - Zastavica ukazuje na to da li verzija dolazi iz prodavnice aplikacija ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-514">**Release_AppStore** -  A flag indicates whether a build is coming from an app store or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-515">**Release_Audience** - Određuje podgrupu korisnika u okviru određene grupe korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-515">**Release_Audience** -  Identifies a sub-audience of a given audience group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-516">Omogućava nam da pratimo podskupove grupa korisnika radi procene rasprostranjenosti i određivanja prioriteta problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-516">Allows us to track subsets of audience groups to evaluate prevalence and prioritization of issues.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-517">**Release_AudienceGroup** - Određuje iz kog kruga podaci dolaze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-517">**Release_AudienceGroup** -  Identifies the ring where data is coming from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-518">Omogućava nam da objavimo funkcije u fazama i ustanovimo potencijalne probleme pre nego što dospeju do većine korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-518">Allows us to roll out features in a staged fashion and identify potential issues before they reach most users.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-519">**Release_Channel** - Kanal putem kojeg se proizvod objavljuje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-519">**Release_Channel** -  The channel that the product is being released through.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-520">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo da li problem utiče na jedan od naših distributivnih kanala drugačije nego na druge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-520">Allows us to identify if an issue is impacting one of our rollout channels differently than others.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-521">**RunningMode** – Ukazuje na to na koji način je aplikacija pokrenuta, od strane korisnika ili iz sistemskog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-521">**RunningMode** -  Indicates how the app is launched either by user or by system process.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-522">**SchemaVersion** -  Označava aktuelnu verziju telemetrije u telemetrijskom cevovodu programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-522">**SchemaVersion** -  Indicates a current telemetry schema version in OneNote's telemetry pipeline.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-523">**Session_EcsETag** - Indikator iz sistema letova koji predstavlja letove poslate na računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-523">**Session_EcsETag** -  An indicator from the flighting system that represents the flights sent to the machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-524">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koji letovi mogu da utiču na određenu sesiju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-524">Allows us to identify what flights might be impacting a given session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-525">**Session_ImpressionId** - Određuje skup letova koji se izvršavaju u određenoj sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-525">**Session_ImpressionId** -  Identifies the set of flights that are running in a given session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-526">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koji pojedinačni letovi se izvršavaju u sesiji, tako da možemo utvrditi da li je let izvor problema koji utiče na korisnike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-526">Allows us to identify which individual flights are running on a session so that we can determine if a flight is the source of an issue impacting users.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-527">**SessionCorrelationId** – Univerzalni jedinstveni identifikator za sesiju domaćina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-527">**SessionCorrelationId** -  The globally unique identifier for the host's session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-528">**SH_ErrorCode** – Označava kôd greške ako je dostupan ako neka aktivnost ne uspe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-528">**SH_ErrorCode** -  Indicates an error code if available when an activity fails.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-529">**Oznaka** - Oznaka celog broja koji određuje lokaciju u kodugde se generiše telemetrijski događaj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-529">**Tag** -  An integer tag that identifies the location in code where the telemetry event is generated.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-530">**UserInfo_IdType** – Niska označava vrstu korisničkog naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-530">**UserInfo_IdType** -  A string indicates the type of a user's account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-531">**UserInfo.OMSTenantId** – Zakupac za koga je vezana pretplata korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-531">**UserInfo_OMSTenantId** -  The tenant that a user's subscription is tied to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-532">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo probleme i otkrijemo da li je problem široko rasprostranjen ili izolovan skup korisnika ili određenog zakupca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-532">Allows us to classify issues and identify whether a problem is widespread or isolated to a set of users or a specific tenant.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-533">**UserInfo_OtherId** – Lista neprimarnih pseudonimnih identifikatora koji predstavljaju korisničke naloge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-533">**UserInfo_OtherId** -  A list of non-primary pseudonymous identifiers representing user's accounts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-534">**UserInfo_OtherIdType** – Lista tipova naloga koji nisu primarni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-534">**UserInfo_OtherIdType** -  A list of non-primary account types.</span></span>

## <a name="data-fields-that-are-common-for-outlook-mobile-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-535">Polja podataka koja su uobičajena za Outlook Mobile događaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-535">Data fields that are common for Outlook mobile events</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-536">Outlook Mobile prikuplja uobičajena polja za svaki od naših događaja tako da možemo osigurati da je aplikacija ažurirana, bezbedna i funkcioniše kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-536">Outlook mobile collects common fields for each of our events so that we can ensure the app is up-to-date, secure, and functioning as expected.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-537">Sledeća polja podataka su uobičajena za sve događaje za Outlook u sistemu iOS i Android.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-537">The following data fields are common for all events for Outlook for iOS and Android.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-538">**aad_tenant_id** – ID zakupca klijenta ako je dostupan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-538">**aad_tenant_id** - The tenant ID of the customer if available</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-539">**account_cid** – identifikator pod pseudonimom koji predstavlja trenutnog korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-539">**account_cid** - A pseudonymous identifier that represents the current user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-540">**account_domain** – Ime domena naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-540">**account_domain** - Domain name of the account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-541">**account_puid** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator korisnika Microsoft naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-541">**account_puid** - The globally unique user identifier for a consumer Microsoft account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-542">**account_type** – Prati tip naloga kao što je Office 365, Google Cloud Cache, Outlook.com itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-542">**account_type** - Tracks the account type such as Office 365, Google Cloud Cache, Outlook.com, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-543">**action** – Ime radnje događaja (kao što je arhiviraj, Izbriši itd.) tako da možemo da otkrijemo probleme sa određenim radnjama koje su preduzete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-543">**action** - The event action name (such as archive, delete, etc.) so we can detect issues with specific actions taken</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-544">**ad_id** – Jedinstveni identifikator oglašavanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-544">**ad_id** - The unique advertising identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-545">**app_version** – Aktuelna verzija instalirane aplikacije koja bi trebala da nam pomogne da otkrijemo probleme koji utiču na određenu verziju aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-545">**app_version** - Current version of the app installed to help us detect issues affecting certain app version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-546">**AppInfo.ETag** - Jedinstveni identifikator za upravljanje objavljivanjem naših funkcija koji bi trebao da nam pomogne da otkrijemo probleme koji utiču na određene funkcije koje se objavljuju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-546">**AppInfo.ETag** - A unique identifier for managing release of our features to help us detect issues affecting certain features being released</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-547">**AppInfo.Language** - Trenutna postavka jezika na uređaju koja bi trebala da nam pomogne da otkrijemo probleme koji utiču na određene jezike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-547">**AppInfo.Language** - Currently language setting of the device to help us detect issues affecting certain languages</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-548">**AppInfo.Version** – Aktuelna verzija instalirane aplikacije koja bi trebala da nam pomogne da otkrijemo probleme koji utiču na određenu verziju aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-548">**AppInfo.Version** - Current version of the app installed to help us detect issues affecting certain app versions</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-549">**ci** – pseudonimski jedinstveni identifikator uređaja specifičan za aplikaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-549">**ci** - a pseudonymous app-specific device unique identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-550">**cid_type** – ukazuje na tip naloga, kao što je komercijalni nalog ili Outlook.com nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-550">**cid_type** - indicates what type of account it is, such as a commercial account or Outlook.com account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-551">**cloud** - Gde se nalazi poštansko sanduče za nalog na ovom uređaju, pomaže u otkrivanju problema specifičnih za određeni oblak poštanskog sandučeta, kao što je Office 365 ili GCC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-551">**cloud** - Where the mailbox resides for the account on this device to help detect issues specific to a specific mailbox cloud, like Office 365 or GCC.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-552">**customer_type** – Pokazuje tip klijenta (potrošač, trgovac, treća strana itd.) da nam pomogne da ustanovimo probleme koji utiču na određene tipove klijenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-552">**customer_type** - Indicates the type of customer (consumer, commercial, third party, etc.) to help us detect issues affecting certain customer types</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-553">**device_category** – Ukazuje na tip uređaja (telefon, tablet, itd.) da nam pomogne da ustanovimo probleme sa određenom kategorijom uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-553">**device_category** - Indicates what type of device it is (phone, tablet, etc.) to help us detect device category-specific issues</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-554">**DeviceInfo.Id** – Jedinstveni identifikator uređaja koji nam pomaže da otkrijemo probleme sa određenim uređajem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-554">**DeviceInfo.Id** - A unique device identifier to help us detect device-specific issues</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-555">**DeviceInfo.Make** – Marka uređaja (tj. Apple, Samsung itd) pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme sa određenom markom uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-555">**DeviceInfo.Make** - The make of the device (for example, Apple, Samsung, etc.) to help us detect device make specific issues</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-556">**DeviceInfo.Model** – Model uređaja (tj. iPhone 6s) nam pomaže da otkrijemo probleme sa određenim modelom uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-556">**DeviceInfo.Model** - The device model (for example, iPhone 6s) to help us detect device model specific issues</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-557">**DeviceInfo.NetworkType** – Mreža uređaja koja se trenutno koristi (WiFi, mobilna mreža itd), pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme sa određenom mrežom uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-557">**DeviceInfo.NetworkType** - The current device network being used (WiFi, cellular, etc.) to help us detect device network specific issues</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-558">**DeviceInfo.OsBuild** - Aktuelna verzija operativnog sistema uređaja, pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme koji utiču na određene verzije operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-558">**DeviceInfo.OsBuild** - The current OS build of the device to help us detect issues affecting certain OS builds</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-559">**DeviceInfo.OsName** – Ime operativnog sistema (na primer, iOS), pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme koji utiču na određene platforme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-559">**DeviceInfo.OsName** - The name of the OS (for example, iOS) to help us detect issues affecting certain platforms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-560">**DeviceInfo.OsVersion** - Aktuelna verzija operativnog sistema uređaja, pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme koji utiču na određene verzije operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-560">**DeviceInfo.OsVersion** - The current OS version of the device to help us detect issues affecting certain OS versions</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-561">**DeviceInfo.SDKUid** – Jedinstven identifikator uređaja (slično kao DeviceInfo.Id)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-561">**DeviceInfo.SDKUid** - The device unique identifier (similar to DeviceInfo.Id)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-562">**EventInfo.InitId** – ID koji se koristi kao deo sekvence za redosled događaja putem našeg telemetrijskog kanala, pomaže nam da otkrijemo osnovni uzrok problema sa kanalom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-562">**EventInfo.InitId** - ID used as part of sequencing for event ordering through our telemetry pipeline to help us detect the root cause of a pipeline issue</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-563">**EventInfo.SdkVersion** – SDK verzija koju koristimo za slanje telemetrije kako bismo otkrili osnovni uzrok problema sa kanalom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-563">**EventInfo.SdkVersion** - The SDK version we are using to send our telemetry to help us detect the root cause of a pipeline issue</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-564">**EventInfo.Sequence** - Sekvenca za redosled događaja putem našeg telemetrijskog kanala, pomaže nam da otkrijemo osnovni uzrok problema sa kanalom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-564">**EventInfo.Sequence** - The sequence is for event ordering through our telemetry pipeline to help us detect the root cause of a pipeline issue</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-565">**EventInfo.Source** – Govori nam koji deo koda nam je poslao događaj, pomaže nam da otkrijemo osnovni uzrok problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-565">**EventInfo.Source** - Tells us what part of the code sent the event to help us detect the root cause of an issue</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-566">**EventInfo.Time** – Vreme i datum kada je događaj emitovan na uređaju tako da naši sistemi mogu uspešno da upravljaju događajima koji pristižu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-566">**EventInfo.Time** - The time and date the event was emitted from the device so our systems can successfully manage events coming in</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-567">**eventpriority** – Prioritet telemetrijskog događaja u odnosu na druge događaje tako da naši sistemi mogu uspešno da upravljaju događajima koji pristižu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-567">**eventpriority** - The priority of the telemetry event relative to other events so our systems can successfully manage events coming in</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-568">**first_launch_date** – Prvo pokretanje aplikacije, pomaže nam da shvatimo kada se problem prvi put pojavio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-568">**first_launch_date** - The first time the app was launched so helps us understand when an issue first began</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-569">**hashed_email** – Identifikator pod pseudonimom koji predstavlja e-poštu trenutnog korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-569">**hashed_email** - A pseudonymous identifier that represents the current user email</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-570">**is_first_session** - Prati da li je ovo prva sesija aplikacije radi otklanjanja grešaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-570">**is_first_session** - Tracks if this is the first session of the app for debugging purposes</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-571">**origin** - Poreklo radnje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-571">**origin** - The origination of an action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-572">Na primer, označavanje pročitane poruke može da potiče sa liste poruka ili od obaveštenja o pristigloj pošti, to nam pomaže da otkrijemo probleme na osnovu porekla radnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-572">For example marking a message read can originate from message list or a new mail notification, this helps us detect issues based on action origination</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-573">**PipelineInfo.AccountId** – Identifikator pod pseudonimom koji predstavlja trenutnog korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-573">**PipelineInfo.AccountId** - A pseudonymous identifier that represents the current user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-574">**PipelineInfo.ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se uređaj trenutno nalazi radi otkrivanja problema i prekida u određenoj zemlji ili regionu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-574">**PipelineInfo.ClientCountry** - The current country of the device to detect country or region-specific issues and outages</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-575">**PipelineInfo.ClientIp** - IP adresa sa kojom je uređaj povezan radi otklanjanja problema sa povezivanjem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-575">**PipelineInfo.ClientIp** - The IP address the device is connected to debug connection issues</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-576">**PipelineInfo.IngestionTime** - Vremenske oznake kada se odvija preuzimanje telemetrije za ovaj događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-576">**PipelineInfo.IngestionTime** - Timestamp of when our telemetry ingestion happens for this event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-577">**Session.Id** – Jedinstveni identifikator sesije aplikacije, pomaže u identifikaciji problema sa sesijom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-577">**Session.Id** - A unique identifier for the app session to help identify session-related issues</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-578">**Sesija.Impresionid** – Jedinstveni identifikator za upravljanje objavljivanjem funkcija obezbeđuje uspešno objavljivanje svim korisnicima i uređajima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-578">**Session.ImpressionId** - A unique identifier for managing release of our features to ensure features are successfully released to all users and devices</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-579">**ui_mode** – Da li korisnik koristi svetli ili tamni režim, pomaže pri trijaži UX grešaka sa tamnim režimom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-579">**ui_mode** - Is the user in light or dark mode, helps us triage UX bugs with dark mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-580">**UserInfo.Language** - Jezik korisnika, pomaže u otklanjanju grešaka sa prevodom teksta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-580">**UserInfo.Language** - The user's language to help debug translation text issues</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-581">**UserInfo.TimeZone** - Vremenska zona korisnika radi otklanjanja problema sa kalendarom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-581">**UserInfo.TimeZone** - The user's time zone to help debug calendar issues</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-582">Pored toga, sledeća polja su uobičajena za sve događaje za aplikaciju Outlook u sistemu iOS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-582">In addition, the following fields are common for all events for Outlook for iOS.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-583">**DeviceInfo.NetworkProvider** – Dobavljač mreže uređaja (tj. Verizon)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-583">**DeviceInfo.NetworkProvider** - The network provider of the device (for example, Verizon)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-584">**gcc_restrictions_enabled** – Saopštava nam da li su GCC ograničenja primenjena na aplikaciju kako bismo obezbedili da GCC klijenti bezbedno koriste našu aplikaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-584">**gcc_restrictions_enabled** - Tells us if GCC restrictions have been applied to the app so we can ensure our GCC customers are using our app securely</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-585">**multi_window_mode** – Saopštava nam da li korisnik na iPad uređaju koristi više prozora kako bismo lakše otkrili probleme vezane za korišćenje većeg broja prozora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-585">**multi_window_mode** – Tells us if the user on the iPad is using multiple windows to help us detect issues related to multi-window usage.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-586">**office_session_id** – Jedinstveni ID koji prati sesiju za povezane Office usluge, pomaže u otkrivanju problema sa integracijom određene Office usluge u programu Outlook, kao što je Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-586">**office_session_id** - A unique ID tracking the session for connected Office services to help detect issues specific an Office service integration in Outlook like Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-587">**state** – Da li je aplikacija bila aktivna kada je ovaj događaj poslat, pomaže pri otkrivanju problema specifičnih za aktivan ili neaktivan status aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-587">**state** - Whether the app was active when this event was sent to help detect issues specific to active or inactive app states</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-588">Pored toga, sledeća polja su uobičajena za sve događaje za aplikaciju Outlook u sistemu Android.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-588">In addition, the following fields are common for all events for Outlook for Android.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-589">**aad_id** – pseudonimski Azure Active Directory identifikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-589">**aad_id** - a pseudonymous Azure Active Directory identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-590">**DeviceInfo.NetworkCost** – Naznaka postojećih mrežnih troškova uređaja koja prikazuje status usluge WiFi/mobilne mreže/rominga, pomaže u otkrivanju problema specifičnih za mrežu uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-590">**DeviceInfo.NetworkCost** - Indication of devices current network cost, which reflects the status of WiFi/Cellular/Roaming to help detect issues specific to device network</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-591">**is_app_in_duo_split_view_mode** – To će nam dati do znanja da je aplikacija bila u Duo režimu podeljenog ekrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-591">**is_app_in_duo_split_view_mode** - This will let us know that the app was in Duo split-screen mode.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-592">Ovo svojstvo je postavljeno samo za Duo (samo Android) uređaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-592">This property is set only for Duo (Android only) devices.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-593">**is_dex_mode_enabled** - Da li je Samsung DeX režim omogućen, pomaže u otkrivanju problema koji su specifični za DeX režim Samsung uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-593">**is_dex_mode_enabled** - Whether Samsung DeX mode is enabled to help detect issues specific to DeX mode with Samsung devices</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-594">**is_sliding_drawer_enabled** – Da li je omogućen interfejs kliznog menija, pomaže u otkrivanju problema koje uzrokuje interfejs kliznog menija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-594">**is_sliding_drawer_enabled** - Whether Sliding Drawer interface is enabled to help detect issues caused by our sliding drawer interface</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-595">**orientation** - Fizički položaj ekrana (uspravan/položen), pomaže pri otkrivanju problema specifičnih za položaj uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-595">**orientation** - Physical orientation of the screen (portrait/landscape) to help detect issues specific to device orientation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-596">**os_arch** - Arhitektura operativnog sistema uređaja, pomaže u otkrivanju problema specifičnih za operativni sistem uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-596">**os_arch** - Operating System architecture for the device to help detect issues specific to device operation systems</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-597">**process_bitness** - Broj bitova procesa (32 ili 64) aplikacije, pomaže u otkrivanju problema koji su specifični za broj bitova uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-597">**process_bitness** - Process bitness (32 or 64 bit) for the application to help detect issues specific to device bitness</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-598">**webview_kernel_version**: verzija jezgra sistema Chromium veb prikaza na uređaju koja nam pomaže da prepoznamo probleme sa kompatibilnošću povezane sa verzijom veb prikaza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-598">**webview_kernel_version**: The Chromium kernel version of webview on the device to help us detect compatibility issues related to the version of webview.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-599">**webview_package_name**: naziv paketa veb prikaza na uređaju koji nam pomaže da prepoznamo probleme sa kompatibilnošću povezane sa verzijom veb prikaza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-599">**webview_package_name**: The package name of webview on the device to help us detect compatibility issues related to the version of webview.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-600">**webview_package_version**: verzija paketa veb prikaza na uređaju koji nam pomaže da prepoznamo probleme sa kompatibilnošću povezane sa verzijom veb prikaza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-600">**webview_package_version**: The package version of webview on the device to help us detect compatibility issues related to the version of webview.</span></span>

#### <a name="officecompliancefileformatballotdisplayedonfirstboot"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-630">Office.Compliance.FileFormatBallotDisplayedOnFirstBoot</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-630">Office.Compliance.FileFormatBallotDisplayedOnFirstBoot</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-631">Ukazuje na to da li je dijalog Izbor formata Office datoteka prikazan korisniku na prvom/drugom mestu prilikom pokretanja programa Word, Excel, PowerPoint u sistemu Win32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-631">Indicates whether the Office File Format choice dialog box was shown to the user on first/second boot of Word, Excel, PowerPoint on Win32.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-632">Prati da li je prikazan dijaloški okvir FileFormat Ballot – događaj se šalje prilikom prvog / drugog pokretanja programa Word, Excel ili PPT Win32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-632">Tracks whether the FileFormat Ballot dialog box is displayed - event is sent at the first/second boot of Word, Excel, or PPT Win32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-633">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-633">The following fields are collected.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-634">**ZemljaRegion** – Podešavanje regiona zemlje korisnika u sistemu Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-634">**CountryRegion** –  The users' country region setting in Windows system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-635">**FileFormatBallotBoxAppIDBootedOnce** – U kojoj je aplikaciji (Word, Excel, PPT) obrađena logika glasačkog prikaza u formatu datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-635">**FileFormatBallotBoxAppIDBootedOnce** –  In which app (Word, Excel, PPT) the file format ballot display logic was processed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-636">**FileFormatBallotBoxDisplayedOnFirstBoot** - Šta je rezultat prikaza za format datoteke (prikazano/nije prikazano kao neočekivano/nije prikazano zbog licence/nije prikazano zbog lokacije).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-636">**FileFormatBallotBoxDisplayedOnFirstBoot** –  What is the display result for file format ballot (displayed/not displayed as unexpected/not displayed due to license/not displayed due to location).</span></span>

#### <a name="officecompliancefileformatballotoption"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-637">Office.Compliance.FileFormatBallotOption</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-637">Office.Compliance.FileFormatBallotOption</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-638">Prati da li je prikazan dijaloški okvir FileFormat Ballot – događaj se šalje prilikom prvog / drugog pokretanja programa Word, Excel ili PPT Win32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-638">Tracks whether the FileFormat Ballot dialog box is displayed - event is sent at the first/second boot of Word, Excel, or PPT Win32.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-639">Ukazuje na to da li se dijalog Izbor formata Office datoteka prikazuje na prvom ili drugom mestu prilikom pokretanja programa Word, Excel ili PowerPoint u sistemu Win32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-639">Indicates whether the Office File Format choice dialog box is displayed on first or second boot of Word, Excel, or PowerPoint on Win32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-640">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-640">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-641">**FileFormatBallotSelectedOption** – Prepoznaje opciju formata datoteke (OOKSML / ODF) koju je korisnik odabrao putem dijaloškog okvira za glasački oblik datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-641">**FileFormatBallotSelectedOption** – Identifies the file format option (OOXML/ODF) that was selected by the user through the file format ballot dialog box.</span></span>


#### <a name="officecorrelationmetadatautccorrelationmetadata"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-642">Office.CorrelationMetadata.UTCCorrelationMetadata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-642">Office.CorrelationMetadata.UTCCorrelationMetadata</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-643">Prikuplja metapodatke sistema Office kroz UTC za poređenje sa ekvivalentnim podacima prikupljenim putem kanal Office telemetrije u cilju provere ispravnosti i potpunosti podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-643">Collects Office metadata through UTC to compare with equivalent data collected through the Office telemetry pipeline to check correctness and completeness of data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-644">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-644">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-645">**ab konfiguracije** - Lista ID-ova funkcija za utvrđivanje koje funkcije su omogućene na klijentu ili su prazne kada se ti podaci se ne prikupljaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-645">**abConfigs** - A list of feature IDs to identify which features are enabled on the client or empty when this data is not being collected.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-646">**abFlights** -„NoNL:NoFlights” kada letovi funkcija nisu podešeni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-646">**abFlights** - "NoNL:NoFlights" when the feature flights aren't set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-647">U suprotnom „holdoutinfo = nepoznato”.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-647">Otherwise "holdoutinfo=unknown".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-648">**Guid sesije aplikacije** – identifikator sesije za određenu aplikaciju počevši od vremena kreiranja procesa do kraja procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-648">**AppSessionGuid** - An identifier of a particular application session starting at process creation time and persisting until process end.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-649">Oblikovan je kao standardni 128–bitni GUID, ali se sastoji iz 4 dela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-649">It is formatted as a standard 128-bit GUID but constructed of four parts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-650">Ta četiri dela su po redu (1) 32–bitni ID procesa (2) 16–bitni ID sesije (3) 16–bitni ID za pokretanje (4) 64–bitni proces nastanka u UTC 100ns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-650">Those four parts in order are (1) 32-bit Process ID (2) 16-bit Session ID (3) 16 bit Boot ID (4) 64-bit Process creation time in UTC 100 ns</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-651">**appVersionBuild** - Broj verzije izdanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-651">**appVersionBuild** - The app build version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-652">**appVersionMajor** - Broj glavne verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-652">**appVersionMajor** - The app major version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-653">**sporedna verzija aplikacije** - Broj sporedne verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-653">**appVersionMinor** - The app minor version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-654">**revizija verzije aplikacije** - Broj revizije verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-654">**appVersionRevision** - The app revision version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-655">**Grupa korisnika** - Ime za grupu korisnika izdanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-655">**audienceGroup** - The release audience group name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-656">**Id korisnika** - Ime za korisnike izdanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-656">**audienceId** - The release audience name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-657">**kanal** - Kanal preko kog je distribuiran sistem Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-657">**channel** - The channel by which Office was distributed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-658">**klasa uređaja** - Veličina i oblik uređaja iz operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-658">**deviceClass** - Device form factor from the OS</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-659">**ecsETag** - Identifikator eksperimenta za proces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-659">**ecsETag** - An experiment identifier for the process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-660">**impressionId** – guid koji ukazuje na aktuelni skup funkcija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-660">**impressionId** - A guid indicating the current set of features.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-661">**Oznaka za jezik** - Aktuelna Office UI IETF oznaka za jezik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-661">**languageTag** - The current Office UI IETF language tag</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-662">**ID korisnika sistema Office** – Nasumično generisan GUID za ovu instalaciju sistema Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-662">**officeUserID** - Randomly generated guid for this Office install</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-663">**arhitektura operativnog sistema** - Arhitektura operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-663">**osArchitecture** - Operating system architecture</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-664">**osEnvironment** – Ceo broj koji označava operativni sistem (Windows, Android, iOS, Mac, itd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-664">**osEnvironment** - An integer indicating the operating system (Windows, Android, iOS, Mac, etc.).</span></span>
