<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-750">Prati da li je preuzet paket za „Dinamičko platno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-750">Tracks if a package for Dynamic Canvas was downloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-751">Smatra se konfiguracijom softvera zato što paket mora biti uspešno preuzet da bi klijentu omogućio pružanje odgovarajućeg iskustva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-751">Considered a software configuration because the package must be successfully downloaded to enable the client to render the right experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-752">Posebno je važno u korisničkim pretplatama gde platno koristimo da korisnika obavestimo da je licenca istekla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-752">Is especially critical in consumer subscriptions where we use canvas to communicate to the user that the license has expired.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-753">Koristi se za praćenje metapodataka paketa dinamičkog sadržaja koje proizvod preuzima i kešira, kao i rezultate operacija koje se izvršavaju na paketu: neuspela preuzimanja, neuspela raspakivanja, greške pri proveri doslednosti, pregledi keša, primene paketa, izvori preuzimanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-753">Used to track metadata of a dynamic content package downloaded and cached by the product and results of operations performed on the package: download failures, unpacking failures, consistency checks failures, cache hits, package usages, download sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-754">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-754">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-755">**Podaci\_KeširanaFasciklaNijeKreirana –** Bulova zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je kreiranje fascikle keša uspešno izvršeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-755">**Data\_CacheFolderNotCreated -** Boolean flag indicating if cache folder creation succeeded</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-756">**Podaci\_CdnPath – izvorna adresa paketa-**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-756">**Data\_CdnPath – source address of the package-**</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-757">**Podaci\_EnsureCached -** Bulova zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je paket sa sadržajem keširan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-757">**Data\_EnsureCached -** Boolean flag indicating if content package was cached</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-758">**Podaci\_Već postoji -** Bulova zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je paket ranije već bio preuzet i da je napravljen još jedan pokušaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-758">**Data\_ExistsAlready -** Boolean flag indicating that the package was already downloaded before and there was another attempt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-759">**Podaci\_Preuzimanje toka datoteka nije uspelo -** izvorni paket nije dostupan u izvoru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-759">**Data\_GetFileStreamFailed -** source package not available in source</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-760">**Podaci\_Preuzimanje toka datoteka nije uspelo na kreira lokalnu fasciklu -** problemi na lokalnom disku izazivaju grešku prilikom kreiranja direktorijuma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-760">**Data\_GetFileStreamFailedToCreateLocalFolder -** local disk issues causing failure in directory creation</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-761">**Podaci\_Preuzimanje toka datoteka iz paketa nije uspelo –** zastavica koja označava da li je paket preuzet, ali ga klijent ne može pročitati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-761">**Data\_GetFileStreamFromPackageFailed -** flag indicating if package was downloaded, but the client can't read it</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-762">**Podaci\_Preuzimanje toka datoteka iz paketa je uspelo -** uspešni pokušaj čitanja paketa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-762">**Data\_GetFileStreamFromPackageSuccess -** successful attempts to read the package</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-763">**Data\_GetFileStreamSuccess –** nema problema s diskom ili konfiguracijom koji ne dozvoljavaju čitanje toka datoteka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-763">**Data\_GetFileStreamSuccess -** no disk issues nor configuration issues that don't let the file stream to be read</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-764">**Podaci\_Preuzimanje relativne putanje nije uspelo –** relativna putanja ne upućuje na pristupačnu lokaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-764">**Data\_GetRelativePathsFailed -** relative path doesn't point to accessible location</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-765">**Podaci\_Stvarna vrednost heša -** heš vrednost izdvojena iz imena datoteke kada je paket upotrebljen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-765">**Data\_HashActualValue -** hash value extracted from file name when the package was used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-766">**Podaci\_Neuspešno izračunavanje heša -** greška pri izračunavanju heša</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-766">**Data\_HashCalculationFailed -** error with calculation of a hash</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-767">**Podaci\_HashMatchFailed -** nepodudaranje heša za ime paketa i keširanih vrednosti registratora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-767">**Data\_HashMatchFailed -** hash mismatch between the package name and registry values cached</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-768">**Podaci\_HashMatchSuccess -** uspešna provera doslednosti heša</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-768">**Data\_HashMatchSuccess -** hash consistency check success</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-769">**Podaci\_Neuspeli zahtev za preuzimanje paketa –** preuzimanje paketa nije moguće</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-769">**Data\_PackageDownloadRequestFailed -** can't download the package</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-770">**Podaci\_Zahtev za preuzimanje paketa ne sadrži podatke -** preuzeti paket ne sadrži podatke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-770">**Data\_PackageDownloadRequestNoData -** downloaded package contains no data</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-771">**Podaci\_Uspešan zahtev za preuzimanje paketa -** uspešno preuzimanje paketa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-771">**Data\_PackageDownloadRequestSuccess -** successful download of a package</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-772">**Podaci\_Uspešno raspakivanje paketa -** statusi pokušaja raspakivanja </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-772">**Data\_PackageExplodedSuccess -** unpacking attempts statuses</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-773">**Podaci\_Otvaranje paketa nije uspelo -** neuspeli pokušaji otvaranja datoteke paketa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-773">**Data\_PackageOpenFailed -** failed attempts to open the package file</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-774">**Podaci\_Uspešno otvaranje paketa -** uspešni pokušaji otvaranja datoteke paketa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-774">**Data\_PackageOpenSuccess -** successful attempts to open the package file</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-775">**Podaci\_Uspešna vrednost heša -** heš vrednost izdvojena iz imena datoteke kada je paket preuzet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-775">**Data\_SuccessHashValue -** hash value extracted from file name when the package was downloaded</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-776">**Podaci\_Uspešan izvor -** površina za koju je paket preuzet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-776">**Data\_SuccessSource -** surface for which the package was downloaded</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-789">**AsyncBegin** – broj funkcija asinhronizacije koje počinju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-789">**AsyncBegin** - number of async functions that begin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-790">**AsyncEndAddinError** - broj funkcija asinhronizacije koje se završavaju greškom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-790">**AsyncEndAddinError** - number of async functions that end in error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-791">**AsyncEndInfraFailure** - broj funkcija asinhronizacije koje se završavaju u infra neuspešnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-791">**AsyncEndInfraFailure** - number of async functions that end with in infra failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-792">**AsyncEndSuccess** - broj funkcija asinhronizacije koje se uspešno završavaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-792">**AsyncEndSuccess** - number of async functions that end successfully</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-793">**AsyncRemoveCancel** – broj funkcija asinhronizacije koje su otkazane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-793">**AsyncRemoveCancel** - number of async functions that were canceled</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-794">**AsyncRemoveRecycle** – broj funkcija asinhronizacije koje su uklonjene zbog recikliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-794">**AsyncRemoveRecycle** - number of async functions that were removed due to recycle</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-795">**StreamingCycles1** - brojač protočnog ciklusa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-795">**StreamingCycles1** - streaming cycle counter</span></span>

#### <a name="officeextensibilitycatalogexchangegetentitlements"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-808">Office.Extensibility.Catalog.ExchangeGetEntitlements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-808">Office.Extensibility.Catalog.ExchangeGetEntitlements</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-809">Podaci u vezi sa uspehom za neuspelo preuzimanje podataka o pravima programskih dodataka za Office 365 zakupca i administratorski dodeljenih programskih dodatka. Koristi se za metriku ispravnosti, grafikone i analize problema klijenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-809">Data regarding the success for failure of retrieving add-in entitlement data for the Office 365 tenant admin assigned add-ins. Used for health metrics, charts, and analysis of customer problems.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-810">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-810">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-811">**Rezultat keširanja -** rezultat pokušaja da se sačuva povratna vrednost pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-811">**CachingResult -** the result of the attempt to save the service call return value</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-812">**Parametar klijenta -** identifikator klijenta poslat prilikom pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-812">**ClientParameter -** client identifier sent in the service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-813">**Broj prava -** broj prava koji se očekuje u odgovoru na pozivanje usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-813">**EntitlementsCount -** The number of entitlements expected in the call response</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-814">**Raščlanjena prava -** broj raščlanjenih prava iz odgovora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-814">**EntitlementsParsed -** the number of entitlements parsed from the response</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-815">**Da li su sva prava raščlanjena -** da li se broj očekivanih raščlanjenih prava podudara sa brojem raščlanjenih prava</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-815">**IsAllEntitlementsParsed -** whether expected entitlements count matches parsed entitlements count</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-816">**ServiceCallHResult -** povratni rezultat API-a pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-816">**ServiceCallHResult -** the result returned by the service call API</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-817">**Id za telemetriju -** GUID koji predstavlja jedinstvenog korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-817">**TelemetryId -** a GUID representing a unique user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-818">**Iskorišćeni keš -** da li je iskorišćen keširani odgovor umesto pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-818">**UsedCache -** whether the cached response was used instead of making a service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-819">**Parametar verzije -** broj verzije sistema Office poslat prilikom pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-819">**VersionParameter -** Office version number sent in the service call</span></span>

#### <a name="officeextensibilitycatalogexchangegetlastupdate"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-820">Office.Extensibility.Catalog.ExchangeGetLastUpdate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-820">Office.Extensibility.Catalog.ExchangeGetLastUpdate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-821">Podaci u vezi sa uspehom za neuspelo preuzimanje potrebe za ažuriranim podacima o administratorski dodeljenim programskim dodacima za Office 365 zakupca. Koristi se za metriku ispravnosti, grafikone i analize problema klijenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-821">Data regarding the success for failure of retrieving the need for updated data regarding the Office 365 tenant admin assigned add-ins. Used for health metrics, charts, and analysis of customer problems.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-822">ExchangeGetLastUpdate će se uvek izvršiti prilikom pokretanja operativnog sistema kao deo koda hosta i utvrditi da li su promenjene dodele programskih dodataka za korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-822">ExchangeGetLastUpdate will always run on boot as part of the host code and determine whether add-in assignments have changed for a user.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-823"> Ako je tako, onda će se osf.DLL Će učitati tako da možemo da pozovemo ExchangeGetEntitlements da dobijemo određene zadatke (i ExchangeGetManifests će biti pozvan da preuzme sve nove manifeste koji su potrebni).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-823">If so then osf.DLL will be loaded so we can call ExchangeGetEntitlements to get the specific assignments (and ExchangeGetManifests will be called to retrieve any new manifests that are needed).</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-824"> ExchangeGetEntitlements (i ExchangeGetManifests) može se takođe pozvati na zahtev kada je host aplikacija pokrenuta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-824">ExchangeGetEntitlements (and ExchangeGetManifests) could also be called on demand after host application has been running.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-825"> Ideja je da se ne učitava veliki DLL ako nema potrebe za tim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-825">The idea is to not load the large DLL if we don't need to.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-826"> Bez ovog događaja u Obavezno, ne bismo mogli da prepoznamo da li korisnici ne uspevaju da događaju do programskih dodataka koji su im dodeljeni ako to prvo pozivanje usluge ne uspe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-826">Without this event in Required, we would not be able to tell if users are failing to get add-ins assigned to them if that first service call fails.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-827"> To takođe predstavlja glavni pokazatelj za sve probleme potvrde identiteta sa kojima se suočavamo prilikom komunikacije sa uslugom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-827">It's also the main signal for any auth problems we face talking to our service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-828">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-828">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-829">**Prekid -** da li je host ugašen tokom poziva usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-829">**Abort -** whether the host was shut down during the service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-830">**Dozvola zahteva -** da li je bio dozvoljen zahtev za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-830">**AllowPrompt -** whether auth prompting was allowed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-831">**Šema potvrde identiteta -** šema potvrde identiteta koju zahteva exchange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-831">**AuthScheme -** the auth scheme requested by exchange</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-832">**BackEndHttpStatus –** http kôd koji je naveden prilikom kominikacije sa exchange potporom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-832">**BackEndHttpStatus -** http code reported when talking to exchange back end</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-833">**Rezervni Url -** sekundarni exchange URL za pozivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-833">**BackupUrl -** the secondary exchange URL to call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-834">**BEServer -** ime potpornog exchange servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-834">**BEServer -** the back-end exchange server name</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-835">**CalculatedBETarget -** puno ime računara potpornog exchange servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-835">**CalculatedBETarget -** The full name of the exchange back end machine</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-836">**Pozovi(n)\_TokenAuthError -** greška pri proveri identiteta n-tog pokušaja poziva usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-836">**Call(n)\_TokenAuthError -** the auth error of the nth service call attempt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-837">**Pozovi(n)\_TokenIsValid -** da li je token potvrde identiteta n-tog pokušaja pozivanja usluge bio važeći</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-837">**Call(n)\_TokenIsValid -** whether the auth token on the nth service attempt was valid</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-838">**Metoda pozivanja -** niska koja označava kojim putem je šifra išla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-838">**CallMethod -** a string indicating which path the code took</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-839">**ConfigSvcReady -** da li usluga podešavanja već pokrenuta </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-839">**ConfigSvcReady -** whether the config service had been initialized yet</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-840">**Datum -** povratna vrednost exchange servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-840">**Date -** value returned by exchange server</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-841">**DiagInfo -** povratne informacije exchange servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-841">**DiagInfo -** information returned by exchange server</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-842">**Kraj\_TicketAuthError -** sve greške prilikom preuzimanja tiketa za proveru identiteta posle pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-842">**End\_TicketAuthError -** any error in getting the auth ticket after service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-843">**Kraj\_TokenIsValid -** da li je tiket za proveru identiteta važeći posle pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-843">**End\_TokenIsValid -** whether the auth ticket is valid after the service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-844">**EndingIdentityState -** prijavljeni status objekata identiteta posle pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-844">**EndingIdentityState -** identity objects reported state after making the service calls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-845">**EwsHandler -** povratna vrednost dobijena od exchange servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-845">**EwsHandler -** value returned from exchange</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-846">**FEServer -** exchange izloženi server koji uslužuje zahtev</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-846">**FEServer -** the exchange front end servicing the request</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-847">**HResult -** kôd rezultata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-847">**HResult -** the result code</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-848">**HttpStatus -** Http Statusni kôd dobijen od Exchange servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-848">**HttpStatus -** Http status code returned from exchange</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-849">**IsSupportedAuthResponse -** da li je tip potvrde identiteta onaj koji možemo da koristimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-849">**IsSupportedAuthResponse -** whether the auth type is one we can use</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-850">**LastUpdateValueRegistry -** heš vrednost preuzeta iz registratora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-850">**LastUpdateValueRegistry -** hash value retrieved from the registry</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-851">**LastUpdateValueRetrieved -** povratna heš vrednost dobijena od pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-851">**LastUpdateValueRetrieved -** hash value returned from the service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-852">**MSDiagnostics -** povratna vrednost dobijena od exchange servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-852">**MSDiagnostics -** value returned from exchange</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-853">**Mso Http Rezultat –** vrednost brojača koju je vratio http API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-853">**MsoHttpResult -** the enumerator value returned from the http API</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-854">**NeedRefresh –-** ovo je true ili false polje koje ukazuje na to da li su podaci programskog dodatka bili zastareli i da li ih je trebalo ažurirati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-854">**NeedRefresh –-** This is a true or false field indicating whether the add-in data was stale and we needed to update it.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-855">**PrimaryUrl -** glavni URL za pozivanje usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-855">**PrimaryUrl -** the main URL to make the service call to</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-856">**Id zahteva -** povratna vrednost dobijena od exchange servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-856">**RequestId -** value returned from exchange</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-857">**Broj pokušaja zahteva -** koliko puta smo pokušali pozivanje usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-857">**RequestTryCount -** the number of times we attempted to make the service call</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-858">**Broj pokušaja zahteva -** koliko puta su pokušali da komuniciramo sa exchange serverom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-858">**RequestTryCount -** the number of times we tried to talk to exchange</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-859">**Lanac rezultata -** serija šifri rezultata iz svakog pokušaja pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-859">**ResultChain -** the series of result code from each of the service call attempts</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-860">**Početni status identiteta -** prijavljeni status objekata identiteta pre pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-860">**StartingIdentityState -** identity objects reported state before making service calls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-861">**Id za telemetriju -** GUID koji predstavlja jedinstveni korisnički, da li treba upućivati pozive drugim uslugama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-861">**TelemetryId -** a GUID representing a unique user whether we need to make other service calls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-869">**ManifestsToRetrieve** – broj manifesta za preuzimanje od servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-869">**ManifestsToRetrieve** – the number of manifests to get from the server</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-949">**AddinProviderV2** –programski dobavljač programskih dodataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-949">**AddinProviderV2** - the add-in provider</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappguardcreatecontainer"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-974">Office.AppGuard.CreateContainer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-974">Office.AppGuard.CreateContainer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-975">Prikupljamo kodove greške i informacije o tome da li je kontejner već postojao ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-975">We collect error codes and whether the container already existed or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-976">Takođe prikupljamo kodove greške za događaj uspostavljanja početnih vrednosti u slučaju da ne uspemo da kreiramo kontejner pri prvom pokušaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-976">We also collect error codes for a reset event in case we fail to create the container on our first attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-977">Podaci će se koristiti za identifikaciju procenta sesija u kojima smo uspešno kreirali kontejner za pokretanje Office Application Guard aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-977">Data will be used identify the percentage of sessions we successfully create the container for launching Office Application Guard apps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-978">Podaci će takođe omogućiti korporaciji Microsoft da identifikuje i reši kodove greške iz kreiranja kontejnera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-978">Data will also allow Microsoft to identify and address error codes from the container creation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-979">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-979">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-980">**ErrorCode1** – Tip koda greške pri podešavanju kontejnera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-980">**ErrorCode1** - Type of container setup error code.</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-981">**ErrorCode2** – Kôd greške iz izvršavanja kreiranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-981">**ErrorCode2** - Error code from executing the creation.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-982">**ErrorCode3** – Dodatni kôd greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-982">**ErrorCode3** - Additional error code.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-983">**Id** – Jedinstveni identifikator (GUID) za kreiranje kontejnera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-983">**Id** - A unique identifier (GUID) for the container creation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-984">**ResetError** – Kôd greške iz pokušaja uspostavljanja početnih vrednosti kontejnera nakon neuspelog pokušaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-984">**ResetError** - Error code from trying to reset the container after a failed attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-985">**ResetErrorCode1** – Tip koda greške pri podešavanju kontejnera nakon komande za uspostavljanje početnih vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-985">**ResetErrorCode1** - Type of Container Setup Error code after reset command.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-986">**ResetErrorCode2** – Kôd greške iz izvršavanja kreiranja nakon komande za uspostavljanje početnih vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-986">**ResetErrorCode2** - Error code from executing the creation after reset command.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-987">**ResetErrorCode3** – Dodatni kôd greške nakon komande za uspostavljanje početnih vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-987">**ResetErrorCode3** - Additional error code after reset command.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-988">**ResetErrorType** – Tip greške tokom uspostavljanja početnih vrednosti: Kreiranje, Priprema datoteke ili Pokretanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-988">**ResetErrorType** - Type of error during reset: Creation, Preparing File or Launch.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-989">**WarmBoot** – Identifikuje da li je kontejner već bio kreiran ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-989">**WarmBoot** - Identifies whether the container was already created or not.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappguardlaunchfile"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-990">Office.AppGuard.LaunchFile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-990">Office.AppGuard.LaunchFile</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-996">**ErrorCode1** – Tip koda greške pri podešavanju kontejnera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-996">**ErrorCode1** – Type of container setup error code.</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-997">**ErrorCode2** – Kôd greške iz izvršavanja kreiranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-997">**ErrorCode2** – Error code from executing the creation.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-998">**ErrorCode3** – Dodatni kôd greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-998">**ErrorCode3** - Additional error code.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-999">**FileId** – Jedinstveni identifikator (GUID) vraćen iz Windows API-ja nakon pokretanja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-999">**FileId** - A unique identifier (GUID) returned from the Windows API after launching a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1000">**Id** – Jedinstveni identifikator (GUID) za pokretanje i kreiranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1000">**Id** – A unique identifier (GUID) for the launching and creating a file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1001">Ovaj ID se koristi za korelaciju događaja iz sistema Office i operativnog sistema Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1001">This ID is used to correlate events from Office and Windows.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1002">**ResetError** – Kôd greške iz pokušaja uspostavljanja početnih vrednosti kontejnera nakon neuspelog pokušaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1002">**ResetError** - Error code from trying to reset the container after a failed attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1003">**ResetErrorCode1** – Tip koda greške pri podešavanju kontejnera nakon komande za uspostavljanje početnih vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1003">**ResetErrorCode1** – Type of container setup error code after reset command.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1004">**ResetErrorCode2** – Kôd greške iz izvršavanja kreiranja nakon komande za uspostavljanje početnih vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1004">**ResetErrorCode2** – Error code from executing the creation after reset command.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1005">**ResetErrorCode3** – Dodatni kôd greške nakon komande za uspostavljanje početnih vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1005">**ResetErrorCode3** - Additional error code after reset command.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1097">**JeURežimuBezbednogČitača** - da li je dokument otvoren u bezbednom čitaču</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1097">**IsSecureReaderMode** - is the document opened in secure reader</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1098">**OcxTrustCenterSettings** - koje su trenutne postavke za ActiveX kontrole</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1098">**OcxTrustCenterSettings** - what is the current ActiveX setting</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1100">Prati završetak otvorene u zaštićenom prikazu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1100">Tracks completion of an open in Protected View.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1101">Koristi se za dijagnostikovanje uslova koji dovode do greške prilikom otvaranja datoteke u zaštićenom prikazu što utiče na bezbednost i produktivnost klijenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1101">Used to diagnose conditions that lead to failures when opening files in Protected View impacting security and productivity of customers.</span></span>

### <a name="application-feature-success-subtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1110">*Podtip uspešnosti funkcija aplikacije*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1110">*Application feature success subtype*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1111">Uspešnost funkcionalnosti aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1111">Success of application functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1112">Ograničena na otvaranje i zatvaranje aplikacije i dokumenata, uređivanje i deljenje (saradnju) datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1112">Limited to opening and closing of the application and documents, file editing, and file sharing (collaboration).</span></span>

#### <a name="accountaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1113">account.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1113">account.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1114">Potrebno je da se osigura da konfiguracija naloga uspešno funkcioniše i da se koristi za nadgledanje zdravlja pri kreiranju naloga, mogućnosti dodavanja novih naloga e-pošte i nadgledanje promena početnih naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1114">Needed to ensure account configuration is operating successfully and is used to monitor health of account creation, ability to add new email accounts, and monitor soft account resets</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1115">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1115">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1116">**account_calendar_count** - koliko kalendara ima nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1116">**account_calendar_count** - how many calendars the account has</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1117">**action** – tip izvršene akcije, npr. create_account, delete_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1117">**action** - type of action performed, for example, create_account, delete_account.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1118">**duration_seconds** - trajanje akcije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1118">**duration_seconds** - duration of the action</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1119">**entry_point** - ulazna tačka akcije, kako je korisnik započeo akciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1119">**entry_point** - entry point of the action, how the user started the action</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1120">**has_hx** - da li uređaj ima nalog koji koristi našu novu uslugu sinhronizacije pošte, ne nužno i nalog na kome je izvršena radnja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1120">**has_hx** - whether the device has an account that is using our new mail syncing service, not necessarily the account that the action was performed upon</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1121">**is_hx** - nalog koji koristi našu novu uslugu sinhronizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1121">**is_hx** - is the account using our new mail syncing service</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1122">**is_shared_mailbox** - da li se radnja odnosi na deljeno poštansko sanduče</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1122">**is_shared_mailbox** - whether the action pertains to a shared mailbox</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1123">**number_of_accounts** - ukupan broj naloga na kojima se radnja obavlja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1123">**number_of_accounts** - total number of accounts that the action is performed on</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1124">**result** – rezultat akcije, npr. uspeh, neuspeh.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1124">**result** - result for the action, for example, success, failure.</span></span>
   
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1125">**server_type** - tip servera za nalog, slično kao account_type</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1125">**server_type** - the server type for the account, similar to account_type</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1126">**shared_type** - tip deljenog naloga (ako je nalog deljen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1126">**shared_type** - type of shared account (if the account is shared)</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1127">**scope** - obim akcije; za brisanje naloga, this_device ili all_devices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1127">**scope** - the scope of the action; for delete account, this_device or all_devices</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1128">**total_calendar_accounts** - broj kalendarskih naloga u aplikaciji u trenutku radnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1128">**total_calendar_accounts** - count of calendar accounts in the app at time of action</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1129">**total_email_accounts** - broj naloga e-pošte u aplikaciji u trenutku radnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1129">**total_email_accounts** - count of email accounts in the app at time of action</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1130">**total_file_accounts** - broj naloga datoteke u aplikaciji u trenutku radnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1130">**total_file_accounts** - count of file accounts in the app at time of action</span></span>

#### <a name="accountlifecycle"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1131">account.lifecycle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1131">account.lifecycle</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1132">Ovaj događaj se prikuplja da bi se osiguralo da konfiguracija naloga uspešno funkcioniše i da se koristi za nadgledanje zdravlja pri kreiranju naloga, mogućnosti dodavanja novih naloga e-pošte i nadgledanje promena početnih naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1132">This event is collected to ensure account configuration is operating successfully and is used to monitor health of account creation, ability to add new email accounts, and monitor soft account resets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1133">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1133">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1134">**account_creation_source** – opciono svojstvo koje se koristi za pronalaženje i dijagnostikovanje problema koji se dešavaju tokom kreiranja naloga kada se doda tip radnje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1134">**account_creation_source** – optional property that is used to find and diagnose any issues that happen during account creation when the action type is add.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1135">Ono može da ima vrednosti kao što su jedinstveno prijavljivanje (SS0), create_new_account, uputstvo, itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1135">It can have values like single sign-on (SSO), create_new_account, manual, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1136">**action** – Tip radnje koja se izvršava na nalogu, na primer, dodavanje, uklanjanje ili uspostavljanje početnih vrednosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1136">**action** - The type of action performed on the account, such as add, remove, or reset</span></span>

#### <a name="addnewaccountstep"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1137">add.new.account.step</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1137">add.new.account.step</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1138">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo koliko je korisnik napredovao u kreiranju novog obrasca naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1138">This event lets us detect how far the user has gotten in the create new account form.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1139">On ukazuje na to kada je korisnik prešao na drugi korak ili ako je otkazao.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1139">It indicates when the user has moved to another step or if they have dropped off.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1140">Ove informacije su nam potrebne da bismo otkrili da li neki koraci ne uspevaju i da bismo obezbedili uspešnost kreiranja korisničkog naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1140">We need this information to detect if any steps are failing and to ensure user account creation was successful.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1141">Prikuplja se sledeće polje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1141">The following field is collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1142">**OTAddAccountCurrentStep** – To može da ima sledeće vrednosti: profile_form, redirect_mobile_check, mobile_check_success</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1142">**OTAddAccountCurrentStep** - That can have the following values: profile_form, redirect_mobile_check, mobile_check_success</span></span>

#### <a name="apperror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1143">app.error</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1143">app.error</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1144">Prati kritične greške aplikacije kako bismo sprečili probleme koji mogu da dovedu do toga da vam aplikacija padne ili da vam onemoguće da pročitate e-poštu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1144">Tracks critical app errors used so that we can prevent issues that could cause your app to crash or prevent you from reading email.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1145">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1145">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1146">**clientName** - Naziv klijenta za datoteku u oblaku u kojoj je došlo do greške, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1146">**clientName** - The name of the client for the cloud file where the error occurred, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1147">**cloudfile_error_type** - Vrsta greške koja se dogodila za datoteku u oblaku, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1147">**cloudfile_error_type** - The type of error that occurred for the cloud file, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1148">**cloudfile_response_name** - Naziv odgovora za grešku koja se dogodila za datoteku u oblaku, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1148">**cloudfile_response_name** - The response name for the error that occurred for the cloud file, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1149">**component_name** - Naziv komponente aplikacije u kojoj se dogodila greška, kao što su pošta ili kalendar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1149">**component_name** - The name of the component of the app where the error occurred, such as mail or calendar.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1150">**debug_info** - Informacije o grešci koja se dogodila za datoteku u oblaku kako bi se moglo utvrditi zašto se greška dogodila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1150">**debug_info** - Information on the error that occurred for the cloud file in order to be able to determine why the error happened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1151">**error_origin_identifier** - Poreklo greške koja se dogodila na skici da je greška nastala, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1151">**error_origin_identifier** - Origin of the error that occurred on the draft that the error occurred, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1152">**error_type** - Tip greške koja se dogodila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1152">**error_type** - The type of error that occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1153">Neki primeri uključuju grešku sačuvaj radnu verziju, pošalji radnu verziju i grešku datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1153">Some examples include save draft, send draft, and cloud file error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1154">**exdate** – datum proširenog pravila (odnosi se samo na greške u ponavljanju zakazanih obaveza) *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1154">**exdate** - the extended rule date (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1155">**exrule** – proširena vrednost pravila (odnosi se samo na greške u ponavljanju zakazanih obaveza) *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1155">**exrule** - the extended rule value (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1156">**has_attachments** - odražava ako je došlo do nacrta greške u vezi sa prilogom, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1156">**has_attachments** - Reflects if the draft the error occurred on has attachments, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1157">**is_IRM_protected** - odražava ako je nacrt na kom se greška pojavila zaštićen programom Information Rights Management, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1157">**is_IRM_protected** - Reflects if the draft the error occurred on is protected by information rights management, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1158">**is_legitimate** – odražava ako greška potiče od greške u programiranju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1158">**is_legitimate** - Reflects if the error comes from a programming error or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1159">Greške u programiranju se smatraju nelegitimnim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1159">Programming errors are considered non-legitimate.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1160">**is_local** - odražava ako je došlo do nacrta greške u programu sinhronizovano sa serverom, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1160">**is_local** - Reflects if the draft the error occurred on has synced to the server, if applicable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1161">**is_recoverable** - odražava da li se greška može oporaviti od ili ako je u pitanju fatalna greška.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1161">**is_recoverable** - Reflects if the error can be recovered from or if it is a fatal error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1162">**rdate** – datum pravila ponavljanja (odnosi se samo na greške u ponavljanju zakazanih obaveza) *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1162">**rdate** - the date of the recurrence rule (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1163">**rrule** – samo pravilo ponavljanja (odnosi se samo na greške u ponavljanju zakazanih obaveza) *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1163">**rrule** - the recurrence rule itself (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1164">**rrule_error_message** – poruka o grešci sa raščlanjavanjem pravila ponavljanja (odnosi se samo na greške u ponavljanju zakazanih obaveza) *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1164">**rrule_error_message** - recurrence rule parsing error message (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1165">**rrule_error_type** – vrsta greške sa raščlanjavanjem pravila ponavljanja (odnosi se samo na greške u ponavljanju zakazanih obaveza) *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1165">**rrule_error_type** - recurrence rule parsing error type (only applies to appointment recurrence errors) *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1166">**status_code** - Statusni kôd greške koja se dogodila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1166">**status_code** - The status code of the error that occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1167">To nam pomaže da shvatimo uzrok greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1167">This helps us understand the cause of the error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1168">Svi znakovi su takođe moguća svojstva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1168">All characters are also possible properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1169">To nam pomaže da shvatimo znakove u radnoj verziji poruke kada se dogodila greška.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1169">This helps us understand the characters in the body of the draft message when the error occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1170">Na primer, „a“, „b“, „c“ su moguća svojstva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1170">For example, "a", "b", "c" are possible properties.</span></span>

#### <a name="applaunchreport"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1171">app.launch.report</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1171">app.launch.report</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1172">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo i rešimo probleme tamo gde se Outlook kreće sporo ili nepotpuno, što otežava korisnicima da koriste našu aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1172">This event lets us detect and fix issues where Outlook is starting slowly or incompletely, making it difficult for users to use our app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1173">Ovo obuhvata informacije o specifičnim funkcijama koje su omogućene i koliko su dugački delovi pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1173">This includes information on the specific features that were enabled and how long parts of the startup took.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1174">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1174">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1175">**is_agenda_widget_active** - govori nam da li je vidžet rasporeda aktivan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1175">**is_agenda_widget_active** - Tells us if the agenda widget is active.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1176">**is_alert_available** - Recite nam da li je aplikacija konfigurisana da dopušta upozorenja u obaveštenjima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1176">**is_alert_available** - Tell us if the app has been configured to allow alerts in notifications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1177">**is_background_refresh_available** - govori da li je aplikacija konfigurisana za osvežavanje u pozadini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1177">**is_background_refresh_available** - Tells if the app has been configured to be able to refresh in the background.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1178">**is_badge_available** - recite nam da li je aplikacija podešena tako da omogući značke u obaveštenjima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1178">**is_badge_available** - Tell us if the app has been configured to allow badges in notifications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1179">**is_intune_managed** - recite nam da li aplikacijom upravlja Intune.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1179">**is_intune_managed** - Tell us if the app is managed by Intune.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1180">**is_registered_for_remote_notifications** - recite nam da li je aplikacija registrovana za daljinska obaveštenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1180">**is_registered_for_remote_notifications** - Tell us if the app has been registered for remote notifications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1181">**is_sound_available** - Recite nam da li je aplikacija podešena tako da dozvoli zvukove u obaveštenjima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1181">**is_sound_available** - Tell us if the app has been configured to allow sounds in notifications.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1182">**is_watch_app_installed** - saopštava nam da li je instalirana aplikacija sat Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1182">**is_watch_app_installed** - Tells us if the watch Outlook app has been installed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1183">**is_watch_paired** - saopštava nam da li je Outlook aplikacija Sat uparena sa glavnom Outlook aplikacijom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1183">**is_watch_paired** - Tell us if the watch Outlook app is paired with the main Outlook app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1184">**launch_to_db_ready_ms** - Recite nam koliko vremena je Outlook aplikaciji bilo potrebno od pokretanja do pripreme baze podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1184">**launch_to_db_ready_ms** - Tell us the amount of time the Outlook app spent from launch to the database being ready.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1185">**num_calendar_accounts** - govori nam broj naloga kalendara u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1185">**num_calendar_accounts** - Tells us the number of calendar accounts in the app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1186">**num_cloud_file_accounts** - govori nam broj naloga za skladištenje u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1186">**num_cloud_file_accounts** - Tells us the number of storage accounts in the app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1187">**num_hx_calendar_accounts** - govori nam broj naloga kalendara u aplikaciji koji se povezuju na našu novu uslugu sinhronizacije pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1187">**num_hx_calendar_accounts** - Tells us the number of calendar accounts in the app that connect to our new mail syncing service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1188">**num_hx_mail_accounts** - govori nam broj naloga pošte u aplikaciji koji se povezuju na našu novu uslugu sinhronizacije pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1188">**num_hx_mail_accounts** - Tells us the number of mail accounts in the app that connect to our new mail syncing service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1189">**num_mail_accounts** - govori nam broj naloga pošte u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1189">**num_mail_accounts** - Tells us the number of mail accounts in the app.</span></span>

#### <a name="calendaraction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1190">calendar.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1190">calendar.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1191">Koristi se za nadgledanje mogućih negativnih uticaja na izvršavanje osnovnih radnji kalendara poput stvaranja ili uređivanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1191">Used for monitoring any possible negative impact on your ability to perform core calendar actions like creating or editing events.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1192">Događaj može da sadrži i niz imena svojstava i da li su se izmenili ili nisu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1192">The event could also include a series of property names and if they have changed or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1193">Na primer, „title_changed“, „online_meeting_changed“ i „description_changed“ su imena svojstava koja su uključena kako bi nam pomogla da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa uređivanjem određenih svojstava.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1193">For example, "title_changed", "online_meeting_changed", and "description_changed" are property names that are included to help us understand if there are any issues with editing certain properties.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1194">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1194">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1195">**account_sfb_enabled** - pomaže nam da se uverimo da je Skype za posao ispravno konfigurisan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1195">**account_sfb_enabled** - Helps us make sure that Skype for Business is configured correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1196">**action** - tip radnje koja je izvršena u kalendaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1196">**action** - The type of action that was performed on the calendar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1197">Ovo obuhvata stvari kao što su otvaranje, uređivanje, dodavanje prečice, odlaganje itd. Pomaže nam da osiguramo da naše iskustvo kalendara funkcioniše kao što je očekivano i da ništa nije prekinuto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1197">This includes things like open, editing, adding shortcut, snooze, etc. Helps us ensure our calendar experience is functioning as expected and nothing has broken</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1198">**action_result** - rezultat radnje koju ste napravili u komponentama kalendara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1198">**action_result** - Result of the action taken on calendar components.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1199">To može da obuhvata vrednosti kao što su uspeh, neuspeh, nepoznato i istek vremena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1199">This can include values such as success, failure, unknown, and timeout.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1200">Koristi se za praćenje stope uspešnosti radnji i utvrđivanje da li postoji širok problem sa radnjama kalendara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1200">Used to track the success rate of actions and determine if there is a widespread issue with calendar actions.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1201">**attendee_busy_status** - status obaveštenja o zauzetosti učesnika sa kojim je radnja povezana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1201">**attendee_busy_status** - The free/busy status of the attendee that the action is related to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1202">Ova vrednost može da bude slobodan, zauzet ili uslovno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1202">This value can be free, busy, or tentative.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1203">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoji problem sa radnjama u vezi sa određenim zauzetim statusom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1203">Helps us understand if there is an issue with actions related to a certain busy status.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1204">**availability** - vrednost dostupnost ako se vrednost zauzetosti na sastanku promeni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1204">**availability** - The availability value if the free/busy value has changed on the meeting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1205">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa podešavanjem određene vrednosti dostupnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1205">Helps us understand if there are issues with setting a certain availability value.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1206">**calendar_onlinemeeting_default_provider** – sadrži podrazumevanog dobavljača za sastanak na mreži za korišćenje sa kreiranjem servera podržane na mreži.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1206">**calendar_onlinemeeting_default_provider** - Contains the default online meeting provider for use with server-supported online meeting creation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1207">To obuhvata tipove Skype, Skype za posao, Hangout i Teams za posao.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1207">This includes types of Skype, Skype for Business, Hangout, and Teams for Business.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1208">Pomaže nam da ustanovimo potencijalne probleme sa kreiranjem sastanaka na mreži za određene dobavljače.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1208">Helps us diagnose potential issues with creating online meetings on certain providers.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1209">**calendar_onlinemeeting_enabled** - tačno ako kalendar podržava kreiranje sastanka na mreži koji podržava server, zasnovano na podrazumevanom dobavljaču usluga na mreži za sastanke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1209">**calendar_onlinemeeting_enabled** - True if the calendar supports server-supported online meeting creation based on a default online meeting provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1210">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa kalendarima omogućenim za sastanak na mreži.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1210">Helps us understand if there are any issues with online meeting enabled calendars.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1211">**calendar_type** - tip kalendara koji se dešava tokom događaja nakon što je korisnik uredio sastanak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1211">**calendar_type** - The type of calendar an event is on after the user has edited the meeting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1212">Moguće vrednosti obuhvataju primarno, sekundarno, deljeno i grupu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1212">Possible values include primary, secondary, shared, and group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1213">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa određenim tipom kalendara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1213">Helps us understand if there are issues with a certain calendar type.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1214">**delete_action_origin** - poreklo izvršene akcije brisanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1214">**delete_action_origin** - The origin of the delete action performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1215">Ovo obuhvata vrednosti kao što su traka sa alatkama za navigaciju i traka sa alatkama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1215">This includes values such as navigation bar toolbar and capsule toolbar.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1216">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa brisanjem sastanka sa određene lokacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1216">Helps us understand if there are any issues with deleting a meeting from a certain location.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1217">**distribution_list_count** – broj učesnika koji su na spiskovima distribucije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1217">**distribution_list_count** - Number of attendees that are on distribution lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1218">Pomaže nam da pratimo da li postoje problemi sa učesnicima koji su na spiskovima distribucije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1218">Helps us track if there are issues with attendees that are on distribution lists.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1219">**guest_count** - broj gostiju na sastanku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1219">**guest_count** - The number of guests on the meeting.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1220">Pomaže nam da budemo sigurni da se gosti ispravno dodaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1220">Helps us make sure that the guests are being added correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1221">**is_all_day** – koristi kao „meeting_duration“ da biste naveli da li je ovo celodnevni sastanak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1221">**is_all_day** - Used along with "meeting_duration" to specify if this is an all-day meeting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1222">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa radnjama koji se izvode na celodnevnim sastancima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1222">Helps us understand if there are any issues with actions performed on all-day meetings.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1223">**is_location_permission_granted** – da li je korisnik dodelio dozvolu aplikaciji za sistemsku lokaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1223">**is_location_permission_granted** – Whether user has granted system location permission to the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1224">Ako je dozvoljen pristup lokaciji, aplikacija može da prikaže dodatne uslužne informacije u korisničkom interfejsu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1224">If location permission is granted, the app can show extra utility information in the user interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1225">Ako znamo da je dozvola lokacije dodeljena, moći ćemo da znamo koliko se često dodatne uslužne informacije prikazuju korisnicima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1225">Knowing if location permission is granted will allow us to know how often the extra utility information is being shown to users.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1226">**is_organizer** - pomaže nam da shvatimo da li organizator može ispravno da uređuje i kreira sastanke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1226">**is_organizer** - Helps us understand if meetings are able to be edited and created by the organizer correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1227">**is_recurring** - pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoji problem koji posebno utiče na periodične sastanke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1227">**is_recurring** - Helps us understand if there is an issue that specifically impacts recurring meetings.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1228">**launch_point** - tačka lansiranja radnje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1228">**launch_point** - The launch point of the action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1229">Mogu da budu vrednosti kao što su vidžet zaglavlje, vidžet podnožje, vidžet ceo dan i prečica za kalendar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1229">Can be values such as widget header, widget footer, widget all day, and calendar shortcut.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1230">Pomaže nam da shvatimo kontekst sa kojeg je radnja pokrenuta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1230">Helps us understand the context that the action was started from.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1231">**location_count** - broj mesta koji su podešeni na kreiranju i uređivanju događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1231">**location_count** - Number of locations that are set on event create and edit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1232">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa kreiranjem ili uređivanjem događaja sa određenim brojem lokacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1232">Helps us understand if there are any issues with creating or editing events with a certain number of locations.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1233">**location_selection_source_type** - tip izvora za izbor lokacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1233">**location_selection_source_type** - Type of the location selection source.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1234">To može da obuhvati vrednosti kao što su sugestija lokacije, prilagođeno i postojeće.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1234">This can include values such as location suggestion, custom, and existing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1235">Pomaže nam da ustanovimo da li postoje problemi sa biranjem lokacije od određenog izvora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1235">Helps us diagnose any issues with selecting a location from a certain source.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1236">**location_session_id** - ID sesije za izbor lokacije za sastanke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1236">**location_session_id** - ID of the meeting location chooser session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1237">Pomaže nam da ustanovimo bilo kakve probleme pomoću izbora lokacije za dodavanje na sastanak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1237">Helps us diagnose any issues with choosing a location to add to the meeting.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1238">**location_type** - izabrani tip lokacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1238">**location_type** - The type of location selected.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1239">Sadrži tipove kao što su prilagođena lokacija, sala za konferencije i Bing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1239">Contains types such as custom location, conference room, and Bing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1240">Pomaže nam da shvatimo probleme prilikom dodavanja određenih tipova lokacija sastanku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1240">Helps us understand issues with adding certain location types to the meeting.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1241">**meeting_duration** - dužina sastanka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1241">**meeting_duration** - The length of the meeting.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1242">Pomaže nam da se uverimo da se sastanci konfigurišu sa ispravnim vremenima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1242">Helps us make sure that the meetings are being configured with the correct times.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1243">**meeting_insights_type** - tip uvida sastanka u detalje o događaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1243">**meeting_insights_type** - The type of meeting insights in the event details.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1244">Ovo uključuje datoteku i poruku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1244">This includes file and message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1245">Pomaže nam da shvatimo broj uvida sastanaka koji se prikazuju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1245">Helps us understand the number of meeting insights that are being shown.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1246">**meeting_type** - tip sastanka na mreži povezan sa akcijom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1246">**meeting_type** - The type of online meeting associated with the action.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1247">To obuhvata tipove Skype, Skype za posao, Hangout i Teams za posao.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1247">This includes types of Skype, Skype for Business, Hangout, and Teams for Business.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1248">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li su sastanci na mreži ispravno konfigurisani.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1248">Helps us understand if the online meetings are configured correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1249">**origin** - poreklo akcije u kalendaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1249">**origin** - The origin of the calendar action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1250">Ovo obuhvata tipove kao što su dnevni red, kalendar, vidžet rasporeda itd. Pomaže nam da bolje osiguramo da interakcija unutar komponenti kalendara ispravno funkcioniše</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1250">This includes types like agenda, calendar, widget agenda, etc. Helps us better ensure the interaction within the calendar components are working correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1251">**recurrence_scope** - tip ponavljanja za sastanak, bilo koja pojava ili grupa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1251">**recurrence_scope** - The type of recurrence of the meeting, either occurrence or series.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1252">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa uređivanjem različitih tipova obrazaca ponavljanja sastanaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1252">Helps us understand if there are any issues with editing different meeting recurrence types.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1253">**reminder_time** - vreme podsetnika sastanka ako se promenio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1253">**reminder_time** - The reminder time of the meeting if it has changed.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1254">Koristi se da biste se uverili da je vreme sastanka podsetnika ispravno sačuvano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1254">Used to make sure the reminder time of the meeting is saved correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1255">**reminders_count** - broj podsetnika na događaju ako su se podsetnici promenili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1255">**reminders_count** - Number of reminders on the event if the reminders have changed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1256">Pomaže nam da ustanovimo da li postoje problemi sa više podsetnika na događaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1256">Helps us diagnose any issues with multiple reminders on an event.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1257">**sensitivity** - osetljivost sastanka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1257">**sensitivity** - The sensitivity of the meeting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1258">Ovo obuhvata tipove normalnih, ličnih, privatnih i poverljivih.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1258">This includes types of normal, personal, private, and confidential.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1259">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li je osetljivost sastanka ispravno konfigurisana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1259">Helps us understand if the sensitivity of the meeting is being configured correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1260">**session_duration** - dužina trajanja sesije u milisekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1260">**session_duration** - The length that the session lasted in milliseconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1261">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi koji povećavaju količinu potrebnog vremena za izvođene radnje "Kalendar".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1261">Helps us understand if there are issues that are increasing the amount of time needed to perform the calendar action.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1262">**shared_calendar_result** - rezultat radnje izvršene u deljenoj fascikli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1262">**shared_calendar_result** - The result of an action performed on a shared calendar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1263">Moguće vrednosti obuhvataju u redu, ne dozvoljavate, nepoznato, vlasnik lokalno i vlasnik je grupa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1263">Possible values include ok, no permission, unknown, owner on-prem, and owner is group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1264">Pomaže nam da shvatimo pouzdanost radnji izvršenih u deljenim kalendarima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1264">Helps us understand the reliability of actions performed on shared calendars.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1265">**time_picker_origin** - poreklo vremena čuvanja za akciju čuvanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1265">**time_picker_origin** - Origin of the time picker for a save action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1266">Obuhvata vrednosti kao što su više opcija i manje opcija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1266">Includes values such as more options and fewer options.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1267">Pomaže nam da shvatimo na koji način je korisnik otišao u tok da sačuva sastanak i osigura ispravno funkcionisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1267">Helps us understand how the user navigated the flow to save the meeting and ensure that is functioning correctly</span></span>
