- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1268">**title** - automatski predloženi naslov iz vrednosti koje definišu određene aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1268">**title** - The auto-suggested title from app-defined values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1269">Ovo obuhvata vrednosti kao što su „Pozovi“, „Ručak“ i „Skype“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1269">This includes values such as "Call", "Lunch", and "Skype".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1270">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li je automatska sugestija naslova ispravno konfigurisana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1270">Helps us understand if the title auto-suggestion is configured correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1271">**txp** - tip rezervacije ili rezervacija na događaju, ako ih ima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1271">**txp** - The type of booking or reservation on the event, if any.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1272">Ovo obuhvata tipove kao što su rezervacije događaja, rezervacije leta, rezervacije iznajmljivanja kola itd. Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li kartice za rezervacije rade ispravno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1272">This includes types like event reservation, flight reservation, car rental reservation, etc. Helps us understand if the booking/reservation cards are performing correctly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1273">**upcoming_event_count** - broj predstojećih događaja prikazanih u prikazu predstojećih događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1273">**upcoming_event_count** - The number of upcoming events displayed in the upcoming events view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1274">Pomaže nam da shvatimo da li postoje problemi sa predstojećim prikazom događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1274">Helps us understand if there are issues with the upcoming events view.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1275">**upcoming_event_seconds_until_event** - broj sekundi do početka sledećeg događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1275">**upcoming_event_seconds_until_event** - The number of seconds until the next upcoming event starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1276">Pomaže nam da shvatimo tipične događaje koji su prikazani u prikazu predstojećih događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1276">Helps us understand the typical events that are shown in the upcoming events view.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1277">**value** - detalji koji se odnose samo za radnje, kao što su dužina odlaganja ili ponavljanje-do kategorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1277">**value** - Action-specific detail such as alert delay length or repeat-until category.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1278">Pomaže nam da shvatimo kontekst koji je izvršen tokom radnje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1278">Helps us understand the context that the action was performed.</span></span> 

#### <a name="combinedsearchuse"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1279">combined.search.use</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1279">combined.search.use</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1280">Koristi se za nadgledanje mogućeg negativnog uticaja na vašu sposobnost da obavljate ključne funkcije pretraživanja, kao što su pretraživanje pošte, kontakata ili događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1280">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on your ability to perform key search functionality such as searching for mail, contacts, or events.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1281">Sledeća polja se prikupljaju za iOS i Android:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1281">The following fields are collected across iOS and Android:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1282">**account_switcher_action_type** - ovaj tip radnje prati ako je korisnik koristio program za promenu naloga bilo u jednostavnom otkrivanju ili ako je odlučio da promeni nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1282">**account_switcher_action_type** - This action type tracks if the user used the account switcher either in simply discovery or if they decided to switch the account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1283">**action_type** - tip radnje koja je izvršena za pretragu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1283">**action_type** - The type of action that was performed for search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1284">Ovo prepoznaje da li je pokrenuta pretraga, da li je nastala ili završena, kao i koje su se radnje događale tokom pretrage, tj. bio je mikrofon korišćen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1284">This identifies if a search has been started, in occurring, or ended and what actions were happening during the search, for example, was the mic used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1285">Ovo je instrument za obezbeđivanje ispravnih i korisnih pretraga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1285">This is instrumental in ensuring accurate and helpful searches.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1286">**conversation_id** – jedinstveni ID za svaku sesiju pretraživanja (tj. svaki put kada korisnik otvori okvir za pretraživanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1286">**conversation_id** - Unique ID for every search session (for example, every time the user enters the search box)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1287">**entrance_type** - ovo utvrđuje na koji način je korisnik pokrenuo upit za pretragu, sa kartice pretraga, nuli upita, zaglavlju pretrage ili rezultatu pretrage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1287">**entrance_type** - This determines how the user started the search query, from the search tab, zero query, search heading, or search result.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1288">**has_contact_results** – jednostavno bilo da su prikazani rezultati kontakta ili ne u upitu pretrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1288">**has_contact_results** - Simple whether contact results are shown or not in the search query</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1289">**include_deleted** - da li pretraga prikazuje izbrisane opcije u rezultatima pretrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1289">**include_deleted** - whether the search is showing deleted options in the search results</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1290">**is_ics_external_data** – snima da li je dodati događaj unutrašnji (tj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1290">**is_ics_external_data** - Captures if an added event is internal (i.e</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1291">dodat u Outlook u kalendar programa Outlook) ili spoljni (tj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1291">added in Outlook to Outlook calendar) or external (i.e</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1292">dodat iz neke druge aplikacije za e-poštu, kao što je Gmail u kalendar programa Outlook).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1292">added from another email app such as Gmail to Outlook calendar).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1293">**is_network_fully_connected** – ovo služi da dobijete nagoveštaj o razlogu za pretragu van mreže.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1293">**is_network_fully_connected** - This is to get a hint of the reason behind the offline search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1294">Ako je mreža povezana i pretraga je van mreže, razlog je verovatno vremensko ograničenje servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1294">If the network is connected and the search is offline, then the reason is likely to be the server timeout</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1295">**is_offline_search** – da li je sesija pretrage bila pretraga van mreže na osnovu rezultata pretrage koje je vratio hx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1295">**is_offline_search** - whether the search session is offline search based on search results returned by hx</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1296">**re_enter_search_tab** - Boolean da naznači da li je korisnik zamenio kartice pre nego što je odabrao rezultat pretraživanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1296">**re_enter_search_tab** - Boolean to indicate whether a user has switched tabs before selecting a search result</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1297">**result_selected_type** – tip podataka koji su prikazani je uključen u interakciju sa programom itd. pogledajte članak razgovori o kontaktu, razgovorima, događaju itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1297">**result_selected_type** - What type of data that was displayed is the user interacting with, for example, see all contact, conversations, event, etc.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1298">**search_conversation_result_data** - ovo sadrži podatke o razgovoru izabranom u rezultatima pretrage uključujući tip naloga (hx, ac itd.), bez obzira da li se poruka zadržava pomoću usluge u oblaku, kao i da li je prikaz pomaka stranice ista stranica kao i prva poruka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1298">**search_conversation_result_data** - This contains data about the conversation selected from a search result including account type (hx, ac, etc.), whether the message is held by a cloud service, and whether the page offset shown is the same page as the first message.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1299">**search_origin** – odakle je došla pretraga, tj. pomoćnik za glasovne pomoćnika, Cortana, unos tastature itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1299">**search_origin** - Where did the search originate from, for example, voice assistant, Cortana, keyboard input, etc.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1300">**search_scope** – niska koja ukazuje na tip naloga koji je korisnik tražio (npr. Exchange, gmail itd.) ili ako je to bilo na svim nalozima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1300">**search_scope** - A string indicating what type of account the user was searching in (for example, Exchange, Gmail, etc.) or if it was in All Accounts.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1301">**search_suggestion_type** – pokazuje šta se nalazi iza predloga pretrage, tj. da li je ispravka pravopisa?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1301">**search_suggestion_type** - indicates what is behind the search suggestion, for example, is a spell correction?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1302">Na osnovu istorije?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1302">Based on history?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1303">Automatsko dovršavanje?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1303">Autocomplete?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1304">**search_request_reason** – označava razlog za slanje zahteva za pretragu iz aplikacije, što znači da ukazuje na akciju komponente ili korisnika koja je pokrenula pretragu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1304">**search_request_reason** - Indicates the reason a search request was sent from the app, in effect indicating the component or user action that invoked a search.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1305">**search_result_filter_type** - označava koji tip filtera je primenjen za pretraživanje, samo prikaz svih ili priloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1305">**search_result_filter_type** - Indicates what type of filter was applied to search, show all or attachments only</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1306">Sledeća polja se prikupljaju za iOS aplikacije programa Outlook Mobile:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1306">The following fields are collected across iOS applications of Outlook Mobile:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1307">**action** - tip radnje koja je izvršena za pretragu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1307">**action** - the type of action that was performed for search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1308">Ovo prepoznaje da li je pokrenuta pretraga, da li je nastala ili završena, kao i koje su se radnje događale tokom pretrage, tj. bio je mikrofon korišćen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1308">This identifies if a search has been started, in occurring, or ended and what actions were happening during the search, for example, was the mic used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1309">Ovo je instrument za obezbeđivanje ispravnih i korisnih pretraga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1309">This is instrumental in ensuring accurate and helpful searches.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1310">**answer_result_selected_count** – prati koliko puta je pretraživanje bilo „uspešno“ tj. da li je korisnik pronašao osobu koju je želeo?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1310">**answer_result_selected_count** - tracks how many times the search was "successful", for example, did the user find the person they wanted?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1311">Napisali ste e-poruku?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1311">Composed an email?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1312">Obeležili ste poruku obeleživačem?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1312">Bookmarked the message?</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1313">**contact_result_in_full_list_selected_count**–prati koliko puta je korisnik tražio da „Vidi sve kontakte“ na celoj listi izabranoj tokom kombinovanih sesija pretrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1313">**contact_result_in_full_list_selected_count** - tracks how many times the user asked to "see all contacts" in full list was selected during the combined search session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1314">**contact_result_selected_count** - prati koliko je bilo izbora izabranih kontakata tokom kombinovane sesije pretrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1314">**contact_result_selected_count** - tracks how many contact results were selected during the combined search session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1315">**conversation_result_selected_count** - prati koliko razgovora je bilo izabrano tokom kombinovane sesije pretrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1315">**conversation_result_selected_count** - tracks how many conversations were selecting during the combined search session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1316">**mail_paging_gesture_count** – prati koliko je gesti listanja stranica za pretraživanje pošte izvršeno unutar kombinovane sesije pretraživanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1316">**mail_paging_gesture_count** - tracks how many mail search paging gestures were performed within the combined search session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1317">**mail_requests_count** – prati koliko je zahteva za pretragu pošte poslato u okviru kombinovane sesije pretrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1317">**mail_requests_count** - tracks how many mail search requests were sent within the combined search session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1318">**people_filter_selected_contacts_count** – prati koliko kontakata je izabrano u filteru za osobe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1318">**people_filter_selected_contacts_count** - tracks how many contacts were selected in the people filter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1319">**search_session_ended_type** - označava gde je pretraga završena zato što je otkazana ili je upit ažuriran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1319">**search_session_ended_type** - Indicates where a search ended because it was canceled or the updated was the query</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1320">**search_suggestion_type** – pokazuje šta se nalazi iza predloga pretrage, tj. da li je ispravka pravopisa?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1320">**search_suggestion_type** - indicates what is behind the search suggestion, for example, is a spell correction?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1321">Na osnovu istorije?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1321">Based on history?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1322">Automatsko dovršavanje?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1322">Autocomplete?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1323">**see_all_contacts_selected_count** – prati koliko je puta izabrano „pogledaj sve kontakte“ tokom kombinovane sesije pretrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1323">**see_all_contacts_selected_count** - tracks how many times "see all contacts" was selected during the combined search session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1324">**subtab_type** –  prati sa koje kartice sa rezultatima je korisnik izabrao rezultat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1324">**subtab_type** -  tracks where the user has selected the result from which result tab</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1325">**top_mail_result_selected_count** - prati koliko puta korisnik izabere najbolje rezultate koji im je pružen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1325">**top_mail_result_selected_count** - tracks how many times a user selects the top results provided to them.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1326">**ui_reload_result_count** – snima vremena ponovnog učitavanja korisničkog interfejsa zbog ažuriranja skupa rezultata (tokom izvršavanja odgovarajućeg upita)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1326">**ui_reload_result_count** - records the times of reloading UI because of result set update (during the corresponding query)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1327">**ui_reload_result_time** – snima ukupno vreme utrošeno na ponovno učitavanje korisničkog interfejsa zbog ažuriranja skupa rezultata (tokom izvršavanja odgovarajućeg upita)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1327">**ui_reload_result_time** - records the total time spent on reloading UI because of result set update (during the corresponding query)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1328">**ui_reload_status_count** – snima vremena ponovnog učitavanja korisničkog interfejsa zbog ažuriranja statusa (tokom izvršavanja odgovarajućeg upita)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1328">**ui_reload_status_count** - records the times of reloading UI because of status update (during the corresponding query)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1329">**ui_reload_status_time** – snima ukupno vreme utrošeno na ponovno učitavanje korisničkog interfejsa zbog ažuriranja statusa (tokom izvršavanja odgovarajućeg upita)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1329">**ui_reload_status_time** - records the total time spent on reloading UI because of status update (during the corresponding query)</span></span>

#### <a name="composemailaccessory"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1330">compose.mail.accessory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1330">compose.mail.accessory</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1331">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo i rešimo probleme sa ključnim radnjama za pisanje e-pošte kako bi vas sprečilo da nailazite na probleme sa prilaganjem datoteke, slikate kao prilog ili šaljete dostupnost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1331">This event lets us detect and fix issues with key mail compose actions to prevent you from running into issues with attaching a file, taking a photo as an attachment, or sending your availability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1332">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1332">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1333">**action** - govori nam šta je bilo pokušano kada se evidentira radnja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1333">**action** - Tells us the action that was attempted when the action is logged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1334">Neki primeri uključuju prilaganje datoteke i predstavljanje više opcija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1334">Some examples include attaching a file and presenting more options.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1335">**icon_name** - govori nam ime ikone koja se prikazuje kada se evidentira radnja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1335">**icon_name** - Tells us the name of the icon that is being shown when the action is logged.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1336">**origin** – Pokazuje nam poreklo radnje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1336">**origin** – Tells us the origin of the action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1337">Moguće vrednosti su quick_reply i full_screen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1337">Possible values are quick_reply and full_screen.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1338">**toolbar_type** – Pokazuje nam tip trake sa alatkama koji se nalazi na stranici za sastavljanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1338">**toolbar_type** – Tell us the toolbar type that is presenting on compose page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1339">Moguće vrednosti su compose_actions i formatting.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1339">Possible values are compose_actions and formatting.</span></span>


#### <a name="conversationviewaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1340">conversation.view.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1340">conversation.view.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1341">Koristi se za monitoring mogućeg negativnog uticaja na mogućnost prikazivanja i odgovaranje na e-poruke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1341">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on your ability to view and reply to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1342">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1342">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1343">**contains_mention** - saopštava nam da li je konverzacija za @ pominjanje primenjena kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme sa pomenutim porukama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1343">**contains_mention** - Tells us if the conversation had an @ mention applied to help us detect issues with email mentions</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1344">**conversation_type** - govori nam koji tip prikaza e-poruke je vizuelizovana, kao što su jedan prikaz poruke ili više prikaza poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1344">**conversation_type** - Tells us what type of email message view was rendered, such as a single message view or multiple message views.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1345">Pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa određenim tipom poruke u našem prikazu za razgovor kroz e-poštu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1345">Helps us detect issues related to a specific message type in our email conversation view.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1346">**hx_error_type** – govori nam koja greška je zabranila usluzi da izvrši uklanjanje, ažuriranje ili dodavanje reakcije na poruku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1346">**hx_error_type** - tells us what error occurred that prohibited the service from completing a remove, update, or add reaction on a message.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1347">**hx_string_tag** – govori nam oznaku greške u bazi koda usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1347">**hx_string_tag** - tells us the tag of the error in the service's codebase</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1348">**reaction_origin** – saopštava koji je izvor iz kog je korisnik reagovao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1348">**reaction_origin** – Tells us origin from where the user reacted</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1349">**reaction_type** – saopštava tip reakcije korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1349">**reaction_type** – Tells us the reaction type of the user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1350">**suggested_reply_char_count** - govori nam koliko znakova predlažemo predloge koji pružamo (ako je dostupno) da nam pomognu da otkrijemo anomalije i probleme u vezi sa našim predlozima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1350">**suggested_reply_char_count** - Tells us how many characters the suggested replies we offer (if available) to help us detect anomalies and issues related to our suggestions</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1351">**suggested_reply_click_pos** - saopštava nam na koji položaj predloženi odgovor (ako je dostupno) se prikazuje tako da možete da otkrijete probleme sa određenim predlozima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1351">**suggested_reply_click_pos** - Tells us which position the suggested reply (if available) is rendered so we can detect issues with a specific suggestion</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1352">**suggested_reply_type** – Ukazuje na tip predloženog odgovora za ovu radnju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1352">**suggested_reply_type** - indicates type of suggested reply for this action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1353">Moguće vrednosti su text, send_avail i create_meeting.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1353">Possible values are text, send_avail, and create_meeting.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1354">**use_default_quick_reply_mode** - govori nam ako je podrazumevani režim za brze odgovore korišćen da bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa iskustvom za brze odgovore za e-poštu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1354">**use_default_quick_reply_mode** - Tells us if the default quick reply mode was used to help us detect issues related to the quick reply experience for email</span></span>

#### <a name="draftaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1355">draft.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1355">draft.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1356">Koristi se za monitoring mogućeg negativnog uticaja na mogućnost pravljenja i čuvanja radnih verzija pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1356">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on your ability to create and save mail drafts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1357">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1357">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1358">**action** – tip radnje, npr. sačuvaj, odbaci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1358">**action** - the type of action, for example, save, discard.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1359">**draft_message_id** - ID poruke za radnu verziju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1359">**draft_message_id** - message ID of the draft</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1360">**is_groups** - da li se radna verzija šalje u/iz fascikle grupa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1360">**is_groups** - whether the draft is being sent to/from a group folder</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1361">**origin** – gde je pokrenuta radna verzija, npr. detalj poruke, pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1361">**origin** - where draft was initiated, for example, message detail, compose.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1362">**smart_compose_model_version** – prati koja se verzija modela pametnog sastavljanja koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1362">**smart_compose_model_version** - tracks which version of smart compose model is being used</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1363">**suggestions_requested** – pokazuje koliko se predloga pametnog sastavljanja traži</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1363">**suggestions_requested** - indicates how many smart compose suggestions requested</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1364">**suggestions_results** – rezultati predloga pametnog sastavljanja, tj. prihvaćeno, odbijeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1364">**suggestions_results** - smart compose suggestions’ result, that is, accepted, rejected</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1365">**suggestions_returned** – pokazuje koliko je predloga pametnog sastavljanja vraćeno sa servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1365">**suggestions_returned** - indicates how many smart compose suggestions returned from server</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1366">**suggestions_shown** – pokazuje koliko se predloga pametnog sastavljanja prikazuje korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1366">**suggestions_shown** - indicates how many smart compose suggestions shown to the user</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1367">**thread_id** - ID za radnu verziju razgovora povezuje se sa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1367">**thread_id** - thread ID of the conversation draft is associated with</span></span>

#### <a name="draganddrop"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1368">drag.and.drop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1368">drag.and.drop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1369">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo da li je radnja prevlačenja i otpuštanja bila uspešna ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1369">This event lets us detect if the drag and drop action was successful or not.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1370">On se koristi da bismo se uverili da iskustva prevlačenja i otpuštanja ispravno rade u svim aplikacijama kao događaj otpuštanja u Outlook i kao događaj prevlačenja koji napušta Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1370">It is used to ensure that drag-and-drop experiences are working correctly across applications both as a drop event into Outlook and a drag event that leaves Outlook.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1371">Sa ovim podacima možemo da osiguramo da kompletno iskustvo sa drugim aplikacijama radi na očekivani način.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1371">With this data, we are able to ensure that the end-to-end experience with other applications is working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1372">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1372">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1373">**action** – Radnja će biti prevlačenje ili otpuštanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1373">**action** - Action will be either drag or drop</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1374">**location** – U slučaju radnje prevlačenja, ovo će nas obavestiti sa koje lokacije je korisnik započeo prevlačenje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1374">**location** - In case of a drag action, this will let us know from which location the user started the drag.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1375">U slučaju radnje otpuštanja, to će nam dati do znanja gde je korisnik otpustio datoteku koja je prevučena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1375">In case of a drop action, this will let us know where the user dropped the file that was being dragged.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1376">**source** – U slučaju radnje otpuštanja, ovo će nas obavestiti sa koje lokacije je korisnik započeo prevlačenje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1376">**source** – In the case of a drop action, this will let us know from which location the user started the drag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1377">To nam pomaže da lakše otkrijemo probleme sa određenim izvorima poput OneDrive ili datotekama u određenoj lokaciji za otpuštanje, poput nove e-poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1377">This helps us better discover issues with a specific source like OneDrive or Files into a specific drop location, such as a new email.</span></span>

#### <a name="drawerevent"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1378">drawer.event</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1378">drawer.event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1379">Koristi se za monitoring mogućeg negativnog uticaja na mogućnost pristupa fasciklama u prijemnom poštanskom sandučetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1379">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on your ability to access folders in your inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1380">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1380">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1381">**add_calendar_option** – ukazuje na tip kalendara koji se dodaje iz fioke ili interesantnog kalendara, kalendar pošte, deljeni kalendar, da bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa određenim tipovima kalendara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1381">**add_calendar_option** - Indicates the type of calendar being added from the drawer that is, interesting calendar, mail calendar, shared calendar, to help us detect issues related to specific calendar types</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1382">**calendar_accounts_count** - ukazuje na broj naloga kalendara koji nam pomažu da ustanovljene probleme u vezi sa brojem naloga koje imate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1382">**calendar_accounts_count** - Indicates the number of calendar accounts to help us detect issues related to number of accounts you have</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1383">**calendar_apps_count** – označava broj aplikacija kalendara koji se nalaze na uređaju korisnika da bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa kalendar aplikacijama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1383">**calendar_apps_count** - Indicates the number of calendar apps present on the user's device to help us detect issues related to calendar apps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1384">**drawer_type** - ukazuje na tip fioke: kalendar, pošta ili 0 upit koji će nam pomoći da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa tipom fioke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1384">**drawer_type** - Indicates the drawer type: calendar, mail or zero query to help us detect issues related to the drawer type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1385">**from_favorites** - označava da li je radnja uzeta iz omiljenih lokacija kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa omiljenim lokacijama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1385">**from_favorites** - Indicates if the action was taken from favorites to help us detect issues related to favorites</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1386">**group_calendar_count** – označava broj kalendara za nalog koji će nam pomoći da otkrijemo probleme vezane sa grupom kalendara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1386">**group_calendar_count** - Indicates the number of calendars for the account to help us detect issues related to group calendars</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1387">**inbox_unread_count** – označava broj nepročitanih poruka u prijemnom poštanskom sandučetu da bi nam pomogao da ustanovljene probleme sa prikazivanjem obaveštenja o nepročitanom sandučetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1387">**inbox_unread_count** - Indicates the number of unread messages in the inbox to help us detect issues with displaying inbox unread counts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1388">**interesting_calendar_accounts_count** – ukazuje na broj naloga koji ispunjavaju uslove za zanimljive kalendari na uređaju kako bi nam pomogli da otkrijemo probleme koji se tiču zanimljivih kalendara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1388">**interesting_calendar_accounts_count** - Indicates the number of accounts that are eligible for interesting calendars on the device to help us detect issues related to interesting calendars</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1389">**is_group_calendar** – označava da li je kalendar grupni kalendar koji će nam pomoći u otkrivanju problema povezanih grupnih kalendara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1389">**is_group_calendar** - Indicates if the calendar is a group calendar to help us detect issues related to group calendars</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1390">**mail_folder_type** – ukazuje na tip fascikle "Pošta", "Prijemno poštansko sanduče", "radne verzije" itd. da biste nam pomogli da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa tipovima fascikli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1390">**mail_folder_type** - Indicates the mail folder type that is, inbox, drafts, etc. to help us detect issues related to folder types.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1391">**mail_accounts_count** – označava broj naloga za poštu koji će nam pomoći u otkrivanju problema povezanih računa pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1391">**mail_accounts_count** - indicates the number of mail accounts to help us detect issues related to mail accounts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1392">**selected_group_calendar_count** – označava broj grupnih kalendara koji su odabrani i aktivni u korisničkom interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1392">**selected_group_calendar_count** - Indicates the number of group calendars that are selected and active in the UI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1393">**visibility_toggle** - označava da li je korisnik uključio ili isključio dati kalendara kako bi nam pomogao da ustanovimo probleme u vezi sa prikazivanjem ili sakrivanjem kalendara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1393">**visibility_toggle** - indicates if the user is turning on or off a given calendar to help us detect issues related to showing or hiding calendars</span></span>

#### <a name="ipccreaterepublishinglicense"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1394">IpcCreateRepublishingLicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1394">IpcCreateRepublishingLicense</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1395">Sakuplja se kada korisnik pokuša da otvori IRM zaštićeni dokument ili primeni IRM zaštitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1395">Collected when a user attempts to open an IRM protected doc or apply IRM protections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1396">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se događaju prilikom IpcCreateRepublishingLicense API poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1396">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen when the IpcCreateRepublishingLicense API call is made.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1397">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1397">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
