#### <a name="linkclickedaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1646">link.clicked.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1646">link.clicked.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1647">Događaj se koristi za praćenje uspeha korisnika u prikazu URL adrese u Edge veb prikazu i ispunjavanju standardnih veb scenarija u tom veb prikazu bez grešaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1647">The event is used to track users' success in viewing a URL in the Edge web view and completing standard web scenarios in that web view without facing errors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1648">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1648">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1649">**account_type** – ako je Edge veb prikaz pokrenut iz e-poruke ili događaja u sistemu Outlook, tip naloga odakle je URL potekao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1649">**account_type** – if the Edge web view was launched from an email or event in Outlook, type of the account where the URL came from</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1650">**action** – radnja koju obavlja korisnik u sistemu Outlook od trenutka kada dodire URL do trenutka kada izađe iz tog toka (otvaranje veze u Edge veb prikazu, stranica ne može da se učita u veb prikazu, obavljanje pretrage u veb prikazu, izlazak iz Edge veb prikaza radi otvaranja veze u aplikaciji veb pregledača itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1650">**action** – action performed by the user inside Outlook from the moment they tap on a URL to when they exit that flow (opened the link in the Edge web view, page failed to load in the web view, performed a search in the web view, exit the Edge web view to open the link in a web browser application, etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1651">**duration** – trajanje korisničke sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1651">**duration** – duration of the user session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1652">**launch_type** – ako je pokrenut Edge veb prikaz, bilo iz sistema Outlook, bilo iz vidžeta ili komponente OS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1652">**launch_type** – if the Edge web view was launched, was it from Outlook, from a widget, or from an OS component</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1653">**origin** – ako je korisnik obavio radnju u Edge veb prikazu, poreklo te radnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1653">**origin** – if the user performed an action in the Edge web view, origin of that action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1654">**referrer** – lokacija URL adrese koju je korisnik dodirnuo (e-poruka, događaj iz kalendara, TXP karta itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1654">**referrer** – the location of the URL the user tapped on (email, calendar event, TXP card, etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1655">**search_scope** – ako je korisnik obavio pretragu u Edge veb prikazu, opseg te pretrage (sve, slike, video itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1655">**search_scope** – if the user performed a search in the Edge web view, scope of that search (All, Images, Videos, etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1656">**search_subtype** – ako je korisnik obavio pretragu u Edge veb prikazu, da li je to bila početna pretraga ili sužena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1656">**search_subtype** – if the user performed a search in the Edge web view, was it an initial search or a refined search</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1657">**session_summary_page_loaded_count** – broj strana koje korisnik učita tokom sesije u Edge veb prikazu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1657">**session_summary_page_loaded_count** – number of pages loaded by the user during their session in the Edge web view</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1658">**session_summary_search_count** – broj Bing pretraga koje korisnik obavi tokom sesije u Edge veb prikazu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1658">**session_summary_search_count** - number of Bing searches performed by the user during their session in the Edge web view</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1659">**session_summary_session_id** – identifikator za trenutnu korisničku sesiju u Edge veb prikazu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1659">**session_summary_session_id** – identifier for the present user session in the Edge web view</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1660">**txp** – ako je Edge veb prikaz pokrenut iz TXP karte, tip događaja te kartice (večera, let itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1660">**txp** – if the Edge web view was launched from a TXP card, event type for that card (dining, flight, etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1661">**txp_component** – ako je Edge veb prikaz pokrenut iz TXP karte, tip komponente korisničkog interfejsa te karte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1661">**txp_component** - if the Edge web view was launched from a TXP card, UI component type for that card</span></span>


#### <a name="mailaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1662">mail.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1662">mail.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1663">Koristi se za nadgledanje mogućeg negativnog uticaja na mogućnost izvršavanja kritičnih radnji pošte (kao što je pokretanje lančanog režima rada pošte, obezbeđivanje trijažne radnje pošte) kako bi se osiguralo da aplikacija radi ispravo za poštu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1663">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on your ability to perform critical mail actions (like running mail threaded mode, ensuring mail triage actions work) to ensure our app is functioning properly for mail.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1664">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1664">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1665">**account** – nalog koji je obavio radnju *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1665">**account** - the account that performed the action *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1666">**action** – prati koji tip radnje je preduzeo, tj. arhiviranje, izbriši, označi kao pročitano itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1666">**action** - tracks what type of action was taking, that is, archive, delete, mark as read, etc.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1667">**attachment_content_type** - tip sadržaja preuzetog priloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1667">**attachment_content_type** - the content type of the downloaded attachment</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1668">**attachment_content_type_with_count** - prati broj priloga u e-poruci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1668">**attachment_content_type_with_count** - tracks the number of attachments in email</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1669">**attachment_download_result** – rezultat (npr. uspeh/neuspeh) za akciju preuzimanja priloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1669">**attachment_download_result** - the result (that is, success/failure) for an attachment download action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1670">**attachment_download_time** - vreme radnje preuzimanja priloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1670">**attachment_download_time** - the time for an attachment download action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1671">**attachment_extn** – produžetak datoteke preuzetog priloga *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojaviti u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1671">**attachment_extn** - the file extension of the downloaded attachment *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1672">**attachment_id** - identifikator sistema za preuzet prilog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1672">**attachment_id** - the system identifier for the downloaded attachment</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1673">**attachment_size** - veličina preuzetog priloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1673">**attachment_size** - the size of downloaded attachment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1674">**domain** - domen dokumenta koji se otvara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1674">**domain** - domain of the document being opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1675">**duration** – prati koliko dugo je trajala radnja u vidu engleski String (npr. 1s, 4č)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1675">**duration** - tracks how long the action took as human-readable English string (for example, 1s, 4h)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1676">**error** - poruka o grešci koja se odnosi na akciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1676">**error** - error message associated with the action</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1677">**event_mode** - kakav tip režima događaja je bio u programu, grupi ili drugima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1677">**event_mode** - what type of event mode it was in, groups or others.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1678">**Extension**– četiri znaka nastavka datoteke veze ili priloga povezanog sa ovom radnjom  *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojaviti u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1678">**Extension** - four characters of file extension of link or attachment associated with this action  *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1679">**internet_message_id** - ID poruke praćenja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1679">**internet_message_id** - tracking message ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1680">**is_group_escalation** - označava da li je poruka, prema kojoj je preduzeta radnja, poslata u poštansko sanduče korisnika zbog eskalacije (pretplaćenog na grupu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1680">**is_group_escalation** - indicates whether the message the action was taken on was sent to the user's mailbox because of an escalation (subscribed to group)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1681">**is_rule** - označava da li je izvšena radnja pošte vraćena u fokusiranu/drugu klasifikaciju </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1681">**is_rule** - indicates if the mail action done is resetting a focused/other classification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1682">**is_threaded_mode** – označava da li je poruka bila u nitnom režimu ili ne, tj. kako su poruke grupisane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1682">**is_threaded_mode** - indicates whether the message was in threaded mode or not, that is, how are the messages grouped</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1683">**is_unread** - označava da li je poruka nepročitana da je akcija preduzeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1683">**is_unread** - indicates whether message is unread that the action was taken on</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1684">**left_swipe_setting** - ukazuje na to koja je radnja bila podešena da bude prevlačenje ulevo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1684">**left_swipe_setting** - indicates what action was a set to be the left swipe</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1685">**message_id** – ID poruke serveru koji je usmeren na akciju ili je razdvojena zarezima ako je u pitanju radnja veća od jedne stavke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1685">**message_id** - server message ID targeted for action, or comma-separated list if more than one item was in action.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1686">**message_type** – označava na kojem tipu poruke je napravljena radnja – grupnoj ili drugoj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1686">**message_type** - indicates what type of message type the action was taken on - group or other</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1687">**number_selected** – broj stavki koje je korisnik izabrao na listi poruka i preduzeo radnje tokom režima višestrukog izbora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1687">**number_selected** - the number of items the user selected on the message list and took action on during multiple selection mode.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1688">**origin** – izvor radnje, npr. prevlačenje ćelija, 0–upit, duboka veza, prikaz e–pošte, lista e–pošte itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1688">**origin** - source of action, that is, cell swipe, zero-query, deep link, email view, email list, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1689">**origin_view** – izvor prikaza radnje, npr., razgovor, poruka itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1689">**origin_view** - source view of action, for example, conversation, message, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1690">**reported_to_msft** - kada šaljete e-poruku u neželjenu (bezvrednu poštu) ili kantu za smeće (phishing), oni mogu da odaberu da prijave njihovu akciju korporaciji Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1690">**reported_to_msft** - after sending an email to junk (spam) or trash (phishing) they can choose to report their action to Microsoft.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1691">**retry** - da li je radnja ponovo pokušana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1691">**retry** - whether the action was retried</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1692">**right_swipe_setting** - ukazuje na to koja je radnja bila podešena da bude prevlačenje udesno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1692">**right_swipe_setting** - indicates what action was a set to be the right swipe</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1693">**shortcut** – označava da li je prečica korišćena i koja prečica je korišćena za planiranje poruke npr. kasnije, sutra, izbor vremena itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1693">**shortcut** - indicates if a shortcut was used and what shortcut was used for scheduling a message that is, later, tomorrow, choose time, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1694">**size** – veličine veze ili priloga povezan sa ovom akcijom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1694">**size** - size of link or attachment associated with this action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1695">**source_folder** – prati tip izvorne fascikle kada radnja pokazuje prelazak iz jedne fascikle u drugu, tj. u prijemno sanduče, smeće itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1695">**source_folder** - tracks source folder type when action is indicating to move from one folder to other, that is, to inbox, trash etc.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1696">**source_inbox** – označava u kom prijemnom poštanskom sandučetu se odvija radnja pošte (npr. fokusirano, drugo itd.) stanje – stanje radnje, tj. uspeh ili tačka neuspeha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1696">**source_inbox** - indicates which inbox the mail action is taking place (that is, focused, other, etc.) state - state of the action, that is, success or point of failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1697">**source_inbox** – stanje akcije, tj. uspeh ili tačka neuspeha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1697">**state** - state of the action, that is, success or point of failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1698">**target_folder** – označava odredišni tip fascikle prilikom premeštanja e–pošte iz jedne fascikle u drugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1698">**target_folder** - indicates target folder type when moving emails from one folder to other</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1699">**thread_id** – ID razgovora usmerenog na akciju ili listu razdvojenu zarezima ako je više od jedne stavke ciljano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1699">**thread_id** - thread ID of the conversation targeted for action, or comma-separated list if more than one item was targeted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1700">**time_taken_to_fetch_access_token** -potrebno vreme da se dobavi sistemski token pristupa koji se koristi za otvaranje veze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1700">**time_taken_to_fetch_access_token** - time taken to fetch a system access token to use for opening a link</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1701">**time_taken_to_fetch_drive_item** - vreme potrebno za hvatanje resursa OneDrive kada se klikne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1701">**time_taken_to_fetch_drive_item** - time taken to fetch a OneDrive resource when clicked</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1702">**time_taken_to_fetch_embed_viewer_resource** - vreme potrebno za inicijalizaciju ugrađenog preglednika prilikom otvaranja veza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1702">**time_taken_to_fetch_embed_viewer_resource** - time taken to initialize the embedded viewer when opening links</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1703">**time_taken_to_load_embed_viewer** - vreme snimljeno za pokretanje ugrađenog preglednika pri otvaranju veza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1703">**time_taken_to_load_embed_viewer** - time taken to initialize the embedded viewer when opening links</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1704">**time_taken_to_load_link** - vreme za dovršavanje radnje učitavanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1704">**time_taken_to_load_link** - time a load link action takes to complete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1705">**time_taken_to_tap_attachment** – vreme između otvaranja poruke i klika na prilog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1705">**time_taken_to_tap_attachment** - the time between opening the message and clicking on the attachment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1706">**time_taken_to_tap_link** - vreme koje je korisnik uzeo između prikaza poruke i klika na vezu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1706">**time_taken_to_tap_link** - time the user took between viewing message and clicking a link</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1707">**txp** – označava da li postoji txp tip artikla koji se povezuje sa poštom na koju je radnja snimljena, npr. rezervacija događaja, rezervacija leta itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1707">**txp** - indicates if there is a txp type of item associated with the mail that action was taken on, that is, event reservation, flight reservation, etc.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1708">**type** - tip dokumenta koji se otvara preko veze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1708">**type** - document type being opened via link</span></span>

#### <a name="mailcompose"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1709">mail.compose</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1709">mail.compose</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1710">Koristi se za monitoring mogućeg negativnog uticaja na vaše mogućnosti za pisanje i odgovaranje na e-poruke kao što je "pokretanje" u problemima i odgovaranje na njih, formatiranje e-poruke ili slanje e-poruka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1710">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on your ability to compose and reply to emails such as running into issues with reply-all, formatting your email, or sending your emails.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1711">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1711">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1712">**draft_message_id** – radna verzija razgovora koji se kreira kao radna verzija kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa nacrtima e–pošte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1712">**draft_message_id** - The draft ID of the conversation being created as a draft to help us detect issues related to draft emails</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1713">**message_id** – ID poruke razgovora na koju je odgovoreno ili prosleđeno iz programa kako bi nam pomoglo da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa određenom porukom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1713">**message_id** - The message ID of the conversation being replied to or forwarded from to help us detect issues related to a specific message</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1714">**origin** - govori nam gde je nastala nova poruka, kao što je odgovori svima, nova poruka ili brzi odgovor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1714">**origin** - Tells us where the compose originated from, such as from a reply all, a new compose, or quick reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1715">Pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme koji su povezati sa određenim izvornim tipom odgovora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1715">Helps us detect issues associated with a specific reply origin type.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1716">**is_group_escalation** - bez obzira na to da li je poruka eskalirana grupna poruka, možemo da otkrijemo probleme povezane sa sastavljanjem grupe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1716">**is_group_escalation** - Whether the message is an escalated group message so we can detect compose issues related to groups.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1717">**is_link** - saopštava nam da li je nova radna verzija napravljena od veze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1717">**is_link** - Tells us if the new draft that was created was done from a link.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1718">Pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme povezane sa radnim verzijama koje se kreiraju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1718">Helps us detect issues associated with drafts created from links.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1719">**is_force_touch** – saopštava nam da li je nova radna verzija napravljena od radnje dodirom na silu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1719">**is_force_touch** - Tells us if the new draft that was created was done from a force touch action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1720">Pomaže nam da otkrijemo probleme povezane sa radnim verzijama koje se kreiraju iz određenih radnji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1720">Helps us detect issues associated with drafts created from this specific action.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1721">**is_groups** - da li je događaj pokrenut iz prostora grupa tako da možemo da otkrijemo probleme prilikom sastavljanja stavki u vezi sa grupama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1721">**is_groups** - Whether the event was started from the groups' space so we can detect compose issues related to groups.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1722">**source_inbox** - saopštava da li je izvorno poštansko sanduče bilo fokusirano ili drugo prijemno sanduče </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1722">**source_inbox** - Tells us the source inbox, such as whether it was a focused or other inbox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1723">**thread_id** – ID nit razgovora na koju je odgovoreno ili prosleđeno iz programa kako bi nam pomoglo da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa određenom niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1723">**thread_id** - The thread ID of the conversation being replied to or forwarded from to help us detect issues related to a specific thread</span></span>

#### <a name="meetingcalltoaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1724">meeting.call.to.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1724">meeting.call.to.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1725">Koristi se za monitoring mogućeg negativnog uticaja na mogućnost izvršavanja koraka za kritične sastanke kao što je pravljenje, uređivanje i odgovaranje na sastanke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1725">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on your ability to perform critical meeting actions like creating, editing, and responding to meetings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1726">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1726">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1727">**event_mode** - ukazuje na to da li je ovaj događaj bio iz grupe ili nije, da bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme sa grupom događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1727">**event_mode** - Indicates whether this event was from a group or not to help us detect issues with group events</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1728">**meeting_id** - ID sastanka koji nam pomaže da pratimo probleme tokom životnog veka sastanka da bismo otkrili probleme sa određenim sastancima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1728">**meeting_id** - A meeting ID that helps us track issues throughout the lifetime of a meeting to help us detect issues with specific meetings</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1729">**meeting_provider** – pokazuje snabdevača za sastanak na mreži, npr. timovi, Skype za posao da biste nam pomogli da otkrijemo probleme sa određenim dobavljačima sastanaka na mreži</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1729">**meeting_provider** - Indicates the provider for an online meeting, for example, Teams, Skype for Business to help us detect issues with specific online meeting providers</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1730">**notify_type** – ukazuje na tip odgovora za druge tipove naloga koji nam pomažu da otkrijemo probleme sa drugim tipovima naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1730">**notify_type** - Indicates the response type for other account types to help us detect issues with different account types</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1731">**recurrence** – pokazuje koliko često ovaj sastanak nastaje npr. ponavljanje ili serije kako bi nam pomogao da ustanovite probleme sa grupom sastanaka koji se ponavljaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1731">**recurrence** - Indicates how often this meeting occurs that is, occurrence or series to help us detect issues with reoccurring meeting series</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1732">**response** - ukazuje na tip odgovora kao što su prihvatanje ili odbijanje određenih tipova naloga kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme pri odgovoru na događaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1732">**response** - Indicates response type such as accept or decline on certain account types to help us detect issues with responding to events</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1733">**response_message_length** - pokazuje kolika je dužina poruke bila pri otkrivanju problema sa odgovorima na sastanku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1733">**response_message_length** - Indicates how long the message length was to help us detect issues with meeting responses</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1734">**review_time_proposal_action_type** - pokazuje novi predlog za odziv korisnika da bi nam pomogao da ustanovite probleme sa predlaganjem novog vremena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1734">**review_time_proposal_action_type** - Indicates a user response new time proposal to help us detect issues with proposing a new time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1735">**send_response** - označava da li je poslat odgovor da bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme slanja odgovora o pozivu na sastanak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1735">**send_response** - Indicates whether a response was sent to help us detect issues sending meeting invite responses</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1736">**txp** - ukazuje na tip sastanka koji je generisan u vezi sa rezervacijama letova i isporukama kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme sa ovim tipom sastanaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1736">**txp** - Indicates what type of meeting it was generated from flight reservations and deliveries to help us detect issues with this type of meeting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1737">**with_message_enabled** – označava da li korisnik može da odgovara porukom kako bi nam pomogao da ustanovimo probleme pri odgovaranju na pozivnice za sastanke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1737">**with_message_enabled** - Indicates whether a user can respond with a message to help us detect issues with responding to meeting invites</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroiddocsuifileoperationsopendocumentmeasurements"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1738">Office.Android.DocsUI.FileOperations.OpenDocumentMeasurements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1738">Office.Android.DocsUI.FileOperations.OpenDocumentMeasurements</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1739">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Android platforme i zapisa kada se pokrene operacija otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1739">This event is collected for Office applications running under Android platform and records when a file open operation takes place.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1740">Događaj pomaže u održavanju otvorene operacije datoteka bezbednim, ažuriranim i da ispravno funkcionišu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1740">The event helps in keeping the file open operation secure, up- to- date and performing properly.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1741">Cilj prikupljanja ovih podataka jeste da se kontinuirano poboljšava performanse otvorene datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1741">The goal of collecting this data is to continuously improve the file open performance.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1742">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1742">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1743">**Data_AppDocsOperationDuration** - vreme provedeno u podsloju tokom operacije otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1743">**Data_AppDocsOperationDuration** - The duration spent in sub- layer during a file open operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1744">**Data_AppDuration** - vreme provedeno u obradi aplikacije tokom operacije otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1744">**Data_AppDuration** - The duration spent in application processing during a file open operation.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1745">**Data_AppWarmUpGain** – Podešavanje trajanja pokretanja aplikacije koje dobijamo zbog prethodnog dela aplikacije pre pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1745">**Data_AppWarmUpGain** - The gain in application boot duration we get because of pre-booting a part of the application beforehand.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1746">**Data_BootDuration** - trajanje pokretanja aplikacije u procesu otvorene datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1746">**Data_BootDuration** - The duration of application boot in process of the file open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1747">**Data_ClosePreviouslyOpenedMarkers** – Vrednost niske koja evidentira trajanje između nekih poziva funkcije prilikom pokretanja aplikacije, u formatu sa ID-om funkcije i trajanjem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1747">**Data_BootMarkers** – A string value logging the time duration between some function calls when booting the application, in a format with function ID and duration.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1748">**Data_ClosePreviouslyOpenedMarkers** – U nekim scenarijima otvaranja datoteka, zatvaranje prethodno otvorenog dokumenta se obavlja pre otvaranja trenutnog dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1748">**Data_ClosePreviouslyOpenedMarkers** – In some file open scenarios, closing of a previously opened document takes place before the opening of the current document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1749">Ovaj period između nekih operacija koje se obavljaju u ovom slučaju hvata se u vrednosti niske koja je u formatu \<functionId>\<functionValue>\<functionId>\<functionValue>...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1749">This time duration between some of the operations that take place in this case is captured in a string value that has the format \<functionId>\<functionValue>\<functionId>\<functionValue>...</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1750">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** – Nabrajanje koje označava režim pristupa datoteke, npr. samo za čitanje, čitanje pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1750">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - An enumeration indicating the access mode of the file, for example, read only, read write.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1751">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind**- Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip asinhronog toka korišćenog za otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1751">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind** - An enumeration indicating the type of asynchronous flow used to open the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1752">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType**- Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip algoritma deljenja datoteke na odlomke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1752">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - An enumeration indicating the type of chunking algorithm of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1753">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Nabrajanje koje označava stanje zaštite podataka preduzeća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1753">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - An enumeration indicating the enterprise data protection state of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1754">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Oznaka tipa datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1754">**Data_Doc_Ext** - File extension of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1755">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** – Ime datoteke na host serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1755">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - The server host name of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1756">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - globalno jedinstven identifikator (GUID) koji jedinstveno identifikuje ime hosta servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1756">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - A Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) that uniquely identifies server host name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1757">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje identitet koji se koristi za otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1757">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - A GUID that uniquely identifies the identity used to open a file.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1758">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario**- Nabrajanje koje označava detaljan tip scenarija operacije otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1758">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - An enumeration indicating the detailed scenario type of a file open operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1759">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na IO zastavice operacije otvaranje datoteke, npr. da li je datoteka keširana ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1759">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - An enumeration indicating the IO flags of a file open operation, for example, if the file is cached or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1760">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled** – Da li je za određenu datoteku omogućena saradnja u oblaku ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1760">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled** - Whether or not the cloud collaboration is enabled for the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1761">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** – Da li je datoteka otvorena postepenim otvaranjem ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1761">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Whether or not the file was opened via incremental open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1762">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** – Da li datoteka podržava Office uslugu za saradnju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1762">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Whether or not a file supports Office Collaboration Service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1763">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** – Da li je datoteka otvorena iz vanmrežne keširane kopije ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1763">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Whether or not a file is opened from an offline cached copy.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1764">**Data_Doc_IsPrefetched** – Da li je datoteka bila učitana u pozadini pre operacije otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1764">**Data_Doc_IsPrefetched** - Whether or not the file was prefetched before open operation happened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1765">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** – Da li datoteka u oblaku postoji lokalno i da li je sinhronizovana sa serverom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1765">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** - Whether or not a cloud file exists locally and is synchronized with the server.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1766">**Data_Doc_Location** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na to gde se datoteka nalazi, npr. lokalno ili u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1766">**Data_Doc_Location** - An enumeration indicating where the file is located, for example, locally or in cloud.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1767">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** – Nabrajanje koji označava razlog za datoteku koja je samo za čitanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1767">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - An enumeration indicating the read only reason of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1768">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** – GUID koji na jedinstveno identifikuje ID resursa datoteke na serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1768">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - A GUID that uniquely identifies server resource ID of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1769">**Data_Doc_RtcType** – Nabrajanje koje označava tip RTC kanala koji datoteka koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1769">**Data_Doc_RtcType** - An enumeration indicating type of real-time channel (RTC) used by the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1770">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje ID dokumenta na serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1770">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - A GUID that uniquely identifies server document ID.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1771">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** – Nabrajanje koje označava protokol servera datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1771">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - An enumeration indicating the server protocol of a cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1772">**Data_Doc_ServerType** – Nabrajanje koje označava tip servera datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1772">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - An enumeration indicating the server type of a cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1773">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** – Nabrajanje koje označava tip servera datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1773">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - An enumeration indicating the server version of a cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1774">**Data_Doc_SessionId** – Ceo broj koji se povećava za 1 za svaku operaciju otvaranja datoteke u sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1774">**Data_Doc_SessionId** - An integer that is incremented by 1 for each file open operation in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1775">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Niska koja se koristi za uporednu evidenciju na strani klijenta i na strani servera, to je obično neka vrsta ID-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1775">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - A string used to correlate client- side and server- side logs, typically it is a kind of ID.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1776">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Veličina dokumenta u bajtovima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1776">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - File size in bytes.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1777">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** – Nabrajanje koje označava vrstu specijalnog znaka u URL adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1777">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - An enumeration indicating which kind of special character the file URL has.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1778">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje URL adresu datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1778">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - A GUID that uniquely identifies the file URL.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1779">**Data_Doc_UsedWrsDataOnOpen** - Da li je datoteka otvorena postepeno pomoću unapred keširanih WRS podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1779">**Data_Doc_UsedWrsDataOnOpen** - Whether or not the file was opened incrementally using pre- cached WRS data.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1780">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - Niska koja označava od koje usluge potiče Web Application Open Platform Interface Protocol (WOPI) datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1780">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - A string indicating which service a Web Application Open Platform Interface Protocol (WOPI) file is from.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1781">**Data_ErrorId_Code** - kôd greške koji ukazuje na neuspeh u operaciji prikupljanja podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1781">**Data_ErrorId_Code** - An error code indicating a failure in the data collection operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1782">**Data_ErrorId_Tag** - oznaka u kodu kako bi vam pomogla da nađete tačku neuspeha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1782">**Data_ErrorId_Tag** - A tag in the code to help find the point of failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1783">**Data_FileOpenFlowMarkers** – Pre nego što počne proces otvaranja datoteke, postoji neka preliminarna obrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1783">**Data_FileOpenFlowMarkers** – Before the file open process begins, there is some pre-processing involved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1784">Vreme utrošeno za ovu preliminarnu obradu hvata se u vrednosti niske koja je u formatu \<functionId>\<functionValue>\<functionId>\<functionValue>...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1784">This time taken for this pre-processing is captured in a string value that has the format \<functionId>\<functionValue>\<functionId>\<functionValue>...</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1785">**Data_FirstPartyProviderApp** – ako se otvaranje datoteke u programu Word, Excel ili PowerPoint ili Office aplikacijama, poziva iz druge Microsoft aplikacije, onda se ime tog dobavljača aplikacije snima ovde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1785">**Data_FirstPartyProviderApp** - If a file open on Word, Excel, or PowerPoint or Office apps is invoked from another Microsoft app, then the name of that provider app is captured here.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1786">**Data_InclusiveMeasurements**-– Vrednost niske koja evidentira trajanje pozivanja funkcije, u formatu sa oznakom funkcije i trajanjem koje obuhvata trajanje podfunkcijskih poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1786">**Data_InclusiveMeasurements** - A string value logging the time duration spent in some function calls, in a format with function tag and duration which includes the duration of sub- function calls.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1787">**Data_InitializationReason** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na način otvaranja datoteke, npr. element korisničkog interfejsa, pokretanje iz druge aplikacije, itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1787">**Data_InitializationReason** - An enumeration indicating how the file is opened, for example, UI element, triggered by another app, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1788">**Data_Measurements** – Vrednost niske koja evidentira trajanje pozivanja funkcije, u formatu sa oznakom funkcije i trajanjem koje isključuje trajanje podfunkcijskih poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1788">**Data_Measurements** - A string value logging the time duration spent in some function calls, in a format with function tag and duration which excludes the duration of sub- function calls.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1789">**Data_OfficeMobileInitReason**- prebrojavanje koje ukazuje na ulaznu tačku otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1789">**Data_OfficeMobileInitReason** - An enumeration indicating the entry point of file open.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1790">**Data_RenderToInSpaceDuration** – Period između završetka prikazivanja i animacije siluete/podloge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1790">**Data_RenderToInSpaceDuration** – The duration between render end and the silhouette/canvas animation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1791">**Data_SilhouetteDuration** – Trajanje prikazivanja otvorene datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1791">**Data_SilhouetteDuration** - The duration of rendering of the file open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1792">**Data_TimeSplitMeasurements** – Vrednost niske koja evidentira trajanje pozivanja funkcije, u formatu sa oznakom funkcije, vremenskom oznakom početka i trajanjem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1792">**Data_TimeSplitMeasurements** - A string value logging the time duration spent in some function calls, in a format with function tag, start timestamp and duration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1795">Ovo je ključna telemetrija upotrebe za nadogradnju u utisku pri prvom pokretanju za neprijavljene korisnike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1795">This is critical usage telemetry for the upsell in the First Run Experience for unsigned users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1796">Ovaj događaj snima metriku za prvo pokretanje prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1796">This event captures the first-run sign-in metrics.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1797">Podaci će se koristiti za dobijanje uvida za prethodno prijavljivanje i razumevanje da li korisnik nastavlja sa sledećom fazom u korisničkom toku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1797">The data will be used to infer insights for the pre sign-in and understand if the user is continuing to the next stage in the user flow.</span></span>
