#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetryexpansionfilesavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1816">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExpansionFilesAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1816">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExpansionFilesAvailability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1817">Omogućavamo datoteke proširenja Android Package Kit (APK) za Office aplikaciju za mobilne uređaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1817">We are enabling Android Package Kit (APK) expansion files for the Office mobile app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1818">APK datoteke proširenja su dodatne datoteke resursa koje projektanti Android aplikacija mogu da objave uz svoju aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1818">APK Expansion files are supplementary resource files that Android app developers can publish along with their app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1819">Da biste razumeli pouzdanost datoteka proširenja, evidentiramo zastavicu koja ukazuje na to da li su datoteke proširenja dostupne ili nisu pri svakom pokretanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1819">To understand the reliability of the expansion files, we log a flag indicating whether expansion files are available or not at every boot.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1820">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1820">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1821">**Data_ExpansionFilesAvailable** – Bulova zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li su APK datoteke proširenja dostupne na uređaju u vreme pokretanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1821">**Data_ExpansionFilesAvailable** - A Boolean flag that indicates whether APK Expansion files are available on the device at the time of app boot.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetryexpansionfilesdownloader"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1822">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExpansionFilesDownloader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1822">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExpansionFilesDownloader</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1823">Omogućavamo datoteke proširenja Android Package Kit (APK) za Office aplikaciju za mobilne uređaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1823">We are enabling Android Package Kit (APK) expansion files for the Office mobile app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1824">APK datoteke proširenja su dodatne datoteke resursa koje projektanti Android aplikacija mogu da objave uz svoju aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1824">APK Expansion files are supplementary resource files, that Android app developers can publish along with their app.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1825">Da biste razumeli pouzdanost mehanizma preuzimanja datoteka proširenja, evidentiramo zastavicu koja ukazuje na to da li uspešno možemo da preuzmemo datoteke proširenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1825">To understand the reliability of our expansion file download mechanism, we are logging a flag indicating whether we are successfully able to download expansion files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1826">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1826">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1827">**Data_DownloadSuccess** – Bulova zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je preuzimanje APK datoteka proširenja uspelo svaki put kada pokušamo da ih preuzmemo tokom pokretanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1827">**Data_DownloadSuccess** - A Boolean flag that indicates whether APK Expansion files download is successful, whenever we attempt a download during app boot.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetrynotecreated"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1828">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.NoteCreated</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1828">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.NoteCreated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1829">Kritičan signal koji se koristi da prati da li korisnici Lepljivih beležaka mogu da kreiraju beleške u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1829">Critical signal that is used to monitor the ability of Sticky Notes users to create notes in the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1830">Telemetrija se koristi za obezbeđivanje otkrivanja kritične regresivne OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1830">Telemetry is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1831">Ako korisnici ne mogu da naprave belešku, to bi izazvalo incident krajnje ozbiljnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1831">If users can’t create a note, this would trigger a high severity incident.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1832">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1832">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1833">**IsExportable** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je ovaj događaj bio rezultat delovanja korisnika ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1833">**IsExportable** - A flag indicating whether this event was a result of a user action or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1834">Treba da bude postavljeno na vrednost "ispravno" pošto je NoteCreated radnja koju aktivira korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1834">Should be set to True as NoteCreated is a user-triggered action.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1835">**NoteLocalId** – Jedinstveni identifikator koji se jasno razlikuje od drugih dodeljuje se belešci kada korisnik kreira belešku unutar aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1835">**NoteLocalId** - Distinguishable unique identifier assigned to a note at the time of a user creates the note within the app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1836">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Broj verzije koji označava verziju aplikacije Lepljive beleške koje korisnik koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1836">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Version number indicating the version of Sticky Notes the user is using.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1837">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koje verzije proizvoda ispoljavaju problem tako da možemo ispravno da damo prioritet rešavanju tog problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1837">Allows us to identify which versions of the product are showing an issue so that we can correctly prioritize it.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetrynoteviewed"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1838">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.NoteViewed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1838">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.NoteViewed</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1839">Kritičan signal koji se koristi da prati da li korisnici Lepljivih beležaka mogu da prikazuju beleške u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1839">Critical signal that is used to monitor the ability of Sticky Notes users to view notes in the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1840">Telemetrija se koristi za obezbeđivanje otkrivanja kritične regresivne OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1840">Telemetry is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1841">Ako korisnici ne mogu da prikazuju beležnice, to bi izazvalo ozbiljan incident.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1841">If users can’t view their notes, this would trigger a high severity incident.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1842">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1842">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1843">**HasImages** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li prikazana beleška sadrži uskladištene slike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1843">**HasImages** - A flag indicating whether the note viewed has images stored in it.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1844">**IsExportable** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je ovaj događaj bio rezultat delovanja korisnika ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1844">**IsExportable** - A flag indicating whether this event was a result of a user action or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1845">Treba da bude postavljeno na vrednost "ispravno" pošto je NoteViewed radnja koju aktivira korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1845">Should be set to True as NoteViewed is a user-triggered action.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1846">**NoteLocalId** - Jedinstveni identifikator koji se jasno razlikuje od drugih dodeljuje se belešci kada korisnik kreira belešku unutar aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1846">**NoteLocalId** - Distinguishable unique identifier assigned to a note at the time a user creates the note within the app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1847">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Broj verzije koji označava verziju aplikacije Lepljive beleške koje korisnik koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1847">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Version number indicating the version of Sticky Notes the user is using.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1848">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koje verzije proizvoda ispoljavaju problem tako da možemo ispravno da damo prioritet rešavanju tog problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1848">Allows us to identify which versions of the product are showing an issue so that we can correctly prioritize it.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeandroidintuneintunecompliancerequest"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1849">Office.Android.Intune.IntuneComplianceRequest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1849">Office.Android.Intune.IntuneComplianceRequest</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1850">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije pokrenute u programu android, uključujući Office Mobile, Word, Excel, PowerPoint i OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1850">This event is collected for Office applications running on Android, including Office mobile, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1851">Događaj ukazuje na pokušaj prijave na nalog organizacije sa licencom Intune gde je administrator organizacije konfigurisao smernice za nametanje uslovnog pristupa aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1851">The event indicates an attempt to sign in to an Intune licensed organization account where the organization administrator has configured policy to enforce app conditional access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1852">Koristi se za razumevanje broja krajnjih korisnika koji pokušavaju da koriste aplikacije u okviru ove konfiguracije smernica, kao i da je u kombinaciji sa drugim događajem, Office.Android.Intune.IntuneComplianceStatus, da bi se osiguralo primenjivanje konfigurisane politike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1852">It is used to understand the number of end users who are attempting to use apps under this policy configuration, and is combined with another event, Office.Android.Intune.IntuneComplianceStatus, to ensure the configured policy is enforced.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1853">Ne skupljaju se polja podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1853">No data fields are collected.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidintuneintunecompliancestatus"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1854">Office.Android.Intune.IntuneComplianceStatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1854">Office.Android.Intune.IntuneComplianceStatus</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1855">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije pokrenute u programu android, uključujući Office Mobile, Word, Excel, PowerPoint i OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1855">This event is collected for Office applications running on Android, including Office mobile, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1856">Događaj ukazuje na pokušaj prijave na nalog organizacije sa licencom Intune gde je administrator organizacije konfigurisao smernice za nametanje uslovnog pristupa aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1856">The event indicates an attempt to sign in to an Intune licensed organization account where the organization administrator has configured policy to enforce app conditional access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1857">Ovaj događaj pokazuje status usaglašenosti aplikacije koju je korisnik potpisao i koristi se za istraživanje neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1857">This event indicates the compliance status of the application to which the user has signed-in and is used to investigate failures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1858">Kombinuje se sa drugim događajem, Office.Android.Intune.IntuneComplianceRequest, da bi se osiguralo da je nametnuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1858">It is combined with another event, Office.Android.Intune.IntuneComplianceRequest, to ensure the configured policy is enforced.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1859">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1859">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1860">**Data_ComplianceStatus** - označava status usaglašenosti aplikacije tokom prijavljivanja pomoću ispravnog ili neispravnog kôda greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1860">**Data_ComplianceStatus** - Indicates the compliance status of the application during sign-in with a success or failure error code.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1861">-1 – Nepoznata greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1861">-1 – Unknown error</span></span>
  -    <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1862">0 – aplikacija je usaglašena sa smernicama organizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1862">0 – The application is compliant with the organization policies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1863">1 – aplikacija nije usaglašena sa smernicama organizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1863">1 – The application is not compliant with the organization policies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1864">2 – Neuspeh u vezi sa uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1864">2 – Service-related failures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1865">3 – Neuspeh u vezi sa mrežom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1865">3 – Network-related failures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1866">4 – aplikacija nije uspela da preuzme token potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1866">4 – Application failed to retrieve authentication token</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1867">5 – odgovor još nije primljen iz usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1867">5 – The response has not been yet received from the service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1868">6 – treba da instalirate aplikaciju portala preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1868">6 – The company portal application needs to be installed</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidodwxpssotelemetry"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1869">Office.Android.ODWXPSSO.Telemetry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1869">Office.Android.ODWXPSSO.Telemetry</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1870">Ovaj događaj pomaže nam da razumemo pomoću koje druge Microsoft aplikacije u uređaju je naša aplikacija uspela nečujno da se pojedinačno prijavi, putem koje ulazne tačke itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1870">This event helps in understanding with which other Microsoft app in the device, our app got silent single sign on, from which entry point and so on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1871">Pomaže i u razumevanju razloga neuspelog nečujnog pojedinačnog prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1871">Also helps in understanding the failure reason for not getting silent single sign on.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1872">Dobijamo bolji uvid o tome od koje Microsoft aplikacije na uređaju dobijamo iskustvo za pojedinačno prijavljivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1872">We get better insights like from which Microsoft app in the device, we are getting single sign on experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1873">Reagujemo na neuspehe, gde pojedinačno prijavljivanje ne funkcioniše na očekivani način.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1873">Act upon failures, where single sign on is not working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1874">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1874">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1875">**AccountType** – Označava tip naloga putem kojeg je došlo do pojedinačnog prijavljivanja, kao što su lični Microsoft nalog ili poslovni nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1875">**AccountType** - Indicates the account type with which single sign on is happening, like personal Microsoft account or work account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1876">**EntryPoint** – Označava ulaznu tačku u aplikaciji sa koje je pokrenut pokušaj pojedinačnog prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1876">**EntryPoint** - Indicates the entry point in the app, from where single sign on attempt was initiated.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1877">**ErrorCode** – Označava kôd greške pri pokušaju pojedinačnog prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1877">**ErrorCode** - Indicates the error code of the single sign on attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1878">**ErrorDescription** – Označava poruku o grešci pri pokušaju pojedinačnog prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1878">**ErrorDescription** - Indicates the error message of the single sign on attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1879">**HResult** – Označava kod stanja rezultata pokušaja pojedinačnog prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1879">**HResult** - Indicates result status code of the single sign on attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1880">**ProviderPackageId** - Druga Microsoft aplikacija na uređaju putem koje se odvija pojedinačno prijavljivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1880">**ProviderPackageId** - Other Microsoft app in the device from which single sign on is happening.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidphonenumbersignins"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1881">Office.Android.PhoneNumberSignIns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1881">Office.Android.PhoneNumberSignIns</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1882">Ovaj događaj pomaže u razumevanju da li se korisnik prijavio pomoću naloga koji se zasniva na telefonskom broju ili pomoću ličnog Microsoft naloga koji se zasniva na e-pošti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1882">This event helps in understanding if user signed in or signed up with phone number-based account or email based personal Microsoft account.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1883">Ovaj događaj pomaže da saznamo broj korisnika koji se prijavljuje putem ličnog Microsoft naloga koji se zasniva na broju telefona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1883">This event helps in knowing count of users signing in or signing up with phone number based personal Microsoft account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1884">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1884">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1885">**EntryPoint** – Označava ulaznu tačku u aplikaciji sa koje je pokrenut pokušaj prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1885">**EntryPoint** - Indicates the entry point in the app, from where sign-in attempt was initiated.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1886">**IsEmailMissing** - Da li nedostaje adresa e-pošte u podacima o profilu naloga?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1886">**IsEmailMissing** - Is email missing in the account profile information?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1887">**IsEmailMissing** - Da li nedostaje broj telefona u podacima o profilu naloga?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1887">**IsPhoneNumberMissing** - Is phone number missing in the account profile information?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1888">**UserDecision** – Označava izbor korisnika kao što je prijavljivanje odmah ili kasnije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1888">**UserDecision** - Indicates the choice made by user like sign-in or sign-up or sign in later.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidusersignindecision"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1889">Office.Android.UserSignInDecision</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1889">Office.Android.UserSignInDecision</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1890">Ovaj događaj pomaže u razumevanju na kom nivou dolazi do neuspelog prijavljivanja korisnika, zbog čega se to dešava, koliko korisnika se uspešno prijavljuje i sa koje ulazne tačke u aplikaciji itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1890">This event helps in understanding at which stage user is dropping in sign in flow, why sign in is failing, how many users are getting signed in successfully from which entry point in the app and so on.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1891">Ovaj događaj nam pomaže da sakupimo podatke o prijavljivanju, što nam dalje pomaže da razumemo u kojoj fazi dolazi od neuspelog prijavljivanja korisnika itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1891">This event helps with sign-in funnel data, which helps in understand at which stage users are getting dropped more and so on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1892">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1892">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1893">**AccountType** – Označava tip naloga putem kojeg je došlo do pokušaja jednokratnog prijavljivanja, kao što je lični nalog ili poslovni nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1893">**AccountType** - Indicates the account type with which sign-in is attempted like personal account or work account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1894">**AfterLicensingState** – Označava stanje licenciranja aplikacije nakon izvršenog prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1894">**AfterLicensingState** - Indicates the app licensing state after sign-in completed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1895">**AllowedEditsWithoutSignIn** – Označava koliko je besplatnih izmena isteklo pre pokušaja prijave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1895">**AllowedEditsWithoutSignIn** - Indicates how many free edits have lapsed before sign-in was attempted.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1896">**BeforeLicensingState** – Označava stanje licenciranja aplikacije pre izvršenog pokušaja prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1896">**BeforeLicensingState** - Indicates the app licensing state before sign-in attempted.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1897">**CompletionState** – Označava fazu završetka prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1897">**CompletionState** - Indicates the stage of sign-in completion.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1898">**EntryPoint** – Označava ulaznu tačku u aplikaciji sa koje je pokrenut pokušaj prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1898">**EntryPoint** - Indicates the entry point in the app, from where sign-in attempt was initiated.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1899">**HRDAutoAcceleratedSignUpAttemptCount** – Označava broj pokušaja ubrzanih prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1899">**HRDAutoAcceleratedSignUpAttemptCount** - Indicates the count of accelerated sign-ups attempted.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1900">**HRDAutoAcceleratedSignUpQuitCount** – Označava broj otkazanih ubrzanih prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1900">**HRDAutoAcceleratedSignUpQuitCount** - Indicates the count of accelerated sign-ups canceled.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1901">**HResult** – Označava kod stanja rezultata operacije prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1901">**HResult** - Indicates result status code of the sign-in operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1902">**IsPhoneOnlyAuthFeatureEnabled** - Da li je prijavljivanje na osnovu broja telefona dozvoljeno ili ne?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1902">**IsPhoneOnlyAuthFeatureEnabled** - Is phone number-based sign-in allowed or not?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1903">**LicenseActivationHResult** - Ukazuje na kod statusa pokušaja aktivacije licence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1903">**LicenseActivationHResult** - Indicates the status code of license activation attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1904">**LicenseActivationMessageCode** – Označava kôd poruke iz usluge licenciranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1904">**LicenseActivationMessageCode** - Indicates the message code from licensing service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1905">**NoFreeEditsTreatmentValue** – Da li je dozvoljeno besplatno uređivanje ili ne?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1905">**NoFreeEditsTreatmentValue** - Is free edits allowed or not?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1906">**SignUpAttemptCount** – Označava broj pokušanih prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1906">**SignUpAttemptCount** - Indicates the count of sign-ups attempted.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1907">**StartMode** – Označava režim u kom je pokrenut pokušaj prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1907">**StartMode** - Indicates the mode in which sign-in attempt was started.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1908">**UserDecision** – Označava izbor korisnika kao što je prijavljivanje odmah ili kasnije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1908">**UserDecision** - Indicates the choice made by user like sign-in or sign-up or sign in later.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeappcompatappcompatagentscanandupload"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1909">Office.AppCompat.AppCompat.AgentScanAndUpload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1909">Office.AppCompat.AppCompat.AgentScanAndUpload</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1910">Prikupljaju se samo kada krajnji korisnik omogući Kontrolnu tablu Office telemetrije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1910">Only collected when end user has enabled Office Telemetry Dashboard.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1911">Prikuplja informacije o tome kada se izvršava Office Telemetry agent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1911">It collects information on when the Office Telemetry Agent is executed.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1912">  Ovo se prikuplja samo kada je Kontrolna tabla Office telemetrije omogućena, a koristi se za određivanje ispravnost agenta Office telemetrije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1912">This is only collected when Office Telemetry Dashboard is enabled and is used to determine the health of Office Telemetry agent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1913">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1913">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1914">**Data.AgentExit** - Vremenska oznaka koja označava kada se agent telemetrije uspešno zatvori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1914">**Data.AgentExit** - Timestamp of when the Telemetry agent exits successfully</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1915">**Data.AgentExit** - Vremenska oznaka koja označava kada agent telemetrije uspešno obavi skeniranje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1915">**Data.AgentScan** - Timestamp of when the Telemetry agent completed a scan successfully</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1916">**Data.AgentUpload** - Vremenska oznaka koja označava kada agent telemetrije uspešno završi otpremanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1916">**Data.AgentUpload** - Timestamp of when the Telemetry agent completes the upload successfully</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappcompatappcompatagentupload"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1917">Office.AppCompat.AppCompat.AgentUpload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1917">Office.AppCompat.AppCompat.AgentUpload</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1918">Generisano prilikom pokretanja klijenta kada krajnji korisnik omogući Kontrolnu tablu Office telemetrije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1918">Generated on client startup when end user has enabled Office Telemetry Dashboard.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1919">Prikuplja informacije o tome kada je Office Telemetry agent učitao podatke u fasciklu „Deljenje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1919">It collects information on when the Office Telemetry Agent has uploaded data to the share folder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1920">Primarno korišćenje ovog događaja jeste nadgledanje zdravlja usluge Office Telemetrije, a sekundarno korišćenje događaja jeste da proceni korišćenje kontrolne table Office telemetrije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1920">The primary use of this event is to monitor the health of the Office Telemetry agent and the secondary use of the event is to estimate usage of the Office Telemetry Dashboard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1921">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1921">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1922">**UploadTime** - vremenski žig poslednjeg uspešnog otpremanja koji je obavio telemetrijski agent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1922">**UploadTime** - the timestamp of the last successful upload performed by the Telemetry Agent.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeappcompatappcompattelemetrydashboardresiliencycrashlog"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1923">Office.AppCompat.AppCompat.TelemetryDashboardResiliencyCrashLog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1923">Office.AppCompat.AppCompat.TelemetryDashboardResiliencyCrashLog</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1924">Prikuplja se samo kada krajni korisnik (najverovatnije administrator) omogući Kontrolnu tablu Office telemetrije. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1924">Only collected when Office Telemetry Dashboard has been enabled by end user (most likely an admin).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1925">Prikuplja pojavljivanje padova Office programskih dodataka i dokumenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1925">It collects the occurrence of Office Add-ins and documents crashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1926"> Ovo se prikupljaju samo onda kada korisnik omogući Kontrolnu tablu Office telemetrije i koristi se za utvrđivanje da li postoji povećano pojavljivanje padova programskih dodataka ili dokumenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1926">This is only collected when user has enabled Office Telemetry Dashboard and is used to determine if there is an increased occurrence of add-in or document crashes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1927">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1927">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1928">**Vreme prikupljanja podataka** - Vremenska oznaka koja označava kada je evidentiran događaj pada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1928">**Data.CollectionTime** - Timestamp of when a crash event was logged</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappdocsappdocsdocumentoperation"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1929">Office.AppDocs.AppDocs.DocumentOperation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1929">Office.AppDocs.AppDocs.DocumentOperation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1930">Ovaj događaj se prikuplja za Office aplikacije pokrenute na Android, iOS, Universal ili Windows platformama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1930">This event is collected for Office applications running on Android, iOS, Universal, or Windows platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1931">Događaj beleži kada se izvršava operacija sa datotekom (kreiranje/otvaranje/čuvanje/izvoz/itd.) i koristi se za razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1931">The event records when a file operation (create/open/save/export/etc.) takes place and it is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on the file operation information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1932">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1932">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-1933">**Data_AppIdForReportEndBeforeAppKnown** – ID aplikacije kada nije poznat pre nego što je kraj izveštaja pozvao operaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-1933">**Data_AppIdForReportEndBeforeAppKnown** – App ID when not known before report end called on the operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2005">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2005">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2006">Događaj se koristi za hvatanje neuspeha automatskog dodavanja tokena za potvrdu identiteta tokom kupovine unutar aplikacije na Mac računarima (događaj evidentira primljeni kôd greške).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2006">The event is used for capturing auth token generation failures during InAppPurchase on the Mac (the event logs the error code received).</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2007">Ovaj događaj se koristi za otkrivanje i rešavanja neuspešnog dodavanja tokena za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2007">This event is used for detecting and helping troubleshoot auth token generation failures</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2020">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2020">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2023">This data is used for monitoring the health of the in-app purchase flows.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappleintune"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2028">Office.Apple.InTune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2028">Office.Apple.InTune</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsappdocsoperationopenfrommrubypath"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2065">Office.Docs.AppDocs.OperationOpenFromMruByPath</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2065">Office.Docs.AppDocs.OperationOpenFromMruByPath</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2066">Ovaj događaj se prikuplja za Office aplikacije pokrenute na Android, iOS, Universal ili Windows platformama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2066">This event is collected for Office applications running on Android, iOS, Universal, or Windows platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2067">Događaj se snima kad se izvršava operacija otvaranja datoteke sa putanje obezbeđene na poslednjoj korišćenoj listi i koristi se za razumevanje korisnika i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2067">The event records when a file open operation takes place from the path provided in the most recently used list and is used to understand and prioritize user-experience errors based on file open operation information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2068">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2068">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2069">**Data_AppIdForReportEndBeforeAppKnown** – ID aplikacije kada nije poznat pre nego što je kraj izveštaja pozvao operaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2069">**Data_AppIdForReportEndBeforeAppKnown** – App ID when not known before report end called on the operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2070">**Data_CanContinueFromOnBeforeOperationBegins** – CanContinue stanje, pre nego što je pozvan rukovalac početkom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2070">**Data_CanContinueFromOnBeforeOperationBegins** – CanContinue state, before the begin handler is invoked.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2071">**Data_DetachedDuration** – Trajanje procesa odvajanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2071">**Data_DetachedDuration** – The duration of detach process of an event.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2072">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** – Nabrajanje koje označava režim pristupa datoteke, npr. samo za čitanje, čitanje i pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2072">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** – An enumeration indicating the access mode of the file, for example, read only, read write.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2073">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip asinhronog toka korišćenog za otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2073">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind** – An enumeration indicating the type of asynchronous flow used to open the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2074">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip algoritma deljenja datoteke na odlomke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2074">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** – An enumeration indicating the type of chunking algorithm of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2075">**Data_Doc_EdpState** – Nabrajanje koje označava stanje zaštite podataka preduzeća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2075">**Data_Doc_EdpState** – An enumeration indicating the enterprise data protection state of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2076">**Data_Doc_Ext** – Prva 4 znaka oznake tipa datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2076">**Data_Doc_Ext** – First 4 characters of the extension of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2077">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** – Ime datoteke na host serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2077">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** – The server host name of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2078">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje ime hosta servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2078">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** – A GUID that uniquely identifies server host name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2079">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** – Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2079">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** – A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2080">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** – Nabrajanje koje označava detaljan tip scenarija operacije otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2080">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** – An enumeration indicating the detailed scenario type of a file open operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2081">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na IO zastavice operacije otvaranje datoteke, npr. da li je datoteka keširana ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2081">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** – An enumeration indicating the IO flags of a file open operation, for example, if the file is cached or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2082">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled** – Da li je za određenu datoteku omogućena saradnja u oblaku ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2082">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled** – Whether or not the cloud collaboration is enabled for the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2083">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** – Da li je datoteka otvorena postepenim otvaranjem ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2083">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** – Whether or not the file was opened via incremental open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2084">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** – Da li datoteka podržava Office uslugu za saradnju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2084">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** – Whether or not a file supports Office Collaboration Service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2085">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** – Da li je datoteka otvorena iz vanmrežne keširane kopije ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2085">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** – Whether or not a file is opened from an offline cached copy.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2086">**Data_Doc_IsPrefetched** – Da li je datoteka bila učitana u pozadini pre operacije otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2086">**Data_Doc_IsPrefetched** – Whether or not the file was prefetched before open operation happened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2087">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** – Da li datoteka u oblaku postoji lokalno i da li je sinhronizovana sa serverom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2087">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** – Whether or not a cloud file exists locally and is synchronized with the server.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2088">**Data_Doc_Location** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na to gde se datoteka nalazi, npr. lokalno ili u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2088">**Data_Doc_Location** – An enumeration indicating where the file is located, for example, locally or in cloud.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2089">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** – Nabrajanje koji označava razlog za datoteku koja je samo za čitanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2089">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** – An enumeration indicating the read only reason of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2090">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** – GUID koji na jedinstveno identifikuje ID resursa datoteke na serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2090">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** – A GUID that uniquely identifies server resource ID of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2091">**Data_Doc_RtcType** – Nabrajanje koje označava tip RTC kanala koji datoteka koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2091">**Data_Doc_RtcType** – An enumeration indicating type of real-time channel (RTC) used by the file.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsappdocsoperationopenfrommrubyurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2123">Office.Docs.AppDocs.OperationOpenFromMruByUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2123">Office.Docs.AppDocs.OperationOpenFromMruByUrl</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2124">Ovaj događaj se prikuplja za Office aplikacije pokrenute na Android, iOS, Universal ili Windows platformama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2124">This event is collected for Office applications running on Android, iOS, Universal, or Windows platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2125">Događaj se snima kad se izvršava operacija otvaranja datoteke sa URL adrese obezbeđene na poslednjoj korišćenoj listi i koristi se za razumevanje korisnika i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2125">The event records when a file open operation takes place from the URL provided in the most recently used list and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file open operation information.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2126">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2126">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2127">**Data_AppIdForReportEndBeforeAppKnown** – ID aplikacije kada nije poznat pre nego što je kraj izveštaja pozvao operaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2127">**Data_AppIdForReportEndBeforeAppKnown** – App ID when not known before report end called on the operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2128">**Data_CanContinueFromOnBeforeOperationBegins** – CanContinue stanje, pre nego što je pozvan rukovalac početkom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2128">**Data_CanContinueFromOnBeforeOperationBegins** – CanContinue state, before the begin handler is invoked.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2129">**Data_DetachedDuration** – Trajanje procesa odvajanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2129">**Data_DetachedDuration** – The duration of detach process of an event.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2130">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** – Nabrajanje koje označava režim pristupa datoteke, npr. samo za čitanje, čitanje i pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2130">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** – An enumeration indicating the access mode of the file, for example, read only, read write.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2131">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip asinhronog toka korišćenog za otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2131">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind** – An enumeration indicating the type of asynchronous flow used to open the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2132">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip algoritma deljenja datoteke na odlomke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2132">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** – An enumeration indicating the type of chunking algorithm of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2133">**Data_Doc_EdpState** – Nabrajanje koje označava stanje zaštite podataka preduzeća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2133">**Data_Doc_EdpState** – An enumeration indicating the enterprise data protection state of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2134">**Data_Doc_Ext** – Prva 4 znaka oznake tipa datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2134">**Data_Doc_Ext** – First 4 characters of the extension of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2135">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** – Ime datoteke na host serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2135">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** – The server host name of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2136">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje ime hosta servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2136">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** – A GUID that uniquely identifies server host name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2137">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** – Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2137">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** – A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2145">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** – Da li datoteka u oblaku postoji lokalno i da li je sinhronizovana sa serverom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2145">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** – Whether or not a cloud file exists locally and is synchronized with the server.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2146">**Data_Doc_Location** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na to gde se datoteka nalazi, npr. lokalno ili u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2146">**Data_Doc_Location** – An enumeration indicating where the file is located, for example, locally or in cloud.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsappdocsoperationopenfrompath"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2181">Office.Docs.AppDocs.OperationOpenFromPath</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2181">Office.Docs.AppDocs.OperationOpenFromPath</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2182">Ovaj događaj se prikuplja za Office aplikacije pokrenute na Android, iOS, Universal ili Windows platformama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2182">This event is collected for Office applications running on Android, iOS, Universal, or Windows platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2183">Događaj beleži kada se izvršava otvaranje datoteke sa putanje i koristi se za razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2183">The event records when a file open operation takes place from a path and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file open operation information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2184">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2184">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2185">**Data_AppIdForReportEndBeforeAppKnown** – ID aplikacije kada nije poznat pre nego što je kraj izveštaja pozvao operaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2185">**Data_AppIdForReportEndBeforeAppKnown** – App ID when not known before report end called on the operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2186">**Data_CanContinueFromOnBeforeOperationBegins** – CanContinue stanje, pre nego što je pozvan rukovalac početkom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2186">**Data_CanContinueFromOnBeforeOperationBegins** – CanContinue state, before the begin handler is invoked.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2187">**Data_DetachedDuration** – Trajanje procesa odvajanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2187">**Data_DetachedDuration** – The duration of detach process of an event.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2188">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** – Nabrajanje koje označava režim pristupa datoteke, npr. samo za čitanje, čitanje i pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2188">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** – An enumeration indicating the access mode of the file, for example, read only, read write.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2189">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip asinhronog toka korišćenog za otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2189">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind** – An enumeration indicating the type of asynchronous flow used to open the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2190">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip algoritma deljenja datoteke na odlomke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2190">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** – An enumeration indicating the type of chunking algorithm of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2191">**Data_Doc_EdpState** – Nabrajanje koje označava stanje zaštite podataka preduzeća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2191">**Data_Doc_EdpState** – An enumeration indicating the enterprise data protection state of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2192">**Data_Doc_Ext** – Prva 4 znaka oznake tipa datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2192">**Data_Doc_Ext** – First 4 characters of the extension of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2193">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** – Ime datoteke na host serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2193">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** – The server host name of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2194">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje ime hosta servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2194">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** – A GUID that uniquely identifies server host name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2195">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** – Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2195">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** – A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2196">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** – Nabrajanje koje označava detaljan tip scenarija operacije otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2196">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** – An enumeration indicating the detailed scenario type of a file open operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2197">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na IO zastavice operacije otvaranje datoteke, npr. da li je datoteka keširana ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2197">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** – An enumeration indicating the IO flags of a file open operation, for example, if the file is cached or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2198">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled** – Da li je za određenu datoteku omogućena saradnja u oblaku ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2198">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled** – Whether or not the cloud collaboration is enabled for the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2200">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** – Da li datoteka podržava Office uslugu za saradnju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2200">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** – Whether or not a file supports Office Collaboration Service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2201">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** – Da li je datoteka otvorena iz vanmrežne keširane kopije ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2201">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** – Whether or not a file is opened from an offline cached copy.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2202">**Data_Doc_IsPrefetched** – Da li je datoteka bila učitana u pozadini pre operacije otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2202">**Data_Doc_IsPrefetched** – Whether or not the file was prefetched before open operation happened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2203">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** – Da li datoteka u oblaku postoji lokalno i da li je sinhronizovana sa serverom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2203">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** – Whether or not a cloud file exists locally and is synchronized with the server.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2204">**Data_Doc_Location** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na to gde se datoteka nalazi, npr. lokalno ili u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2204">**Data_Doc_Location** – An enumeration indicating where the file is located, for example, locally or in cloud.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2205">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** – Nabrajanje koji označava razlog za datoteku koja je samo za čitanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2205">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** – An enumeration indicating the read only reason of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2206">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** – GUID koji na jedinstveno identifikuje ID resursa datoteke na serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2206">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** – A GUID that uniquely identifies server resource ID of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2207">**Data_Doc_RtcType** – Nabrajanje koje označava tip RTC kanala koji datoteka koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2207">**Data_Doc_RtcType** – An enumeration indicating type of real-time channel (RTC) used by the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2245">**Data_DetachedDuration** – Trajanje procesa odvajanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2245">**Data_DetachedDuration** – The duration of detach process of an event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2259">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** – Da li je datoteka otvorena iz vanmrežne keširane kopije ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2259">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** – Whether or not a file is opened from an offline cached copy.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2263">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** – Nabrajanje koji označava razlog za datoteku koja je samo za čitanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2263">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** – An enumeration indicating the read only reason of a file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2356">Ovaj događaj se prikuplja za Office aplikacije pokrenute na Android, iOS, Universal ili Windows platformama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2356">This event is collected for Office applications running on Android, iOS, Universal, or Windows platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2357">Događaj beleži kada se izvršava otvaranje datoteke sa URL adrese i koristi se za razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2357">The event records when a file open operation takes place from a URL and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file open operation information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2358">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2358">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsappledocsuxiossaveasthroughfilemenu"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2413">Office.Docs.Apple.DocsUXiOSSaveAsThroughFileMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2413">Office.Docs.Apple.DocsUXiOSSaveAsThroughFileMenu</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2414">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2414">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2415">Događaj se snima kad se izvršava operacija „Sačuvaj kao“ i koristi se za razumevanje korisnika i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji datoteka, kao što su kategorije lokacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2415">The event records when a "Save as" operation takes place and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file operation information such as location categories.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2416">Operacija „Sačuvaj kao“ pojavljuje se svaki put kada korisnik napravi novu datoteku i prvi put je sačuva ili sačuva kopiju postojeće datoteke na novu lokaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2416">A "Save as" operation occurs whenever a user creates a new file and saves it for the first time or saves a copy of an existing file to a new location.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2417">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2417">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2418">**Data_OriginServiceType** – apstraktna kategorizacija originalne lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2418">**Data_OriginServiceType** - An abstract categorization of the original location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2419">**Data_ServiceType** – apstraktna kategorizacija nove lokacije datoteke nakon što se dovrši čuvanje kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2419">**Data_ServiceType** - An abstract categorization of the new location of a file after the save is completed like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsappledocsuxmacatmentioninsertedatmention"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2420">Office.Docs.Apple.DocsUXMacAtMentionInsertedAtMention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2420">Office.Docs.Apple.DocsUXMacAtMentionInsertedAtMention</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2421">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2421">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2422">Ovaj događaj se snima kada korisnik „@“ pominje drugog korisnika i koristi se za razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu načina na koji korisnici sarađuju sa drugim korisnicima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2422">This event records when a user "@" mentions another user and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on how users collaborate with other users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2423">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2423">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2424">**Data_CharactersTyped** – numerička vrednost koja označava ukupan broj znakova otkucanih u tekstu pominjanja „@“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2424">**Data_CharactersTyped** - A numerical value that indicates the total number of characters typed in the "@" mention text.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsappledocsuxmacodspsharingwebviewsharingcompleted"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2425">Office.Docs.Apple.DocsUXMacODSPSharingWebViewSharingCompleted</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2425">Office.Docs.Apple.DocsUXMacODSPSharingWebViewSharingCompleted</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2426">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2426">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2427">Ovaj događaj se beleži kada korisnik odluči da deli dokument u oblaku koristeći iskustvo deljenja usluge OneDrive i koristi se za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta kod korisnika na osnovu deljenja dokumenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2427">This event records when a user chooses to share a cloud document using the OneDrive sharing experience and is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences based on sharing documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2428">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2428">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2429">**Data_ShareType** – fiksno kodirana niska koja pokazuje kakva je operacija deljenja završena uključujući, ali ne ograničavajući se na „Kopiraj vezu“, „Više aplikacija“, „Teams“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2429">**Data_ShareType** - A hardcoded string that indicates what kind of share operation was completed including but not limited to "Copy Link", "More apps", "Teams".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2430">**Data_ShareWebViewMode** – fiksno kodirana niska koja pokazuje kakav je režim deljenja bio aktivan kada je deljenje dovršeno, uključujući, ali ne ograničavajući se na „Upravljanje pristupom“, „AtMentions“, „Deljenje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2430">**Data_ShareWebViewMode** - A hardcoded string that indicates what kind of share mode was active when the share was completed including but not limited to "ManageAccess", "AtMentions", "Share".</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuicollaborationcoauthorgalleryrowtapped"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2431">Office.DocsUI.Collaboration.CoauthorGalleryRowTapped</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2431">Office.DocsUI.Collaboration.CoauthorGalleryRowTapped</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2432">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2432">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2433">Ovaj događaj se beleži kada korisnik odabere da pogleda spisak trenutnih koautora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2433">This event records when a user selects to look at the list of current co-authors.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2434">Ovi podaci se koriste za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva koji se odnose na koautorstvo dokumenta u isto vreme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2434">This data is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences relating to co-authoring a document at the same time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2435">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2435">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2436">**Data_CoauthorCount** - numerička vrednost koja predstavlja ukupan broj osoba koji trenutno uređuju isti dokument kao i korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2436">**Data_CoauthorCount** - A numerical value that represents the total number of people who are currently editing the same document as the user.</span></span>
