<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2438">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2438">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2439">Događaj se snima kada se promeni broj aktivnih koautora u dokumentu u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2439">The event records when the number of active co-authors in a cloud document changes.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2440">Ovi podaci se koriste za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva koji se odnose na koautorstvo dokumenta u isto vreme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2440">This data is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences relating to co-authoring a document at the same time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2441">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2441">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2442">**Data_CoauthorsJoined** - Broj koautora koji su se pridružili dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2442">**Data_CoauthorsJoined** - The number of co-authors that joined the document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2443">**Data_CoauthorsLeft** - Broj koautora koji su napustili dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2443">**Data_CoauthorsLeft** - The number of co-authors that left the document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2444">**Data_NewCoauthorCount** - novi broj aktivnih koautora u dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2444">**Data_NewCoauthorCount** - The new count of active co-authors in the document.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2445">**Data_OldCoauthorCount** - prethodni broj aktivnih koautora pre ažuriranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2445">**Data_OldCoauthorCount** - The previous count of active co-authors before the update.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2446">**Data_ ServiceType** – apstraktna kategorizacija originalne lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2446">**Data_ServiceType** - An abstract categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuidocstagedocstagecreatenewfromtemplate"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2447">Office.DocsUI.DocStage.DocStageCreateNewFromTemplate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2447">Office.DocsUI.DocStage.DocStageCreateNewFromTemplate</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2448">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2448">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2449">Događaj se snima kada se nova datoteka kreira iz iskustva „Novo iz predloška“ i koristi se za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o kreiranju dokumenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2449">The event records when a new file is created from the "New from template" experience and is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences based on document creation information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2450">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2450">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2451">**Data_InHomeTab** – Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je nova datoteka iz predloška kreirana na kartici „Početak“ datoteke novog iskustva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2451">**Data_InHomeTab** - A Boolean value that indicates whether the new file from template was created from the Home tab of the file new experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2452">**Data_InSearch** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je datoteka kreirana kada je korisnik tražio predložak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2452">**Data_InSearch** - A Boolean that indicates whether the file was created when the user was searching for a template.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2453">**Data_IsHomeTabEnabled** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je korisniku trenutno dostupna kartica „Početak“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2453">**Data_IsHomeTabEnabled** - A Boolean value that indicates if the Home tab is currently available to the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2454">**Data_IsRecommendedEnabled** – Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je korisniku trenutno dostupno iskustvo „Preporučeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2454">**Data_IsRecommendedEnabled** - A Boolean value that indicates if the "Recommended" experience is currently available to the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2455">**Data_TemplateIndex** - Numerički indeks datoteke predloška dok se vizuelno prikazuje korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2455">**Data_TemplateIndex** - The numerical index of the template file as it is displayed visually to the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2456">**Data_TemplateType** – Klasifikacija koja će vam pomoći da razlikujete tip predloška, uključujući, ali ne ograničavajući se na predložak „Na mreži“, predložak „Pretraži na mreži“, predloške „Lokalno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2456">**Data_TemplateType** - A classification to help distinguish the type of template like, but not limited to, "Online" templates, "Online search" templates, "Local" templates.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuidocstagerecommendedopen"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2457">Office.DocsUI.DocStage.RecommendedOpen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2457">Office.DocsUI.DocStage.RecommendedOpen</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2458">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2458">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2459">Događaj se snima kad se izvršava operacija otvaranja datoteke iz odeljka preporučenih datoteka u galeriji dokumenata i koristi se za razumevanje korisnika i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2459">The event records when a file-open operation takes place from the recommended files section of the document gallery and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file open operation information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2460">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2460">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2461">**Data_Success** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je operacija uspela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2461">**Data_Success** - A Boolean value to indicate whether the operation succeeded.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuifileoperationsdocsuifileopenmacrequired"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2462">Office.DocsUI.FileOperations.DocsUIFileOpenMacRequired</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2462">Office.DocsUI.FileOperations.DocsUIFileOpenMacRequired</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2463">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2463">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2464">Događaj se snima kad se izvršava operacija otvaranja datoteke i koristi se za razumevanje korisnika i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji otvaranja datoteke kao što su kategorija lokacije „Tip usluge“ i prva četiri znaka oznake tipa datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2464">The event records when a file open operation takes place and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file open operation information such as location categories "ServiceType" and the first four characters of the extension.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2465">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2465">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2466">**Data_Ext** - Oznaka tipa datoteke ograničena je na prva četiri znaka oznake ili manje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2466">**Data_Ext** - The file extension limited to the first four characters of the extension or less.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2467">**Data_ServiceType** – apstraktna kategorizacija lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2467">**Data_ServiceType** - An abstract categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuifileoperationsopendocumentmeasurements"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2468">Office.DocsUI.FileOperations.OpenDocumentMeasurements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2468">Office.DocsUI.FileOperations.OpenDocumentMeasurements</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2469">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru iOS platforme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2469">This event is collected for Office applications running under iOS platform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2470">Događaj beleži kada se izvršava otvaranje datoteke i koristi se za razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o otvaranju datoteka, naročito informacija o performansama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2470">The event records when a file open operation takes place and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file open operation information, especially performance information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2471">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2471">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2472">**Data_AppDuration** – Vreme obrade tokom operacije otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2472">**Data_AppDuration** - The duration spent in application processing during a file open operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2473">**Data_BootDuration** – Trajanje procesa pokretanja otvorene datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2473">**Data_BootDuration** - The duration of boot process of the file open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2474">**Data_ClickOrigin** - Niska koja ukazuje na to odakle je deo veze koji je korisnik kliknuo u iOS Outlook aplikaciji da bi otvorio datoteku u Office aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2474">**Data_ClickOrigin** - A string indicating which part the link was from when user clicked a link in iOS Outlook to open a file in Office app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2475">**Data_ClickTime** – Unix vreme epohe kada je korisnik kliknuo na link u iOS Outlook aplikaciji da bi otvorio datoteku u Office aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2475">**Data_ClickTime** - The Unix epoch time when the user clicked a link in iOS Outlook to open the file in Office app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2476">**Data_ClosePreviouslyOpenedMarkers** – Vrednost niske koja evidentira trajanje između nekih pozivanja funkcije, u formatu sa id–om funkcije i trajanjem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2476">**Data_ClosePreviouslyOpenedMarkers** – A string value logging the time duration between some function calls, in a format with function ID and duration.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2477">**Data_DetachedDuration** – Trajanje procesa odvajanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2477">**Data_DetachedDuration** - The duration of detach process of an event.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2478">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** – Nabrajanje koje označava režim pristupa datoteke, npr. samo za čitanje, čitanje i pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2478">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - An enumeration indicating the access mode of the file, for example, read only, read write.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2479">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind**- Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip asinhronog toka korišćenog za otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2479">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind** - An enumeration indicating the type of asynchronous flow used to open the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2480">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType**- Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na tip algoritma deljenja datoteke na odlomke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2480">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - An enumeration indicating the type of chunking algorithm of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2481">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Nabrajanje koje označava stanje zaštite podataka preduzeća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2481">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - An enumeration indicating the enterprise data protection state of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2482">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Oznaka tipa datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2482">**Data_Doc_Ext** - File extension of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2483">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** – Ime datoteke na host serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2483">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - The server host name of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2484">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje ime hosta servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2484">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - A GUID that uniquely identifies server host name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2485">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje identitet koji se koristi za otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2485">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - A GUID that uniquely identifies the identity used to open a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2486">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario**- Nabrajanje koje označava detaljan tip scenarija operacije otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2486">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - An enumeration indicating the detailed scenario type of a file open operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2487">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na IO zastavice operacije otvaranje datoteke, npr. da li je datoteka keširana ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2487">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - An enumeration indicating the IO flags of a file open operation, for example, if the file is cached or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2488">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled** – Da li je za određenu datoteku omogućena saradnja u oblaku ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2488">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled** - Whether or not the cloud collaboration is enabled for the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2489">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** – Da li je datoteka otvorena postepenim otvaranjem ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2489">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Whether or not the file was opened via incremental open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2490">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** – Da li datoteka podržava Office uslugu za saradnju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2490">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Whether or not a file supports Office Collaboration Service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2491">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** – Da li je datoteka otvorena iz vanmrežne keširane kopije ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2491">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Whether or not a file is opened from an offline cached copy.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2492">**Data_Doc_IsPrefetched** – Da li je datoteka bila učitana u pozadini pre operacije otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2492">**Data_Doc_IsPrefetched** - Whether or not the file was prefetched before open operation happened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2493">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** – Da li datoteka u oblaku postoji lokalno i da li je sinhronizovana sa serverom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2493">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** - Whether or not a cloud file exists locally and is synchronized with the server.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2494">**Data_Doc_Location** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na to gde se datoteka nalazi, npr. lokalno ili u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2494">**Data_Doc_Location** - An enumeration indicating where the file is located, for example, locally or in cloud.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2495">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** – Nabrajanje koji označava razlog za datoteku koja je samo za čitanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2495">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - An enumeration indicating the read only reason of a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2496">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** – GUID koji na jedinstveno identifikuje ID resursa datoteke na serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2496">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - A GUID that uniquely identifies server resource ID of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2497">**Data_Doc_RtcType** – Nabrajanje koje označava tip RTC kanala koji datoteka koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2497">**Data_Doc_RtcType** - An enumeration indicating type of real-time channel (RTC) used by the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2498">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje ID dokumenta na serveru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2498">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - A GUID that uniquely identifies server document ID.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2499">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** – Nabrajanje koje označava protokol servera datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2499">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - An enumeration indicating the server protocol of a cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2500">**Data_Doc_ServerType** – Nabrajanje koje označava tip servera datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2500">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - An enumeration indicating the server type of a cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2501">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** – Nabrajanje koje označava tip servera datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2501">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - An enumeration indicating the server version of a cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2502">**Data_Doc_SessionId** – Ceo broj koji se povećava za 1 za svaku operaciju otvaranja datoteke u sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2502">**Data_Doc_SessionId** - An integer that is incremented by 1 for each file open operation in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2503">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Niska koja se koristi za uporednu evidenciju na strani klijenta i na strani servera, to je obično neka vrsta ID-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2503">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - A string used to correlate client-side and server-side logs, typically it is a kind of ID.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2504">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Veličina dokumenta u bajtovima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2504">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - File size in bytes.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2505">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** – Nabrajanje koje označava vrstu specijalnog znaka u URL adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2505">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - An enumeration indicating which kind of special character the file URL has.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2506">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** – GUID koji jedinstveno identifikuje URL adresu datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2506">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - A GUID that uniquely identifies the file URL.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2507">**Data_Doc_UsedWrsDataOnOpen** - Da li je datoteka otvorena postepeno pomoću unapred keširanih WRS podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2507">**Data_Doc_UsedWrsDataOnOpen** - Whether or not the file was opened incrementally using pre-cached WRS data.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2508">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - Niska koja označava od koje usluge potiče WOPI (Web Application Open Platform Interface Protocol) datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2508">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - A string indicating which service a WOPI (Web Application Open Platform Interface Protocol) file is from.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2509">**Data_HWModel** – Vrednost niske koja evidentira model iPad ili iPhone uređaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2509">**Data_HWModel** – A string value logging the model of iPad or iPhone device.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2510">**Data_InclusiveMeasurements** – Vrednost niske koja evidentira trajanje pozivanja funkcije, u formatu sa oznakom funkcije i trajanjem koje obuhvata trajanje podfunkcijskih poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2510">**Data_InclusiveMeasurements** - A string value logging the time duration spent in some function calls, in a format with function tag and duration which includes the duration of sub-function calls.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2511">**Data_InitializationReason** – Nabrajanje koje ukazuje na način otvaranja datoteke, npr. iz kog elementa korisničkog interfejsa ili pokretanje iz druge aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2511">**Data_InitializationReason** - An enumeration indicating how the file is opened, for example, from which UI element or triggered by another app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2512">**Data_IsDocumentAlreadyOpen** – Da li je datoteka već otvorena ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2512">**Data_IsDocumentAlreadyOpen** – Whether or not the file is already open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2513">**Data_IsInterrupted** – Da li je radnju otvorene datoteke prekinula aplikacija koja prelazi u pozadinu ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2513">**Data_IsInterrupted** – Whether or not the file open operation was interrupted by app transitioning to background.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2514">**Data_Measurements** – Vrednost niske koja evidentira trajanje pozivanja funkcije, u formatu sa oznakom funkcije i trajanjem koje isključuje trajanje podfunkcijskih poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2514">**Data_Measurements** - A string value logging the time duration spent in some function calls, in a format with function tag and duration which excludes the duration of sub-function calls.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2515">**Data_OpenInPlace** – Da li datoteka mora da se kopira u zaštićeno sandbox okruženje Office sistema pre nego što korisnik može da je otvori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2515">**Data_OpenInPlace** - Whether or not a file must be copied to the Office's sandboxed container before user can open it.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2516">**Data_OpenStartTime** – Vreme Unix epohe kada je započeto otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2516">**Data_OpenStartTime** - The Unix epoch time when the file open started.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2517">**Data_SilhouetteDuration** – Trajanje prikazivanja otvorene datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2517">**Data_SilhouetteDuration** - The duration of rendering of the file open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2518">**Data_SourceApplication** - Niska koja označava paket ID izvorne aplikacije kada je druga aplikacija pokrenula otvaranje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2518">**Data_SourceApplication** - A string indicating the bundle ID of the source application when a file open was triggered by another app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2519">**Data_StopwatchDuration** – Trajanje događaja od početka da kraja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2519">**Data_StopwatchDuration** - The duration from beginning of the event to the end of the event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2520">**Data_TimeSplitMeasurements** – Vrednost niske koja evidentira trajanje pozivanja funkcije, u formatu sa oznakom funkcije, vremenskom oznakom početka i trajanjem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2520">**Data_TimeSplitMeasurements** - A string value logging the time duration spent in some function calls, in a format with function tag, start timestamp and duration.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuifileoperationsopenfilewithreason"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2521">Office.DocsUI.FileOperations.OpenFileWithReason</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2521">Office.DocsUI.FileOperations.OpenFileWithReason</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2522">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2522">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2523">Događaj se snima kad se izvršava operacija otvaranja datoteke i koristi se za razumevanje korisnika i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji otvaranja datoteke kao što su kategorija lokacije „Tip usluge“ i odakle je u okviru aplikacije korisnik zatražio da otvori datoteku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2523">The event records when a file open operation takes place and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file open operation information such as location categories "ServiceType" and from where within Application the user requested to open a file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2524">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2524">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2525">**Data_IsCandidateDropboxFile** – ovo je Bulova vrednost koja se evidentira ako pregledajući putanju datoteke smatramo da je to možda iz fascikle koju sinhronizuju DropBox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2525">**Data_IsCandidateDropboxFile** - This is a Boolean value that is logged if by inspecting the path of the file we think it might be from a folder that is synched by Drop Box.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2526">**Data_IsSignedIn** - bez obzira na to da li je korisnik prijavljen kada se čuva datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2526">**Data_IsSignedIn** - Whether or not a user is signed in when the file is saved.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2527">**Data_OpenReason** - otvoreni razlog je numerička vrednost koja označava mesto u okviru aplikacije sa kojeg je korisnik otvorio datoteku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2527">**Data_OpenReason** - The open reason is a numerical value that indicates from where within the application a user opened a file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2528">**Data_ServiceType** – apstraktna numerička kategorizacija lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2528">**Data_ServiceType** - An abstract numerical categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuifileoperationssavetourl"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2529">Office.DocsUI.FileOperations.SaveToURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2529">Office.DocsUI.FileOperations.SaveToURL</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2530">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2530">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2531">Događaj se snima kad se izvršava operacija „Sačuvaj kao“ i koristi se za razumevanje korisnika i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji datoteka, kao što su kategorije lokacije i prva četiri znaka oznake tipa datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2531">The event records when a "save as" operation takes place and is used to understand and prioritize user-experiences based on file operation information such as location categories and the first four characters of the extension.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2532">Operacija „Sačuvaj kao“ pojavljuje se svaki put kada korisnik napravi novu datoteku i prvi put je sačuva ili sačuva kopiju postojeće datoteke na novu lokaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2532">A "save as" operation occurs whenever a user creates a new file and saves it for the first time or saves a copy of an existing file to a new location.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2533">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2533">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2534">**Data_FileExtension** – prva četiri znaka oznake tipa nove datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2534">**Data_FileExtension** - The first four characters of the new file's extension.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2535">**Data_IsNewFileCreation** - označava da li je operacija čuvanja za novu datoteku ili kopiju postojeće datoteke.
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2535">**Data_IsNewFileCreation** - Indicates if the save operation is for a new file or a copy of an existing file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2536">**Data_IsSignedIn** - bez obzira na to da li je korisnik prijavljen kada se čuva datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2536">**Data_IsSignedIn** - Whether or not a user is signed in when the file is saved.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2537">**Data_SaveErrorCode** - numerička vrednost koja se postavlja ako postoji greška koja će vam pomoći u prepoznavanju vrste greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2537">**Data_SaveErrorCode** - A numerical value that is set if there is an error to help identify the kind of error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2538">**Data_SaveErrorDomain** – precizira domen SaveErrorCode kako je definisan od strane Apple SaveErrorDomains „to su proizvoljne niske koje se koriste za razlikovanje kodova“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2538">**Data_SaveErrorDomain** - Specifies the domain of the SaveErrorCode as defined by Apple SaveErrorDomains "are arbitrary strings used to differentiate groups of codes".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2539">**Data_SaveLocation** – apstraktna kategorizacija originalne lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2539">**Data_SaveLocation** - An abstract categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2540">**Data_SaveOperationType** – numerička vrednost definisana NSSaveOperationType grupom vrednosti kompanije Apple.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2540">**Data_SaveOperationType** - A numerical value defined by Apple's NSSaveOperationType group of values.</span></span>


#### <a name="officedocsuisharinguicloudupsellshown"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2541">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.CloudUpsellShown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2541">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.CloudUpsellShown</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2542">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2542">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2543">Ovaj događaj se snima kada korisnik prođe kroz nadogradnju dokumenata u tok oblaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2543">This event records when a user goes through the document upsell to cloud flow.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2544">Ovi podaci se koriste za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva koji se odnose na premeštanje dokumenata na lokacije u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2544">This data is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences relating to moving documents to cloud locations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2545">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2545">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2546">**Data_FileStyle** - numerička vrednost koja pokazuje iz kojeg scenarija je prikazano iskustvo nadogradnje kao što je preklopnik za automatsko čuvanje ili dugme za deljenje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2546">**Data_FileStyle** - A numerical value that indicates from what scenario the upsell experience was shown like from an autosave toggle or a share button.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2547">**Data_FileType** – prva četiri znaka oznake tipa nove datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2547">**Data_FileType** - The first four characters of the current file's extension.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2548">**Data_InDocStage** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je iskustvo nadogradnje prikazano iz galerije dokumenata ili iz prozora dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2548">**Data_InDocStage** - A Boolean that indicates if the upsell experience is shown from the Document Gallery or from within a document window.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2549">**Data_IsDocumentOpened** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je trenutni dokument za koji se prikazuje iskustvo nadogradnje takođe otvoren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2549">**Data_IsDocumentOpened** - A Boolean that indicates if the current document for which the upsell experience is being shown is also open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2550">**Data_IsDraft** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je trenutna datoteka ikada sačuvana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2550">**Data_IsDraft** - A Boolean that indicates if the current file has ever been saved.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2551">**Data_IsSheetModal** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je iskustvo nadogradnje predstavljeno modalno ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2551">**Data_IsSheetModal** - A Boolean that indicates if the upsell experience was presented modally or not.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuisharinguicloudupsellupload"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2552">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.CloudUpsellShown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2552">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.CloudUpsellUpload</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2553">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2553">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2554">Ovaj događaj se snima kada korisnik odluči da otpremi novu ili lokalnu datoteku u oblak i rezultat te operacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2554">This event records when a user chooses to upload a new or local file to the cloud and the result of that operation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2555">Ovi podaci se koriste za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva koji se odnose na premeštanje dokumenata na lokacije u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2555">This data is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences relating to moving documents to cloud locations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2556">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2556">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2557">**Data_FileStyle** - numerička vrednost koja pokazuje iz kojeg scenarija je prikazano iskustvo nadogradnje kao što je preklopnik za automatsko čuvanje ili dugme za deljenje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2557">**Data_FileStyle** - A numerical value that indicates from what scenario the upsell experience was shown like an autosave toggle or a share button.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2558">**Data_FileType** – prva četiri znaka oznake tipa nove datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2558">**Data_FileType** - The first four characters of the current file's extension.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2559">**Data_InDocStage** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je iskustvo nadogradnje prikazano iz galerije dokumenata ili iz prozora dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2559">**Data_InDocStage** - A Boolean that indicates if the upsell experience is shown from the Document Gallery or from within a document window.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2560">**Data_IsDefaultServiceLocation** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je izabrana lokacija za otpremu dokumenta podrazumevana lokacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2560">**Data_IsDefaultServiceLocation** - A Boolean value that indicates if the selected location to upload the document to is the default location.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2561">**Data_IsDocumentOpened** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je trenutni dokument za koji se prikazuje iskustvo nadogradnje takođe otvoren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2561">**Data_IsDocumentOpened** - A Boolean that indicates if the current document for which the upsell experience is being shown is also open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2562">**Data_IsDraft** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je trenutna datoteka ikada sačuvana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2562">**Data_IsDraft** - A Boolean that indicates if the current file has ever been saved.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2563">**Data_IsSheetModal** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je iskustvo nadogradnje predstavljeno modalno ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2563">**Data_IsSheetModal** - A Boolean that indicates if the upsell experience was presented modally or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2564">**Data_LocationServiceType** – apstraktna kategorizacija lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2564">**Data_LocationServiceType** - An abstract categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2565">**Data_UploadAction** – fiksno kodirana niska koja pokazuje da li je otpremanje bilo operacija „premeštanje“ ili „kopiranje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2565">**Data_UploadAction** - A hard-coded string that indicates whether the upload was a move or a copy operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2566">**Data_UploadResult** – fiksno kodirana niska koja označava rezultat pokušaja otpremanja, uključujući, ali ne ograničavajući se na „Uspeh“', „UserCancelledUpload“, i „PreAuthFailed“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2566">**Data_UploadResult** - A hard-coded string that indicates the result of the attempt to upload including but not limited to ''Success", "UserCancelledUpload", and "PreAuthFailed".</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuisharinguicopylinkoperation"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2567">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.CopyLinkOperation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2567">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.CopyLinkOperation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2568">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2568">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2569">Ovaj događaj se snima kada korisnik odluči da deli dokument u oblaku generisanjem veze na dokument u oblaku i koristi se za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta kod korisnika na osnovu deljenja dokumenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2569">This event records when a user chooses to share a document by generating a link to a cloud document and is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences based on sharing documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2570">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2570">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2571">**Data_ ServiceType** – apstraktna kategorizacija originalne lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2571">**Data_ ServiceType** - An abstract categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2572">**Data_LinkType** – fiksno kodirana niska koja opisuje vrstu izvršenog poziva kao što su „Samo za prikaz“ i „Prikaz i uređivanje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2572">**Data_LinkType** - A hard-coded string that describes the kind of invite operation performed like "ViewOnly" and "ViewAndEdit".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2573">**Data_ShareScenario** – fiksno kodirana niska opisa gde se u korisničkom interfejsu aplikacije deli datoteka, uključujući, ali ne ograničavajući se na, „Meni datoteka“, „OpenTabShareActionMenu“, „RecentTabShareActionMenu“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2573">**Data_ShareScenario** - A hard-coded string description of where within the application's user interface the file is being shared from including but not limited to, "FileMenu", "OpenTabShareActionMenu", "RecentTabShareActionMenu".</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuisharinguidocsuionedriveshare"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2574">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.DocsUIOneDriveShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2574">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.DocsUIOneDriveShare</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2575">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2575">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2576">Ovaj događaj se beleži kada korisnik odluči da deli dokument u oblaku koristeći iskustvo deljenja usluge OneDrive i koristi se za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta kod korisnika na osnovu deljenja dokumenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2576">This event records when a user chooses to share a cloud document using the OneDrive sharing experience and is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences based on sharing documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2577">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2577">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2578">**Data_ODSPShareWebviewShareError** - ako iskustvo deljenja doživi grešku, ovo je numerička vrednost koja će vam pomoći da identifikujete razlog neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2578">**Data_ODSPShareWebviewShareError** - If the sharing experience experiences an error this is a numerical value to help identify the reason for the failure.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2579">**Data_ODSPShareWebviewShareGrantAccessResult** - Bulova vrednost koja kad je vrednost „true“ ukazuje da je lagana operacija deljenja uspešno završena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2579">**Data_ODSPShareWebviewShareGrantAccessResult** - A Boolean value that when true indicates that a lightweight sharing operation successfully completed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2580">**Data_ODSPShareWebviewShareSuccessType** - kada se operacija deljenja uspešno dovrši, ovo je numerička vrednost koja se koristi da se odredi koja operacija deljenja je dovršena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2580">**Data_ODSPShareWebviewShareSuccessType** - When a share operation successfully completes this is a numerical value used to determine what kind of sharing operation was completed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2581">**Data_WebViewInfoResult** - ako se korisnički interfejs ne učita, ovo je numerička vrednost koja će vam pomoći da identifikujete razlog neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2581">**Data_WebViewInfoResult** - If the user interface fails to load this is a numerical value to help identify the reason for the failure.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2582">**Data_WebViewLoadTimeInMs** - numerička vrednost koja snima koliko je vremena potrebno da se veb korisnički interfejs učita.
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2582">**Data_WebViewLoadTimeInMs** - A numerical value that records the amount of time it took for the web user interface to load.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuisharinguiinvitepeople"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2583">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.InvitePeople</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2583">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.InvitePeople</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2584">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2584">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2585">Ovaj događaj se snima kada korisnik odluči da pozove osobe dokument u oblaku i koristi se za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta kod korisnika na osnovu deljenja dokumenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2585">This event records when a user chooses to invite people to a cloud document and is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences based on sharing documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2586">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2586">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2587">**Data_ ServiceType** – apstraktna kategorizacija originalne lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2587">**Data_ ServiceType** - An abstract categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2588">**Data_InviteeCount** - ukupan broj kontakata pozvanih u dokument u jednoj akciji poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2588">**Data_InviteeCount** - The total number of contacts invited to a document in one invite action.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2589">**Data_LinkType** – fiksno kodirana niska koja opisuje vrstu izvršenog poziva kao što su „Samo za prikaz“ i „Prikaz i uređivanje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2589">**Data_LinkType** - A hard-coded string that describes the kind of invite operation performed like "ViewOnly" and "ViewAndEdit".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2590">**Data_MessageLength** - numerički broj ukupnog broja znakova poslatih u poruci poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2590">**Data_MessageLength** - A numerical count of the total number of characters sent in the invite message.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2591">**Data_ShareScenario** – fiksno kodirana niska opisa gde se u korisničkom interfejsu aplikacije deli datoteka, uključujući, ali ne ograničavajući se na, „Meni datoteka“, „OpenTabShareActionMenu“, „RecentTabShareActionMenu“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2591">**Data_ShareScenario** - A hard-coded string description of where within the application's user interface the file is being shared from including but not limited to, "FileMenu", "OpenTabShareActionMenu", "RecentTabShareActionMenu".</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuisharinguisendacopyoperation"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2592">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.SendACopyOperation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2592">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.SendACopyOperation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2593">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2593">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2594">Ovaj događaj se snima kada korisnik odluči da pošalje kopiju dokumenta i koristi se za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta kod korisnika na osnovu deljenja dokumenata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2594">The event records when a user chooses to send a copy of a document and is used to better understand and prioritize user-experiences based on sharing documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2595">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2595">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2596">**Data_IsHomeTabEnabled** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je korisniku trenutno dostupna kartica „Početak“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2596">**Data_IsHomeTabEnabled** - A Boolean value that indicates if the Home tab is currently available to the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2597">**Data_IsRecommendedEnabled** – Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je korisniku trenutno dostupno iskustvo „Preporučeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2597">**Data_IsRecommendedEnabled** - A Boolean value that indicates if the "Recommended" experience is currently available to the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2598">**Data_OperationType** – numerička vrednost koja označava koja vrsta slanja operacije kopiranja se izvršava kao što je slanje kopije e–poštom ili slanje kopije putem Apple kontrole deljenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2598">**Data_OperationType** - A numerical value to indicate what kind of send a copy operation is taking place like sending a copy in an email or sending a copy through Apple's share control.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2599">**Data_ ServiceType** – apstraktna kategorizacija originalne lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2599">**Data_ServiceType** - An abstract categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2600">**Data_ShareFileType** – fiksno kodirana niska opisa tipa objekta koji se deli, uključujući, ali ne ograničavajući se na: „Dokument“, „PDF”, „Slika“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2600">**Data_ShareFileType** - A hard-coded string description of what type of object is being shared including but not limited to, "Document", "PDF", "Picture".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2601">**Data_ShareScenario** – fiksno kodirana niska opisa gde se u korisničkom interfejsu aplikacije deli datoteka, uključujući, ali ne ograničavajući se na, „Meni datoteka“, „OpenTabShareActionMenu“, „RecentTabShareActionMenu“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2601">**Data_ShareScenario** - A hard-coded string description of where within the application's user interface the file is being shared from including but not limited to, "FileMenu", "OpenTabShareActionMenu", "RecentTabShareActionMenu".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2602">**Data_SharingService** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je datoteka kreirana kada je korisnik tražio predložak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2602">**Data_SharingService** - A Boolean that indicates whether the file was created when the user was searching for a template.</span></span>

#### <a name="officedocsuisharinguiupsellshare"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2603">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.UpsellShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2603">Office.DocsUI.SharingUI.UpsellShare</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2604">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2604">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2605">Ovaj događaj se snima kada korisnik prođe kroz nadogradnju dokumenata u tok oblaka kada pokušava da podeli dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2605">This event records when a user goes through the document upsell to cloud flow when trying to share a document.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2606">Ovi podaci se koriste za bolje razumevanje i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva koji se odnose na premeštanje dokumenata na lokacije u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2606">This data is used to better understand and prioritize user experiences relating to moving documents to cloud locations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2607">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2607">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2608">**Data_FileOperationResult** - numerička vrednost koja pokazuje da li je operacija uspela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2608">**Data_FileOperationResult** - A numerical value to indicate whether the operation succeeded.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2609">**Data_HostedFromDocStage** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li korisnik prolazi kroz nadogradnju do protoka oblaka iz DocStage iskustva ili iz otvorenog dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2609">**Data_HostedFromDocStage** - A Boolean to indicate if a user is going through the upsell to cloud flow from the DocStage experience or from an open document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2610">**Data_isLocalCopyOn** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je korisnik odlučio da zadrži lokalnu kopiju dokumenta otpremom na lokaciju u oblaku ili da premesti postojeći dokument na lokaciju u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2610">**Data_isLocalCopyOn** - A Boolean to indicate if the use chose to keep a local copy of the document being uploaded to a cloud location or move the existing document to a cloud location.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2611">**Data_NewFileType** – apstraktna kategorizacija lokacije nove lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2611">**Data_NewFileType** - An abstract categorization of the location of the new location of the file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2612">**Data_OriginalFileType** – apstraktna kategorizacija lokacije datoteke kao što je „SharePoint“, „OneDrive“, „Lokalno“, „WOPI“, itd., a eksplicitno nije stvarna lokacija datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2612">**Data_OriginalFileType** - An abstract categorization of the location of a file like "SharePoint", "OneDrive", "Local", "WOPI", etc., and explicitly not the actual location of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2613">**Data_UploadButtonPressed** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je korisnik odlučio da otpremi trenutni dokument na lokaciju u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2613">**Data_UploadButtonPressed** - A Boolean to indicate if the user chose to upload the current document to a cloud location.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2614">**Data_UploadError** - numerička vrednost koja ukazuje na vrstu greške do koje je došlo ako operacija slanja ne uspe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2614">**Data_UploadError** - A numerical value that indicates the kind of error that occurred if an upload operation fails.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2615">**Data_UpsellAppearsFromDelegate** - Bulova vrednost koja označava da li je prikaz prikazan iz menija deljenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2615">**Data_UpsellAppearsFromDelegate** - A Boolean value to indicate if the view was shown from the share menu.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2646">**clientCorrelationId** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za sesiju aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2646">**clientCorrelationId** - The globally unique identifier for the application's session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2648">**DeviceInfo.Make** - Proizvođač uređaja ili ime OEM proizvođača.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2648">**DeviceInfo.Make** - The Device manufacturer or device OEM name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2652">**DeviceInfo_SDKUid** – Jedinstveno identifikuje uređaj iz perspektive telemetrije SDK–a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2652">**DeviceInfo.SDKUid** - Uniquely identifies the device from the telemetry SDK's perspective.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2653">**eventId** - Identifikator imena događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2653">**eventId** - Name identifier of the event.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2654">**EventInfo.SdkVersion** - Verzija telemetrije SDK-a koju klijent koristi za generisanje događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2654">**EventInfo.SdkVersion** - The version of the telemetry SDK used by the client to generate the event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2655">**eventpriority** - Vrednost nabrajanja za prioritet slanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2655">**eventpriority** - An enumeration value for the priority of sending the event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2656">**feature** - Koristi se za grupisanje različitih događaja iste funkcije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2656">**feature** - Used to group various events of the same feature.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2657">**hostAppRing** - Populacija korisnika kojima je aplikacija distribuirana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2657">**hostAppRing** - The population of users to whom the application was distributed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2658">**properties** – Sadrži dodatna svojstva metapodataka prikupljenih za svaki događaj..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2658">**properties** - Contains additional metadata properties collected for each event.</span></span>
        
    - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2659">**ClientTimeStamp** - Vremenska oznaka kada je događaj prijavljen u klijentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2659">**ClientTimeStamp** - Timestamp of when the event was logged in the client.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2660">**publicEventName** - Ime događaja koji je javno okrenut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2660">**publicEventName** - Public facing event name.</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2661">**region** – Geografsko područje usluge feeda na koju je korisnik povezan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2661">**region** - The geographical region of the feed service that the user is connected to.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2662">**tenantAadObjectId** – Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za korisnika zakupca preduzeća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2662">**tenantAadObjectId** - A globally unique identifier for the user's enterprise tenant.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2663">**type** – Tip evidentiranih događaja, npr. praćenje, greška, događaj, QoS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2663">**type** - Type of the logged event, for example, Trace, Error, Event, QoS.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2664">**userAadObjectId** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator korisnika za Enterprise Microsoft nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2664">**userAadObjectId** - The globally unique user identifier for an enterprise Microsoft account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2665">**UserInfo.Id** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator korisnika za Enterprise Microsoft nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2665">**UserInfo.Id** - The globally unique user identifier for an enterprise Microsoft account.</span></span>

#### <a name="officefileiocsiccachedfilecsiloadfilebasic"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2776">Office.FileIO.CSI.CCachedFileCsiLoadFileBasic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2776">Office.FileIO.CSI.CCachedFileCsiLoadFileBasic</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2777">Omogućava nam da znamo da li se datoteka uspešno otvorila iz FIO sloja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2777">Allows us to know if a file successfully opened from the FIO Layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2778">Koristi se za nadgledanje i ispravnost funkcija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2778">Used for feature health and monitoring.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2779">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2779">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2780">**Grupa aktivnosti -** oznaka koja omogućava da skup događaja za praćenje bude grupisan kako bi upravljao sveukupnim uspehom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2780">**Activity.Group -** tag that allows a set of monitoring events to be grouped to manage overall success</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2781">**Activity.IsHVA -** zastavica koja označava da je događaj ključan za uspeh korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2781">**Activity.IsHVA -** flag to indicate that event is critical to user success</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2782">**Data.AsyncOpen -** zastavica koja označava da je otvoreno imalo sadržaj koji je stigao posle otvaranja glavnog tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2782">**Data.AsyncOpen -** flag to indicate the open had content that arrived after the main body was opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2783">**Data.CacheFileId -** se povezuje sa telemetrijom keša Office dokumenata da omogući analizu uticaja problema sa kešom na korisničko iskustvo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2783">**Data.CacheFileId -** connects to Office Document Cache telemetry to enable impact analysis of cache issues on the user experience</span></span>
 
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2784">**Data.CFREnabled** - ukazuje da je za sesiju omogućen CacheFileRuntime.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2784">**Data.CFREnabled** - Indicates that CacheFileRuntime is enabled for the session.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2785">**Data.CFRFailure** - ukazuje da je CacheFileRuntime naišao na grešku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2785">**Data.CFRFailure** - Indicated that CacheFileRuntime ran into error.</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2786">**Data.CoauthStatus -** saopštava status saradnje na dokumentu prilikom otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2786">**Data.CoauthStatus -** reports collaborative status of the document on Open</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2787">**Data.CountOfMultiRoundTripsDownload -** Broj povratnih putovanja ka serveru koji se koristi za rešavanje problema sa performansama i mrežnih problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2787">**Data.CountOfMultiRoundTripsDownload -** Count of round trips to the server used to troubleshoot performance and network issues</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2789">**Data.DialogId –** Podesite da li će se tokom otvaranja prikazivati dijalog korisničkog interfejsa, što znači da je korisniku prikazana poruka upozorenja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2789">**Data.DialogId -** Set if a UI dialog was displayed during Open, indicating that a warning message was displayed to the user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2790">**Data.DidFallbackToDAV -** Aktivirano ako je dokument otvoren korišćenjem starije verzije protokola za prenos datoteka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2790">**Data.DidFallbackToDAV -** Set if the document was opened using an older file transfer protocol</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2791">**Data.Doc.AccessMode -** Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2791">**Data.Doc.AccessMode -** Document is read only/editable</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2792">**Data.Doc.AssistedReadingReasons -** Aktivirano ako dokument ima primenjenu elektronsku zaštitu podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2792">**Data.Doc.AssistedReadingReasons -** Set if the document has electronic data protection in place</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2793">**Data.Doc.AsyncOpenKind –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2793">**Data.Doc.AsyncOpenKind –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2795">**Data.Doc.EdpState -** Postavke elektronske zaštite podataka za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2795">**Data.Doc.EdpState -** Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2796">**Data.Doc.Ext -** Oznaka tipa dokumenta (docx/xlsb/pptx, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2796">**Data.Doc.Ext -** Document extension (docx/xlsb/pptx, etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2797">**Data.Doc.Extension -** Zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2797">**Data.Doc.Extension -** Obsolete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2798">**Data.Doc.FileFormat -** Verzija protokola za format datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2798">**Data.Doc.FileFormat -** File format protocol version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2799">**Data.Doc.Fqdn -** Ime domena za OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2799">**Data.Doc.Fqdn -** OneDrive or SharePoint Online Domain Name</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2800">**Data.Doc.FqdnHash -** Jednosmerni heš imena domena koji se može identifikovati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2800">**Data.Doc.FqdnHash -** One-way hash of customer identifiable domain name</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2803">**Data.Doc.InitializationScenario -** Beleži način na koji je otvoren dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2803">**Data.Doc.InitializationScenario -** Records how the document was opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2804">**Data.Doc.IOFlags -** Izveštava o keširanim zastavicama koje su korišćene za podešavanje postavki zahteva za otvaranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2804">**Data.Doc.IOFlags -** Reports on the cached flags used to set request options</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2808">**Data.Doc.IsOcsSupported -** Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je dokument podržan u usluzi saradnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2808">**Data.Doc.IsOcsSupported -** Flag indicating that the document is supported in the collaboration service</span></span>

#### <a name="officefileiocsiccachedfilecsisavefilebasic"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2901">Office.FileIO.CSI.CCachedFileCsiSaveFileBasic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2901">Office.FileIO.CSI.CCachedFileCsiSaveFileBasic</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2902">Omogućava nam da znamo da li je datoteka uspešno sačuvana iz FIO sloja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2902">Allows us to know if a file was successfully saved from the FIO Layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2903">Koristi se za nadgledanje i ispravnost funkcija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2903">Used for Feature Health and monitoring.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2904">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2904">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2905">**Grupa aktivnosti -** oznaka koja omogućava da skup događaja za praćenje bude grupisan kako bi upravljao sveukupnim uspehom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2905">**Activity.Group -** tag that allows a set of monitoring events to be grouped to manage overall success</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2906">**Activity.IsHVA -** zastavica koja označava da je događaj ključan za uspeh korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2906">**Activity.IsHVA -** flag to indicate that event is critical to user success</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2907">**Data.AsyncOpen -** zastavica koja označava da je otvoren dokument sa sadržajem koji je stigao posle otvaranja glavnog tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2907">**Data.AsyncOpen -** flag to indicate that the document was opened with content that arrived after the main body was opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2908">**Data.BaseDownloadTriggered -** Promena praćenja dijagnostike koja ukazuje na to da je zatražena osnovna verzija dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2908">**Data.BaseDownloadTriggered -** Change tracking diagnostic indicating that the base version of the document was requested</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-2909">**Data.BlockAutoUploadReasons –** kodove razloga za blokiran status otpremanja (npr. Automatsko čuvanje je isključeno, dokument je u tranziciji)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-2909">**Data.BlockAutoUploadReasons -** Reason codes for blocked upload state (for example, Autosave is turned off, the document is transitioning)</span></span>

#### <a name="officefindtimeappfailedtostart"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3048">Office.FindTime.AppFailedToStart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3048">Office.FindTime.AppFailedToStart</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3049">Prikuplja se kada aplikacija ne uspeva da se pokrene zbog neočekivane greške prilikom pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3049">Collected when app fails to start due to an unexpected error during startup.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3050">Koristi se za praćenje izuzetaka i padova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3050">Used to track exceptions & crashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3051">Pomaže u nadgledanju i otklanjanju grešaka ispravnosti aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3051">Helps monitor & debug app health.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3052">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3052">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3053">**Datum i vreme** - Vremenska oznaka kada je događaj evidentiran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3053">**DateTime** - Timestamp of when the event is logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3054">**ImeDogađaja** - Ime događaja koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3054">**EventName** - The name of the event being logged</span></span>

#### <a name="officefirstrunappleactivationresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3055">Office.FirstRun.Apple.ActivationResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3055">Office.FirstRun.Apple.ActivationResult</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3056">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3056">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3057">Događaj se koristi za nadgledanje stanja toka aktivacije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3057">The event is used to monitor the health of our application activation flow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3058">Prikupljamo podatke da bismo utvrdili ishod aktiviranja pretplate na Office 365 zajedno sa tokom koji se koristi za aktiviranje (utisak pri prvom pokretanju, tok u aplikaciji, kupovina, itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3058">We collect data to figure out the outcome of the Office 365 subscription activation along with the flow used to activate (First Run Experience, In-App-Flow, Purchase, etc.).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3059">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3059">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3060">**Data_ActivationStatusCollectionTime** – vremenska oznaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3060">**Data_ActivationStatusCollectionTime** – A timestamp</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3061">**Data_ActivationStatusError** – kod greške prilikom aktiviranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3061">**Data_ActivationStatusError** – An activation error code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3062">**Data_ActivationStatusFlowType** – numerička vrednost koja označava tip toka aktivacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3062">**Data_ActivationStatusFlowType** – A numeric value indicating the type of activation flow</span></span>
