#### <a name="officelenslenssdkcloudconnectorlaunch"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3181">Office.Lens.LensSdk.CloudConnectorLaunch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3181">Office.Lens.LensSdk.CloudConnectorLaunch</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3182">Kada korisnik zaberja sliku i željene funkcije u konačnom izboru za sliku za korišćenje sistema OCR, ovaj događaj se sakuplja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3182">When the user crops the image and taps confirm on the final image selection for using OCR, this event is collected.</span></span>     
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3183">Ovo je zapis korisnika zahteva za uslugu kao što ne postoji mapiranje korisnika u usluzi – posao u usluzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3183">This is user-to-request record for the service as there is no user-to-service-job mapping on the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3184">Korisnički ID se zahteva da bi ispunio zahteve za goo kada usluga nije direktno izloћena korisnicima, već putem klijenata i identifikuje ukupan broj osoba koje koriste uslugu, pomažući usluzi da prati količinu korisnika pomoću proizvoda, kao i identifikovanje promena u trendovima, kao i identifikovanje promena u trendovima, pomoć za pronalaženje i ispravljanje problema u proizvodu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3184">UserId is required to fulfill GDPR requirements as service is not directly exposed to users, but through clients and identify the total number of people using the service, helping the service track the volume of users using the product, as well as identifying changes in trends, help look for and rectify issues in the product.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3185">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3185">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3186">**CallType** –String za identifikovanje ako je API Call bio sinhronizovano ili asinhrono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3186">**CallType** - String to identify if the API call was synchronous or asynchronous.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3187">**CloudConnectorRequestId** –String koji identifikuje zahtev za uslugom koji je napravljen da konvertuje slike koristeći uslugu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3187">**CloudConnectorRequestId** - String that identifies the service request that was made to convert images via service.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3188">**Target–Connetconnectortarget** –String koji potvrđuje tip konverzije koju će usluga izvršiti na slikama, kao što je konvertovanje u PDF, docx, Text itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3188">**CloudConnectorTarget** - String that confirms which type of conversion the service will do on images, like converting to PDF, Docx, text, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3189">**User ID** –String koji identifikuje korisnika koji poseduje slike koje se obrađuju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3189">**CustomerId** - String that identifies the user who owns the images being processed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3190">**Tip klijenta** –String koji identifikuje klijenta kao Enterprise ili pojedinačnog korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3190">**CustomerType** - String that identifies the customer as an enterprise or individual user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3191">Ova razlika utiče na broj slika (kvota) koju klijent može da konvertuje istovremeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3191">This distinction affects the number of images (quota) the client can convert at a time.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3192">**Odnosi** –String, koji identifikuje povezanost između soиiva i usluge koja se koristi za obradu datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3192">**RelationId** - String, which identifies correlation between Lens and the service used to process files.</span></span>


#### <a name="officelenslenssdkcloudconnectoruploaderror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3193">Office.Lens.LensSdk.CloudConnectorUploadError</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3193">Office.Lens.LensSdk.CloudConnectorUploadError</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3194">U vidu slike u tabelu, kada korisnik pribavi deljenje, kopiranje ili otvaranje, ispravke u tabeli koju je napravio korisnik dele se sa uslugom da bi se poboljšali OCR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3194">In Image to Table, when the user taps either Share, Copy or Open, the corrections in the table made by the user are shared with the service to improve the OCR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3195">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja na osnovu reakcije greške te usluge i sadrži relevantne identifikatore da bi se otklanjaju Razni problemi u usluzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3195">This event is collected on the error response of that service and contains the relevant identifiers to troubleshoot various issues on the service.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3196">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3196">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3197">**CloudConnectorRequestId** –String identifikator da biste povezali posao sa uslugom u trenutnom zahtevu za uslugu za koji su podaci o poboljšanju deljeni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3197">**CloudConnectorRequestId** - String identifier to link the service job to the current service request for which the improvement data was shared.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3198">**Korodnosu** –String koji sadrži identifikator instance trenutnog posla usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3198">**CorrelationId** - String that contains the identifier of the current service job instance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3199">**Razlog** –String koji sadrži kôd greške i opis greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3199">**Reason** - String that contains the error code and description of the error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3200">**TargetType** –String koji identifikuje krajnju tačku u usluzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3200">**TargetType** - String that identifies the endpoint on the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3201">**Tip zadatka** –String koji identifikuje nameru poziva za uslugu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3201">**TaskType** - String that identifies the intent of the service call.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3203">U vidu slike u tabelu, kada korisnik pribavi deljenje, kopiranje ili otvaranje, ispravke u tabeli koju je napravio korisnik dele se sa uslugom da bi se poboljšali OCR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3203">In Image to Table, when the user taps either Share, Copy or Open, the corrections in the table made by the user are shared with the service to improve the OCR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3204">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja na uspešnom odgovoru te usluge i sadrži relevantne identifikatore za rešavanje problema sa procesom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3204">This event is collected on the successful response of that service and contains the relevant identifiers to troubleshoot the process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3205">On omogućava i da analizirate korišćenje gasovoda za poboljšanje usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3205">It also helps analyze the usage of service improvement pipeline.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3206">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3206">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3207">**CloudConnectorRequestId** –String identifikator da biste povezali posao sa uslugom u trenutnom zahtevu za uslugu za koji su podaci o poboljšanju deljeni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3207">**CloudConnectorRequestId** - String identifier to link the service job to the current service request for which the improvement data was shared.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3208">**Korodnosu** –String koji sadrži identifikator instance trenutnog posla usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3208">**CorrelationId** - String that contains the identifier of the current service job instance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3209">**TargetType** –String koji identifikuje krajnju tačku u usluzi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3209">**TargetType** - String that identifies the endpoint on the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3210">**Tip zadatka** –String koji identifikuje nameru poziva za uslugu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3210">**TaskType** - String that identifies the intent of the service call.</span></span>


#### <a name="officelenslenssdkpermission"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3211">Office. Lens. LensSdk. dozvola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3211">Office.Lens.LensSdk.Permission</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3212">Dozvole su osetljivoj funkciji, kao što bez njih korisnici ne mogu da iskuse nijednu od funkcija soиiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3212">Permissions are a sensitive feature, as without them user cannot experience any of Lens's features.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3213">Dozvole se prate da bi se razumela korisnička navika za pružanje/opoziv dozvola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3213">Permissions are tracked to understand user habits for providing/revoking permissions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3214">Kada korisnik komunicira sa svim dijalozima dozvola u našoj aplikaciji, skupljamo ove događaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3214">When the user interacts with any permission dialogs in our app, we collect these events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3215">Na osnovu trendova korisnika za prihvatanje i odbacivanje dozvola, prepoznaćemo poboljšanja funkcija koje pomažu korisnicima da razumeju zašto su dozvole ključne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3215">Based on user trends for accepting and rejecting permissions, we identify feature enhancements to help users understand why permissions are critical.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3216">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3216">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3217">**Data_action** – sadrži vrednosti kao što su "Kameraperonalno (ili demantovano), što će nam pomoći da shvatimo da li je korisnik prihvatio ili odbio dozvole za skladištenje i kameru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3217">**Data_action** - Contains values like “CameraPermissionAllowed (or Denied), StoragePermissionGranted (or Denied), which help us understand whether the user accepted or rejected storage and camera permissions.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3218">**Data_Action** – ovo polje nam pomaže da shvatimo koji tip dozvole je tražio od korisnika kao što je kamera ili skladište</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3218">**Data_Action** - This field helps us understand which type of permission was asked from the user such as Camera or storage</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3219">**Data_status** – sadrži vrednosti kao što je dozvoljeno, uskraćen i poricano zauvek, što nam pomaže da shvatimo da li je korisnik prihvatila ili odbacila dozvole za skladištenje i kameru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3219">**Data_status** - Contains values like Allowed, Denied, and DeniedForever, which help us understand whether the user accepted or rejected storage and camera permissions.</span></span>


#### <a name="officelenslenssdksavemedia"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3220">Office.Lens.LensSdk.SaveMedia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3220">Office.Lens.LensSdk.SaveMedia</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3221">Ovaj događaj je pozvan kada korisnik klikne na dugme Gotovo i sačuva slike na Android i iOS uređaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3221">This event is invoked when the user clicks on the done button and saves images on Android and iOS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3222">On olakšava merenje nivoa učešća korisnika kvanciranjem korisnika koji završe čuvanjem slika kroz našu aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3222">It helps measure the level of user engagement by quantifying users who end up saving images through our app.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3223">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja samo za Android:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3223">The following fields are collected on Android:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3224">**Data_FileSizeAfterCleanUp** veličine datoteke nakon čišćenja, da biste razumeli koliko se komprimovanja ostvarilo nakon čišćenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3224">**Data_FileSizeAfterCleanUp** - Size of the file after it is cleaned by app, to understand how much compression was achieved after cleanup.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3225">**Data_FileSizeAfterSave** veličine datoteke, kada je korisnik sačuva, da bi razumeo koliko se komprimovanja ostvarilo nakon čuvanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3225">**Data_FileSizeAfterSave** - Size of the file after it is saved by user, to understand how much compression was achieved after saving.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3226">**Data_FileSizeBeforeCleanUp** veličine datoteke pre nego što je očišćene, da biste razumeli koliko je zahvatljena veličina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3226">**Data_FileSizeBeforeCleanUp** - Size of the file before it is cleaned by app, to understand how much captured size was</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3227">**Data_Filter** – filter primenjen na sliku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3227">**Data_Filter** - The filter applied to the image.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3228">**Data_ImageHeightAfterCleanUp** visine slike nakon očišćene aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3228">**Data_ImageHeightAfterCleanUp** - Height of the image after it was cleaned by app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3229">**Data_ImageHeightBeforeCleanUp** – visina slike pre nego što ju je očistila aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3229">**Data_ImageHeightBeforeCleanUp** - Height of the image before it was cleaned by app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3230">**Data_ImageWidthAfterCleanUp** širinu slike pre nego što je oиistila aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3230">**Data_ImageWidthAfterCleanUp** - Width of the image before it was cleaned by app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3231">**Data_ImageWidthBeforeCleanUp** širinu slike pre nego što je oиistila aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3231">**Data_ImageWidthBeforeCleanUp** - Width of the image before it was cleaned by app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3232">**Data_MediaId** – identifikator za slike kako bi vam pomogao da pratite uspeh operacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3232">**Data_MediaId** - Identifier for images to help track operation success.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3233">**Data_ProcessMode** – režimu korisnika u vreme čuvanja slike od strane korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3233">**Data_ProcessMode** - Mode of the user at the time of the saving the image by the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3234">**Data_Source** – definiše mesto na kojem je slika napravljena od primera "kamera snimljena" pomoću fotoaparata, uvezene iz galerije itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3234">**Data_Source** - Defines where the image was sourced from, example captured via camera, imported from gallery, etc.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3235">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja samo za iOS:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3235">The following fields are collected on iOS:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3236">**Data_filter** – filter primenjen na sliku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3236">**Data_filter** - The filter applied to the image.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3237">**Data_imageDPI** – smanjenje slike koje je primenjeno na sliku sačuvane datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3237">**Data_imageDPI** - Image reduction applied to the saved file image</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3238">**Data_imageSize** veličine slike nakon što je korisnik saиuvao sliku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3238">**Data_imageSize** - Size of the image after user has saved the image</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3239">**Data_mediaId** – identifikator za slike kako bi vam pomogao da pratite uspeh operacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3239">**Data_mediaId** - Identifier for images to help track operation success.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3240">**Data_mode** – režimu korisnika u vreme čuvanja slike od strane korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3240">**Data_mode** - Mode of the user at the time of the saving the image by the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3241">**Data_sizeinPixel** veličine slike u obliku piksela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3241">**Data_sizeinPixel** - Size of the image in the form of pixel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3242">**Data_source** – definiše mesto na kojem je slika napravljena od primera "kamera snimljena" pomoću fotoaparata, uvezene iz galerije itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3242">**Data_source** - Defines where the image was sourced from, example captured via camera, imported from gallery, etc.</span></span> 


#### <a name="officelenslenssdkserviceidmapping"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3243">Office.Lens.LensSdk.ServiceIDMapping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3243">Office.Lens.LensSdk.ServiceIDMapping</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3244">Kada se slika uspešno otpremljena u uslugu, ovaj događaj se sakuplja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3244">When an image is uploaded successfully to the service, this event is collected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3245">On označava da će usluga sada pokrenuti jedan ili više poslova da obrađuje sliku i sadrži relevantne ID–ove da bi pomogao u rešavanju procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3245">It signifies that service will now run one or more jobs to process the image and contain relevant IDs to help troubleshoot the process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3246">On takođe pomaže u analizi upotrebe različitih funkcija usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3246">It also helps analyze the usage of different service features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3247">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3247">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3248">**CloudConnectorRequestId** –String koji identifikuje zahtev za uslugom koji je napravljen da konvertuje slike koristeći uslugu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3248">**CloudConnectorRequestId** - String that identifies the service request that was made to convert images via service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3249">**I2DserviceProcessID** –String koji identifikuje posao usluge koji koristi određenu subzahtev</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3249">**I2DserviceProcessID** - String that identifies the service job running a particular sub-request</span></span> 


#### <a name="officeiospaywallpaywallpresented"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3250">Office.iOS.Paywall.Paywall.Presented</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3250">Office.iOS.Paywall.Paywall.Presented</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3251">Ova kritična telemetrija korištenja se sakuplja kada se Paywall kontrola prikazuje korisniku i koristi se za razumevanje iskustva kupovine iz aplikacije i optimizaciju iste u budućim verzijama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3251">This critical usage telemetry is collected when Paywall control is shown to the user, and is used to understand the in-app purchase experience for the user and optimize the same for future versions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3252">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3252">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3253">**mesto unosa** – String – Dugme/Tok odakle je Paywall prikazan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3253">**entryPoint** - String – The Button/Flow from which Paywall was displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3254">Kao što je "Dugme za premijum nadogradnju" ili "Tok prvog pokretanja"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3254">Like “Premium Upgrade Button” or “First Run Flow”</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3255">**is FRE** – Bulov izraz – Da li pokazujemo Iskustvo prvog pokretanja ili običan korisnički interfejs?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3255">**isFRE** - Boolean – Are we showing the First Run Experience or regular UI?</span></span>

#### <a name="officeiospaywallpaywallstats"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3256">Office.iOS.Paywall.Paywall.Stats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3256">Office.iOS.Paywall.Paywall.Stats</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3257">Ovi metapodaci zasnovani na sesiji se sakupljaju kada se Paywall korisnički interfejs prikazuje korisniku, trajanju interakcije i tome da li je pokušana kupovina bila uspela ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3257">This session-based metadata is collected when the Paywall UI is shown to the user, the duration of the interaction and whether a purchase was attempted and succeeded or failed.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3258">Podaci se koriste za razumevanje upotrebe i ispravnosti celokupnog iskustva plaćanja i otklanjanje grešaka, optimizaciju i otklanjanje problema prilikom kupovine iz aplikacije u budućim verzijama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3258">The data is used to understand the usage and health of the entire payment experience and debug, optimize, and troubleshoot the in-app purchase experience in future versions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3259">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3259">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3260">**entryPoint** – niz – dugme/tok s kojeg je prikazan Paywall.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3260">**entryPoint** - String – The Button/Flow from which Paywall was displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3261">Kao što je "Dugme za premijum nadogradnju" ili "Tok prvog pokretanja".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3261">Like “Premium Upgrade Button” or “First Run Flow”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3262">**is FRE** – Bulov izraz – Da li pokazujemo Iskustvo prvog pokretanja ili običan korisnički interfejs?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3262">**isFRE** - Boolean – Are we showing the First Run Experience or regular UI?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3263">**status** – niska – Status izlaska Paywall-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3263">**status** - String – Exit status of Paywall.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3264">Kao što je “initiated”, “paymentDone”, “provisionFailed”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3264">Like “initiated”, “paymentDone”, “provisionFailed”</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3265">**Trajanje korisnika** – Duplo – Trajanje u milisekundama koje je korisnik potrošio na Paywall-u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3265">**userDuration** - Double – Duration in milliseconds the user spent on Paywall</span></span>


#### <a name="officeiospaywallprovisioningresponse"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3266">Office.iOS.Paywall.Provisioning.Response</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3266">Office.iOS.Paywall.Provisioning.Response</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3267">Kritična telemetrija inženjerstva sa uslugom Microsoft Retail Federation Service (RFS) za prikupljanje informacija obezbeđenih u ovom događaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3267">Critical engineering telemetry with Microsoft Retail Federation Service (RFS) to collect the information provided in this event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3268">RFS je interna usluga koja se u okviru korporacije Microsoft koristi za unakrsnu proveru kupovine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3268">RFS is the internal service used within Microsoft for crosschecking the purchase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3269">Podaci se koriste za dobijanje ispravnosti API poziva upućenog usluzi RFS, što bi pomoglo u razumevanju stope uspešnosti i otklanjanju grešaka u slučaju otkazivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3269">The data is used to get the health of the API call made to RFS which would help in understanding the success rate and debugging for any failures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3270">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3270">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3271">**entryPoint** – niska – Dugme/tok sa kojeg je prikazan Paywall.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3271">**entryPoint**- String – The Button/Flow from which Paywall was displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3272">Kao što je „Premium Upgrade Button“ ili „First run flow“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3272">Like “Premium Upgrade Button” or “First Run Flow”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3273">**failureReason** – niska – Dodaje se samo kada je status „neupeh“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3273">**failureReason**- String – Only added when status is “failure”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3274">Ukazuje na odgovor na grešku koji je dao RFS odgovor dodeljivanja privilegija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3274">Indicating the error response given by the RFS Provisioning response.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3275">**productId** – niska – ID proizvoda usluge App Store za koji je upućen zahtev</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3275">**productId**- String – App Store ID of the product the request was made for</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3276">**status** – niska – Uspeh ili Neuspeh, što upućuje na to je li zahtev uspeo ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3276">**status**- String – Success or Failure, indicating if the request succeeded or failed</span></span>


#### <a name="officeiospaywallskuchooserbuybuttontap"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3277">Office.iOS.Paywall.SKUChooser.BuyButtonTap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3277">Office.iOS.Paywall.SKUChooser.BuyButtonTap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3278">Kritična telemetrija upotrebe koja ukazuje na to kada korisnik dodirne dugme Kupi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3278">Critical usage telemetry that indicates when a user taps the Purchase/Buy Button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3279">Upotrebljava se za zaključivanje o načinu korišćenja i mernim podacima konverzije za korisnike koji pokušaju da kupe pretplatu u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3279">Used to infer the usage pattern and conversion metric for users who attempt to buy a subscription in the app.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3280">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3280">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3281">**entryPoint** – niska – Dugme/tok sa kojeg je prikazan Paywall.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3281">**entryPoint**- String – The Button/Flow from which Paywall was displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3282">Kao što je „Premium Upgrade Button“ ili „First run flow“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3282">Like “Premium Upgrade Button” or “First Run Flow”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3283">**isdefaultSKU** – Bulova vrednost – Ako korisnik kupuje proizvod, preporučili smo mu ga tako što smo ga podrazumevano prikazali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3283">**isDefaultSKU**- Bool – If the user is purchasing the product, we recommended for them, by displaying it by default.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3284">**productId** – niska – ID proizvoda usluge App-store za koji je dodirnuto dugme Kupi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3284">**productId** - String – App-store product-id of the product for which the Buy Button was tapped</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3285">**toggleCount** – Int – Koliko se puta korisnik prebacivao između prikazivanja različitih proizvoda pre nego što je dodirnuo dugme Kupi u trenutnoj sesiji u usluzi Paywall.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3285">**toggleCount**- Int – Number of times the user switched between viewing various products, before they tapped the Buy Button, in the current session of Paywall.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeiospaywallskuchoosermorebenefitsstats"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3286">Office.iOS.Paywall.SKUChooser.MoreBenefits.Stats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3286">Office.iOS.Paywall.SKUChooser.MoreBenefits.Stats</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3287">Ovaj događaj prikuplja funkcije i aplikacije koje korisnik razvija iz "Pogledajte dodatne pogodnosti" i trajanje potrošenog vremena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3287">This event collects the features and apps the user expands from “See More Benefits”, and the duration of time spent.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3288">Podaci se koriste da se razume upotreba funkcije "Pogledajte sve pogodnosti" i dodatno optimizujete iskustvo u budućim verzijama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3288">The data is used to understand usage of the “See all benefits” feature and further optimize the experience in future versions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3289">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3289">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3290">**Proširene aplikacije** – Niska – Usluge/aplikacije, razdvojene zarezima, za koje su razvijene pogodnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3290">**appsExpanded** - String - Comma-separated list of services/apps for which the benefits were expanded.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3291">**ID proizvoda** – Niska – ID proizvoda u App Store za koji korisnik prikazuje više ponuđenih pogodnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3291">**productId** - String - App Store ID of the product for which user is viewing more benefits offered</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3292">**Trajanje korisnika** – Duplo – Trajanje u milisekundama koje je korisnik proveo na ekranu „Pogodnosti“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3292">**userDuration** - Double - Duration in milliseconds the user spent on the Benefits Screen.</span></span>


### <a name="officeiospaywallskuchooserproductswitched"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3293">Office.iOS.Paywall.SKUChooser.ProductSwitched</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3293">Office.iOS.Paywall.SKUChooser.ProductSwitched</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3294">Telemetrija upotrebe koja prikazuje koliko puta se korisnik prebacuje između različitih SKU-ova pre pokušaja kupovine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3294">Usage telemetry to show how many times a user switches between different SKUs before attempting a purchase.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3295">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3295">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3296">**productId** – niska – ID proizvoda usluge App Store na čije prikazivanje se korisnik upravo prebacio sa dostupnih proizvoda u SKU biraču.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3296">**productId**- String – App Store ID of the product the user just switched to viewing from the available products on the SKU chooser.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeiospaywallskuchooserstats"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3297">Office.iOS.Paywall.SKUChooser.Stats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3297">Office.iOS.Paywall.SKUChooser.Stats</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3298">Ova telemetrija korišćenja se prikuplja da bi se videlo kako je korisnik ušao u birač SKU, koliko vremena korisnik provodi na ekranu birača SKU i zašto je izašao iz birača SKU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3298">This usage telemetry is collected to see how the user entered the SKU Chooser, how much time the user spends on the SKU Chooser screen and why they exited the SKU Chooser.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3299">Podaci se koriste za razumevanje upotrebe birača SKU-a i optimizaciju iskustva kupovine iz aplikacije u budućim verzijama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3299">The data is used to understand usage of the SKU chooser and optimize the in-app purchase experience in future versions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3300">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3300">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3301">**entryPoint** – niz – dugme/tok s kojeg je prikazan Paywall.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3301">**entryPoint** - String – The Button/Flow from which Paywall was displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3302">Kao što je "Dugme za premijum nadogradnju" ili "Tok prvog pokretanja".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3302">Like “Premium Upgrade Button” or “First Run Flow”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3303">**Razlog napuštanja** – String – Razlog za izlaz iz birača SKU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3303">**exitReason** - String – Exit reason of SKU Chooser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3304">Kao što je “BuyButton”, “CloseButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3304">Like “BuyButton”, “CloseButton</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3305">**is FRE** – Bulov izraz – Da li pokazujemo Iskustvo prvog pokretanja ili običan korisnički interfejs?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3305">**isFRE** - Boolean – Are we showing the First Run Experience or regular UI?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3306">**Trajanje korisnika** – Duplo – Trajanje u milisekundama koje je korisnik proveo na SKU biraču</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3306">**userDuration** - Double – Duration in milliseconds the user spent on the SKU chooser</span></span>


#### <a name="officelivepersonacardconfigurationsetaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3307">Office.LivePersonaCard.ConfigurationSetAction</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3307">Office.LivePersonaCard.ConfigurationSetAction</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3308">Prijavljujemo se kada je korisnik u aplikaciji koja učitava karticu „Personalnost“ u očekivanju da korisnik otvori aktivnu karticu „Personalnost“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3308">We log when the user is in an app that loads a Persona Card in anticipation of the user opening the Live Persona Card.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3309">Podaci se koriste za utvrđivanje da li je vizitkarta ispravno ispunjena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3309">The data is used to determine whether the card loaded correctly.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3310">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3310">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3311">**Data.accountType** – Da li korisnik pripada organizaciji ili potrošaču</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3311">**Data.accountType** - Whether the user belongs to an organization or a consumer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3312">**Data.appContextId** – Slučajno generisani ID koji se koristi za identifikovanje različitih naloga u istoj aplikaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3312">**Data.appContextId** - A randomly generated ID used to identify different accounts in the same app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3313">**Data.AppInfo.Name** - Naziv usluge koja se koristi (Kartica profila)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3313">**Data.AppInfo.Name** - Name of the service in use (Profile card)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3314">**Data.AppInfo_Id** - Ime host aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3314">**Data.AppInfo_Id** - Name of the host application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3315">**Data.AppInfo_Version** - Verzija host aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3315">**Data.AppInfo_Version** - Version of the host application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3316">**Data.cardCorrelationId** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za Karticu „Personalnost“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3316">**Data.cardCorrelationId** - The globally unique identifier for a persona card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3317">**Data.cardPersonaCorrelationId** – Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za određenu personalnost prikazanu na kartici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3317">**Data.cardPersonaCorrelationId** - The globally unique identifier for a specific persona shown in a card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3318">**SessionCorrelationId** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za sesiju aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3318">**Data.clientCorrelationId** - The globally unique identifier for the app's session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3319">**Data.clientType** – Tip uređaja na kom se pokreće aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3319">**Data.clientType** - The type of device the app is run on</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3320">**Data.contextType** – Iz kog konteksta (aplikacije) je pokrenuta kartica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3320">**Data.contextType** - What context (app) the card was launched from</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3321">**Data.ecsConfigIds** – Identifikatori verzije za funkcije omogućene na kartici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3321">**Data.ecsConfigIds** - Version identifiers for the features enabled in the card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3322">**Data.ecsTagId** – ID oznake za funkcije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3322">**Data.ecsTagId** - Tag ID for features</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3323">**Data.eventId** – Identifikator imena događaja, npr. "LivePersonaCardRenderedAction"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3323">**Data.eventId** - Name identifier of the event, for example "LivePersonaCardRenderedAction"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3324">**Data.eventpriority** - Vrednost nabrajanja za prioritet slanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3324">**Data.eventpriority** - An enumeration value for the priority of sending the event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3325">**Data.feature** - Koristi se za grupisanje različitih događaja iste funkcije (Kartica profila)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3325">**Data.feature** - Used to group various events of the same feature (Profile card)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3326">**Data.flights** – Funkcije omogućene na kartici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3326">**Data.flights** - The features enabled in the card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3327">**Data.fromCache** – Da li su podaci dobavljeni iz memorije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3327">**Data.fromCache** - Whether data was fetched from memory</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3328">**Data.hasFinePointer** – Da li uređaj ima mogućnost pokazivača miša</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3328">**Data.hasFinePointer** - Whether the device has mouse-pointer capability</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3329">**Data.hasHoverEvents** – Da li uređaj ima mogućnost zadržavanja pokazivača miša</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3329">**Data.hasHoverEvents** - Whether the device has mouse-hover capability</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3330">**Data.immersiveProfileCorrelationId** – Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za sesiju prikaza proširenog profila</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3330">**Data.immersiveProfileCorrelationId** - A globally unique identifier for the expanded profile view session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3331">**Data.offlineResolved** – Da li su podaci dobavljeni tokom rada van mreže</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3331">**Data.offlineResolved** - Whether data was fetched while offline</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3332">**Data.OTelJS.Version** – Verzija OTel sistema za evidenciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3332">**Data.OTelJS.Version** - Version of OTel logger</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3333">**Data.personaCorrelationId** – Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za jedinstvene personalnosti u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3333">**Data.personaCorrelationId** - A globally unique identifier for unique personas in a session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3334">**Data.properties** – Dodatni metapodaci prikupljeni za svaki događaj na sledeći način: *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih izdanja sistema Office, ali može se i dalje pojaviti u starijim izdanjima.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3334">**Data.properties** - Additional metadata collected for each event as follows: *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3335">**cardCorrelationId** - Duplikat gore navedenog Data.appContextId</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3335">**cardCorrelationId** - Duplicate of Data.appContextId above</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3336">**cardPersonaCorrelationId** - Duplikat gore navedenog Data.cardCorrelationId</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3336">**cardPersonaCorrelationId** - Duplicate of Data.cardCorrelationId above</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3337">**ClientTimeStamp** - Vreme u aplikaciji kada se evidentira događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3337">**ClientTimeStamp** - Time on the application when the event was logged</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3338">**consumerCorrelationId** - Duplikat gore navedenog Data.clientCorrelationId</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3338">**consumerCorrelationId** - Duplicate of Data.clientCorrelationId above</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3339">**externalAppSessionCorrelationId** – Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za aplikaciju za identifikovanje svih Kartica „Personalnost“ otvorenih u istoj podsesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3339">**externalAppSessionCorrelationId** - A globally unique identifier for the app to identify all persona cards opened in the same sub-session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3340">**Data.region** – Geografska oblast pozadinska usluga kartice profila na koji se korisnik povezuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3340">**Data.region** -The geographical region of the profile card backend service to which user is connected</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3341">**Data.tenantAadObjectId** – Zakupac sa kojim je pretplata korisnika povezana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3341">**Data.tenantAadObjectId** - The tenant to which a user's subscription is tied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3342">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo probleme i otkrijemo da li je problem široko rasprostranjen ili je ograničen na skup korisnika ili određenog zakupca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3342">Allows us to classify issues and identify whether a problem is widespread or isolated to a set of users or a specific tenant</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3343">**Data.type** – Tip evidentiranih događaja, npr. praćenje, greška, događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3343">**Data.type** -Type of the logged event, for example, Trace, Error, Event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3344">**Data.userAadObjectId** – Globalni jedinstveni identifikator korisnika za Enterprise Microsoft nalog (duplikat broja Data.UserInfo.Id)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3344">**Data.userAadObjectId** -The globally unique user identifier for an enterprise Microsoft account (duplicate of Data.UserInfo.Id)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3345">**Data.UserInfo.Id** – Globalni jedinstveni identifikator korisnika za Enterprise Microsoft nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3345">**Data.UserInfo.Id** - The globally unique user identifier for an enterprise Microsoft account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3347">**Data.UserInfo.OMSTenantId** – Zakupac sa kojim je povezana pretplata korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3347">**Data.UserInfo.OMSTenantId** - The tenant that a user's subscription is tied to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3348">Omogućava nam da klasifikujemo probleme i otkrijemo da li je problem široko rasprostranjen ili je ograničen na skup korisnika ili određenog zakupca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3348">Allows us to classify issues and identify whether a problem is widespread or isolated to a set of users or a specific tenant</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3349">**Data.userPuid** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator korisnika za Microsoft nalog (duplikat od Data.UserInfo.MsaId)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3349">**Data.userPuid** - The globally unique user identifier for a consumer Microsoft account (duplicate of Data.UserInfo.MsaId)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3350">**Data.version** - Verzija usluge (Kartica profila)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3350">**Data.version** - The version of the service (Profile Card)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3351">**Data.workloadCulture** - Kultura postavljena u host aplikaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3351">**Data.workloadCulture** - Culture set in the host application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3365">**Data.AppInfo.Name** - Ime upotrebljene usluge (Kartica profila)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3365">**Data.AppInfo.Name** - Name of the service in use (Profile card)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3366">**Data.cardCorrelationId** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za Karticu „Personalnost“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3366">**Data.cardCorrelationId** - The globally unique identifier for a persona card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3367">**Data.cardPersonaCorrelationId** – Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za određenu personalnost prikazanu na kartici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3367">**Data.cardPersonaCorrelationId** - The globally unique identifier for a specific persona shown in a card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3368">**SessionCorrelationId** - Globalni jedinstveni identifikator za sesiju aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3368">**Data.clientCorrelationId** - The globally unique identifier for the app's session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3369">**Data.clientType** – Tip uređaja na kom se pokreće aplikacija, npr. „Outlook_Win32“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3369">**Data.clientType** - The type of device the app is run on, for example “Outlook_Win32”</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3530">Telemetrija koja je ključna za praćenje neuspeha\\uspeha za proveru valjanosti dobavljanja smernica za oblak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3530">Critical telemetry to track failure\\success for cloud policy fetch precheck validation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3531">RazlogIzlaska sadrži mapu brojača do uslova predprovere koji nije bio ispunjen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3531">ExitReason contains an enumerator map to the pre-check condition that failed.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeofficemobilepdfviewerpdffileopenmeasurements"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3541">Office.OfficeMobile.PdfViewer.PdfFileOpenMeasurements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3541">Office.OfficeMobile.PdfViewer.PdfFileOpenMeasurements</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3542">Ovaj događaj se prikuplja za Office aplikaciju za iOS i beleži kada se izvršava operacija otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3542">This event is collected for the Office app for iOS, it records when a file open operation takes place.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3543">Prikupili smo ove podatke da bismo obezbedili dobar učinak za svako otvaranje datoteke u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3543">We collect this data to ensure good performance for all file opens on the app.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3544">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3544">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3545">**Data_Doc_ActivationFQDN** – Ime domena aplikacije dobavljača za scenario aktiviranja datoteke (beleže se samo informacije o aplikaciji 1. strane).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3545">**Data_Doc_ActivationFQDN** - Domain name of the Provider app for a file activation scenario (only first party app info is being logged).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3546">**Data_Doc_CreateTelemetryReason** – telemetrijski razlog za kreiranje PDF datoteke. (npr: kreiranje iz skeniranja pomoću radnje „slika u PDF“, radnje „dokument u PDF“ itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3546">**Data_Doc_CreateTelemetryReason** – Telemetry reason for PDF creation.(for example: Create from scan, using “picture to pdf” action, using “document to pdf” action, etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3547">**Data_Doc_DownloadDurationms** – Vreme za preuzimanje PDF datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3547">**Data_Doc_DownloadDurationms** - Time to download a PDF cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3548">**Data_Doc_DownloadEndTime** – Vremenska oznaka zaustavljanja preuzimanja datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3548">**Data_Doc_DownloadEndTime** - Timestamp for end of download of a cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3549">**Data_Doc_DownloadStartTime** – Vremenska oznaka početka preuzimanja datoteke u oblaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3549">**Data_Doc_DownloadStartTime** – Timestamp for start of download of a cloud file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3550">**Data_Doc_FileOpSessionID** – Jedinstveni ID za sesiju dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3550">**Data_Doc_FileOpSessionID** - Unique ID for a Document Session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3551">**Data_Doc_Location** – Lokacija gde se datoteka nalazi (lokalno, ODSP, iCloud, aplikacija datoteka treće strane, wopi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3551">**Data_Doc_Location** - Location where the file sits (Local, ODSP, iCloud, third-party files app, wopi</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3552">**Data_Doc_OpenCompletionTime** – Vremenska oznaka zaustavljanja operacije otvaranja PDF datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3552">**Data_Doc_OpenCompletionTime** - Timestamp for end of open operation of a PDF file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3553">**Data_Doc_OpenDurationms** – Vreme otvaranja PDF datoteke u milisekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3553">**Data_Doc_OpenDurationms** - Time to open a PDF file in milliseconds.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3554">**Data_Doc_OpenDurationms** – Vremenska oznaka zaustavljanja operacije otvaranja PDF datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3554">**Data_Doc_OpenStartTime** - Timestamp for start of open operation of a PDF file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3555">**Data_Doc_TelemetryReason** – Telemetrijski razlog za otvaranje događaja (npr. otvorite iz MRU ili pregledajte, aktivacija datoteke, aktivacija protokola itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3555">**Data_Doc_TelemetryReason** - Telemetry reason for the open event (for example: open from MRU or browse, File Activation, Protocol Activation, etc.).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3556">**Doc_RenderDurationms** – Vreme za prikazivanje PDF datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3556">**Doc_RenderDurationms** - Time to render a pdf file</span></span>


#### <a name="officeofficemobilepdfviewerpdffileoperations-on-android"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3557">Office.OfficeMobile.PdfViewer.PdfFileOperations (na Android uređaju)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3557">Office.OfficeMobile.PdfViewer.PdfFileOperations (on Android)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3558">Događaj se prikuplja za Office aplikaciju za Android.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3558">The event is collected for the Office app for Android.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3559">On snima kad se izvršava operacija otvaranja, zatvaranja ili čuvanja pdf-a i koristi se za razumevanje korisnika i određivanje prioriteta korisničkog iskustva na osnovu informacija o operaciji pdf datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3559">It records when a .pdf open, close, or save operation takes place and is used to understand and prioritize the user experience based on .pdf file operation information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3560">Događaj nam omogućava da operacije otvaranja, zatvaranja i čuvanja pdf–a rade na očekivani način, kao i da se poboljšaju performanse operacija pdf datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3560">The event enables us to keep the .pdf open, close, and save operations performing as expected, and to improve .pdf file operation performance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3561">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3561">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3562">**Data_Doc_FileOpSessionID** – Jedinstveni ID za sesiju dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3562">**Data_Doc_FileOpSessionID** - Unique ID for a Document Session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3563">**Data_ErrorCode** – greška u slučaju neuspelih otvaranja datoteka/neuspelih preuzimanja / otkazanih preuzimanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3563">**Data_ErrorCode** - error in case of file open failures/download failures / download canceled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3564">**Data_ErrorMessage** – relevantan kôd poruke-do-greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3564">**Data_ErrorMessage** - relevant message-to-error code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3565">**Data_FailureReason** – U slučaju neuspešnog otvaranja, ovi enums definišu razlog neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3565">**Data_FailureReason** - In case of open failure, these enums define the reason for failure.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3566">**Data_FileGUID** – globalni identifikator datoteke koja se generiše nasumično</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3566">**Data_FileGUID** – Global identifier for the file, which is randomly generated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3567">**Data_FileLocation** – Lokacija na kojoj se nalazi datoteka, npr. Lokalna, ODSP, iCloud itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3567">**Data_FileLocation** - Location where the file sits, ex: Local, ODSP, iCloud, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3568">**Data_FileOpenEntryPoint Ulazna tačka** – ulazna tačka za otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3568">**Data_FileOpenEntryPoint** - entry point for file open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3569">**Data_FileSize** – Veličina datoteke na kojoj se odvija operacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3569">**Data_FileSize** - Size of the file on which the operation is happening</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3570">**Data_NetworkRequestErrorResponse** – odgovor greške na mreži koja odgovara kôdu greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3570">**Data_NetworkRequestErrorResponse** – Network Error response corresponding to error code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3571">**Data_NetworkRequestStage** – faza greške u slučaju preuzimanja pdf datoteke iz oblaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3571">**Data_NetworkRequestStage** – Error stage in case of cloud pdf file download.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3572">**Data_OpenMode** – U kojem režimu je PDF otvoren, npr. 0: Režim prikaza, 2: Režim potpisivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3572">**Data_OpenMode** - In which mode the PDF was opened, ex: 0: View mode, 2: Sign mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3573">**Data_PageCount** – Prebrojavanje stranica u PDF datoteci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3573">**Data_PageCount** - Count of page in the PDF File.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3574">**Data_PasswordProtected** – Obeleživač koji nam pokazuje da li je datoteka zaštićena lozinkom ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3574">**Data_PasswordProtected** - Marker that tells whether the file is password protected or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3575">**Data_ProviderApp** – trenutno obezbeđena aplikacija dobavljača samo u slučaju aktiviranja datoteka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3575">**Data_ProviderApp** - currently providing provider app in case of file activation only</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3576">**Data_ReadOnly** – Obeleživač koji govori da li je datoteka samo za čitanje ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3576">**Data_ReadOnly** - Marker that tells whether the file is read only or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3577">**Data_Result** – Status operacije koja se izvršava, npr. true:uspeh, false:neuspeh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3577">**Data_Result** - The status of the operation being performed, ex: true:success, false:failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3578">**Data_Type** – Tip operacije datoteke (otvaranje, zatvaranje ili čuvanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3578">**Data_Type** - Type of file operation (open, close, or save)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3602">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3602">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3603">**IS_SPANNED** – Označava da li je aplikacija u raširenom režimu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3603">**IS_SPANNED** - Indicates whether the app is in a spanned mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3604">Ovo se konkretno evidentira za uređaje koji se mogu preklopiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3604">This is specifically logged for foldable devices.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3606">**OLD_STATE** – Označava državu aplikacije neposredno pre navigacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3606">**OLD_STATE** - Indicates the applications' state right before the navigation</span></span>

#### <a name="officeonenoteandroidstickynotesnotecreated"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3638">Office.OneNote.Android.StickyNotes.NoteCreated</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3638">Office.OneNote.Android.StickyNotes.NoteCreated</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3639">Kritičan signal koji se koristi da prati da li korisnici Lepljivih beležaka mogu da kreiraju beleške u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3639">Critical signal that is used to monitor the ability of Sticky Notes users to create notes in the app.</span></span>   <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3640">Telemetrija se koristi za obezbeđivanje otkrivanja kritične regresivne OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3640">Telemetry is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3641">Ako korisnici ne mogu da naprave belešku, to bi izazvalo incident krajnje ozbiljnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3641">If users can’t create a note, this would trigger a high severity incident.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3642">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3642">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3645">**NoteLocalId** – Jedinstveni identifikator koji se jasno razlikuje od drugih dodeljuje se belešci kada korisnik kreira belešku unutar aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3645">**NoteLocalId** - Distinguishable unique identifier assigned to a note at the time of a user creates the note within the app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3646">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Broj verzije koji označava verziju aplikacije Lepljive beleške koje korisnik koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3646">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Version number indicating the version of Sticky Notes the user is using.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3647">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koje verzije proizvoda ispoljavaju problem tako da možemo ispravno da damo prioritet rešavanju tog problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3647">Allows us to identify which versions of the product are showing an issue so that we can correctly prioritize it.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3657">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Broj verzije koji označava verziju aplikacije Lepljive beleške koje korisnik koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3657">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Version number indicating the version of Sticky Notes the user is using.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3658">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koje verzije proizvoda ispoljavaju problem tako da možemo ispravno da damo prioritet rešavanju tog problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3658">Allows us to identify which versions of the product are showing an issue so that we can correctly prioritize it.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeonenotesearchsearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3724">Office.OneNote.Search.Search</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3724">Office.OneNote.Search.Search</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3725">ID kritične identifikacije koje se koristi za nadgledanje mogućnosti programa OneNote korisnika za pronalaženje informacija na hiljade stranica i beležnica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3725">Critical signal ID used to monitor the ability of OneNote users to find information across thousands of pages and notebooks.</span></span>   <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3726">Telemetrija koja se koristi za obezbeđivanje kritične regresivne ispravnosti za OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3726">Telemetry used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3727">Ako korisnici ne mogu da pronađu informacije u beležnicama, to bi izazvalo ozbiljan incident.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3727">If users can't find information across notebooks this would trigger a high severity incident.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3728">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3728">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3729">**PageSearchResultCount** – označava broj rezultata pretrage pronađenih u režimu pretrage stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3729">**PageSearchResultCount** - Indicates the number of search's results found in a page search mode.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3730">**PageTimeToFirstResultInMs** – označava vreme koje potrebno da bi OneNote pronašao prvo podudaranje u režimu pretrage stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3730">**PageTimeToFirstResultInMs** - Indicates the amount of time OneNote takes to find the first match in a page search mode.</span></span>
    
-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3731">**PageTimeToLastResultInMs** – označava vreme koje potrebno da bi OneNote pronašao poslednje podudaranje u režimu pretrage stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3731">**PageTimeToLastResultInMs** - Indicates the amount of time OneNote takes to find the last match in a page search mode.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3732">**PageTimeToMedianResultInMs** – označava srednji vremenski period koji je potreban da bi OneNote pronašao sva podudaranja u režimu pretrage stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3732">**PageTimeToMedianResultInMs** - Indicates the median of time OneNote takes to find all matches in a page search mode.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3733">**SearchResultCount** – označava broj pronađenih rezultata pretrage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3733">**SearchResultCount** - Indicates the number of search's results found.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3734">**TagSearchResultCount** – označava broj rezultata pretrage pronađenih u režimu pretrage stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3734">**TagSearchResultCount** - Indicates the number of search's results found in a tag search mode.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3735">**TagTimeToFirstResultInMs** – označava vreme koje potrebno da bi OneNote pronašao prvo podudaranje u režimu pretrage stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3735">**TagTimeToFirstResultInMs** - Indicates the amount of time OneNote takes to find the first match in a tag search mode.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3736">**TagTimeToLastResultInMs** – označava vreme koje potrebno da bi OneNote pronašao poslednje podudaranje u režimu pretrage stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3736">**TagTimeToLastResultInMs** - Indicates the amount of time OneNote takes to find the last match in a tag search mode.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3737">**TagTimeToMedianResultInMs** – označava vreme koje potrebno da bi OneNote pronašao poslednje podudaranje u režimu pretrage oznaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3737">**TagTimeToMedianResultInMs** - Indicates the median of time OneNote takes to find all matches in a tag search mode.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3738">**TimeToFirstResultInMs** – označava vreme koje potrebno da bi OneNote pronašao prvo podudaranje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3738">**TimeToFirstResultInMs** - Indicates the amount of time OneNote takes to find the first match.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3739">**TimeToLastResultInMs** – označava vreme koje potrebno da bi OneNote pronašao poslednje podudaranje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3739">**TimeToLastResultInMs** - Indicates the amount of time OneNote takes to find the last match.</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3740">**TimeToMedianResultInMs** – označava vreme koje potrebno da bi OneNote pronašao sva podudaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3740">**TimeToMedianResultInMs** - Indicates the median of time OneNote takes to find all matches.</span></span>

### <a name="officeonenotesigscriticalerrorencountered"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3741">Office.OneNote.SIGS.CriticalErrorEncountered</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3741">Office.OneNote.SIGS.CriticalErrorEncountered</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3742">Ovim događajem se beleži ključni signal koji se koristi za nadziranje stanja usluge Signal Ingestion Service (SIG) evidentiranjem svake kritične pogreške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3742">This event captures a critical signal that is used to monitor the health of Signal Ingestion Service (SIGS), by logging whenever a critical error is encountered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3743">Kritične greške mogu da blokiraju ceo SIGS, a to će nam pomoći da vidimo svaki takav problem čim korisnici na njih naiđu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3743">Critical errors can block the whole of SIGS, and this will help us catch any such issues as soon as they are encountered by users.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3744">Bez toga zavisimo od toga da korisnici prijavljuju probleme koje imaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3744">Without this, we will be dependent on users to report the problems they are facing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3745">Odsutnost takve telemetrije mogla bi znatno povećati vreme rešavanja takvih problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3745">Absence of such telemetry would make the turnaround time for such issues much higher.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3746">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3746">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3747">**ErrorCode** – kôd problema na koji je naišao korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3747">**ErrorCode** - The code of the issue that was hit by the user.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeonenotestickynotesnotecreated-on-ios-onenotestickynotesnotecreated-on-android"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3748">Office.OneNote.StickyNotes.NoteCreated (on iOS), OneNote.StickyNotes.NoteCreated (on Android)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3748">Office.OneNote.StickyNotes.NoteCreated (on iOS), OneNote.StickyNotes.NoteCreated (on Android)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3752">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3752">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3754">**IsExportable** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da li je ovaj događaj bio rezultat delovanja korisnika ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3754">**IsExportable** - A flag indicating whether this event was a result of a user action or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3755">Treba da bude postavljeno na vrednost "ispravno" pošto je NoteCreated radnja koju aktivira korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3755">Should be set to True as NoteCreated is a user-triggered action.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3756">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Broj verzije koji označava verziju aplikacije Lepljive beleške koje korisnik koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3756">**StickyNotes-SDKVersion** - Version number indicating the version of Sticky Notes the user is using.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3757">Omogućava nam da utvrdimo koje verzije proizvoda ispoljavaju problem tako da možemo ispravno da damo prioritet rešavanju tog problema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3757">Allows us to identify which versions of the product are showing an issue so that we can correctly prioritize it.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeonenotestoragenotebooksyncresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3769">Office.OneNote.Storage.NotebookSyncResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3769">Office.OneNote.Storage.NotebookSyncResult</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3770">Ovaj događaj evidentira rezultat sinhronizacije beležnice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3770">This event logs notebook sync result.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3771">Koristi se za otkrivanje broja jedinstvenih ciljeva sinhronizacije kada se izračunava rezultat sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3771">It is used for figuring out how many unique sync targets when calculating OneNote sync score.</span></span>
