- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3773">**CachedError_Code** – numerisani ili alfanumerički kod koji se koristi za određivanje prirode keširane greške i/ili zašto se ona dogodila</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3773">**CachedError_Code** - a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of the cached error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3774">**CachedError_Description** –opis keširane greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3774">**CachedError_Description** -a description of the cached error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3775">**CachedError_Tag** – ukazuje na to gde u kodu se javlja keširana greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3775">**CachedError_Tag** -indicate where in the code throws the cached error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3776">**CachedError_Type** – tip keširane greške, npr. Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3776">**CachedError_Type** -the type of the cached error, for example, Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3777">**ExecutionTime** - vreme u milisekundama potrebno za kopiranje beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3777">**ExecutionTime** -time in milliseconds taken to replicate the notebook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3778">**Gosid** -globalni ID prostora objekta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3778">**Gosid** -global object space ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3779">**IdentityType** –tip identiteta, npr. Windows Live, org ID itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3779">**IdentityType** -identity type, for example, Windows Live, Org ID, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3780">**InitialReplicationInSession** – da li je ovo replikacija prve beležnice nakon otvaranja ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3780">**InitialReplicationInSession** -is this replication the first notebook replication after open or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3781">**IsBackgroundSync** – da li je ovo sinhronizacija pozadine ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3781">**IsBackgroundSync** -is this a background sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3782">**IsCachedErrorSuppressed** -da li je keširana greška potisnuta ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3782">**IsCachedErrorSuppressed** -is the cached error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3783">**IsCachedErrorUnexpected** - da li je keširana greška neočekivana ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3783">**IsCachedErrorUnexpected** -is the cached error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3784">**IsNotebookErrorSuppressed** -da li je greška sinhronizacije beležnice potisnuta ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3784">**IsNotebookErrorSuppressed** -is the notebook level sync error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3785">**IsNotebookErrorUnexpected**- da li je greška sinhronizacije beležnice neočekivana ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3785">**IsNotebookErrorUnexpected** -is the notebook level sync error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3786">**IsSectionErrorSuppressed** - da li je greška sinhronizacije odeljka potisnuta ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3786">**IsSectionErrorSuppressed** -is the section sync error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3787">**IsSectionErrorUnexpected** – da li je greška sinhronizacije odeljka neočekivana ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3787">**IsSectionErrorUnexpected** -is the section sync error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3788">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** – da li sinhronizacija beležnice koristi modernu sinhronizaciju sadržaja stranice ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3788">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** -is the notebook sync using modern page content sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3789">**LastAttemptedSync** -vremenska oznaka kada je beležnica pokušavala da se sinhronizuje poslednji put</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3789">**LastAttemptedSync** -timestamp when the notebook was attempted to be synced last time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3790">**LastBackgroundSync** -vremenska oznaka kada je poslednji put pokušana sinhronizacija najnovijih pozadina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3790">**LastBackgroundSync** -timestamp when the latest background sync was attempted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3791">**LastNotebookViewedDate** – datum kada je beležnica poslednji put prikazana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3791">**LastNotebookViewedDate** -the date when the notebook was last viewed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3792">**LastSuccessfulSync** – vremenska oznaka kada je beležnica uspešno sinhronizovana ranije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3792">**LastSuccessfulSync** -timestamp when the notebook successfully synced before</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3793">**NeedToRestartBecauseOfInconsistencies** -da li se sinhronizacija mora ponovo pokrenuti zbog nedoslednosti ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3793">**NeedToRestartBecauseOfInconsistencies** -does the sync need to restart because of inconsistencies or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3794">**NotebookErrorCode** – kôd greške sinhronizovanja nivoa beležnice sačuvan na prostoru za grafiku beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3794">**NotebookErrorCode** -notebook level sync error code saved on notebook graph space</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3795">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3795">**NotebookId** -notebook ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3796">**NotebookType** -tip beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3796">**NotebookType** -notebook type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3797">**ReplicatingAgainBecauseOfInconsistencies**-da li se sinhronizacija ponovo pokreće zbog nedoslednosti ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3797">**ReplicatingAgainBecauseOfInconsistencies** -does the sync restart because of inconsistencies or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3798">**SectionError_Code** – numerisani ili alfanumerički kod koji se koristi za određivanje prirode greške u sinhronizaciji odeljka i/ili zašto se ona dogodila</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3798">**SectionError_Code** -a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of the section sync error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3799">**SectionError_Description** –opis greške sinhronizacije odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3799">**SectionError_Description** -a description of the section sync error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3800">**SectionError_Tag** – ukazuje na to gde u kodu se javlja greška sinhronizacije odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3800">**SectionError_Tag** -indicate where in the code throws the section sync error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3801">**SectionError_Type** – tip greške sinhronizacije odeljka, npr. Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3801">**SectionError_Type** -the type of the section sync error, for example, Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3802">**Success** – da li je beležnica uspešno sinhronizovana ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3802">**Success** -is the notebook sync successful or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3803">**SyncDestinationType** –tip odredišnog sinhronizovanja, npr. OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3803">**SyncDestinationType** -sync destination type, that is, OneDrive or SharePoint Online</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3804">**SyncId** – broj jedinstven za svaku sinhronizaciju beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3804">**SyncId** -a number unique to each notebook sync</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3805">**SyncWasFirstInSession** –da li je ova sinhronizacija prva sinhronizacija u trenutnoj sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3805">**SyncWasFirstInSession** -is this sync the first sync in current session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3806">**SyncWasUserInitiated** -da li je ovu sinhronizaciju pokrenuo korisnik ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3806">**SyncWasUserInitiated** -is this sync user initiated or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3807">**TenantId** – ID SharePoint zakupca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3807">**TenantId** -SharePoint tenant ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3808">**TimeSinceLastAttemptedSync**- vreme od poslednjeg pokušaja sinhronizacije beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3808">**TimeSinceLastAttemptedSync** -time since last notebook sync attempt</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3809">**TimeSinceLastSuccessfulSync** - vreme od poslednje uspešne sinhronizacije beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3809">**TimeSinceLastSuccessfulSync** -time since last successful notebook sync</span></span>


#### <a name="officeonenotesystemapplifecycleapplaunch"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3810">Office.OneNote.System.AppLifeCycle.AppLaunch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3810">Office.OneNote.System.AppLifeCycle.AppLaunch</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3811">Kritični signal koji se koristi da bi se osiguralo da korisnici usluge OneNote mogu uspešno pokrenuti aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3811">The critical signal used to ensure OneNote users can successfully launch the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3812">Telemetrija se koristi za obezbeđivanje kritične regresivne ispravnosti za OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3812">The telemetry is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3813">Ako korisnici ne mogu da pokrenu aplikaciju u prozoru performansi, to bi izazvalo incident velike ozbiljnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3813">If users can't launch the app in our performance window, this would trigger a high severity incident.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3820">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3820">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3821">**RezultatKreiranjaNaloga** – Rezultat (uspeh, neuspeh, otkazivanje, itd.) dodavanja naloga u Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3821">**AccountCreationResult** – The result (success, failure, cancellation, etc.) of adding the account to Outlook.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3822">**VremeKreiranjaNaloga** – proteklo vreme pri pokušaju kreiranja naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3822">**AccountCreationTime** – time taken to attempt account creation</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3823">**IzborPodatakaNaloga** – izvor postavki za nalog (npr. automatsko otkrivanje, GuessSmart, automatsko otkrivanje itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3823">**AccountInfoSource** - account settings source (for example, AutoDiscover, GuessSmart, AutoDetect, etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3824">**TipNaloga** – Tip naloga koji se konfiguriše.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3824">**AccountType** – The type of account being configured.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3825">**HeširanaAdresaEpošte** – heširana adresa e-pošte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3825">**HashedEmailAddress** – hashed email address</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3826">**ShowPasswordPageFlightEnabled** -indikator koji pokazuje da li je ShowPopImapPasswordPage let omogućen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3826">**ShowPasswordPageFlightEnabled** - indicator if ShowPopImapPasswordPage flight is enabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3834">**TipNaloga** - tip naloga za koji je pokušana popravka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3834">**AccountType** - type of account for which account repair was attempted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3835">**HashedEmailAddress** – heširana adresa e-pošte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3835">**HashedEmailAddress** - hashed email address</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3836">**ZahtevZaRučnuPopravku** - indikator koji označava da li je postoji zahtev za ručno popravljanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3836">**ManualRepairRequested** - indicator if manual repair was requested</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3837">**Rezultat** - rezultat pokušaja popravke naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3837">**Result** - result of attempt to repair account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3838">Na primer: „Uspeh“ ili „Neuspeh\_ČuvanjaIzmenaUNalogu“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3838">For example: "Success" or "Fail\_SaveChangesToAccount"</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopstorescreatenewstore"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3849">Office.Outlook.Desktop.Stores.CreateNewStore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3849">Office.Outlook.Desktop.Stores.CreateNewStore</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3850">Prikuplja rezultat kreiranja nove prodavnice (sa tipom i verzijom), kao i kôd rezultata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3850">Collects the result of creating a new store (with type and version), and the result code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3851">Aktivno pratimo ovaj događaj da bismo pratili ispravno funkcionisanje mogućnosti da korisnik sinhronizuje i skladišti e–poštu lokalno, arhivira e–poštu (u PST) ili da koristi grupe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3851">We actively monitor this event to track the health a user's ability to sync and store mail locally, archive mails (in a PST), or use Groups.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3853">**Standardna HVA aktivnost** sa prilagođenim korisnim podacima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3853">**Standard HVA Activity** with custom payload</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3854">**TipSkladišta** – tip kreiranog skladišta OST ili PST/NST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3854">**StoreType** – The type of store created OST/PST/NST</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3855">**VerzijaSkladišta** – Verzija kreiranog skladišta Malo/Veliko/Tardis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3855">**StoreVersion** – The store version created Small/Large/Tardis</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookmacaccountaddworkflow"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3856">Office.Outlook.Mac.AccountAddWorkflow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3856">Office.Outlook.Mac.AccountAddWorkflow</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3857">Rezultat dodavanja naloga u programu Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3857">Result of adding an account in Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3858">Podaci se nadgledaju da bismo bili sigurni da neće doći do povećanog broja otkazivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3858">The data is monitored to ensure we don't see any spikes in failures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3859">Takođe analiziramo podatke da bismo pronašli oblasti za poboljšanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3859">We also analyze the data to find areas of improvement.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3860">Cilj nam je da sa svakim izdanjem poboljšamo stopu uspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3860">We aim to improve this success rate with each release.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3861">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3861">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3862">**AccountConfigMethod** – metod konfigurisanja Naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3862">**AccountConfigMethod** - the account configuration method</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3863">**AccountType** – Tip naloga koji se konfiguriše.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3863">**AccountType** - the type of account being configured</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3864">**AccountWorkflowSession** – sesiji u kojoj se pokušava izvršiti tok naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3864">**AccountWorkflowSession** - session where account workflow is attempted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3865">**Sessionduration** – trajanje sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3865">**SessionDuration** - duration of session</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3866">**ThreadId** - identifikator za nit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3866">**ThreadId** - identifier for the thread</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3868">Rezultat dodavanja naloga u programu Outlook pomoću novog iskustva konfigurisanja naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3868">Result of adding an account in Outlook using new account configuration experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3869">Podaci se nadgledaju da bismo bili sigurni da neće doći do povećanog broja otkazivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3869">The data is monitored to ensure we don't see any spikes in failures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3870">Takođe analiziramo podatke da bismo pronašli oblasti za poboljšanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3870">We also analyze the data to find areas of improvement.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3871">Cilj nam je da sa svakim izdanjem poboljšamo stopu uspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3871">We aim to improve this success rate with each release.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3872">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3872">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3873">**AccountConfigAutoSignIn** -Automatska konfiguracija naloga koju je podesio administrator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3873">**AccountConfigAutoSignIn** - automatic account configuration set by admin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3874">**AccountConfigDomain** – domen naveden tokom konfiguracije naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3874">**AccountConfigDomain** - domain specified during account configuration</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3875">**AccountConfigEntryPoint** - tačka unosa gde je korisnik uneo konfiguraciju naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3875">**AccountConfigEntryPoint** - entry point where user entered account configuration</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3876">**AccountConfigErrorCode** -kod greške na koji se naišlo tokom konfiguracije naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3876">**AccountConfigErrorCode** - error code encountered during account configuration</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3877">**AccountConfigErrorString** -greška na koju se naišlo tokom konfiguracije naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3877">**AccountConfigErrorString** - error encountered during account configuration</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3878">**AccountConfigMethod** – metod konfigurisanja naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3878">**AccountConfigMethod** - account configuration method</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3879">**AccountConfigPhase** -aktuelni korak toka posla konfigurisanja naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3879">**AccountConfigPhase** - current step of account configuration workflow</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3880">**AccountConfigPhaseFrom** -početni korak toka posla konfigurisanja naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3880">**AccountConfigPhaseFrom** - beginning step of account configuration workflow</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3881">**AccountConfigPhaseTo** -poslednji korak toka posla konfigurisanja naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3881">**AccountConfigPhaseTo** - last step of account configuration workflow</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3882">**AccountType** – tip naloga koji se konfiguriše</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3882">**AccountType** - type of account being configured</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3883">**AccountWorkflowSession** – sesiji u kojoj se pokušava izvršiti tok naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3883">**AccountWorkflowSession** - session where account workflow is attempted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3884">**Sessionduration** – trajanje sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3884">**SessionDuration** - duration of session</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3890">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3890">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationclose"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3895">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.Close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3895">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.Close</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3896">Prikuplja se kada se zatvore PowerPoint prezentacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3896">Collected when PowerPoint presentations are closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3897">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se odigravaju tokom procesa zatvaranja koji podrazumeva očuvanje i sinhronizovanje korisničkih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3897">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen through the close process which entail persisting and syncing the user's data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3898">Microsoft koristi ove podatke da obezbedili da zatvaranje radi kao što je očekivano i uspešno očuvanje korisničkog sadržaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3898">Microsoft uses this data to ensure that close is working as expected and user content is successfully being persisted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3899">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3899">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3900">**Data\_AddDocTelemetryResult:long -** Da li stavka evidencije sadrži svu neophodnu telemetriju dokumenta (Podaci\_Dokument\_\* polja)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3900">**Data\_AddDocTelemetryResult:long -** Does this log entry have all necessary document telemetry (Data\_Doc\_\* fields)?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3901">Ako ne, zašto?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3901">If not, why?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3902">**Podaci\_AutoSaveDisabledReasons:string -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti zašto je automatsko čuvanje onemogućeno za ovaj dokument?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3902">**Data\_AutoSaveDisabledReasons:string -** Predefined set of values of why was autosave disabled on this document?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3903">(Objedinjavanje grešaka, čuvanje greške, smernice grupe).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3903">(Merge error, Save error, Group policy etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3904">**Podaci\_CloseReason:long -** Kako je zatvaranje izvršeno?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3904">**Data\_CloseReason:long -** How was close performed?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3905">Zatvaranje dokumenta?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3905">Closing document?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3906">Zatvaranje aplikacije?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3906">Closing app?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3907">**Podaci\_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long -** Broj nekontrolisanih izuzetaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3907">**Data\_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long -** Number of unhandled exceptions</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3908">**Data\_DetachedDuration:long -** Vreme tokom kog je aktivnost bila uklonjena/nije bila pokrenuta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3908">**Data\_DetachedDuration:long -** Time for which Activity was detached/not running</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3909">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode:long -** Kako je dokument otvoren (samo za čitanje/čitanje i pisanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3909">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode:long -** How was this document opened (Read only | read write)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3910">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3910">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons:long -** Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3911">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3911">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3912">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType:long -** Kako je dokument uskladišten u sistemu SharePoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3912">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType:long -** How is document stored in SharePoint</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3913">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState:long -** Status dokumenta u vezi sa zaštitom podataka preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3913">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState:long -** Enterprise Data Protection state of document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3914">**Data\_Doc\_Ext:string -** Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3914">**Data\_Doc\_Ext:string -** Document extension</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3915">**Data\_Doc\_Extension:string -** Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3915">**Data\_Doc\_Extension:string -** Document extension</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3916">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za format datoteke (detaljniji od oznake tipa datoteke)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3916">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat:long -** Predefined set of values of format of file (more granular than extension)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3917">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn:string -** Gde je dokument uskladišten (SharePoint.com, live.net), dostupno samo za domene programa Office 365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3917">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn:string -** Where is document stored (SharePoint.com, live.net), only available for Office 365 domains</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3918">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash:string -** Heš mesta gde je uskladišten dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3918">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash:string -** Hash of where document is stored</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3919">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId:string -** Jedinstveni korisnički GUID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3919">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId:string -** Unique GUID of user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3920">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityUniqueId:string -** Jedinstveni identifikator identiteta koji je korišćen za radnju deljenja dokumenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3920">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityUniqueId:string -** Unique identifier of identity that was used for Shared Documents action</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3921">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags:long -** Maske bitova za različite zastavice koje se odnose na IO u datom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3921">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags:long -** Bitmask for various IO-related flags for a given document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3922">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za tip upravljanja pravima o informacijama koji je primenjen na dokument (prosleđivanje, odgovaranje, bezbedni čitač, uređivanje, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3922">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights:long -** Predefined set of values of what type of Information Rights Management is applied on this document (Forward, Reply, SecureReader, Edit etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3923">**Data\_Doc\_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool -** Tačno ako je HTTP zaglavlje "IsCloudCollabEnabled" već dobijeno iz zahteva za opcije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3923">**Data\_Doc\_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool -** True if the "IsCloudCollabEnabled" HTTP header has already been received from an OPTIONS request.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3924">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen:bool-** Da li je dokument otvoren postepeno (nova funkcija koja otvara dokument, bez potrebe za preuzimanjem celog dokumenta)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3924">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen:bool -** Was document opened incrementally (new feature that opens document without needing to download entire document)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3925">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported:bool –** Da li dokument podržava koautorstvo putem nove OCS usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3925">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported:bool -** Is Document supports co-authoring using new OCS service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3926">**Data\_Doc\_IsOpeningOfflineCopy:bool -** Proverava da li se dokument otvara iz lokalnog keša</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3926">**Data\_Doc\_IsOpeningOfflineCopy:bool -** verifies if document is being opened from local cache</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3927">**Data\_Doc\_IsSyncBacked:bool -** Proverava da li je dokument otvoren iz fascikle koja koristi aplikaciju OneDrive za ponovnu sinhronizaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3927">**Data\_Doc\_IsSyncBacked:bool -** verifies if document is being opened from folder that is using OneDrive sync back app</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3928">**Data\_Doc\_Location:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za mesto gde je dokument uskladišten (lokalno, u usluzi SharePoint, na WOPI serveru, na mreži, itd.) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3928">**Data\_Doc\_Location:long -** Predefined set of values of where document is stored (Local, SharePoint, WOPI, Network etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3929">**Data\_Doc\_LocationDetails:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za detaljnije informacije o lokaciji („privremena“ fascikla, fascikla „preuzimanja“, usluga One Drive za dokumente i slike, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3929">**Data\_Doc\_LocationDetails:long -** Predefined set of values of more detailed location (Temp folder, downloads folder, One Drive Documents, One Drive Pictures etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3930">**Data\_Doc\_NumberCoAuthors:long –** Broj koautora u trenutku otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3930">**Data\_Doc\_NumberCoAuthors:long -** Number of co-authors at the time of opening of a document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3931">**Data\_Doc\_PasswordFlags:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za način na koji je dokument šifrovan lozinkom (nije šifrovan, lozinka za čitanje, lozinka za uređivanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3931">**Data\_Doc\_PasswordFlags:long -** Predefined set of values of how document is encrypted with password (None, password to read, password to edit)-</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3932">**Data\_Doc\_ReadOnlyReasons:long –-** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument označen samo za čitanje (zaključan na serveru, konačni dokument, zaštićen lozinkom za uređivanje, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3932">**Data\_Doc\_ReadOnlyReasons:long -** Predefined set of values of why this document was marked read only (Locked on server, final document, password protected to edit etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3933">**Data\_Doc\_ResourceIdHash:string -** Heš identifikatora resursa za dokumente koji su uskladišteni na oblaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3933">**Data\_Doc\_ResourceIdHash:string -** Hash of resource identifier for documents stored in cloud</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3934">**Data_Doc_RtcType –**  Označava kako je postavljen kanal u realnom vremenu (RTC) za trenutnu datoteku (onemogućeno, nepodržano, na zahtev, uvek uključeno itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3934">**Data_Doc_RtcType -**  Indicates how the real-time channel (RTC) was set up for current file (Disabled, unsupported, on demand, always on, etc.).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3935">**Data\_Doc\_ServerDocId:string -** nepromenljivi identifikator za dokumente koji su uskladišteni na oblaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3935">**Data\_Doc\_ServerDocId:string -** immutable identifier for documents stored in cloud</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3936">**Data\_Doc\_ServerProtocol:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na to koji protokol se koristi za komunikaciju sa serverom (Http, Cobalt, WOPI, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3936">**Data\_Doc\_ServerProtocol:long -** Predefined set of values of which protocol is used to talk to server (Http, Cobalt, WOPI etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3938">**Data\_Doc\_ServerVersion:long –** Proverava da li je server zasnovan na verziji Office14, Office15, Office16</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3938">**Data\_Doc\_ServerVersion:long -** verifies if server is based off Office14, Office15, or Office 16</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3939">**Data\_Doc\_SessionId:long -** generisani GUID koji identifikuje instance dokumenta tokom istog procesa sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3939">**Data\_Doc\_SessionId:long -** generated GUID that Identifies the instance of the document within the same process session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3940">**Data\_Doc\_SharePointServiceContext:string -** Neprozirna niska, obično GridManagerID.FarmID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3940">**Data\_Doc\_SharePointServiceContext:string -** An opaque string, typically GridManagerID.FarmID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3941">Korisna je za povezivanje evidencija na strani klijenta i na strani servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3941">Useful for correlating client-side and server-side log</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3942">**Data\_Doc\_SizeInBytes:long -** Veličina dokumenta u bajtovima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3942">**Data\_Doc\_SizeInBytes:long -** Document size in bytes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3943">**Data\_Doc\_SpecialChars:long -** Maska bitova koja ukazuje na specijalne znakove u URL adresi ili putanji dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3943">**Data\_Doc\_SpecialChars:long -** Bitmask indicating special chars in the document's URL or Path</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3944">**Data\_Doc\_StorageProviderId:string -** Niska koja identifikuje dobavljača skladišta za dokument, kao što je „DropBox“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3944">**Data\_Doc\_StorageProviderId:string -** A string that identifies the document's storage provider, like "DropBox"</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3945">**Data\_Doc\_StreamAvailability:long-** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za status protoka dokumenta (dostupan, trajno onemogućen, nedostupan)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3945">**Data\_Doc\_StreamAvailability:long -** Predefined set of values of status of document Stream(available, permanently disabled, not available)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3946">**Data\_Doc\_UrlHash:string -** Heš za celu URL adresu dokumenata koji su uskladišteni na oblaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3946">**Data\_Doc\_UrlHash:string -** hash of full URL of documents stored in cloud</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3947">**Data\_Doc\_UsedWrsDataOnOpen:bool -** tačno ako je datoteka otvorena postepeno pomoću unapred keširanih WRS podataka na hostu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3947">**Data\_Doc\_UsedWrsDataOnOpen:bool -** true if the file was opened incrementally using pre cached WRS data on the host</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3948">**Data\_Doc\_WopiServiceId:string –** Identifikator usluge WOPI, npr. „Dropbox“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3948">**Data\_Doc\_WopiServiceId:string -** WOPI Service identifier, for example "Dropbox"</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3949">**Podaci\_DocHasStorage:bool -** Da li ovaj dokument ima lokalno skladište?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3949">**Data\_DocHasStorage:bool -** Does this document have local storage?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3950">**Data\_fLifeguarded:bool -** Da li se dokument ikada samokorigovao (funkcija koja sama ispravlja greške u dokumentu bez slanja upita korisniku)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3950">**Data\_fLifeguarded:bool -** Was document ever lifeguarded (feature to fix document errors by themselves without prompting user)?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3951">**Podaci\_IsDocAutoSaveable:bool -** Da li se prezentacija može automatski sačuvati?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3951">**Data\_IsDocAutoSaveable:bool -** Is presentation auto saveable?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3952">**Podaci\_IsDocDirty:bool -** Da li prezentacija sadrži promene koje još nisu sačuvane?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3952">**Data\_IsDocDirty:bool -** Does presentation have changes that are not yet saved?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3953">**Podaci\_IsNewDoc:bool -** Da li se radi o novom ili postojećem dokumentu? </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3953">**Data\_IsNewDoc:bool -** Is new document or existing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3954">**Podaci\_IsRecoveredDoc:bool -** Da li se radi o spasenom dokumentu?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3954">**Data\_IsRecoveredDoc:bool -** Is document recovered one?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3955">(Ako je došlo do pada prethodne sesije, pokazujemo okno za oporavak dokumenta prilikom sledeće sesije)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3955">(If prior session crashed, we show document recovery pane on next session)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3956">**Podaci\_NewDocDiscarded:bool -** Da li je nova prezentacija odbačena bez čuvanja?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3956">**Data\_NewDocDiscarded:bool -** Was new presentation discarded without being saved</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3957">**Podaci\_OCSClosingDlgCanceled:bool -** Ako je otpremanje na čekanju na OCS dok korisnik zatvori dokument, pojaviće se dijalog sa porukom korisniku da sačeka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3957">**Data\_OCSClosingDlgCanceled:bool -** If upload is pending on OCS while user closes document, dialog is popped up to user to wait.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3958">Koju opciju je odabrao korisnik?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3958">Which option user chose?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3959">**Podaci\_OCSClosingDlgExpired:bool -** Da li je isteklo vreme za dijalog (nakon 1 minuta) samo od sebe?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3959">**Data\_OCSClosingDlgExpired:bool -** Did dialog expire (after 1 minute) on its own?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3960">**Podaci\_OCSClosingStatus:long –** Koji je konačni status OCS (u CSI, može se zatvoriti, u OCS prelazu, u CSI prelazu, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3960">**Data\_OCSClosingStatus:long -** What's final status of OCS (In CSI, Closable, In OCS Transition, In CSI transition, etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3961">**Podaci\_OCSClosingWaitDurationMS:long -** Koliko je vremena korisnik morao da čeka na OCS otpremanje?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3961">**Data\_OCSClosingWaitDurationMS:long -** How much time user had to wait for OCS to upload</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3963">**Podaci\_ServerDocId:string -** GUID za jedinstveno identifikovanje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3963">**Data\_ServerDocId:string -** GUID to uniquely identify a document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3964">**Data\_StopwatchDuration:long -** Ukupno vreme aktivnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3964">**Data\_StopwatchDuration:long -** Total time for Activity</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3965">**Podaci\_UserContinuedZRTClose:bool –** Kada je prikazan dijalog prilikom zatvaranja, da li je korisnik izabrao da „Nastavi” sa zatvaranjem?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3965">**Data\_UserContinuedZRTClose:bool -** Upon showing dialog on close, did user selected 'Continue' to close?</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationnewdocument"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3966">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.NewDocument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3966">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.NewDocument</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3967">Prikuplja se kada PowerPoint kreira novu prezentaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3967">Collected when PowerPoint creates a new presentation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3968"> Uključuje metriku za uspeh, neuspeh i performanse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3968">Includes success failure and performance metrics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3969">Ove informacije su potrebne da bismo proverili da li PowerPoint može uspešno da kreira datoteke bez degradacije u performansama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3969">This information is used to ensure we can create files successfully and with no degradation in performance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3970">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3970">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3971">**TipNovogDokumenta** – Da li je novi dokument kreiran iz predloška ili kreiran prazan?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3971">**NewDocumentType** – Whether new document is created from template or just created blank?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3972">**FLifeguarded** – Da li dokument ima mogućnost samokorigovanja (funkcija koja sama ispravlja greške u dokumentu bez upita za korisnika)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3972">**FLifeguarded** – Is document life guarded (feature that restores corrupt document state without prompting user)</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationopencompleteprotocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3973">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.OpenCompleteProtocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3973">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.OpenCompleteProtocol</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3974">Prikuplja se kada PowerPoint otvori prezentacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3974">Collected when PowerPoint opens presentations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3975">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se događaju na kraju procesa otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3975">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen through the end stages of the open process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3976">Microsoft koristi te podatke da bi se uverili da funkcija radi kao što je očekivano i ne postoji bilo kakva degradacija pri otvaranju prezentacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3976">Microsoft uses this data to ensure the feature is working as expected and there is no degradation to opening presentations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3977">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3977">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3978">**Data\_AntiVirusScanMethod:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za tip antivirusnog skeniranja (IOAV, AMSI, nijedan, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3978">**Data\_AntiVirusScanMethod:long -** Predefined set of values of type of AntiVirus scanned (IOAV, AMSI, None etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3979">**Data\_AntiVirusScanStatus:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za antivirusno skeniranje koje se izvršava za svaki otvoreni dokument (nisu otkrivene pretnje, neuspelo, otkriven je malver, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3979">**Data\_AntiVirusScanStatus:long -** Predefined set of values of anti-virus scan that happens for every document opened (NoThreatsDetected, Failed, MalwareDetected etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3980">**Podaci\_CloseAndReopen:bool -** Da li je ovaj dokument zatvoren i ponovo otvoren?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3980">**Data\_CloseAndReopen:bool -** Was this document closed and reopened?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3981">**Data\_DetachedDuration:long -** Vreme tokom kog je aktivnost bila uklonjena/nije bila pokrenuta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3981">**Data\_DetachedDuration:long -** Time for which Activity was detached/not running</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3982">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode:long -** Kako je dokument otvoren (samo za čitanje/čitanje i pisanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3982">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode:long -** How was this document opened (Read only | read write)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3983">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3983">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons:long -** Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3984">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3984">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3985">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType:long -** Kako je dokument uskladišten u sistemu SharePoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3985">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType:long -** How is document stored in SharePoint</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3986">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState:long -** Status dokumenta u vezi sa zaštitom podataka preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3986">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState:long -** Enterprise Data Protection state of document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3987">**Data\_Doc\_Ext:string -** Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3987">**Data\_Doc\_Ext:string -** Document extension</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3988">**Data\_Doc\_Extension:string -** Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3988">**Data\_Doc\_Extension:string -** Document extension</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3989">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za format datoteke (detaljniji od oznake tipa datoteke)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3989">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat:long -** Predefined set of values of format of file (more granular than extension)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3990">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn:string -** Gde je dokument uskladišten (SharePoint.com, live.net), dostupno samo za domene programa Office 365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3990">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn:string -** Where is document stored (SharePoint.com, live.net), only available for Office 365 domains</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3991">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash:string -** Heš mesta gde je uskladišten dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3991">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash:string -** Hash of where document is stored</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3992">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId:string -** Jedinstveni korisnički GUID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3992">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId:string -** Unique GUID of user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3993">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityUniqueId:string -** Jedinstveni identifikator identiteta koji je korišćen za radnju deljenja dokumenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3993">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityUniqueId:string -** Unique identifier of identity that was used for Shared Documents action</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3994">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags:long -** Maske bitova za različite zastavice koje se odnose na IO u datom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3994">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags:long -** Bitmask for various IO-related flags for a given document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3995">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za tip upravljanja pravima o informacijama koji je primenjen na dokument (prosleđivanje, odgovaranje, bezbedni čitač, uređivanje, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3995">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights:long -** Predefined set of values of what type of Information Rights Management is applied on this document (Forward, Reply, SecureReader, Edit etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3996">**Data\_Doc\_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool -** Tačno ako je HTTP zaglavlje "IsCloudCollabEnabled" već dobijeno iz zahteva za opcije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3996">**Data\_Doc\_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool -** True if the "IsCloudCollabEnabled" HTTP header has already been received from an OPTIONS request.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3997">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen:bool-** Da li je dokument otvoren postepeno (nova funkcija koja otvara dokument, bez potrebe za preuzimanjem celog dokumenta)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3997">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen:bool -** Was document opened incrementally (new feature that opens document without needing to download entire document)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3998">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported:bool –** Da li dokument podržava koautorstvo putem nove OCS usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3998">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported:bool -** Is Document supports co-authoring using new OCS service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-3999">**Data\_Doc\_IsOpeningOfflineCopy:bool -** Da li se dokument otvara iz lokalnog keša?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-3999">**Data\_Doc\_IsOpeningOfflineCopy:bool -** Is document being opened from local cache?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4000">**Data\_Doc\_IsSyncBacked:bool -** Da li je dokument otvoren iz fascikle koja koristi aplikaciju OneDrive za ponovnu sinhronizaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4000">**Data\_Doc\_IsSyncBacked:bool -** Is document opened from folder that is using OneDrive sync back app</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4001">**Data\_Doc\_Location:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za mesto gde je dokument uskladišten (lokalno, u usluzi SharePoint, na WOPI serveru, na mreži, itd.) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4001">**Data\_Doc\_Location:long -** Predefined set of values of where document is stored (Local, SharePoint, WOPI, Network etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4002">**Data\_Doc\_LocationDetails:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za detaljnije informacije o lokaciji („privremena“ fascikla, fascikla „preuzimanja“, usluga One Drive za dokumente i slike, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4002">**Data\_Doc\_LocationDetails:long -** Predefined set of values of more detailed location (Temp folder, downloads folder, One Drive Documents, One Drive Pictures etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4003">**Data\_Doc\_NumberCoAuthors:long –** Broj koautora u trenutku otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4003">**Data\_Doc\_NumberCoAuthors:long -** Number of co-authors at the time of opening of a document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4004">**Data\_Doc\_PasswordFlags:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za način na koji je dokument šifrovan lozinkom (nije šifrovan, lozinka za čitanje, lozinka za uređivanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4004">**Data\_Doc\_PasswordFlags:long -** Predefined set of values of how document is encrypted with password (None, password to read, password to edit)-</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4005">**Data\_Doc\_ReadOnlyReasons:long –-** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument označen samo za čitanje (zaključan na serveru, konačni dokument, zaštićen lozinkom za uređivanje, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4005">**Data\_Doc\_ReadOnlyReasons:long -** Predefined set of values of why this document was marked read only (Locked on server, final document, password protected to edit etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4007">**Data_Doc_RtcType –**  Označava kako je postavljen kanal u realnom vremenu (RTC) za trenutnu datoteku (onemogućeno, nepodržano, na zahtev, uvek uključeno itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4007">**Data_Doc_RtcType -**  Indicates how the real-time channel (RTC) was set up for current file (Disabled, unsupported, on demand, always on, etc.).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4009">**Data\_Doc\_ServerProtocol:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na to koji protokol se koristi za komunikaciju sa serverom (Http, Cobalt, WOPI, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4009">**Data\_Doc\_ServerProtocol:long -** Predefined set of values of which protocol is used to talk to server (Http, Cobalt, WOPI etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4010">**Data\_Doc\_ServerType:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za tip servera (SharePoint, DropBox, WOPI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4010">**Data\_Doc\_ServerType:long -** Predefined set of values of type of server (SharePoint, DropBox, WOPI)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4011">**Data\_Doc\_ServerVersion:long –** Proverava da li je server zasnovan na verziji Office14, Office15, Office16</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4011">**Data\_Doc\_ServerVersion:long -** verifies if server is based off Office14, Office15, or Office 16</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4012">**Data\_Doc\_SessionId:long -** generisani GUID koji identifikuje instance dokumenta tokom istog procesa sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4012">**Data\_Doc\_SessionId:long -** generated GUID that Identifies the instance of the document within the same process session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4013">**Data\_Doc\_SharePointServiceContext:string -** Neprozirna niska, obično GridManagerID.FarmID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4013">**Data\_Doc\_SharePointServiceContext:string -** An opaque string, typically GridManagerID.FarmID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4014">Korisna je za povezivanje evidencija na strani klijenta i na strani servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4014">Useful for correlating client side and server-side logs</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4015">**Data\_Doc\_SizeInBytes:long -** Veličina dokumenta u bajtovima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4015">**Data\_Doc\_SizeInBytes:long -** Document size in bytes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4016">**Data\_Doc\_SpecialChars:long -** Maska bitova koja ukazuje na specijalne znakove u URL adresi ili putanji dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4016">**Data\_Doc\_SpecialChars:long -** Bitmask indicating special chars in the document's URL or Path</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4017">**Data\_Doc\_StorageProviderId:string -** Niska koja identifikuje dobavljača skladišta za dokument, kao što je „DropBox“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4017">**Data\_Doc\_StorageProviderId:string -** A string that identifies the document's storage provider, like "DropBox"</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4018">**Data\_Doc\_StreamAvailability:long-** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za status protoka dokumenta (dostupan, trajno onemogućen, nedostupan)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4018">**Data\_Doc\_StreamAvailability:long -** Predefined set of values of status of document Stream(available, permanently disabled, not available)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4019">**Data\_Doc\_UrlHash:string -** Heš za celu URL adresu dokumenata koji su uskladišteni na oblaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4019">**Data\_Doc\_UrlHash:string -** hash of full URL of documents stored in cloud</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4020">**Data\_Doc\_UsedWrsDataOnOpen:bool -** tačno ako je datoteka otvorena postepeno pomoću unapred keširanih WRS podataka na hostu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4020">**Data\_Doc\_UsedWrsDataOnOpen:bool -** true if the file was opened incrementally using pre cached WRS data on the host</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4021">**Data\_Doc\_WopiServiceId:string –** Identifikator usluge WOPI, npr. „Dropbox“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4021">**Data\_Doc\_WopiServiceId:string -** WOPI Service identifier, for example "Dropbox"</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4022">**Podaci\_ExecutionCount:long -** Koliko puta se izvršava IncOpen protokol pre izvršavanja ovog protokola (OpenComplete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4022">**Data\_ExecutionCount:long -** How many times we executed IncOpen protocol before executing this (OpenComplete) protocol</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4023">**Data\_FailureComponent:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za komponentu koja je izazvala neuspeh protokola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4023">**Data\_FailureComponent:long -** Predefined set of values of which component caused this protocol to fail?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4024">(neusaglašenost, CSI, unutrašnja, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4024">(Conflict, CSI, Internal etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4025">**Data\_FailureReason:long –** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za razlog neuspešnosti (datoteka je oštećena, blokirao je antivirus, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4025">**Data\_FailureReason:long -** Predefined set of values of what's the failure reason (FileIsCorrupt, BlockedByAntivirus etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4026">**Data_FullDownloadRoundTripCount: Long –** Broj povratnih odziva servera potrebnih za preuzimanje celog dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4026">**Data_FullDownloadRoundTripCount:long -** The number of roundtrips to the server taken to download the entire document.</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4027">**Data_IsProtocolRunInIncOpenMode: Bool –** Da li je protokol bio pokrenut za postepeno preuzimanje u kome su delovi dokumenta preuzeti nakon što je dokument prvobitno prikazan korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4027">**Data_IsProtocolRunInIncOpenMode:bool -** Was the protocol run for an incremental download, which is a download where parts of the document were downloaded after initially showing it to the user.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4028">**Podaci\_MethodId:long -** Interno koji red koda je poslednji koji se izvršio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4028">**Data\_MethodId:long -** Internally which line of code was last one to be executed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4029">**Data\_StopwatchDuration:long -** Ukupno vreme aktivnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4029">**Data\_StopwatchDuration:long -** Total time for Activity</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4030">**Podaci\_TimeToEdit:long -** Koliko vremena je bilo potrebno da bi dokument stekao mogućnost uređivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4030">**Data\_TimeToEdit:long -** Time it took for document to become editable</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4031">**Podaci\_TimeToView:long -** Vreme utrošeno za prikaz prvog slajda dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4031">**Data\_TimeToView:long -** Time it took for first slide of document to be rendered</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4032">**Podaci\_UnhandledException:bool -** Da li je bilo nekontrolisanih izvornih izuzetaka?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4032">**Data\_UnhandledException:bool -** Any unhandled native exception?</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationsave"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4033">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.Save</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4033">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.Save</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4034">Prikuplja se kad god PowerPoint vrši čuvanje pomoću moderne putanje kôda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4034">Collected whenever PowerPoint performs a save using the modern code path.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4035">Uključuje rezultat tipa uspeh ili neuspeh za metriku performansi pri čuvanju i odgovarajuće metapodatke dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4035">Includes success or failure result type of save performance metrics and relevant document metadata.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4036">Greške pri čuvanju mogu dovesti do gubitka podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4036">Failures in save can result in data loss.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4037">Microsoft koristi ove podatke da obezbedi da funkcija radi kao što je očekivano i da se uspešno vrši očuvanje korisničkog sadržaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4037">Microsoft uses this data to ensure the feature is working as expected and user content is successfully being persisted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4038">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4038">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4039">**Data\_AddDocTelemetryResult:long -** Da li stavka evidencije sadrži svu neophodnu telemetriju dokumenta (Podaci\_Dokument\_\* polja)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4039">**Data\_AddDocTelemetryResult:long -** Does this log entry have all necessary document telemetry (Data\_Doc\_\* fields)?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4040">Ako ne, zašto?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4040">If not, why?</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4041">**Podaci\_BeforeSaveEvent:long -** Vreme utrošeno da se podigne dokument pre događaja čuvanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4041">**Data\_BeforeSaveEvent:long -** Time taken to raise Document Before Save Event</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4042">**Podaci\_CheckDownRevSaveTimeMS:long -** Vreme utrošeno za proveru revizije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4042">**Data\_CheckDownRevSaveTimeMS:long -** Time taken to check revision</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4043">**Podaci\_CheckMacroSaveTimeMS:long -** Vreme utrošeno za čuvanje makroa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4043">**Data\_CheckMacroSaveTimeMS:long -** Time taken to save macros</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4044">**Podaci\_ClearAutoSaveTimeMS:long -** Vreme utrošeno da se ukloni zastavica za automatsko čuvanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4044">**Data\_ClearAutoSaveTimeMS:long -** Time taken to clear AutoSave flag</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4045">**Podaci\_ClearDirtyFlagTimeMS:long -** Vreme utrošeno da se ukloni zastavica za nesređeni dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4045">**Data\_ClearDirtyFlagTimeMS:long -** Time taken to clear document dirty flag</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4046">**Podaci\_CloneDocumentTimeMS:long -** Vreme utrošeno na kloniranje dokumenta pre početka čuvanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4046">**Data\_CloneDocumentTimeMS:long -** Time taken to clone document before starting the save</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4047">**Podaci\_CommitTransactionTimeMS:long -** Vreme utrošeno da se izvrši transakcija čuvanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4047">**Data\_CommitTransactionTimeMS:long -** Time taken to commit the save transaction</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4048">**Data\_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long -** Neuhvaćeni izvorni izuzeci dok je aktivnost pokrenuta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4048">**Data\_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long -** Uncaught native exceptions while activity was running</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4049">**Data\_DetachedDuration:long -** Vreme tokom kog je aktivnost bila uklonjena/nije bila pokrenuta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4049">**Data\_DetachedDuration:long -** Time for which Activity was detached/not running</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4050">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode:long -** Kako je dokument otvoren (samo za čitanje/čitanje i pisanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4050">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode:long -** How was this document opened (Read only | read write)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4051">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4051">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons:long -** Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4052">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4052">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4053">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType:long -** Kako je dokument uskladišten u sistemu SharePoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4053">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType:long -** How is document stored in SharePoint</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4054">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState:long -** Status dokumenta u vezi sa zaštitom podataka preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4054">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState:long -** Enterprise Data Protection state of document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4055">**Data\_Doc\_Ext:string -** Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4055">**Data\_Doc\_Ext:string -** Document extension</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4056">**Data\_Doc\_Extension:string -** Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4056">**Data\_Doc\_Extension:string -** Document extension</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4057">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za format datoteke (detaljniji od oznake tipa datoteke)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4057">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat:long -** Predefined set of values of format of file (more granular than extension)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4058">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn:string -** Gde je dokument uskladišten (SharePoint.com, live.net), dostupno samo za domene programa Office 365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4058">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn:string -** Where is document stored (SharePoint.com, live.net), only available for Office 365 domains</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4059">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash:string -** Heš mesta gde je uskladišten dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4059">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash:string -** Hash of where document is stored</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4060">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId:string -** Jedinstveni korisnički GUID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4060">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId:string -** Unique GUID of user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4061">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityUniqueId:string -** Jedinstveni identifikator identiteta koji je korišćen za radnju deljenja dokumenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4061">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityUniqueId:string -** Unique identifier of identity that was used for Shared Documents action</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4062">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags:long -** Maske bitova za različite zastavice koje se odnose na IO u datom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4062">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags:long -** Bitmask for various IO-related flags for a given document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4063">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za tip upravljanja pravima o informacijama koji je primenjen na dokument (prosleđivanje, odgovaranje, bezbedni čitač, uređivanje, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4063">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights:long -** Predefined set of values of what type of Information Rights Management is applied on this document (Forward, Reply, SecureReader, Edit etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4064">**Data\_Doc\_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool -** Tačno ako je HTTP zaglavlje "IsCloudCollabEnabled" već dobijeno iz zahteva za opcije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4064">**Data\_Doc\_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool -** True if the "IsCloudCollabEnabled" HTTP header has already been received from an OPTIONS request.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4065">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen:bool-** Da li je dokument otvoren postepeno (nova funkcija koja otvara dokument, bez potrebe za preuzimanjem celog dokumenta)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4065">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen:bool -** Was document opened incrementally (new feature that opens document without needing to download entire document)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4066">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported:bool –** Da li dokument podržava koautorstvo putem nove OCS usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4066">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported:bool -** Is Document supports co-authoring using new OCS service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4067">**Data\_Doc\_IsOpeningOfflineCopy:bool -** Proverava da li se dokument otvara iz lokalnog keša</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4067">**Data\_Doc\_IsOpeningOfflineCopy:bool -** verifies if document being is opened from local cache</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4068">**Data\_Doc\_IsSyncBacked:bool -** Da li je dokument otvoren iz fascikle koja koristi aplikaciju OneDrive za ponovnu sinhronizaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4068">**Data\_Doc\_IsSyncBacked:bool -** Is document opened from folder that is using OneDrive sync back app</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4069">**Data\_Doc\_Location:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za mesto gde je dokument uskladišten (lokalno, u usluzi SharePoint, na WOPI serveru, na mreži, itd.) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4069">**Data\_Doc\_Location:long -** Predefined set of values of where document is stored (Local, SharePoint, WOPI, Network etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4070">**Data\_Doc\_LocationDetails:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za detaljnije informacije o lokaciji („privremena“ fascikla, fascikla „preuzimanja“, usluga One Drive za dokumente i slike, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4070">**Data\_Doc\_LocationDetails:long -** Predefined set of values of more detailed location (Temp folder, downloads folder, One Drive Documents, One Drive Pictures etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4071">**Data\_Doc\_NumberCoAuthors:long –** Broj koautora u trenutku otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4071">**Data\_Doc\_NumberCoAuthors:long -** Number of co-authors at the time of opening of a document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4072">**Data\_Doc\_PasswordFlags:long -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za način na koji je dokument šifrovan lozinkom (nije šifrovan, lozinka za čitanje, lozinka za uređivanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4072">**Data\_Doc\_PasswordFlags:long -** Predefined set of values of how document is encrypted with password (None, password to read, password to edit)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4073">**Data\_Doc\_ReadOnlyReasons:long –-** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument označen samo za čitanje (zaključan na serveru, konačni dokument, zaštićen lozinkom za uređivanje, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4073">**Data\_Doc\_ReadOnlyReasons:long -** Predefined set of values of why this document was marked read only (Locked on server, final document, password protected to edit etc.)</span></span>
