#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationsaveas"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4119">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.SaveAs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4119">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.SaveAs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4120">Prikuplja se kad god PowerPoint izvršava komandu „Sačuvaj kao“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4120">Collected whenever PowerPoint performs a Save As.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4121">Uključuje rezultat tipa uspeh ili neuspeh za metriku performansi pri čuvanju i odgovarajuće metapodatke dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4121">Includes success or failure result type of save performance metrics and relevant document metadata.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4122">Greške pri čuvanju mogu dovesti do gubitka podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4122">Failures in save can result in data loss.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4123">Microsoft koristi ove podatke da obezbedi da funkcija radi kao što je očekivano i da se uspešno vrši očuvanje korisničkog sadržaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4123">Microsoft uses this data to ensure the feature is working as expected and user content is successfully being persisted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4124">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4124">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4125">**Data_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** - Da li stavka evidencije sadrži svu neophodnu telemetriju dokumenta (Data_Doc_\* fields)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4125">**Data_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** - Does this log entry have all necessary document telemetry (Data_Doc_\* fields)?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4126">Ako ne, zašto?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4126">If not, why?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4127">**Data_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long** - Neuhvaćeni izvorni izuzeci dok je aktivnost pokrenuta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4127">**Data_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long** - Uncaught native exceptions while activity was running</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4128">**Data_DetachedDuration:long**- Vreme tokom kog je aktivnost bila uklonjena/nije bila pokrenuta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4128">**Data_DetachedDuration:long** - Time for which Activity was detached/not running</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4129">**Data_DstDoc_AccessMode:long**- Kako je dokument otvoren (samo za čitanje/čitanje i pisanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4129">**Data_DstDoc_AccessMode:long** - How was this document opened (Read only | read write)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4130">**Data_DstDoc_AssistedReadingReasons:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4130">**Data_DstDoc_AssistedReadingReasons:long** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4131">**Data_DstDoc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4131">**Data_DstDoc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Indicates whether a cached version of the new cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4132">**Data_DstDoc_ChunkingType:long** - Kako je dokument uskladišten u sistemu SharePoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4132">**Data_DstDoc_ChunkingType:long** - How is document stored in SharePoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4133">**Data_DstDoc_EdpState:long** - Status dokumenta u vezi sa zaštitom podataka preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4133">**Data_DstDoc_EdpState:long** - Enterprise Data Protection state of document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4134">**Data_DstDoc_Ext:string** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4134">**Data_DstDoc_Ext:string** - Document extension</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4135">**Data_DstDoc_Extension:string** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4135">**Data_DstDoc_Extension:string** - Document extension</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4136">**Data_DstDoc_FileFormat:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za format datoteke (detaljniji od oznake tipa datoteke)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4136">**Data_DstDoc_FileFormat:long** - Predefined set of values of format of file (more granular than extension)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4137">**Data_DstDoc_Fqdn:string** - Gde je dokument uskladišten (SharePoint.com, live.net), dostupno samo za Office 365 domene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4137">**Data_DstDoc_Fqdn:string** - Where is document stored (SharePoint.com, live.net), only available for Office 365 domains</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4138">**Data_DstDoc_FqdnHash:string** - Heš mesta gde je uskladišten dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4138">**Data_DstDoc_FqdnHash:string** - Hash of where document is stored</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4139">**Data_DstDoc_IdentityTelemetryId:string** - Jedinstveni korisnički GUID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4139">**Data_DstDoc_IdentityTelemetryId:string** - Unique GUID of user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4140">**Data_DstDoc_IdentityUniqueId:string** - Jedinstveni identifikator identiteta koji je korišćen za radnju deljenja dokumenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4140">**Data_DstDoc_IdentityUniqueId:string** - Unique identifier of identity that was used for Shared Documents action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4141">**Data_DstDoc_IOFlags:long** – Maske bitova za različite zastavice koje se odnose na IO u datom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4141">**Data_DstDoc_IOFlags:long** - Bitmask for various IO-related flags for a given document</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointdocoperationsavelegacy"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4219">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.SaveLegacy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4219">Office.PowerPoint.DocOperation.SaveLegacy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4220">Prikuplja se kad god PowerPoint vrši čuvanje pomoću zastarele putanje kôda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4220">Collected whenever PowerPoint performs a save using the legacy code path.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4221">Uključuje rezultat tipa uspeh ili neuspeh za metriku performansi pri čuvanju i odgovarajuće metapodatke dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4221">Includes success or failure result type of save performance metrics and relevant document metadata.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4222">Greške pri čuvanju mogu dovesti do gubitka podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4222">Failures in save can result in data loss.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4223">Microsoft koristi ove podatke da obezbedi da funkcija radi kao što je očekivano i da se uspešno vrši očuvanje korisničkog sadržaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4223">Microsoft uses this data to ensure the feature is working as expected and user content is successfully being persisted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4224">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4224">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4225">**Data_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** - Da li stavka evidencije sadrži svu neophodnu telemetriju dokumenta (Data_Doc_\* fields)?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4225">**Data_AddDocTelemetryResult:long** - Does this log entry have all necessary document telemetry (Data_Doc_\* fields)?</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4226">Ako ne, zašto?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4226">If not, why?</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4227">**Data_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long** - Neuhvaćeni izvorni izuzeci dok je aktivnost pokrenuta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4227">**Data_CppUncaughtExceptionCount:long** - Uncaught native exceptions while activity was running</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4228">**Data_DetachedDuration:long**- Vreme tokom kog je aktivnost bila uklonjena/nije bila pokrenuta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4228">**Data_DetachedDuration:long** - Time for which Activity was detached/not running</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4229">**Data_Doc_AccessMode:long**- Kako je dokument otvoren (samo za čitanje/čitanje i pisanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4229">**Data_Doc_AccessMode:long** - How was this document opened (Read only | read write)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4230">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4230">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons:long** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4231">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4231">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4232">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType:long** - Kako je dokument uskladišten u sistemu SharePoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4232">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType:long** - How is document stored in SharePoint</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4233">**Data_Doc_EdpState:long** - Status dokumenta u vezi sa zaštitom podataka preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4233">**Data_Doc_EdpState:long** - Enterprise Data Protection state of document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4234">**Data_Doc_Ext:string** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4234">**Data_Doc_Ext:string** - Document extension</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4235">**Data_Doc_Extension:string** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4235">**Data_Doc_Extension:string** - Document extension</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4236">**Data_Doc_FileFormat:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za format datoteke (detaljniji od oznake tipa datoteke)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4236">**Data_Doc_FileFormat:long** - Predefined set of values of format of file (more granular than extension)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4237">**Data_Doc_Fqdn:string** - Gde je dokument uskladišten (SharePoint.com, live.net), dostupno samo za Office 365 domene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4237">**Data_Doc_Fqdn:string** - Where is document stored (SharePoint.com, live.net), only available for Office 365 domains</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4238">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash:string** - Heš mesta gde je uskladišten dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4238">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash:string** - Hash of where document is stored</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4239">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId:string** - Jedinstveni GUID korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4239">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId:string** - Unique GUID of user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4240">**Data_Doc_IdentityUniqueId:string** - Jedinstveni identifikator identiteta koji je korišćen za radnju deljenja dokumenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4240">**Data_Doc_IdentityUniqueId:string** - Unique identifier of identity that was used for Shared Documents action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4241">**Data_Doc_IOFlags:long** – Maske bitova za različite zastavice koje se odnose na IO u datom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4241">**Data_Doc_IOFlags:long** - Bitmask for various IO-related flags for a given document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4242">**Data_Doc_IrmRights:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za tip upravljanja pravima o informacijama koji je primenjen na dokument (prosleđivanje, odgovaranje, bezbedni čitač, uređivanje, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4242">**Data_Doc_IrmRights:long** - Predefined set of values of what type of Information Rights Management is applied on this document (Forward, Reply, SecureReader, Edit etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4243">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool** - Tačno ako je HTTP zaglavlje "IsCloudCollabEnabled" već dobijeno iz zahteva za opcije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4243">**Data_Doc_IsCloudCollabEnabled:bool** - True if the "IsCloudCollabEnabled" HTTP header has already been received from an OPTIONS request.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4244">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen:bool** - Da li je dokument otvoren postepeno (nova funkcija koja otvara dokument, bez potrebe za preuzimanjem celog dokumenta)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4244">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen:bool** - Was document opened incrementally (new feature that opens document without needing to download entire document)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4247">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked:bool** - Da li je dokument otvoren iz fascikle koja koristi aplikaciju OneDrive za ponovnu sinhronizaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4247">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked:bool** - Is document opened from folder that is using OneDrive sync back app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4248">**Data_Doc_Location:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za mesto gde je dokument uskladišten (lokalno, u usluzi SharePoint, na WOPI serveru, na mreži, itd.) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4248">**Data_Doc_Location:long** - Predefined set of values of where document is stored (Local, SharePoint, WOPI, Network etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4249">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za detaljnije informacije o lokaciji („privremena“ fascikla, fascikla „preuzimanja“, usluga One Drive za dokumente i slike, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4249">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails:long** - Predefined set of values of more detailed location (Temp folder, downloads folder, One Drive Documents, One Drive Pictures etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4251">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za način na koji je dokument šifrovan lozinkom (nije šifrovan, lozinka za čitanje, lozinka za uređivanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4251">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags:long** - Predefined set of values of how document is encrypted with password (None, password to read, password to edit)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4252">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument označen samo za čitanje (zaključan na serveru, konačni dokument, zaštićen lozinkom za uređivanje, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4252">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons:long** - Predefined set of values of why this document was marked read only (Locked on server, final document, password protected to edit, etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4254">**Data_Doc_RtcType** –  Označava kako je postavljen kanal u realnom vremenu (RTC) za trenutnu datoteku (onemogućeno, nepodržano, na zahtev, uvek uključeno itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4254">**Data_Doc_RtcType** -  Indicates how the real-time channel (RTC) was set up for current file (Disabled, unsupported, on demand, always on, etc.).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4257">**Data_Doc_ServerType:long** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za tip servera (SharePoint, DropBox, WOPI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4257">**Data_Doc_ServerType:long** - Predefined set of values of type of server (SharePoint, DropBox, WOPI)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4259">**Data_Doc_SessionId:long** - generisani GUID koji identifikuje instance dokumenta tokom istog procesa sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4259">**Data_Doc_SessionId:long** - generated GUID that Identifies the instance of the document within the same process session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4260">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext:string** - Neprozirna niska, obično GridManagerID.FarmID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4260">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext:string** - An opaque string, typically GridManagerID.FarmID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4261">Korisna je za povezivanje evidencija na strani klijenta i na strani servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4261">Useful for correlating client side and server-side logs</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointpptiosrehearseview"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4357">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.IOS.RehearseView</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4357">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.IOS.RehearseView</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4358">Ovaj događaj označava da je korisnik zaustavio sesiju vežbe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4358">This event is denoting that user has stopped the rehearsal session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4359">Podaci se koriste u kombinaciji sa Office.PowerPoint.IOS.Android.RehearseView.StartSession kao prvi pokazatelj bilo kakvih rušenja ili grešaka sa kojima se suočava korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4359">The data is used in combination with Office.PowerPoint.IOS.Android.RehearseView.StartSession as the first indicator of any crashes or errors that user faces.</span></span>  
 
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4360">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4360">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4361">**Vreme kreiranja veze** – vreme potrošeno na kreiranje veza na strani usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4361">**ConnectionCreationTime** - time taken to create service side connections.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4362">**CountDownAlertTime** – Vreme za koje je prikazano upozorenje za odbrojavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4362">**CountDownAlertTime** - Time for which countdown alert was displayed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4363">**CountdownInitTime** – Vreme između dovršenog učitavanja projekcije slajdova i početka odbrojavanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4363">**CountdownInitTime** – Time between slideshow load completed and countdown started.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4364">**CritiqueSummary** – Rezime svih kritika koje su korisnici videli uz svoje brojeve.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4364">**CritiqueSummary** - Summary of what all critiques user saw with their counts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4365">**ExitEventCode** – Kôd za identifikaciju u kom scenariju korisnik izlazi iz probe, bilo da je reč o scenariju greške ili uspešnom izlasku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4365">**ExitEventCode** - Code to identify under which scenario user exit out of rehearse session, whether it was error scenario or successful exit</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4366">**FRETime** – Vreme za koje je FRE ekran počeo da prikazuje dok ga korisnik nije odbacio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4366">**FRETime** - Time between FRE screen started to display until user dismissed it.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4367">**MicrophonePermissionTime** – Vreme tokom kojeg se prikazivalo upozorenje za dozvolu mikrofona dok korisnik nije izabrao jednu od opcija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4367">**MicrophonePermissionTime** - Time for which microphone permission alert was displayed until user selected one of the options.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4368">**PauseRehearsingCount** – Prebrojavanje koliko je puta korisnik kliknuo na pauziranje probe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4368">**PauseRehearsingCount** - Count of how many times user clicked on pause rehearsal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4369">**RehearsalInitTime** – Vreme koje je potrebno da se proba pokrene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4369">**RehearsalInitTime** - Time taken by rehearsal to initialize</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4370">**ResumeRehearsingCount** – Prebrojavanje koliko je puta korisnik kliknuo na nastavak probe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4370">**ResumeRehearsingCount** - Count of how many times user clicked on resume rehearsal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4371">**Sessionid** – ovo je ID sesije prednjih vrata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4371">**Sessionid** - This is speech front door session ID.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4372">Ovo se koristi za otklanjanje grešaka u evidencijama usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4372">This is used to debug service logs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4373">**SlideshowViewLoadTime** – Vreme potrebno za učitavanje projekcije slajdova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4373">**SlideshowViewLoadTime** - Time taken by slideshow to load.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4380">**PayloadCreationTime** – vreme koje je potrebno u milisekundama za kreiranje opterećenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4380">**PayloadCreationTime** - This is the time taken in milliseconds to create payload.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4382">**RehearseSessionId** – ovo je ID sesije prednjih vrata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4382">**RehearseSessionId** - This is speech front door session ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4383">Ovo možemo da koristimo za otklanjanje grešaka u evidencijama usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4383">We can use this to debug service logs.</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4384">**SummaryPageErrorReceived** – to je Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je primljena stranica rezimea ili je došlo do greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4384">**SummaryPageErrorReceived** - This is a Boolean value that indicates if summary page was received or error occurred.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4385">**SummaryPageHtmlLoadTime** – to je vreme u milisekundama koje je potrebno za učitavanje summarypageHtml.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4385">**SummaryPageHtmlLoadTime** - This is the time taken in milliseconds to load summarypageHtml.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4386">**SummaryPageLoadStartTime** – to je vreme u milisekundama za primanje prvog odgovora sa servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4386">**SummaryPageLoadStartTime** - This is the time taken in milliseconds receive first response from the server.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4387">**SummaryPageLoadTime** – vreme potrebno za učitavanje stranice rezimea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4387">**SummaryPageLoadTime** - Time taken to load summary page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4388">Ovo obuhvata vreme kreiranja korisnog tereta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4388">This includes payload creation time.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4389">**ThumbnailsCount** – to je ukupan broj sličica koje će biti deo stranice rezimea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4389">**ThumbnailsCount** - This is the total number of thumbnails that will be part of summary page.</span></span>

#### <a name="officetargetedmessagingabexperimentmessagetrigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4475">Office.TargetedMessaging.ABExperimentMessageTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4475">Office.TargetedMessaging.ABExperimentMessageTrigger</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4476">Prati broj korisnika koji prima „BizBar“ i „Dinamičko platno“ poruke iz „Usluge ciljane razmene poruka“ (TMS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4476">Tracks the number of users receiving BizBar and Dynamic Canvas messages from TargetedMessagingService (TMS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4477">Ovi podaci su od ključni za razumevanje koje poruke korisnici dobijaju i na kojoj površini tako da možemo biti sigurni da korisnici neće propustiti poruke koje mogu biti od presudnog značaja za njihovu dalju upotrebu proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4477">This data is critical to understand what messages users are getting and on what surface so that we can ensure they are not missing any messages that may be critical to their continued use of the product.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4478">Takođe su neophodni za precizno merenje uspeha eksperimenta i kampanje koje se izvršavaju kroz TMS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4478">Also needed to accurately measure the success of our experiments and campaigns run through TMS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4479">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4479">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4480">**Podaci\_Površina** – Ime površine za koju je namenjena poruka isporučena putem ove usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4480">**Data\_Surface** – Name of the surface that this service delivered message is meant for</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4481">**Podaci\_Letovi** – ECS/CT identifikator leta koji je korišćen da isporuči ovu poruku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4481">**Data\_Flight** – ECS/CT Flight identifier that was used to deliver this message</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4482">**Podaci\_IdKampanje** – identifikator kampanje kojoj pripada ova poruka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4482">**Data\_CampaignId** – identifier of the campaign that this message is part of</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4483">**Podaci\_IdPoruke** – identifikator poruke isporučene putem ove usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4483">**Data\_MessageId** – identifier of this service delivered message</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4484">**Podaci\_IdTransakcije** – identifikator ove transakcije sa uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4484">**Data\_TransactionId** – identifier of this transaction with the service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4485">**Podaci\_TačkaAktivacije** – korak u kome je ovaj događaj evidentiran (primljena poruka u odnosu na prikazanu poruku)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4485">**Data\_TriggerPoint** – The step in which this event was logged (message received vs message displayed)</span></span>

#### <a name="officetranslatortexttranslated"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4561">Office.Translator.TextTranslated</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4561">Office.Translator.TextTranslated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4562">Prikuplja uspešno ili neuspešno izvršeno prevođenje izabranog dela dokumenta koje korisnik pokreće u Translator SDX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4562">Collects success or failure of a selection translation that a user action triggers in the Translator SDX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4563">Ovo je od presudnog značaja za proveru ispravnosti funkcije prevođenja i omogućava nam da reagujemo na sve prekide do kojih može doći.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4563">This is critical to evaluate the health of the translation feature and react to any outages that might occur.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4564">Koristi se za praćenje ispravnosti scenarija „Prevođenje odabranog dela“ u programu Excel, PowerPoint, Word.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4564">Used to monitor the health of the "Translate Selection" scenario in Excel, PowerPoint, Word.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4565">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4565">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

#### <a name="officeuxacccheckeracccheckerfinalviolationcountperrule"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4618">Office.UX.AccChecker.AccCheckerFinalViolationCountPerRule</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4618">Office.UX.AccChecker.AccCheckerFinalViolationCountPerRule</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4619">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada se prijave problemi sa pristupačnošću za trenutno otvoreni dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4619">This event is triggered when Accessibility issues are reported for the currently opened document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4620">Ovaj događaj predstavlja kršenja pristupačnosti (greške, upozorenja i saveti) koja postoje po pravilu, za otvoreni dokument na početku i na kraju sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4620">This event represents the Accessibility violations (Errors, Warnings, and Tips) that exist per Rule, for the opened document at the beginning and end of the session.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4621">Ovaj događaj se koristi za snimanje tačaka kršenja pristupačnosti (greške, upozorenja i saveti) po pravilu, za otvoreni dokument na početku i na kraju sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4621">This event is used to record the counts of Accessibility violations (Errors, Warnings, and Tips) per Rule, for the opened document at the beginning and end of the session.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4622">Detalji o tačkama kršenja po pravilu pomažu korporaciji Microsoft da identifikuje koji su problemi sa pristupačnošću najčešći u Office dokumentima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4622">Details of violation counts per rule help Microsoft to identify which Accessibility issues are most common in Office documents.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4623">Ovo pomaže da se oni isprave i pokreće stvaranje inkluzivnog okruženja na radnom mestu i u učionici za osobe sa umanjenim sposobnostima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4623">This helps with work on remediating them and drives the creation of an inclusive environment in the workplace and classroom for people with disabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4624">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4624">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
