#### <a name="officeuxacccheckeracccheckerviolationinformation"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4667">Office.UX.AccChecker.AccCheckerViolationInformation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4667">Office.UX.AccChecker.AccCheckerViolationInformation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4668">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada se prijave problemi sa pristupačnošću za trenutno otvoreni dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4668">This event is triggered when Accessibility issues are reported for the currently opened document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4669">On predstavlja skup tačaka kršenja (greške, upozorenja i saveti) za otvoreni dokument na početku i na kraju sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4669">It represents the aggregate counts of violations (Errors, Warnings, and Tips) for the opened document at the beginning and end of the session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4670">Ovaj događaj se koristi za snimanje skupa tačaka kršenja pristupačnosti (greške, upozorenja i saveti) za otvoreni dokument na početku i na kraju sesije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4670">This event is used to record the aggregate counts of Accessibility violations (Errors, Warnings, and Tips) for the opened document at the beginning and end of the session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4671">Znanje o korišćenju kontrolora pristupačnosti dozvoljava korporaciji Microsoft da poboljša utiske pri radu sa aplikacijom da bi bila inkluzivnija za osobe sa umanjenim sposobnostima u scenarijima korišćenja sistema Office za radno mesto i učionicu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4671">The knowledge of Accessibility checker usage allows Microsoft to improve its application experiences to be more inclusive for people with disabilities in Office usage scenarios for the workplace and classroom.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4672">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4672">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4673">**FinalDocID** – konačni ID dokumenta o skeniranom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4673">**FinalDocID** - Final DocumentID of the scanned document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4674">**FinalDocUrlHash** – konačni heš URL adrese dokumenta o skeniranom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4674">**FinalDocUrlHash** - Final DocumentURLHash of the scanned document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4675">**FinalErrorCount** – konačni zbir grešaka koje je kontrolor pristupačnosti prijavio za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4675">**FinalErrorCount** - Final count of Errors reported by Accessibility Checker for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4676">**FinalIntelligentServiceCount** – konačni zbir problema sa pametnim uslugama koje je kontrolor pristupačnosti prijavio za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4676">**FinalIntelligentServiceCount** - Final count of Intelligent services issues reported by Accessibility Checker for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4677">**FinalTipCount** – konačni zbir saveta koje je kontrolor pristupačnosti prijavio za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4677">**FinalTipCount** - Final count of tips reported by Accessibility Checker for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4678">**FinalViolationCount** – konačni zbir prekršaja koje je kontrolor pristupačnosti prijavio za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4678">**FinalViolationCount** - Final count of violations reported by Accessibility Checker for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4679">**FinalWarningCount** – konačni zbir upozorenja koja je kontrolor pristupačnosti prijavio za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4679">**FinalWarningCount** - Final count of warnings reported by Accessibility Checker in the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4680">**InitialDocID** – početni ID dokumenta o skeniranom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4680">**InitialDocID** - Initial DocumentID of the scanned document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4681">**InitialDocUrlHash** – početni heš URL adrese dokumenta o skeniranom dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4681">**InitialDocUrlHash** - Initial DocumentURLHash of the scanned document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4682">**InitialErrorCount** – broj svih prekršaja tipa “Greška” koji su pronađeni prvi put kada se kontrolor pristupačnosti pokrenuo u sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4682">**InitialErrorCount** - Number of all violations of type Error that were found the first time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4683">**InitialIntelligentServicesCount** – broj svih prekršaja tipa “Inteligentna usluga” koji su pronađeni prvi put kada se kontrolor pristupačnosti pokrenuo u sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4683">**InitialIntelligentServicesCount** - Number of all violations of type Intelligent Service that were found the first time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4684">**InitialTipCount** – broj svih prekršaja tipa “Savet” koji su pronađeni prvi put kada se kontrolor pristupačnosti pokrenuo u sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4684">**InitialTipCount** - Number of all violations of type Tip that were found the first time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4685">**InitialUrlHash** – broj svih prekršaja tipa greške koji su pronađeni prvi put kada se kontrolor pristupačnosti pokrenuo u sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4685">**InitialUrlHash** - Number of all violations of type error that were found the first time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4686">**InitialViolationCount** – broj svih prekršaja koji su pronađeni prvi put kada se kontrolor pristupačnosti pokrenuo u sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4686">**InitialViolationCount** - Number of all violations that were found the first time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4687">**InitialWarningCount** – broj svih prekršaja tipa “Upozorenje” koji su pronađeni prvi put kada se kontrolor pristupačnosti pokrenuo u sesiji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4687">**InitialWarningCount** - Number of all violations of type Warning that were found the first time the acc checker ran in a session.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4688">**PaneOpened** – logički operator koji prati da li je otvaran kontrolor pristupačnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4688">**PaneOpened** - A Boolean that tracks whether the Accessibility Checker pane was opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4689">**ServerDocID** – server ID-a dokumenta za dokument koji je skenirao kontrolor pristupačnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4689">**ServerDocID** - Server DocumentID for the document scanned by the Accessibility checker</span></span>


#### <a name="officeuxacccheckerbackgroundacccheckerenabledstate"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4690">Office.UX.AccChecker.BackgroundAccCheckerEnabledState</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4690">Office.UX.AccChecker.BackgroundAccCheckerEnabledState</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4691">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada je korisnik ili IT administrator omogućio kontrolor pristupačnosti u pozadini za Office korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4691">This event is triggered when the user or IT Admin has enabled the Background Accessibility checker for the Office user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4692">Ovaj događaj se koristi da bi se shvatile instance kada je omogućen kontrolor pristupačnosti u pozadini za Office korisnike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4692">This event is used to understand the instances when the Background Accessibility checker is enabled for Office users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4693">Omogućeni status kontrolora pristupačnosti u pozadini dozvoljava korporaciji Microsoft da shvati da li se dokumenti mogu automatski skenirati u pozadini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4693">The enabled status of the Background Accessibility checker allows Microsoft to understand if documents can be scanned automatically in the background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4694">To pomaže da kreirate inkluzivnije okruženje na radnom mestu i u učionici za osobe sa umanjenim sposobnostima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4694">This helps to create a more inclusive workplace and classroom environment for people with disabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4695">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4695">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4696">**BackgroundAccCheckerEnabled** – logički operator za praćenje omogućenog/onemogućenog stanja kontrolora pristupačnosti u pozadini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4696">**BackgroundAccCheckerEnabled** - Boolean to track the Enabled/Disabled state of the Background Accessibility checker</span></span>


#### <a name="officeuxacccheckerbackgroundscanningcheckboxclicked"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4697">Office.UX.AccChecker.BackgroundScanningCheckboxClicked</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4697">Office.UX.AccChecker.BackgroundScanningCheckboxClicked</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4698">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada korisnik omogući kontrolor pristupačnosti u pozadini iz okna zadatka kontrolora pristupačnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4698">This event is triggered when the user enables the Background Accessibility checker from the Accessibility checker task pane.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4699">Ovaj događaj se koristi da bi se shvatile instance kada je omogućen kontrolor pristupačnosti u pozadini za Office dokumente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4699">This event is used to understand the instances when the Background Accessibility checker is enabled for Office documents.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4700">Omogućeni status kontrolora pristupačnosti u pozadini dozvoljava korporaciji Microsoft da shvati da li se dokumenti mogu automatski skenirati u pozadini.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4700">The enabled status of the Background Accessibility checker allows Microsoft to understand if documents can be scanned automatically in the background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4701">To pomaže da kreirate inkluzivnije okruženje na radnom mestu i u učionici za osobe sa umanjenim sposobnostima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4701">This helps to create a more inclusive workplace and classroom environment for people with disabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4702">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4702">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4703">**FinalBackgroundScanningState** – početno stanje polja za potvrdu koje omogućava skeniranje pozadine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4703">**FinalBackgroundScanningState** - Initial state of the checkbox that enables background scanning</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4704">**InitialBackgroundScanningState** – početno stanje polja za potvrdu koje omogućava skeniranje pozadine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4704">**InitialBackgroundScanningState** - Initial state of the checkbox that enables background scanning</span></span>


#### <a name="officeuxacccheckerdisabledresults"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4705">Office.UX.AccChecker.DisabledResults</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4705">Office.UX.AccChecker.DisabledResults</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4706">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada se kontrolor pristupačnosti onemogući za otvoreni dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4706">This event is triggered when the Accessibility Checker gets disabled for the opened document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4707">Ovaj događaj se koristi da bi se shvatile instance kada se onemogući kontrolor pristupačnosti za Office, zbog zastarelog ili nepodržanog Office dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4707">This event is used to understand the instances when the Office Accessibility checker gets disabled, due to a legacy or unsupported Office document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4708">Onemogućen status kontrolora pristupačnosti dozvoljava korporaciji Microsoft da shvati koliko često dokument nije moguće skenirati i da pomogne korisnicima u omogućavanju skeniranja takvih dokumenata – konvertovanjem naviše dokumenta u moderan format datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4708">The disabled status of the Accessibility checker allows Microsoft to understand how often a document cannot be scanned, and to assist users in allowing the scanning of such documents – by upconverting the document to a modern file format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4709">To pomaže da kreirate inkluzivnije okruženje na radnom mestu i u učionici za osobe sa umanjenim sposobnostima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4709">This helps to create a more inclusive workplace and classroom environment for people with disabilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4710">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4710">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4711">**Data_Disabled_ID** – ID onemogućene greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4711">**Data_Disabled_ID** - ID of the disabled error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4712">**Data_Disabled_Reason** – razlog za onemogućavanje kontrolora pristupačnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4712">**Data_Disabled_Reason** - Reason for disabling the Accessibility Checker</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4713">**Data_IsUpConvertEnabled** – prati da li je konvertovanje naviše u moderan format datoteke dostupno za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4713">**Data_IsUpConvertEnabled** - Tracks whether Upconvert to a modern file format is available for the document</span></span>


#### <a name="officeuxacccheckershowtaskpane"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4714">Office.UX.AccChecker.ShowTaskPane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4714">Office.UX.AccChecker.ShowTaskPane</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4715">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada se okno zadatka kontrolora pristupačnosti pokrene za trenutno otvoreni dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4715">This event is triggered when the Accessibility Checker task pane is launched for the currently opened document.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4716">Ovaj događaj se koristi da bi se shvatila upotreba kontrolora pristupačnosti za Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4716">This event is used to understand the usage of the Office Accessibility Checker.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4717">Kontrolor pristupačnosti se koristi za identifikovanje i popravljene problema sa pristupačnošću u Office dokumentima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4717">The Accessibility Checker is used to identify and remediate Accessibility issues in Office documents.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4718">Znanje o korišćenju kontrolora pristupačnosti dozvoljava korporaciji Microsoft da poboljša utiske pri radu sa aplikacijom da bi bila inkluzivnija za osobe sa umanjenim sposobnostima u scenarijima korišćenja sistema Office za radno mesto i učionicu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4718">The knowledge of Accessibility Checker usage allows Microsoft to improve its application experiences to be more inclusive for people with disabilities in Office usage scenarios for the workplace and classroom.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4719">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4719">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4720">**BackgroundScanCheckboxEnabled** – prati da li je omogućen kontrolor pristupačnosti u pozadini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4720">**BackgroundScanCheckboxEnabled** - Tracks whether the Background Accessibility Checker is enabled</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4721">**Kolona** – Namena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4721">**Column** - Purpose</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4722">**DocUrlHash** – jedinstven heš ID–a dokumenta koji je bio skeniran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4722">**DocUrlHash** - Unique doc ID hash of the document that was scanned</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4723">**HasAccessibilityViolations** – prati da li dokument sadrži bilo kakva kršenja pristupačnosti u momentu kada se okno otvori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4723">**HasAccessibilityViolations** - Tracks if the document contains any accessibility violations at the point the pane is opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4724">**IsPaneDisabled** – prati da li je okno kontrolora pristupačnosti otvoreno u onemogućenom stanju (zastareo ili nepodržani dokument)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4724">**IsPaneDisabled** - Tracks if the Accessibility Checker pane is opened in a disabled state (legacy or unsupported document)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4725">**PaneOpenedBefore** – prati da li je okno kontrolora pristupačnosti otvarano ranije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4725">**PaneOpenedBefore** - Tracks if the Accessibility Checker pane was opened before</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4726">**WAC_ServerDocId** – server ID-a dokumenta koji je bio skeniran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4726">**WAC_ServerDocId** - Server Document ID for the document that was scanned</span></span>


#### <a name="officevisiosharedfeatureexperimentation"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4727">Office.Visio.Shared.FeatureExperimentation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4727">Office.Visio.Shared.FeatureExperimentation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4728">Prati funkciju letova za korisnike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4728">Tracks feature flighting for users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4729">Ovaj događaj nam pomaže da odredimo uspešnost ili neuspešnost funkcije letova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4729">This event helps us determines success or failure of feature flights.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4730">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4730">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4731">**Data\_Enable:bool**- tačno ukazuje na to da je funkcija omogućena za trenutnog korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4731">**Data\_Enable:bool**- true indicate the feature is enabled for current user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4732">**Data\_Feature:string** - ime funkcije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4732">**Data\_Feature:string** - name of the feature</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4733">**Data\_Flighted:bool** - tačno ukazuje na to da je funkcija omogućena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4733">**Data\_Flighted:bool** - true indicates the feature is enabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4734">**Data\_Licensed:bool** - tačno ukazuje na to da se funkcija nalazi u okviru provere licenciranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4734">**Data\_Licensed:bool** - true indicates the feature is under licensing check</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4735">**Data\_Subscriber:bool** - tačno ukazuje na to da korisnik ima licencu za pretplatu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4735">**Data\_Subscriber:bool** - true indicates the user has subscription license</span></span>

#### <a name="officevisiosharedrefreshsmartdiagram"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4736">Office.Visio.Shared.RefreshSmartDiagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4736">Office.Visio.Shared.RefreshSmartDiagram</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4737">Hvata greške u osvežavanju dijagrama kada se datoteka kreira pomoću funkcije VP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4737">Captures diagram refresh failures when file is created through DV.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4738">To nam pomaže da otklonimo greške i probleme u osvežavanju podataka u dijagramu VP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4738">This helps us debug the failures and issues in data refresh in a DV diagram.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4739">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4739">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4740">**Data\_ConnectorsBasedOnSequence:bool** - tačno ako je osveženi dijagram prvobitno keiran pomoću konektora koji se zasniva na opciji „sekvence“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4740">**Data\_ConnectorsBasedOnSequence:bool** - true if the refreshed diagram was originally created using connector based on sequence" option</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4741">**Data\_DialogError**:**string** - greška tokom osvežavanja pametnog dijagrama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4741">**Data\_DialogError**:**string** - error during refreshing smart diagram</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4742">**Data\_FileError:string** - greška niske kada je povezana Excel datoteka nevažeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4742">**Data\_FileError:string** - error string when connected Excel file is invalid</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4743">**Data\_OverwriteSelected**:**bool** - tačno ako je korisnik izabrao opciju zamene dijagrama tokom osvežavanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4743">**Data\_OverwriteSelected**:**bool** - true if user selected overwrite diagram option during refresh</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4744">**Data\_WarningShown**:**bool** - tačno ako je korisniku prikazano upozorenje tokom osvežavanja podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4744">**Data\_WarningShown**:**bool** - true if there was any warning shown to user during data refresh</span></span>

#### <a name="officevisiosharedwritebacktoexcel"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4745">Office.Visio.Shared.WritebackToExcel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4745">Office.Visio.Shared.WritebackToExcel</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4746">Hvata greške povratnog upisivanja u programu Excel kada se datoteka kreira pomoću funkcije VP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4746">Captures Excel write back failures when file is created through DV.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4747">To nam pomaže da otklonimo greške i probleme ponovnog upisivanja podataka u program Excel u dijagramu VP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4747">This helps us debug the failures and issues in writing back data to Excel in a DV diagram.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4748">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4748">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4749">**Data\_ConnectorsBasedOnSequence:bool** - tačno znači da su konektori kreirani na osnovu postavki sekvence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4749">**Data\_ConnectorsBasedOnSequence:bool** - true means connectors are created based on sequence settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4750">**Data\_DataSourceType:string** – Polje koje ukazuje na to da li je dijagram kreiran iz „tabele“ ili „prilagođenog opsega“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4750">**Data\_DataSourceType:string** - This filed indicates whether diagram is created from  "Table" or "CustomRange"</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4751">**Data\_DialogError:string** - tip česte greške koja se javlja tokom kreiranja pametnog dijagrama u programu Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4751">**Data\_DialogError:string** - Custom Error type while creating smart diagram through Excel</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4752">**Data\_NoOfShapesAdded:int** - Broj oblika koji su dodati tokom funkcije ponovnog upisivanja u program Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4752">**Data\_NoOfShapesAdded:int** - Number of shapes added during writeback to Excel functionality</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4753">**Data\_NoOfShapesAdded:int** - Broj oblika koji su obrisani tokom funkcije ponovnog upisivanja u program Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4753">**Data\_NoOfShapesDeleted:int** - Number of shapes deleted during writeback to Excel functionality</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4754">**Data\_OverwriteSelected:bool** - tačno ukazuje na to da je korisnik izabrao opciju zamene podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4754">**Data\_OverwriteSelected:bool** - true indicate user selected overwrite data option</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4755">**Data\_SourceDataModified:bool** - tačno ukazuje na to da su izvorni podaci izmenjeni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4755">**Data\_SourceDataModified:bool** - true indicates source data is modified</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4756">**Data\_WarningShown:bool** - tačno znači da je korisniku prikazano upozorenje o ažuriranju podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4756">**Data\_WarningShown:bool** - true means data update warning shown to the user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4757">**Data\_WarningShownBecauseOfPresenceOfFormula:bool** - tačno ukazuje na to da je korisniku prikazano upozorenje zbog formule koja je prisutna u programu Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4757">**Data\_WarningShownBecauseOfPresenceOfFormula:bool** - true indicates warning shown to the user because of presence of formula in Excel</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4758">**Data\_WarningShownToAddNextStepID:bool** - tačno ukazuje na to da je korisniku prikazano upozorenje zato što u programu Excel nedostaje identifikator sledećeg koraka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4758">**Data\_WarningShownToAddNextStepID:bool** - true indicates warning show to the user because next step Identifier missing in Excel</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4759">**Data\_WarningShownToConvertToTable:bool** - tačno ukazuje na to da je korisniku prikazano upozorenje da konvertuje Excel podatke u format tabele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4759">**Data\_WarningShownToConvertToTable:bool** - true indicates warning shown to the user to convert Excel data to table format</span></span>


#### <a name="officewordfilenewcreatenewfile"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4760">Office.Word.FileNew.CreateNewFile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4760">Office.Word.FileNew.CreateNewFile</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4761">Ovaj događaj označava da je kreiran novi dokument u programu Office Word i prati uspešnost ili neuspešnost operacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4761">This event indicates that a new document is created in Office Word and tracks success or failure of the operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4762">Događaj se koristi da prati da li kreiranje novog dokumenata radi kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4762">The event is used to monitor that new document creation is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4763">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4763">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4764">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4764">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4765">**Podaci\_DirtyState** – Da li je dokument kreiran u nesačuvanom stanju (sa promenama koje treba da se sačuvaju)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4765">**Data\_DirtyState** - whether the document was created in a dirty state (with changes that need to be saved)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4766">**Podaci\_ErrorID** - identifikator greške u slučaju otkazivanja operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4766">**Data\_ErrorID** - error identifier in case of operation failure</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4767">**Data\_MainPdod -** Identifikator dokumenta tokom ove sesije procesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4767">**Data\_MainPdod** - The document identifier during this process session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4768">**Podaci\_KoristiPrilagođeniPredložak** - ukazuje na to da li je dokument kreiran na osnovu prilagođenog predloška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4768">**Data\_UsesCustomTemplate** - indicates whether the document was created from a custom template</span></span>

#### <a name="officewordfileopenuserinitiatedopen"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4769">Office.Word.FileOpen.UserInitiatedOpen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4769">Office.Word.FileOpen.UserInitiatedOpen</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4770">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da Office Word otvara dokument na zahtev korisnika umesto programski.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4770">This event indicates Office Word opens a document by user initiation instead of by Office Word programmatically.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4771">Sadrži i bitne podatke o performansama otvaranja datoteke i o tome da li je u pitanju događaj pokretanja aplikacije iz perspektive korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4771">It also contains critical file open performance data and is an app start event from user perspective.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4772">Događaj prati da li otvaranje datoteke radi kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4772">The event monitors whether file-open is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4773">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4773">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices, and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span> 
 
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4774">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4774">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4775">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** – Izveštava da li smo u slučaju mogli pravilno da popunimo druge vrednosti povezane sa telemetrijom dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4775">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** - Reports whether we were able to properly populate other document telemetry-related values in the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4776">Koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4776">Used for data quality diagnostics.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4777">**Data_BytesAsynchronous** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možemo da otvorimo datoteku ako ih preuzmemo pre nego što korisnik započne uređivanje ili čuvanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4777">**Data_BytesAsynchronous** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we believe we can open the file without if we get them before the user wants to start editing or maybe saving.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4778">**Data_BytesAsynchronousWithWork** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možda možemo da otvorimo dokument, ali potrebno je značajno investiranje u kôd da bi se to omogućilo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4778">**Data_BytesAsynchronousWithWork** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we might be able to open the file without but would require significant code investments to make it happen</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4779">**Data_BytesSynchronous** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) koji moramo da imamo da bismo započeli otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4779">**Data_BytesSynchronous** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we must have before we can start opening the file</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4780">**Data_BytesUnknown** – Broj bajtova u segmentima dokumenta koji ne očekujemo da nađemo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4780">**Data_BytesUnknown** - Number of bytes in document parts that we don't expect to find.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4781">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** -Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4781">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - Document is read only/editable</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4782">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4782">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4783">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Jedinice koje se koriste za postepeno otvaranje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4783">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Units used for incremental document open</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4784">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Postavke elektronske zaštite podataka za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4784">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4785">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta (docx/xlsb/pptx, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4785">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Document extension (docx/xlsb/pptx, etc.)</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4786">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - Verzija protokola za format datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4786">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - File format protocol version</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4787">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - Ime domena za OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4787">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - OneDrive or SharePoint Online Domain Name</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4788">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - Jednosmerni heš imena domena koji se može identifikovati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4788">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - One-way hash of customer identifiable domain name</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4789">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4789">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4790">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Beleži način na koji je otvoren dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4790">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Records how the document was opened</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4791">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Izveštava o keširanim zastavicama koje su korišćene za podešavanje postavki zahteva za otvaranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4791">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Reports on the cached flags used to set open request options</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4792">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Radnje koje su dozvoljene putem smernica za elektronskih zaštitu podataka koje su primenjene na dokument/korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4792">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Actions permitted by the Electronic Data Protection policy that has been applied to the document/user</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4793">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Zastavica koja označava da je dokument postepeno otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4793">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Flag indicating that the document has been incrementally opened</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4794">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je dokument podržan u usluzi saradnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4794">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Flag indicating that the document is supported in the collaboration service</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4795">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to je otvorena vanmrežna kopija dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4795">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Flag indicating that the offline copy of a document was opened</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4796">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** -Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da na računaru postoji kopija koja se automatski sinhronizuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4796">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** - Flag indicating that an auto synced copy of the document exists on the computer</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4797">**Data_Doc_Location** - Označava uslugu koja je obezbedila dokument (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4797">**Data_Doc_Location** - Indicates which service provided the document (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint)</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4798">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Ukazuje na to koja „Poznata fascikla“ je obezbedila lokalno uskladišteni dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4798">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Indicates which Known Folder provided a locally stored document</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4799">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Izračunavanje broja drugih korisnika u sesiji zajedničkog uređivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4799">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Count of the number of fellow users in a collaborative editing session</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4800">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Ukazuje na to da je postavljena zastavica za lozinku za čitanje ili čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4800">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Indicates read or read/write password flags set</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4801">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Razlozi zbog kojih je dokument otvoren samo za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4801">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Reasons why the document was opened read only</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4802">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - Anonimni Identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4802">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - An anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4803">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - Nepromenljivi anonimni Identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4803">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - An immutable anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4804">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - verzija protokola koji se koristi za komunikaciju sa uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4804">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - the protocol version used to communicate with the service</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4805">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - tip servera koji nudi uslugu (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4805">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - the type of the server offering the service (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI etc.)</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4806">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - verzija servera koji nudi uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4806">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - the server version offering the service</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4807">**Data_Doc_SessionId** - Verzija servera koji nudi uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4807">**Data_Doc_SessionId** - the server version offering the service</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4808">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Informacije o dijagnostici iz zahteva usluge SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4808">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Diagnostic information from SharePoint Online requests</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4809">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Indikator veličine dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4809">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Indicator of document size</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4810">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - Indikator specijalnih znakova u URL adresi ili putanji dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4810">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - Indicator of special chars in the document's URL or Path</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4811">**Data_Doc_StreamAvailability** - Indikator koji ukazuje na to da li je protok dokumenta omogućen/onemogućen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4811">**Data_Doc_StreamAvailability** - Indicator if document stream is available/disabled</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4812">**Data_Doc_SyncBackedType** - Indikator tipa dokumenta (lokalni ili iz usluge)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4812">**Data_Doc_SyncBackedType** - Indicator as to the type of document (local or service based)</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4813">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - Jednosmerni heš za kreiranje identifikatora jednostavnog dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4813">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - One-way hash to create a naïve document identifier</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4814">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - Sadrži jedinstveni identifikator WOPI dobavljača usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4814">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - Contains unique identifier of WOPI service provider</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4815">**Data_EditorDisablingRename** -Identifikator prvog urednika zbog kojeg je onemogućeno preimenovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4815">**Data_EditorDisablingRename** - Identifier of the first editor that caused for rename to be disabled</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4816">**Data_EditorsCount** - Broj urednika dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4816">**Data_EditorsCount** - Number of editors in the document</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4817">**Data_ForceReadWriteReason** -Vrednost celog broja koja predstavlja razlog zbog kog je datoteka primorana da se otvori u režimu za čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4817">**Data_ForceReadWriteReason** - Integer value representing the reason why the file was forced into read/write mode</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4818">**Data_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure** - Ukazuje na to da je otvaranje uspelo nakon popravke greške prilikom otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4818">**Data_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure** - Indicates that open succeeded after repairing a failure while opening the document</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4819">**Data_LastLoggedTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za identifikovanje kada otvaranje dva puta ne uspe (koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4819">**Data_LastLoggedTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to identify when we try to fail the open twice (used for data quality diagnostics)</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4820">**Data_LinkStyles** - Ukazuje na to da li se povezujemo sa stilovima predložaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4820">**Data_LinkStyles** - Indicates whether we are linking to the template styles</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4821">**Data_MainPdod** - Identifikator dokumenta koji se obrađuje u programu Office Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4821">**Data_MainPdod** - The document identifier in Office Word process</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4822">**Data_Measurements** - Šifrovana niska koja sadrži analizu vremena otvaranja različitih segmenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4822">**Data_Measurements** - Encoded string containing the time breakdown of the different parts of open.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4823">Koristi se za dijagnostikovanje performanse otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4823">Used to diagnose open performance.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4824">**Data_MoveDisabledReason** - Greška koja onemogućava premeštanje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4824">**Data_MoveDisabledReason** - Error that is disabling move for the document</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4825">**Data_MoveFlightEnabled** - Da li je omogućena putanja za funkciju premeštanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4825">**Data_MoveFlightEnabled** - Whether the flight for the move feature is enabled</span></span>

#### <a name="officewordfilesaveactcmdgosubsaveas"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4836">Office.Word.FileSave.ActCmdGosubSaveAs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4836">Office.Word.FileSave.ActCmdGosubSaveAs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4837">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da korisnik čuva promene u novom dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4837">This event indicates that a user is saving their changes to a new document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4838">Događaj prati da li operacija čuvanja u novom dokumentu radi kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4838">The event monitors whether saving to a new document is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4839">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4839">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4843">**Data_DetachedDuration** - Koliko dugo je radnja odvojena od niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4843">**Data_DetachedDuration** - How long was the activity detached from the thread</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4844">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** -Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4844">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - Document is read only/editable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4845">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4845">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4846">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4846">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4847">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Jedinice koje se koriste za postepeno otvaranje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4847">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Units used for incremental document open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4848">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Postavke elektronske zaštite podataka za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4848">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4849">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta (docx/xlsb/pptx, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4849">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Document extension (docx/xlsb/pptx etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4850">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - Verzija protokola za format datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4850">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - File format protocol version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4851">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - Ime domena za OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4851">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - OneDrive or SharePoint Online Domain Name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4852">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - Jednosmerni heš imena domena koji se može identifikovati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4852">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - One-way hash of customer identifiable domain name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4853">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4853">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4854">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Beleži način na koji je otvoren dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4854">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Records how the document was opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4855">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Izveštava o keširanim zastavicama koje su korišćene za podešavanje postavki zahteva za otvaranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4855">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Reports on the cached flags used to set open request options</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4857">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Zastavica koja označava da je dokument postepeno otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4857">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Flag indicating that the document has been incrementally opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4860">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** -Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da na računaru postoji kopija koja se automatski sinhronizuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4860">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** - Flag indicating that an auto synced copy of the document exists on the computer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4861">**Data_Doc_Location** - Ukazuje na to koja je usluga obezbedila dokument (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4861">**Data_Doc_Location** - Indicates which service provided the document (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4862">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Ukazuje na to koja „Poznata fascikla“ je obezbedila lokalno uskladišteni dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4862">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Indicates which Known Folder provided a locally stored document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4863">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Izračunavanje broja drugih korisnika u sesiji zajedničkog uređivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4863">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Count of the number of fellow users in a collaborative editing session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4864">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Ukazuje na to da je postavljena zastavica za lozinku za čitanje ili čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4864">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Indicates read or read/write password flags set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4865">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Razlozi zbog kojih je dokument otvoren samo za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4865">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Reasons why the document was opened read only</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4867">**Data_Doc_RtcType** –  Označava kako je postavljen kanal u realnom vremenu (RTC) za trenutnu datoteku (onemogućeno, nepodržano, na zahtev, uvek uključeno itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4867">**Data_Doc_RtcType** -  Indicates how the real-time channel (RTC) was set up for current file (Disabled, unsupported, on demand, always on, etc.).</span></span>

#### <a name="officewordfilesaveactfconfirmsavedoccorequerysave"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4886">Office.Word.FileSave.ActFConfirmSaveDocCoreQuerySave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4886">Office.Word.FileSave.ActFConfirmSaveDocCoreQuerySave</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4887">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da program Office Word traži od korisnika da sačuva promene kada program pokuša da zatvori dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4887">This event indicates Office Word prompts the user to save changes when it tries to close the document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4888">On omogućava korporaciji Microsoft da prati da li funkcija „Sačuvaj pri zatvaranju“ radi kao što se očekuje da bi bio izbegnut gubitak podataka u dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4888">It allows Microsoft to monitor whether save-at-quit works as expected to avoid document data loss.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4889">Događaj prati da li funkcija „Sačuvaj pri zatvaranju“ radi kao što se očekuje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4889">The event monitors whether save-at-quit is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4890">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4890">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4894">**Data_DetachedDuration** - Koliko dugo je radnja odvojena od niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4894">**Data_DetachedDuration** - How long was the activity detached from the thread</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4895">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** -Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4895">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - Document is read only/editable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4896">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4896">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4897">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4897">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4898">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Jedinice koje se koriste za postepeno otvaranje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4898">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Units used for incremental document open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4899">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Postavke elektronske zaštite podataka za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4899">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span>

#### <a name="officewordfilesavesaveassavefile"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4948">Office.Word.FileSave.SaveAsSaveFile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4948">Office.Word.FileSave.SaveAsSaveFile</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4949">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da program Office Word čuva dokument kao nov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4949">This event indicates Office Word saves a document into a new document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4950">To omogućava korporaciji Microsoft da otkrije greške u funkciji „Sačuvaj kao“, što je bitno da bi se izbeglo gubljenje podataka u dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4950">It allows Microsoft to detect errors in save-as which is important to avoid document data loss.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4951">Događaj prati da li funkcija „Sačuvaj kao“ radi kao što se očekuje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4951">The event monitors whether save-as is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4952">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4952">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4953">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4953">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4954">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** – Izveštava da li smo u slučaju mogli pravilno da popunimo druge vrednosti povezane sa telemetrijom dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4954">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** - Reports whether we were able to properly populate other document telemetry-related values in the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4955">Koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4955">Used for data quality diagnostics.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4956">**Data_AddDocTelemResDst** – Izveštava da li smo u ovom događaju mogli ispravno da unesemo druge vrednosti koje se tiču telemetrije dokumenta za odredišni dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4956">**Data_AddDocTelemResDst** - Reports whether we were able to properly populate other document telemetry-related values in the event for the destination document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4957">Koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4957">Used for data quality diagnostics.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4958">**Data_AddDocTelemResSrc** – Izveštava da li smo uspeli pravilno da popunimo druge vrednosti povezane sa telemetrijom dokumenta u slučaju izvornog dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4958">**Data_AddDocTelemResSrc** - Reports whether we were able to properly populate other document telemetry-related values in the event for the source document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4959">Koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4959">Used for data quality diagnostics.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4960">**Data_DetachedDuration** - Koliko dugo je radnja odvojena od niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4960">**Data_DetachedDuration** - How long was the activity detached from the thread</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4961">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** -Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4961">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - Document is read only/editable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4962">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4962">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4963">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4963">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4964">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Jedinice koje se koriste za postepeno otvaranje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4964">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Units used for incremental document open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4965">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Postavke elektronske zaštite podataka za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4965">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4966">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta (docx/xlsb/pptx, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4966">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Document extension (docx/xlsb/pptx etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4967">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - Verzija protokola za format datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4967">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - File format protocol version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4968">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - Ime domena za OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4968">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - OneDrive or SharePoint Online Domain Name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4969">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - Jednosmerni heš imena domena koji se može identifikovati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4969">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - One-way hash of customer identifiable domain name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4970">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4970">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4971">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Izveštava o keširanim zastavicama koje su korišćene za podešavanje postavki zahteva za otvaranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4971">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Reports on the cached flags used to set open request options</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4972">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Radnje koje su dozvoljene putem smernica za elektronskih zaštitu podataka koje su primenjene na dokument/korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4972">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Actions permitted by the Electronic Data Protection policy that has been applied to the document/user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-4973">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Zastavica koja označava da je dokument postepeno otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-4973">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Flag indicating that the document has been incrementally opened</span></span>

#### <a name="officewordworddocumentdirtyflagchanged"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5073">Office.Word.Word.DocumentDirtyFlagChanged</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5073">Office.Word.Word.DocumentDirtyFlagChanged</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5074">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da program Office Word uređuje dokument, što menja unutrašnji status dokumenta u „nesređeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5074">This event indicates Office Word edits a document that changes the document internal state into "dirty".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5075">To omogućava korporaciji Microsoft da proceni ispravnost funkcije uređivanja dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5075">It allows Microsoft to evaluate the feature health of edit-document.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5076">Događaj predstavlja otkucaj korisnikovih izmena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5076">The event is a heartbeat of user edits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5077">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5077">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5078">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5078">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5079">**Data\_CollectionTime-** Vremenska oznaka događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5079">**Data\_CollectionTime-** Timestamp of the event</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5080">**Data\_DocumentLocation-** tip lokacije dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5080">**Data\_DocumentLocation-** type of the document location</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5081">**Data\_DocumentLocationDetails-** Podtip lokacije dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5081">**Data\_DocumentLocationDetails-** Sub-type of the document location</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5082">**Data\_FAlwaysSaveEnabled-** Ukazuje na to da li je omogućena funkcija „Uvek sačuvaj“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5082">**Data\_FAlwaysSaveEnabled-** Indicates whether always-save was enabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5083">**Data\_FirstEditTime-** Vremenska oznaka prvog uređivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5083">**Data\_FirstEditTime-** Timestamp of first edit</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5084">**Data\_NumberCoAuthors–** Broj koautora koji uređuju dokument tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5084">**Data\_NumberCoAuthors-** Number of co-authors editing the document during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5085">**Data\_NumberOfTimesDocumentDirtied-** Broj napravljenih izmena u dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5085">**Data\_NumberOfTimesDocumentDirtied-** Number of edits made to the document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5086">**Data\_Pdod -** Identifikator dokumenta koji se obrađuje u programu Office Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5086">**Data\_Pdod-** Document identifier in Office Word process</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5087">**Data\_UrlHash-** Heš putanje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5087">**Data\_UrlHash-** Hash of the document path</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5088">**Data\_ViewKind-** Tip prikaza u programu Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5088">**Data\_ViewKind-** Type of Word view</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5090">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za merenje efikasnosti logike okidača za podsetnik za ocenu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5090">The critical signal used to measure effectiveness of trigger logic for Rating reminder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5091">Ovaj dijalog se prikazuje kada korisnik ispuni sve uslove za prikaz podsetnika za ocenu (br.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5091">This dialog is shown when the user has met all the conditions to see the rating reminder (no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5092">aktivnih dana, da li je prethodno ocenjivao ili nije itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5092">of active days, has rated previously or not, etc.).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5093">Ovo se koristi da bi se obezbedila logika okidača za podsetnik za ocenu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5093">This is used to ensure that the trigger logic for Rating reminder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5094">Ako korisnici vide ovaj dijalog, to će nam obezbediti načine da na vreme dobijemo povratne informacije od klijenata i poboljšamo ispravnost aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5094">If the users are seeing this dialog, it will provide us with ways to receive feedback from the customers on the right time and improve app health.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5095">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5095">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5098">Sakuplja se kada korisnik pokuša da otvori IRM zaštićeni dokument ili primeni IRM zaštitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5098">Collected when a user attempts to open an IRM protected doc or apply IRM protections.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5099">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se događaju prilikom izvršavanja operacije raščlanjivanja licenci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5099">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen when parsing licenses operation is performed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5103">**AppInfo.Version** - Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5103">**AppInfo.Version** - Application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5104">**iKey** – Id servera sistema za evidenciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5104">**iKey** - Logger server ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5105">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** – Id scenarija koji obezbeđuje aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5105">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** - Scenario ID provided by the application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5106">**RMS.Duration** - Ukupno vreme za dovršavanje operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5106">**RMS.Duration** - Total time for the operation to complete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5107">**RMS.DurationWithoutExternalOps** – Ukupno vreme umanjeno za spoljne operacije, kao što je mrežno vreme kašnjenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5107">**RMS.DurationWithoutExternalOps** - Total time minus external operations consumed, such as network latency.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5108">**RMS.ErrorCode** - Kôd bilo koje greške vraćen kao rezultat operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5108">**RMS.ErrorCode** - The error code returned if any from the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5110">**RMS.LicenseFormat** - Format licence: Xrml ili Json</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5110">**RMS.LicenseFormat** - The license Format: Xrml or Json</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5111">**RMS.Result** - Uspešna ili neuspešna operacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5111">**RMS.Result** - Success or fail of the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5112">**RMS.ScenarioId** – ID scenarija definisan klijentom Usluge upravljanja pravima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5112">**RMS.ScenarioId** - Scenario ID defined by Rights Management Service Client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5113">**RMS.SDKVersion** - Verzija klijenta usluge Rights Management</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5113">**RMS.SDKVersion** - The version of Rights Management Service Client</span></span>
