#### <a name="readconversation"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5118">read.conversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5118">read.conversation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5119">Koristi se za monitoring mogućeg negativnog uticaja na zdravlje i performanse prikazivanja e-poruke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5119">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on the health and performance of rendering an email message</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5120">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5120">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5121">**above_40fps** – prebrojavanje okvira prikazanih preko 40 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5121">**above_40fps** - count of frames rendered above 40 fps</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5122">**above_50fps** – broj okvira prikazanih preko 50 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5122">**above_50fps** - count of frames rendered above 50 fps</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5123">**above_55fps** – prebrojavanje okvira prikazanih preko 55 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5123">**above_55fps** - count of frames rendered above 55 fps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5124">**adal_id** – potvrda identiteta korisničkog direktorijuma, jedinstveni identifikator u Microsoft sistemu za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5124">**adal_id** - the account's active directory authentication ID, a unique identifier in the Microsoft authentication system</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5125">**component_name** – ime komponente/prikaz koji je aktivan tokom filtriranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5125">**component_name** - the name of the component/view that is active during the filtering</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5126">**event_mode** - mesto u aplikaciji koje je korisnik uneo u razgovor (grupe ili druge)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5126">**event_mode** - the place in the app that the user entered the conversation (groups or other)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5127">**internet_message_id** - ID praćenja za najnoviju poruku u razgovoru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5127">**internet_message_id** - a tracking ID for the most recent message in the conversation</span></span>
      
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5128">**orientation** - položaj ekrana u trenutku ravnomernosti (uspravno ili položeno)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5128">**orientation** - the screen orientation at the time of the even (portrait or landscape)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5129">**recent_message_id** - ID najnovije poruke u razgovoru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5129">**recent_message_id** - the ID of the most recent message in the conversation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5130">**suggested_reply_state** – stanje predloženih odgovora za ovaj razgovor (nedostupan, dostupan, prikazano, korišćeno, upotrebljeno ili odbačeno)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5130">**suggested_reply_state** - the state of suggested replies for this conversation (unavailable, available, shown, used, or discarded)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5131">**suggested_reply_types** – ukazuje na tip i broj predloženih odgovora prikazanih/korišćenih za ovaj razgovor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5131">**suggested_reply_types** - indicates type and count of suggested reply shown/used for this conversation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5132">To je rečnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5132">It’s a dictionary.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5133">Na primer {text: 2, send_avail: 1}.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5133">For example, {text: 2, send_avail: 1}.</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5134">**total_count** - ukupni okviri koje prikazuje komponenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5134">**total_count** - total frames displayed by the component</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5135">**view_duration** - koliko dugo korisnik prikazuje komponentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5135">**view_duration** - how long the component was viewed by the user</span></span>

#### <a name="saveattempt"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5136">save.attempt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5136">save.attempt</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5137">Omogućava nam da identifikujemo uticaj problema koje su izazvali korisnici koji pokušavaju da sačuvaju datoteku tako što procenjuju broj sesija koji su uticali i ako postoje uobičajene funkcije tih sesija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5137">Allows us to identify the impact of issues caused by users attempting to save a file by evaluating the number of sessions impacted and if there are common features of those sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5138">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5138">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5139">**file_type** - tip datoteke koji je korisnik pokušao da sačuva (na primer. doc)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5139">**file_type** - The type of file the user tried to save (such as .doc)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5140">**origin** - odakle potiče pokušaj čuvanja datoteke, (na primer, iz e-poruke) kako bismo mogli da otkrijemo probleme koje se odnose na čuvanje datoteke sa određenog mesta u aplikaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5140">**origin** - Where the file save attempt originated from (such as from an email) so we can detect issues associated with saving a file from a specific place in the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5141">**token_type** - tip simbola koji se koristi za potvrdu identiteta naloga da biste sačuvali datoteku kako bi nam pomogao u otkrivanju problema potvrde identiteta povezanog sa čuvanjem datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5141">**token_type** - the type of token used to authenticate the account in order to save the file to help us detect authentication issues associated with saving a file</span></span>

#### <a name="searchsubtabselected"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5142">search.subtab.selected</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5142">search.subtab.selected</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5143">Događaj prikuplja tačke porekla za razlog što je odabrana podkartica za pretraživanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5143">The event collects origin points for the reason a search sub_tab was selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5144">Podkartice se nalaze ispod primarne trake za pretraživanje aplikacije radi filtriranja podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5144">The sub tabs sit under the primary app search bar to filter data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5145">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da pratimo proširenja za verziju tipa entiteta (sve, pošta, kontakti i kalendar) koje korisnici koriste kada obave pretragu kako bismo obezbedili da mehanizmi filtera pretrage funkcionišu ispravno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5145">This event lets us track the entity type pills (all, mail, contacts, and calendar) that users are using when they do their searches so we can ensure the search filter mechanisms are working properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5146">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5146">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5147">**properties_general** – Opšta svojstva koja prikupljaju svi Aria događaji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5147">**properties_general** -The general properties that all Aria event is collecting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5148">**selected_reason** – Uzrok vrste pilule koja se odabira, a koja može biti jedna od ovih vrednosti (glif je ikona): tap_on_header, tap_on_see_all, enter_search_mode, mail_glyph, calendar_glyph.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5148">**selected_reason** - The cause of the type pill getting selected, which could be one of the following values (glyph being an icon): tap_on_header, tap_on_see_all, enter_search_mode, mail_glyph, calendar_glyph.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5149">**subtab_type** – Proširenje za verziju tipa koji je izabran, što može da bude jedna od ove četiri vrednosti: sve, pošta, kontakt, događaj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5149">**subtab_type** - The type pill that got selected, which could be one of these four values: all, mail, contact, event.</span></span>

#### <a name="sendmessage"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5150">send.message</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5150">send.message</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5151">Koristi se za monitoring mogućeg negativnog uticaja na performanse i zdravlje slanja e-poruka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5151">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on the performance and health of sending email messages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5152">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5152">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5153">**account** – prati nalog koji je izvršio akciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5153">**account** - tracks the account that performed the action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5154">**compose_duration** - prati ukupno vreme koje je korisniku potrebno za sastavljanje poruke, uključujući više sesija radnih verzija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5154">**compose_duration** - tracks the total time user took to compose the message including multiple drafts session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5155">**draft_message_id** - prati ID poruke za pisanje koja se šalje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5155">**draft_message_id** - tracks the compose message ID of the message being sent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5156">**event_mode** – prati režim događaja ako je primenljiv na poruku, ("grupe" ili "drugo")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5156">**event_mode** - tracks the event mode if applicable to the message ("groups" or "other")</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5157">**has_attachment** - označava da li poruka ima priloge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5157">**has_attachment** - indicates whether message has any attachments</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5158">**has_mip_label** - označava da li je nalepnica "MIP" bila označena na poruci ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5158">**has_mip_label** - indicates whether a MIP label was stamped on the message or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5159">**is_group_escalation** – da li je ovo grupna eskalirana poruka, "eskalirana poruka" je poruka koja je poslata u poštansko sanduče korisnika zbog eskalacije (pretplaćenog na grupu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5159">**is_group_escalation** - is this a group escalated message, "escalated message" is a message that was sent to the user's mailbox because of an escalation (subscribed to group)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5160">**is_groups** - praćenje da li je poslata poruka grupna poruka ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5160">**is_groups** - track whether message sent is a groups message or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5161">**key_stroke_count** - praćenje pritisaka na taster za poruku koja se šalje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5161">**key_stroke_count** - tracks the keystrokes count for the message that is being sent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5162">**message_id** - prati ID poruke koje se odgovore/prosleđuju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5162">**message_id** - tracks the message ID being replied/forwarded</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5163">**origin** – označava gde je pokrenuto pisanje, npr. novi, odgovor, brzi odgovor itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5163">**origin** - indicates where compose was initiated, that is, new, reply, quick reply etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5164">**send_draft_origin** – označava gde je pokrenuto slanje, npr. pisanje ili kratki odgovor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5164">**send_draft_origin** - indicates where send was initiated, that is, compose or quick reply</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5165">**smart_compose_model_version** – prati koja se verzija modela pametnog sastavljanja koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5165">**smart_compose_model_version** - tracks which version of smart compose model is being used</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5166">**source_inbox** - označava izvorno Prijemno sanduče u referenci poruke,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5166">**source_inbox** - indicates source inbox type for reference message,</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5167">**suggested_reply_state** – hvatanje predložene poruke za odgovor, odnosno nedostupan, dostupan, prikazano, upotrebljeno, odbačen za ovu poslatu poštu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5167">**suggested_reply_state** - capturing suggested reply state that is, unavailable, available, shown, used, discarded for this sent mail</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5168">**suggested_reply_types** – ukazuje na tip i broj predloženih odgovora prikazanih/korišćenih za ovu poslatu e-poruku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5168">**suggested_reply_types** - indicates type and count of suggested reply shown/used for this sent email.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5169">To je rečnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5169">It’s a dictionary.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5170">Na primer {text: 2,  send_avail: 1}.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5170">For example, {text: 2,  send_avail: 1}.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5171">**suggestions_requested** – pokazuje koliko se predloga pametnog sastavljanja traži</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5171">**suggestions_requested** - indicates how many smart compose suggestions requested</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5172">**suggestions_results** – rezulysti predloga pametnog sastavljanja, tj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5172">**suggestions_results** - smart compose suggestions’ result, i.e</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5173">prihvaćeno, odbijeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5173">accepted, rejected</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5174">**suggestions_returned** – pokazuje koliko je predloga pametnog sastavljanja vraćeno sa servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5174">**suggestions_returned** - indicates how many smart compose suggestions returned from server</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5175">**suggestions_shown** – pokazuje koliko se predloga pametnog sastavljanja prikazuje korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5175">**suggestions_shown** - indicates how many smart compose suggestions shown to the user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5176">**thread_id** - označava nit ID razgovora koji su odgovoreni/prosleđeni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5176">**thread_id** - indicates thread ID of the conversation being replied/forwarded</span></span>

#### <a name="session"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5177">sesija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5177">session</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5178">Omogućava nam da otkrijemo i rešimo situacije u kojima koristimo previše baterije uređaja i pomažu nam da identifikujemo šta može da bude uzrok.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5178">Allows us to detect and fix situations where we are using up too much of your device's battery and helps us identify what could be the cause.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5179">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5179">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5180">**battery_level** – saopštava nam nivo baterije na uređaju koji će nam pomoći da otkrijemo kada aplikacija uzrokuje negativan uticaj na nivo baterije uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5180">**battery_level** - tells us the battery level on the device to help us detect when our app is causing a negative impact on your device's battery level</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5181">**has_hx** - govori nam da nalog koristi našu novu uslugu sinhronizacije kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme izazvane uslugom sinhronizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5181">**has_hx** - Tells us the account is using our new sync service to help us detect issues caused by our sync service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5182">**Session.Duration** – dužina sesije u sekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5182">**Session.Duration** - the length of the session in seconds</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5183">**Session.DurationBucket** – dužina trajanja vremenskog područja *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojaviti u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5183">**Session.DurationBucket** - duration length time bucket *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5184">**Session.FirstLaunchTime**– prvo zabeleženo vreme pokretanja aplikacije *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz trenutnih verzija sistema Office, ali se i dalje može pojaviti u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5184">**Session.FirstLaunchTime** - first recorded launch time of the app *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5185">**Session.State** – indikator da li je ovo početak ili kraj sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5185">**Session.State** - the indicator of whether this is the start or end of the session</span></span>

#### <a name="settingsaction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5186">settings.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5186">settings.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5187">Ovaj događaj prikuplja informacije o konfiguraciji u postavkama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5187">This event collects the configuration information in settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5188">Podaci nam omogućavaju da otkrijemo situacije u kojima postoji mogući negativnog uticaja na mogućnost korisnika da konfiguriše postavke aplikacije, kao što su postavke obaveštenja, primarni nalog e-pošte i da konfiguriše potpis e-pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5188">The data allows us to detect situations where there is possible negative impact on the users’ ability configure app settings, such as notification settings, primary mail account, and configuring the email signature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5189">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5189">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5190">**account_order_changed** - da biste proverili da li je ova konfiguracija promenjena, da biste se uverili da ova konfiguracija ispravno funkcioniše</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5190">**account_order_changed** - To check if you changed the order of your accounts to make sure this configuration works properly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5191">**action** - potencijalne radnje preduzete u okviru postavke, kao što je brisanje naloga kako bi nam pomoglo da ustanovimo negativne probleme i obezbedimo da nema negativnog uticaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5191">**action** - possible actions taken in settings, such as deleting an account to help us diagnose issues and ensure no negative impact</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5192">**auth_type** - tip potvrde identiteta koju koristi nalog, tako da možemo da shvatimo koji pozadinski sloj za sinhronizaciju koristimo da bismo pomogli u dijagnostikovanju problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5192">**auth_type** - The authentication type being used by the account, so we understand which backend sync layer we are using to help us diagnose issues</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5193">**changed_folder** – hvatanje u vidu da li se fascikla promenila da bi nam pomoglo da ustanovimo probleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5193">**changed_folder** - Capturing whether a folder was changed to help us diagnose issues.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5194">**delete_scope** – tokom brisanja naloga, bez obzira na to da li ste izbrisali nalog sa ovog uređaja ili sa svih uređaja sa programom Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5194">**delete_scope** - During an account deletion, whether you deleted the account from this device or from all devices with Outlook.</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5195">**enabled_state** – bilo da automatski odgovarate, čuvate kontakte i blokirate spoljne slike, postavke su ispravno konfigurisane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5195">**enabled_state** - Whether your auto reply, save contacts, and block external images settings are configured correctly</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5196">**notification_action** – da biste proverili da li ste konfigurisali radnje obaveštenja za sledeće e-poruke kako bi nam pomogli da se uverimo da ova postavka uspešno funkcioniše</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5196">**notification_action** - To check if you have configured any notification actions for triaging emails to help us make sure this setting is working successfully</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5197">**notification_action_number** – da biste proverili da li su vaše radnje obaveštenja (radnja 1 ili radnja 2) ispravno konfigurisane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5197">**notification_action_number** - To check if your notification actions (action one or action two) are configured correctly</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5198">**server_type** – slični auth_type, on nam pokazuje koji tip naloga treba da nam pomogne da bolje ustanovimo probleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5198">**server_type** - Similar to auth_type, it tells us which type of account you have to help us diagnose issues better.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5199">Primeri: Office365, Gmail, Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5199">Examples: Office365, Gmail, Outlook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5200">**setting_properties** – Prati svojstva u vezi sa podešavanjem radnji detaljno opisanih u nastavku:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5200">**setting_properties** - Tracks properties relation to setting action detailed below:</span></span> 
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5201">**alternate_app_icon_setting** – izabrana alternativna ikona aplikacije (svetla, tamna)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5201">**alternate_app_icon_setting** - the selected alternate app icon (light, dark)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5202">**auth_type** – ukazuje na tip potvrde identiteta na zadnjoj strani koji nam omogućava da znamo da li postoji problem sa određenim tipom naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5202">**auth_type** - indicates the back-end authentication type allowing us to know if there is an issue with a particular account type</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5203">**badge_count_state** – označava tip broja na bedžu koji je korisnik zatražio tj. bez značaka, fokusirano prijemno poštansko sanduče itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5203">**badge_count_state** - indicates what type of badge count the user has asked for that is, no badges, focused inbox only, etc.</span></span> 
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5204">**changed_folder** – utvrđuje da li je ova radnja arhivirana, planirana ili druga radnja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5204">**changed_folder** - determines whether this action was archived, scheduled, or another action.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5205">**delete_scope** – prati da li je ova radnja bila u vezi sa brisanjem nekoga samo na ovom uređaju ili na svim uređajima, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5205">**delete_scope** - tracks whether this action was related to deleting someone just on this device or on all devices, if applicable.</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5206">**enabled_state** - bez obzira na to da li je stanje vezano za akciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5206">**enabled_state** - whether state related to the action is enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5207">**in_app_language** – izabrani jezik u aplikaciji, tip niske (podrazumevani, en-US, fa, ru itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5207">**in_app_language** - the selected in-app language, string type (default, en-US, fa, ru etc.)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5208">**notification_action_setting** – ukazuje na detalje, ako je primenljivo, postavki obaveštenja koja se tiču ove radnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5208">**notification_action_setting** - indicates the details of, if applicable, notification action settings related to this action</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5209">**notification_action** – označava ono što je korisnik pokušavao da uradi, npr. zastavica, brisanje, arhiviranje, to nam omogućava da ustanovimo koju radnju poruke je korisnik želeo da izvrši u obaveštenju, kao i da li je radnja uspela ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5209">**notification_action** - indicates what the user was trying to do, that is, flag, delete, archive, it allows us to determine what message action the user wanted to perform on the notification and if the action failed or not.</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5210">**notification_action_number** – ukazuje na to koji broj radnje (dve od tri radnje su prilagodljive) je dodeljen radnji obaveštenja, tj. radnja jedan, radnja dva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5210">**notification_action_number** - indicates which action number (two of three actions are customizable) was assigned a notification action, that is, action one, action two.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5211">To nam omogućava da utvrdimo da li postoji problem sa određenom radnjom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5211">This allows us to determine if there is a problem with a particular action.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5212">**notification_state** – označava tip broja na bedžu koji je korisnik zatražio tj. bez značaka, fokusirano prijemno poštansko sanduče itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5212">**notification_state** - indicates what type of badge count the user has asked for that is, no badges, focused inbox only, etc.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5213">**server_type** – ukazuje na tip pomoćnog servera koji nam omogućava da znamo da li postoji problem sa određenom vrstom servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5213">**server_type** - indicates the back-end server type allowing us to know if there is an issue with a particular server type</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5214">**izvor** – označava šta je izvor obaveštenja, ako je primenljivo, iz postavki ili ne uznemiravaj postavke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5214">**source** - indicates what is the source of notifications, if applicable, from settings or do not disturb setting</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5215">**swipe_setting** – ukazuje na detalje, ako je primenljivo, postavki prevlačenja koje se tiču ove radnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5215">**swipe_setting** - indicates the details of, if applicable, swipe settings related to this action</span></span>
     - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5216">**swipe_action** – označava ono što je korisnik pokušavao da uradi, npr. zastavica, brisanje, arhiviranje, to nam omogućava da ustanovimo koju akciju je korisnik tražio, kao i da li je radnja uspela ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5216">**swipe_action** - indicates what the user was trying to do, that is, flag, delete, archive, it allows us to determine what action the user wanted and if the action failed or not.</span></span> 
     - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5217">**swipe_direction** – označava na koji način će korisnik podesiti prevlačenje, tj. sleva nadesno ili zdesna nalevo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5217">**swipe_direction** - indicates which way the user set up the swipe to be, that is, left to right or right to left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5218">To nam omogućava da odlučimo da li postoji problem sa određenim pravcima za brzo prevlačenje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5218">This allows us to determine if there is a problem with a particular swipe direction.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5219">**temperature_unit_setting** – izabrana jedinica za temperaturu koja treba da se koristi za vremensku prognozu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5219">**temperature_unit_setting** -  the selected temperature unit to be used for weather</span></span> 
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5220">**theme_color_setting** – prilagođena boja teme aplikacije koju je izabrao korisnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5220">**theme_color_setting** - the custom app theme color selected by the user</span></span> 
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5221">**ui_mode_setting** – izabrani režim korisničkog interfejsa (mračno, svetlo, podrazumevano sistemski, niska baterija itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5221">**ui_mode_setting** - the selected UI mode (dark, light, system default, low battery etc.)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5222">**signature_setting** – označava da li je postavka primenjena na ceo nalog ili pojedinačni nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5222">**signature_setting** - indicates if the setting was applied to all account or an individual account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5223">**state_changed_to** – da biste proverili da li je postavka vašeg fokusiranog prijemnog sandučeta „uključeno/isključeno“ ispravno konfigurisana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5223">**state_changed_to** - To check if your focused inbox On/Off setting is configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5224">**swipe_action** – da biste proverili da li ste konfigurisali radnje brzog prevlačenja za sledeće e-poruke kako bi nam pomogli da se uverimo da ova postavka uspešno funkcioniše</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5224">**swipe_action** - To check if you have configured any swipe actions for triaging emails to help us make sure this setting is working successfully</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5225">**swipe_direction** – da biste proverili da li su vam smerovi prevlačenja (levo ili desno) ispravno konfigurisani</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5225">**swipe_direction** - To check if your swipe directions (left or right) are configured correctly</span></span>


#### <a name="sidebaraction"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5226">sidebar.action</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5226">sidebar.action</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5227">Omogućava nam da otkrijemo situacije u kojima postoji mogući negativnog uticaja na vašu mogućnost da konfigurišete postavke aplikacije, kao što su postavke obaveštenja, primarni nalog e-pošte i da konfigurišete potpis pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5227">Allows us to detect situations where there is possible negative impact on your ability configure your app settings, such as your notification settings, your primary mail account, and configuring your mail signature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5228">Polja podataka koja su uobičajena za Outlook Mobile za ovaj događaj na iOS i Android uređajima:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5228">Data fields that are common for Outlook Mobile for this event on iOS and Android:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5229">**Account** – prati nalog i njegove podatke koji su povezani sa događajem, vrednosti koje su praćene u tim podacima su u zajedničkoj dokumentaciji OM polja *[Ovo polje je uklonjeno iz aktuelnih verzija sistema Office ali se i dalje može pojavljivati u starijim verzijama.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5229">**Account** - tracks the account and its data associated with the event, values tracked in this data are in the common om field documentation *[This field has been removed from current builds of Office, but might still appear in older builds.]*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5230">**action** – praćenje tipa radnje bočne trake tj. odbačeno, izabrana pomoćna dugmad, bočna traka pošte itd.,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5230">**action** - tracks the type of side bar action occurred, that is, dismissed, help button selected, mail side bar, etc.,</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5231">**from_favorites** - prati da li radnja dolazi iz stavke u omiljenim lokacijama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5231">**from_favorites** - tracks if the action is coming from an item in favorites</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5232">**mail_folder_type** - kakav tip fascikle je izabran tokom radnje na traci sa strane, ako ih ima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5232">**mail_folder_type** - what type of folder was selected during the side bar action, if any.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5233">**sidebar_type** – prati tip bočne trake povezane sa ovim događajem, tj. poštu ili kalendar kako bi nam pomogao da obezbedimo da navigacija kroz postavku omiljenih lokacija funkcioniše ispravno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5233">**sidebar_type** - tracks the type of side bar associated with this event, that is, mail or calendar to help us ensure the navigation from the favorites setting works properly</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5234">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5234">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5235">**account_type** – označava tip potvrde identiteta naloga tj. gmail, outlook itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5235">**account_type** - indicates what authentication type the account is that is, Gmail, outlook, etc.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5236">**account_has_groups** - pomaže nam da se uverimo da li nalog ima grupe, da su one ispravno konfigurisane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5236">**account_has_groups** - Helps us make sure if the account has groups, they are configured correctly</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5237">**calendar_accounts_count** - broj naloga kalendara za koje morate da nam pomognete da se uverimo da su nalozi kalendara ispravno konfigurisani</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5237">**calendar_accounts_count** - Number of calendar accounts you have to help us make sure your calendar accounts are configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5238">**calendar_apps_count** - broj aplikacija za kalendar za koje morate da nam pomognete da se uverimo da su zanimljive za kalendar su ispravno konfigurisane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5238">**calendar_apps_count** - Number of calendar apps you have to help us make sure your interesting calendar apps are configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5239">**calendar_type** - tip kalendara koji imate (primarni kalendar, grupni kalendar itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5239">**calendar_type** - The type of calendar you have (Primary calendar, Group calendar, etc.)</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5240">**has_favorite_folders** - pomaže nam da se uverimo da su omiljene fascikle ispravno konfigurisane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5240">**has_favorite_folders** - Helps us make sure favorite folders are configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5241">**has_favorite_people** - pomaže nam da se uverimo da su omiljene osobe/kontakti konfigurisani ispravno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5241">**has_favorite_people** - Helps us make sure favorite people/contacts are configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5242">**has_group_calendar** - pomaže nam da se uverimo, ukoliko imate grupne kalendare, da su oni ispravno konfigurisani</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5242">**has_group_calendar** - Helps us make sure if you have group calendars, they are configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5243">**has_group_calendar_account** - pomaže nam da se uverimo, ukoliko imate grupne kalendare, da su oni ispravno konfigurisani</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5243">**has_group_calendar_account** - Helps us make sure if you have group calendars, they are configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5244">**has_group_toggled** - pomaže nam da se uverimo da ako ste proverili grupisanje kalendara, da je ova postavka ispravno konfigurisana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5244">**has_group_toggled** - Helps us make sure if you have toggled group calendars, this setting is configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5245">**interesting_calendar_accounts_count** - broj zanimljivih naloga kalendara za koje morate da nam pomognete da se uverimo da su zanimljivi nalozi kalendara ispravno konfigurisani</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5245">**interesting_calendars_accounts_count** - Number of interesting calendar accounts you have to help us make sure your interesting calendar accounts are configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5246">**mail_accounts_count** - ukupan broj naloga pošte na bočnoj traci da biste se uverili da je ovo ispravno konfigurisano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5246">**mail_accounts_count** - The total number of mail accounts in the sidebar to make sure this is configured correctly</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5247">**mail_folder_type** – tip fascikle na koju je korisnik tapnuo da bi se uverili da je ispravno konfigurisana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5247">**mail_folder_type** - The type of folder the user tapped on to make sure it's configured correctly.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5248">To može da uključi izbrisanu fasciklu, bezvrednu poštu ili fasciklu koja je poslata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5248">This could include Deleted folder, Spam, or your Sent folder.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5249">**mail_inbox_unread_count** - pomaže nam da osiguramo da se prebrojavanje nepročitano prikazuje i precizno konfiguriše</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5249">**mail_inbox_unread_count** - Helps us ensure the unread count is displayed and configured accurately</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5250">**mail_subfolder_depth** – pomaže nam da uspešno prikažemo konfiguranje podfascikli za poštu korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5250">**mail_subfolder_depth** - Helps us ensure we can successfully display a user's mail subfolder configurations</span></span>

#### <a name="storeop"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5251">StoreOp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5251">StoreOp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5252">Sakuplja se kada korisnik pokuša da otvori IRM zaštićeni dokument ili primeni IRM zaštitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5252">Collected when a user attempts to open an IRM protected doc or apply IRM protections.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5253">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se događaju prilikom izvršavanja operacije skladištenja licence Usluge upravljanja pravima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5253">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen when Rights Management Service license store operation is performed.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5254">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5254">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5255">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** – Hijerarhija klijenata koja označava da aplikacija radi u proizvodnom okruženju ili razvojnom okruženju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5255">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** - Client hierarchy, which indicates the application runs in production environment or developer environment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5256">**AppInfo.Name** – Ime aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5256">**AppInfo.Name** - Application name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5257">**AppInfo.Version** - Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5257">**AppInfo.Version** - Application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5258">**iKey** - Id servera usluge vođenja evidencije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5258">**iKey** - Logging service server ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5259">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** – Id scenarija koji obezbeđuje aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5259">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** - Scenario ID provided by the application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5260">**RMS.ContentId** – Id sadržaja u licenci krajnjeg korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5260">**RMS.ContentId** - Content ID in End User License</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5261">**RMS.Duration** - Ukupno vreme za dovršavanje API poziva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5261">**RMS.Duration** - Total time for API call to complete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5262">**RMS.DurationWithoutExternalOps** – Ukupno vreme umanjeno za spoljne operacije, kao što je mrežno vreme kašnjenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5262">**RMS.DurationWithoutExternalOps** - Total time minus external operations consumed, such as network latency.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5263">**RMS.ErrorCode** - Kôd bilo koje greške vraćen kao rezultat operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5263">**RMS.ErrorCode** - The error code returned if any from the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5264">**RMS.HttpCall** - označava postojanje HTTP operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5264">**RMS.HttpCall** - indicate if there is HTTP operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5265">**RMS.LicenseFormat** - Format licence: Xrml ili Json</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5265">**RMS.LicenseFormat** - The license Format: Xrml or Json</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5266">**RMS.OperationName** – Ime operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5266">**RMS.OperationName** - Operation name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5267">**RMS.Result** - Uspešna ili neuspešna operacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5267">**RMS.Result** - Success or fail of the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5268">**RMS.ScenarioId** – ID scenarija definisan klijentom Usluge upravljanja pravima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5268">**RMS.ScenarioId** - Scenario ID defined by Rights Management Service Client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5269">**RMS.SDKVersion** - Verzija klijenta usluge Rights Management</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5269">**RMS.SDKVersion** - The version of Rights Management Service Client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5270">**RMS.ServerType** - Tip servera Usluge upravljanja pravima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5270">**RMS.ServerType** - The type of Rights Management Service Server</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5271">**RMS.StatusCode** - Kod statusa rezultata operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5271">**RMS.StatusCode** - Status code of the operation result</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5272">**RMS.Url** – URL adresa servera Usluge upravljanja pravima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5272">**RMS.Url** - The URL of Rights Management Service Server</span></span>

#### <a name="watchappv2"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5273">watchAppV2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5273">watchAppV2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5274">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo i rešimo moguće probleme sa mogućnostima na Apple satu kao što su primanje obaveštenja i odgovaranje na e-poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5274">This event allows us to detect and fix possible issues with capabilities on your Apple Watch such as receiving notifications and responding to emails.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5275">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5275">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5276">**app_action** – govori nam tipove radnje koje je korisnik koristio u Apple watch, kao što je "archive_message" kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme koji se odnose na određenu akciju kao što je nemoguće uspešno arhiviranje poruke na Apple watch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5276">**app_action** - Tells us the types of action the user took on the Apple watch, such as "archive_message" to help us detect issues related to a specific action such as being unable to successfully archive messages on the Apple Watch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5277">**is_watch_app_installed** - saopštava nam da li je korisnik instalirao Apple Watch aplikaciju na svom uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5277">**is_watch_app_installed** - Tells us if the user has installed our Apple Watch app on their device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5278">**is_complication_enabled** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik dodao Outlook na Apple Watch ekran kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa Apple Watch ekranima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5278">**is_complication_enabled** - Tells us if the user has added Outlook to their Apple Watch screen to help us detect issues related to Apple Watch screens</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5279">**watch_os** - govori nam verziju OS koji su instalirali na Apple satu kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa određenim verzijama programa Apple sata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5279">**watch_os** - Tells us the OS version of the Apple Watch they have installed to help us detect issues related to specific OS versions of the Apple Watch</span></span>


### <a name="application-status-and-boot-subtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5280">*Status aplikacije i podtip pokretanja*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5280">*Application status and boot subtype*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5281">Utvrđivanje da li su se određene funkcije događaja odigrale, kao što su pokretanje ili zaustavljanje i da li funkcija radi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5281">Determination if specific feature events have occurred, such as start or stop, and if feature is running.</span></span>

#### <a name="appstartup"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5282">app.startup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5282">app.startup</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5283">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo i rešimo probleme tamo gde se Outlook kreće sporo ili nepotpuno, što otežava korisnicima da koriste našu aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5283">This event lets us detect and fix issues where Outlook is starting slowly or incompletely, making it difficult for users to use our app.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5284">Ovo obuhvata informacije o specifičnim funkcijama koje su omogućene i koliko su dugački delovi pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5284">This includes information on the specific features that were enabled and how long parts of the startup took.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5285">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5285">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5286">**attach_base_context_millis** - vreme između početka osnovnog konteksta i početka onCreate()</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5286">**attach_base_context_millis** - time between the base Context starting and onCreate() starting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5287">**device_ram_in_mb** - RAM dostupan na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5287">**device_ram_in_mb** - the RAM available on the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5288">**has_company_portal** - da li je instalirana aplikacija za kompaniju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5288">**has_company_portal** - whether the company portal app is installed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5289">**hx_okhttp_mode** - da li nova komponenta usluge za sinhronizaciju e-pošte koristi OKHttp za slanje i primanje mrežnih zahteva zasnovanih na usluzi HTTP-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5289">**hx_okhttp_mode** - whether the new email syncing service component is using OKHttp for sending and receiving HTTP-based network requests</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5290">**initial_activity_name** – android aktivnost koja je pokrenula aplikaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5290">**initial_activity_name** - the Android Activity that launched the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5291">**manufacturer** - proizvođač uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5291">**manufacturer** - the device manufacturer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5292">**model** - model uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5292">**model** - the device model</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5293">**on_create_millis** - potrošeno vreme u onCreate() metodi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5293">**on_create_millis** - time taken in the onCreate() method</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5294">**on_resume_millis** - vreme potrošeno u onResume() metodi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5294">**on_resume_millis** - time taken in the onResume() method</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5295">**time_until_attach** - vreme između učitavanja klase i početnog pokretanja konteksta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5295">**time_until_attach** - time between the class loading and the base Context starting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5296">**total_millis** - ukupno vreme od početka učitavanja razreda do završetka nastavka Android aktivnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5296">**total_millis** - total time from class loading start to Android Activity resume completion</span></span>

#### <a name="boottime"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5297">boot.time</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5297">boot.time</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5298">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo kada su se dogodile kritične greške u aplikaciji koje bi mogle prouzrokovati pad aplikacije ili ozbiljne probleme, kao što je prouzrokovanje da vidite prazne redove u pristigloj pošti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5298">This event lets us detect when critical app errors occurred that would cause your app to crash or experience serious issues like causing you to see empty rows in your inbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5299">Ovaj događaj prikuplja informacije koje nam omogućavaju da razvrstavamo i klasifikujemo probleme radi određivanja prioriteta uticaja problema na klijente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5299">This event collects information that allows us to categorize and classify issues to help prioritize the impact of issues on customers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5300">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5300">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5301">**black_list_reason** - govori nam da li postoji razlog za zanemarivanje tih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5301">**black_list_reason** - Tells us if there is a reason why we should disregard this data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5302">Neki primeri uključuju pokretanje zbog daljinskog obaveštenja i pokretanja zbog dodavanja pozadine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5302">Some examples include launching due to a remote notification and launching due to a background fetch.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5303">**step_premain** – Pokazuje nam vreme potrebno da Outlook pređe sa korisničkog dodirivanja ikone do step0_main „glavnog“ koraka definisanog u ovom dokumentu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5303">**step_premain** – Tells us the amount of time it has taken for Outlook to go from the user tapping the icon to step0_main the “main” step defined in this document.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5304">**step0_main** – saopštava vreme koje je preduzeo za Outlook da bi prošao do "glavnog" koraka, što je korak koji je definisao Apple.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5304">**step0_main** - Tells us the amount of time it has taken for Outlook to get to the "main" step, which is a step defined by Apple.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5305">**step1_appWillFinishLaunching** – govori nam koliko je vremena potrebno da Outlook pređe iz "glavnog" koraka u korak "appVillFinishLaunching", što je korak koji je definisao Apple.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5305">**step1_appWillFinishLaunching** - Tells us the amount of time it has taken for Outlook to go from the "main" step to the "appWillFinishLaunching" step, which is a step defined by Apple.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5306">**step2_appDidFinishLaunching** – govori nam koliko je vremena potrebno da Outlook pređe iz "appWillFinishLaunching" koraka u korak "appDidFinishLaunching", što je korak koji je definisao Apple.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5306">**step2_appDidFinishLaunching** - Tells us the amount of time it has taken for Outlook to go from the "appWillFinishLaunching" step to the "appDidFinishLaunching" step, which is a step defined by Apple.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5307">**step3_engineStarted** – govori nam koliko je vremena potrebno da Outlook pređe iz koraka "appDidFinishLaunching" do pokretanja motora aplikacije, koji rukuje skladištenjem i sinhronizovanjem podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5307">**step3_engineStarted** - Tells us the amount of time it has taken for Outlook to go from the "appDidFinishLaunching" step to starting the engine of the app, which handles storing and syncing data.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5308">**step4_runLoopFirstIdle** – saopštava vreme koje je preduzeo za Outlook da bi prošao iz koraka "engineStarted" kako ne bi bilo dodatnog posla koji treba da dovršite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5308">**step4_runLoopFirstIdle** - Tells us the amount of time it has taken for Outlook to go from the "engineStarted" step to having no additional work to complete.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5309">**total_time** - govori nam ukupnu količinu vremena koju je preduzeo za Outlook da bi dovršio proces pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5309">**total_time** - Tells us the total amount of time it has taken for Outlook to complete the boot process.</span></span>

#### <a name="dnslookupop"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5310">DnsLookupOp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5310">DnsLookupOp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5311">Sakuplja se kada korisnik pokuša da otvori IRM zaštićeni dokument ili primeni IRM zaštitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5311">Collected when a user attempts to open an IRM protected doc or apply IRM protections.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5312">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se događaju prilikom izvršavanja operacije pronalaženja DNS informacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5312">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen when DNS information lookup operation is performed.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5313">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5313">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5314">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** – Hijerarhija klijenata koja označava da aplikacija radi u proizvodnom okruženju ili razvojnom okruženju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5314">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** - Client hierarchy, which indicates the application runs in production environment or developer environment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5315">**AppInfo.Name** – Ime aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5315">**AppInfo.Name** - Application name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5316">**AppInfo.Version** - Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5316">**AppInfo.Version** - Application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5317">**iKey** - Id servera usluge vođenja evidencije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5317">**iKey** - Logging service server ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5318">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** – Id scenarija koji obezbeđuje aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5318">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** - Scenario ID provided by the application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5319">**RMS.Duration** - Ukupno vreme za dovršavanje operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5319">**RMS.Duration** - Total time for the operation to complete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5320">**RMS.DurationWithoutExternalOps** – Ukupno vreme umanjeno za spoljne operacije, kao što je mrežno vreme kašnjenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5320">**RMS.DurationWithoutExternalOps** - Total time minus external operations consumed, such as network latency.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5321">**RMS.ErrorCode** - Kôd bilo koje greške vraćen kao rezultat operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5321">**RMS.ErrorCode** - The error code returned if any from the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5322">**RMS.HttpCall** - označava postojanje http operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5322">**RMS.HttpCall** - indicate if there is http operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5323">**RMS.LicenseFormat** - Format licence: Xrml ili Json</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5323">**RMS.LicenseFormat** - The license Format: Xrml or Json</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5324">**RMS.NoOfDomainsSearched** - Broj pretraženih domena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5324">**RMS.NoOfDomainsSearched** - The number of domains searched</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5325">**RMS.NoOfDomainsSearched** - Broj preskočenih domena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5325">**RMS.NoOfDomainsSkipped** - The number of domains skipped</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5326">**RMS.Result** - Uspešna ili neuspešna operacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5326">**RMS.Result** - Success or fail of the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5327">**RMS.ScenarioId** – ID scenarija definisan klijentom Usluge upravljanja pravima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5327">**RMS.ScenarioId** - Scenario ID defined by Rights Management Service Client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5328">**RMS.SDKVersion** - Verzija klijenta usluge Rights Management</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5328">**RMS.SDKVersion** - The version of Rights Management Service Client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5329">**RMS.ServerType** - Tip servera Usluge upravljanja pravima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5329">**RMS.ServerType** - The type of Rights Management Service Server</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5330">**RMS.StatusCode** - Kod statusa rezultata operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5330">**RMS.StatusCode** - Status code of the operation result</span></span>

#### <a name="firstvisible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5331">first.visible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5331">first.visible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5332">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo kada je korisnik prvi put namerno pokrenuo aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5332">This event lets us detect the first time the app is launched intentionally by the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5333">Ovaj događaj je obavezan da bi se osiguralo da aplikacija uspešno radi u verzijama proizvođača originalne opreme (OEM).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5333">This event is required to ensure that the app is successfully working in Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) builds.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5334">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5334">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5335">**is_oem** – praćenje polja koje ukazuje na to da li je aplikacija pokrenuta na OEM varijanti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5335">**is_oem** - a field tracking that indicates whether the application is running on an OEM variant</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5336">**is_system_install** – polje koje prati prisustvo unapred instalirane datoteke svojstava koja bi trebalo da ukazuje na to da li je ova instalacija OEM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5336">**is_system_install** - a field tracking the presence of a pre-installed property file that should indicate that this install is OEM</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5337">**manufacturer** – proizvođač uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5337">**manufacturer** - device manufacturer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5338">**model** – model uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5338">**model** - device model</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5339">**systemFlagSet** – vrednost zastavice Android sistema (ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM) koja ukazuje na to da li je aplikacija instalirana kao deo sistemske slike uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5339">**systemFlagSet** - value of the Android system flag (ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM) that indicates if the application was installed as part of the device's system image</span></span>

#### <a name="getuserop"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5340">GetUserOp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5340">GetUserOp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5341">Sakuplja se kada korisnik pokuša da otvori IRM zaštićeni dokument ili primeni IRM zaštitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5341">Collected when a user attempts to open an IRM protected doc or apply IRM protections.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5342">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se događaju prilikom izvršavanja operacije preuzimanja korisničkih certifikata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5342">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen when getting user certificates operation is performed.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5343">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5343">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5344">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** – Hijerarhija klijenata koja označava da aplikacija radi u proizvodnom okruženju ili razvojnom okruženju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5344">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** - Client hierarchy, which indicates the application runs in production environment or developer environment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5345">**AppInfo.Name** – Ime aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5345">**AppInfo.Name** - Application name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5346">**AppInfo.Version** - Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5346">**AppInfo.Version** - Application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5347">**iKey** - Id servera usluge vođenja evidencije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5347">**iKey** - Logging service server ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5348">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** – Id scenarija koji obezbeđuje aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5348">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** - Scenario ID provided by the application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5349">**RMS.ContentId** – Id sadržaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5349">**RMS.ContentId** - Content ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5350">**RMS.Duration** - Ukupno vreme za dovršavanje operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5350">**RMS.Duration** - Total time for the operation to complete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5351">**RMS.DurationWithoutExternalOps** – Ukupno vreme umanjeno za spoljne operacije, kao što je mrežno vreme kašnjenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5351">**RMS.DurationWithoutExternalOps** - Total time minus external operations consumed, such as network latency.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidandroidoffice16bootlatency"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5415">Office.Android.AndroidOffice16BootLatency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5415">Office.Android.AndroidOffice16BootLatency</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5416">Veoma važno za snimanje metrike performansi aplikacije u odnosu na vreme odziva aplikacije od pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5416">Critical to capture for app performance metric with respect to the response time of the app from the boot.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5417">Microsoft koristi ovo da prikuplja informacije o vremenu utrošenom da bi se aplikacija odazvala i za otkrivanje scenarija koji utiču na vreme pokretanja u aplikacijama Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5417">Microsoft uses this to collect the time taken for the app to be responsive and also detect scenarios that may impact boot time in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5418">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5418">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5419">**AppLaunchResponsiveTimeInMilliSec** – Vreme potrebno za odziv aplikacije pri pokretanju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5419">**AppLaunchResponsiveTimeInMilliSec** - App launch responsive time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5420">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** - Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je aplikacija obustavljena tokom pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5420">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** - Boolean to indicate if app was suspended during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5421">**CollectionTime** - Vreme događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5421">**CollectionTime** - Time of event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5422">**FileActivationAttempted** - Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je pokušana aktivacija datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5422">**FileActivationAttempted** - Boolean to indicate if file activation as attempted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5423">**FirstIdleOnAppThreadTimeInMilliSec** - Vreme mirovanja niti aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5423">**FirstIdleOnAppThreadTimeInMilliSec** - App thread idle time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5424">**IsThisFirstLaunch** - Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je ovo prvo pokretanje aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5424">**IsThisFirstLaunch** - Boolean to indicate if this is first time app launch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5425">**UserDialogInterruptionDuringBoot** - Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je došlo do blokiranja korisničkog interfejsa tokom pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5425">**UserDialogInterruptionDuringBoot** - Boolean to indicate if there was a blocking UI during boot</span></span>

#### <a name="officeextensibilityofficejsappactivated"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5426">Office.Extensibility.OfficeJS.Appactivated</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5426">Office.Extensibility.OfficeJS.Appactivated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5427">Beleži informacije o neočekivanim isključivanjima sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5427">Records information about unexpected shutdowns of Office.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5428">To nam omogućava da identifikujemo padove ili prekide proizvoda, tako da mogu biti rešeni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5428">This allows us to identify crashes or hangs in the product so that they can be addressed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5429">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5429">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5430">**Data\_AirspaceInitTime:integer-** vreme koje je bilo potrebno za pokretanje AirSpace komponente sistema Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5430">**Data\_AirspaceInitTime:integer-** time taken to initialize Airspace Office component</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5431">**Data\_AllShapes:integer -** Broj oblika u dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5431">**Data\_AllShapes:integer -** number of shapes in the document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5432">**Data\_APIInitTime:integer -** vreme koje je bilo potrebno za pokretanje Visio API modula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5432">**Data\_APIInitTime:integer -** time taken to initialize Visio API module</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5433">**Data\_AppSizeHeight –** Visina **-** prozora programskog dodatka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5433">**Data\_AppSizeHeight –** Add **-** in window size's height</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5434">**Data\_AppSizeWidth –** Širina **-** prozora programskog dodatka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5434">**Data\_AppSizeWidth –** Add **-** in window size's width</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5435">**Data\_AppURL –** URL adresa programskog dodatka; Evidentira punu URL adresu programskih dodataka iz prodavnice i URL domen programskih dodataka koji nisu iz prodavnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5435">**Data\_AppURL -** URL of the Add-in; Logs full URL for Store Add-ins and URL domain for non-store Add-ins</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5436">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5436">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind:long –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5437">**Data\_AuthorsCount:integer -** broj koautora koji su izmenili dokument tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5437">**Data\_AuthorsCount:integer -** number of authors who edited the document in this session</span></span>
