#### <a name="officeextensibilitysandboxodpactivationhanging"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5561">Office.Extensibility.Sandbox.ODPActivationHanging</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5561">Office.Extensibility.Sandbox.ODPActivationHanging</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5562">Prikuplja kada je Office programskom dodatku potrebno neočekivano dugo da se pokrene (> 5 SEC).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5562">Collects when an Office add-in takes unexpectedly long to launch (>5 sec).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5563">Koristi se za otkrivanje i rešavanje problema sa pokretanjem Office programskih dodataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5563">Used to detect and fix problems with Office add-ins launching.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5564">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5564">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5565">**AppId** -ID aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5565">**AppId** - ID of the App</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5566">**ApInfo** -podaci u vezi sa tipom programskog dodatka (okno zadatka ili UILess ili u sadržaju itd.) i tip dobavljača (Omen, SharePoint, okviru sistema datoteka itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5566">**AppInfo** - data regarding the type of add-in (task pane or UILess or in content etc.) and the provider type (omen, SharePoint, filesystem etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5567">**AppInstanceId** – ID instance aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5567">**AppInstanceId** - ID of the app instance</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5568">**AssetId** - ID procene za aplikaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5568">**AssetId** - asset ID of the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5569">**IsPreload** – označava da li je programski dodatak unapred učitan u pozadini radi unapređenja učinka aktivacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5569">**IsPreload** – indicates if the add-in is being preloaded in background for improving activation performance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5570">**NumberOfAddinsActivated**- brojač aktivnih programskih dodataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5570">**NumberOfAddinsActivated** - counter of add-ins activated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5571">**RemoterType** – precizira tip daljinca (pouzdanih, nepouzdanih, Win32webView, pouzdanih UDF-ova itd.) koji se koristi za aktiviranje programskog dodatka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5571">**RemoterType** - specifies the type of remoter (Trusted, untrusted, Win32webView, Trusted UDF etc.) used to activate the add-in</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5572">**StoreType** - poreklo aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5572">**StoreType** - origin of the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5573">**TimeForAuth** - vreme potrošeno na potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5573">**TimeForAuth** - time spent on auth</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5574">**TimeForSandbox** - vreme potrošeno na sandbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5574">**TimeForSandbox** - time spent on the sandbox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5575">**TimeForServerCall** - vreme potrošeno na pozivu na serveru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5575">**TimeForServerCall** - time spent on the server call</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5576">**TotalTime** - ukupno potrošeno vreme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5576">**TotalTime** - total time spent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5577">**UsesSharedRuntime** – označava da li aplikacija koristi sharedRuntime ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5577">**UsesSharedRuntime** - indicates if the app uses sharedRuntime or not.</span></span>

#### <a name="officelenslenssdklaunchlens"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5578">Office.Lens.LensSdk.LaunchLens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5578">Office.Lens.LensSdk.LaunchLens</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5579">Kada korisnik pokrene Lens da bi uhvatio ili uvezao slike u bilo kojoj aplikaciji, pokrenut je SDK i taj događaj se sakuplja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5579">When user launches Lens to capture or import images in any app, Lens SDK is launched, and this event is collected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5580">Pokretanje podataka olakšava određivanje broja korisnika/uređaja koji pokreću aplikaciju i dodatno razumeju potrošnju funkcija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5580">Launch data helps us determine the number of users/devices launching the app and further understand feature usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5581">Pomaže nam da pratimo količinu korisnika pomoću proizvoda, kao i da identifikujemo promene u trendovima, pomoć za pronalaženje i ispravljanje problema u proizvodu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5581">It helps us track the volume of users using the product, as well as identifying changes in trends, help look for and rectify issues in the product.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5582">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5582">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5583">**Data_isResumeSession** – da li je aplikacija pokrenuta u nastavku ili da li je korisnik pokrenuo novi početak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5583">**Data_isResumeSession** - Whether the app was launched in resume or user did a fresh start.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5584">(Boolean polje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5584">(Boolean field)</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5585">**Data_launchPerf** – ceo broj koji označava vreme koje je snimljeno da pokrene aplikaciju (u programu Android)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5585">**Data_launchPerf** - Integer indicating time taken to launch the app (on Android)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5586">**Data_LaunchWorkFlowItem** polje navodi da li se aplikacija pokreće sa ekrana kamera ili uređivanje ekrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5586">**Data_LaunchWorkFlowItem** - Field specifies if the app is launched from camera screen or edit screen.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5587">**Data_mediaCompressionFactor** – faktor prema kom se slike komprimovaju pomoću aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5587">**Data_mediaCompressionFactor** - The factor by which images are compressed by app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5588">**Data_RecoveryMode** –Boolean polje koje ukazuje na to da li je sesija bila oporavljena nakon što je pokrenuta aplikacija (u programu Android)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5588">**Data_RecoveryMode** - Boolean field indicating if this session was recovered after app was killed (on Android)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5589">**Alatka "nadexmodemode"** –Boolean označava da li uređaj podržava Samsung Dex funkcije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5589">**IsDexModeEnabled** - Boolean indicating if device supports Samsung Dex features.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5590">**Isemkrevet** –Boolean polje koje ukazuje na to da li je korisnik pokrenuo kontrolu u režimu Picture in Picture.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5590">**IsEmbeddedLaunch** - Boolean field indicating if user launched the control in picture-in-picture mode.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5591">**Zainterimcropenabit** –Boolean polje koje ukazuje na to da li je korisnik odlučio da ručno izrezali svaku sliku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5591">**IsInterimCropEnabled** - Boolean field indicating if user has chosen to manually crop each image.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5592">**Zamultiwindowenabled** –Boolean polje koje označava da li je moguće pokrenuti aplikaciju na razdeljenom ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5592">**IsMultiWindowEnabled** - Boolean field indicating if it's possible to run app in split screen.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5593">**LaunchPerf** –ceo broj koji se koristi za pokretanje aplikacije (na iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5593">**LaunchPerf** - Integer indicating time taken to launch the app (on iOS)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5594">**Funkcija "Reklistmod"** –Boolean polje koje ukazuje na to da li je sesija oporavljena nakon što je pokrenuta aplikacija (na osnovu iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5594">**RecoveryMode** - Boolean field indicating if this session was recovered after app was killed (on iOS)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5595">**Sdkmod** – režim u kom su fotografije snimljene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5595">**SDKMode** - The mode in which images were captured.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeofficemobileappactivationlaunch"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5596">Office.OfficeMobile.AppActivation.Launch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5596">Office.OfficeMobile.AppActivation.Launch</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5597">Ovaj događaj identifikuje prvu i daljnje aktivacije putem spoljašnjih okidača koji aktiviraju aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5597">This event identifies first time and subsequent activations through external triggers that activate the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5598">Aktivacija aplikacije učitava određene zavisnosti koje su odgovorne za rad aplikacije bez problema i taj događaj će zabeležiti da li su uspešno učitale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5598">App activation loads certain dependencies that are responsible for making the app run smoothly and this event will record if it loaded successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5599">Takođe će zabeležiti izvor aktivacije i nameru aplikacije koja je bila odgovorna za aktivaciju aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5599">It will also record the source of activation and app intent that was responsible for activating the app</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5600">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5600">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5601">**ActionName** – mapiranje vrednosti celog broja na ime radnje/funkcije koja je pozvana iz tačke aktivacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5601">**ActionName** - Integer value mapping to the name of the action/feature which is invoked from the activation point.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5602">**ActivationType** – mapiranje vrednosti celog broja na izvor aktivacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5602">**ActivationType** - Integer value mapping to the source of activation</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5603">**IsActionTriggered** – Bulova vrednost koja određuje da li je radnja pokrenuta nakon uspešne aktivacija aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5603">**IsActionTriggered** - Boolean value determining whether the action got triggered after the successful activation of the app.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5604">**IsFirstRun** – Bulova vrednost koja određuje radi li se o prvom ili daljnjem izvršavanju aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5604">**IsFirstRun** - Boolean value determining whether it was the first run of the app or a subsequent run.</span></span>
 

#### <a name="officeofficemobilefrefirstrunsetup"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5605">Office.OfficeMobile.FRE.FirstRunSetup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5605">Office.OfficeMobile.FRE.FirstRunSetup</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5606">Prvo pokretanje aplikacije nakon instalacije aktiviraće ovaj događaj otkucaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5606">The first run of the app after installation will trigger this heartbeat event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5607">On će nam pomoći da identifikujemo instalacije i automatske nadogradnje sa starijih verzija aplikacije i omogućiće nam da identifikujemo greške u automatskim nadogradnjama, uključujući opterećenja biblioteka i neuspela preuzimanja paketa proširenja/jezičkih paketa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5607">It will help identify installs and auto upgrades from older versions of the app and enable us to identify errors in auto-upgrades, including library loads and expansion/language package download failures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5608">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5608">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5609">**IsFlightAssigned** – Bulova vrednost koja određuje da li je korisnik bio deo unapred dodeljene grupe letova koja može da aktivira izloženost određenim iskustvima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5609">**IsFlightAssigned** - Boolean value determining if the user was part of any preassigned flight group which can trigger exposure to certain experiences.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5610">**IsFRELoadSuccessful** – ceo broj koji pokazuje stanje rezultata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5610">**IsFRELoadSuccessful** - integer mentioning the result state</span></span>

#### <a name="officeonenoteandroidappappbootcomplete-officeandroidearlytelemetryappbootcomplete"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5611">Office.OneNote.Android.App.AppBootComplete, Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.AppBootComplete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5611">Office.OneNote.Android.App.AppBootComplete, Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.AppBootComplete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5612">*[Ovaj događaj je prethodno nazvan OneNote.App.AppBootComplete.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5612">*[This event was previously named OneNote.App.AppBootComplete.]*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5613">Kritičan signal koji se koristi da omogući da novi pojedinačni korisnici (Microsoft nalog) mogu uspešno da pokrenu i koriste OneNote po prvi put.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5613">The critical signal used to ensure new consumer users (Microsoft Account) can successfully launch and use OneNote for the first time.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5614">Koristi se da obezbedi otkrivanje kritičnih regresija OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5614">This is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5615">Ako korisnici ne mogu da pokrenu aplikaciju po prvi put, to bi izazvalo incident velike ozbiljnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5615">If users can't launch the app for the first time, this would trigger a high severity incident.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5616">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5616">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5617">**ACTIVITY_BOOT_TIME_IN_MS** - Vreme potrebno za dovršetak kreiranja aktivnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5617">**ACTIVITY_BOOT_TIME_IN_MS** - Time taken to complete Activity creation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5618">**ACTIVITY_NAME** - Ime otvorene aktivnosti pri pokretanju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5618">**ACTIVITY_NAME** - Name of the Activity opened when booted</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5619">**ANY_DIALOG_SHOWN** – Označava da li je bilo koji dijalog prikazan tokom vremena pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5619">**ANY_DIALOG_SHOWN** - Indicates if any dialog is shown during boot time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5620">**APP_SUSPEND_DURING_EVENT** – Označava da li je pokretanje sprečeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5620">**APP_SUSPEND_DURING_EVENT** - Indicates if the boot was preempted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5621">**APP_THREAD_CREATION_WAIT_TIME_TIME_FOR_APP_THREAD_CREATION** - Vreme potrebno za kreiranje niti aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5621">**APP_THREAD_CREATION_WAIT_TIME_TIME_FOR_APP_THREAD_CREATION** - Time taken to create Application threads</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5622">**AVAILABLE_MEMORY_IN_MB** - Ukupna količina memorije dostupne na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5622">**AVAILABLE_MEMORY_IN_MB** - Total memory available in device</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5623">**AVG_SNAPSHOT_POPULATION_TIME** - Prosečno vreme potrebno za dobavljanje strukture beležnice tokom korišćenja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5623">**AVG_SNAPSHOT_POPULATION_TIME** - Avg. time taken to fetch notebook structures while using the App</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5624">**BOOT_END_AT_VIEW** - Potkategorija imena aktivnosti (ime prikaza)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5624">**BOOT_END_AT_VIEW** - Sub-category of Activity name (Name of the View)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5625">**BOOT_SNAPSHOTS** – Detalji dobavljanja structure beležnice za naloge koji se koriste u aplikaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5625">**BOOT_SNAPSHOTS** - Detail of notebook structure fetches for the account(s) used in App</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5626">**COREAPP_STARTUP_ACCOUNT_SETUP_STARTUP_ACCOUNT_SETUP** - Vreme potrebno za proveru i pokretanja SSO iskustva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5626">**COREAPP_STARTUP_ACCOUNT_SETUP_STARTUP_ACCOUNT_SETUP** - Time taken to check and initiate SSO experience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5627">**CRASH_INTERACTION_DURING_BOOT > 0** – Ukazuje na to da li se aplikacija srušila tokom poslednje sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5627">**CRASH_INTERACTION_DURING_BOOT> 0** - To indicate if the App crashed during last session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5628">**DALVIK_HEAP_LIMIT_IN_MB** - Zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5628">**DALVIK_HEAP_LIMIT_IN_MB** - Obsolete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5629">**DELAY_LOAD_STICKY_NOTES** – Označava da li lepljive beleške imaju odlaganje ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5629">**DELAY_LOAD_STICKY_NOTES** - Indicates if the Sticky Notes with delay or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5630">**FISHBOWL_SHOWN_DURING_EVENT** – Označava instance u kojima se sadržaj ne sinhronizuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5630">**FISHBOWL_SHOWN_DURING_EVENT** - Indicates instances where content in not synced</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5631">**HAS_LOGCAT_LOGGING_IMPACT_ON_BOOT** – Označava da li evidencije utiču na vreme pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5631">**HAS_LOGCAT_LOGGING_IMPACT_ON_BOOT** - Indicates if boot time is impacted due to logs</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5632">**INIT_SNAPSHOT_DURATION** - Vreme potrebno za dobavljanje strukture beležnice za korisničke naloge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5632">**INIT_SNAPSHOT_DURATION** - Time taken to get the notebook structure for the user account(s)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5633">**IS_COLD_BOOT** – Označava da li se aplikacija pokreće kada aplikacija nije pokrenuta u pozadini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5633">**IS_COLD_BOOT** - Indicates if the App launch when the App was not running in the background</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5634">**IS_FIRST_LAUNCH** – Označava da li je ovo prvi put da je pokrenuta aplikacija na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5634">**IS_FIRST_LAUNCH** - Indicates if this is the First time App was launched in the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5635">**IS_FOLDABLE_TYPE** – Označava da li uređaj može da se preklopi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5635">**IS_FOLDABLE_TYPE** - Indicates if the device is a foldable device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5636">**IS_PHONE** - Označava da li je uređaj telefon ili tablet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5636">**IS_PHONE** - Indicates if the device is a phone or tablet</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5637">**IS_RECENT_PAGES_AVAILABLE_ON_FRAGMENT_CREATION** - Označava da li je korisnički interfejs spreman i čeka da sadržaj postane dostupan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5637">**IS_RECENT_PAGES_AVAILABLE_ON_FRAGMENT_CREATION** - Indicates if UI is ready and waiting for content to be made available</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5638">**IS_REHYDRATE_LAUNCH** - Označava da li je aplikaciju zatvorio sistem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5638">**IS_REHYDRATE_LAUNCH** - Indicates if App was killed by the system</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5639">**IS_UPGRADE** - Označava da li je aplikacija pokrenuta nakon nadogradnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5639">**IS_UPGRADE** - Indicates if the App is being launched after upgrade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5640">**JOT_MAIN_APP_CREATE_TIME_MAIN_APP_CREATE_TIME** - Vreme potrebno za kreiranje JOT komponente (komponenta sa deljenim kodom)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5640">**JOT_MAIN_APP_CREATE_TIME_MAIN_APP_CREATE_TIME** - Time taken to create JOT component (shared code component)</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5641">**JOT_MAIN_APP_INIT_TIME_MAIN_APP_INIT_TIME** - Vreme potrebno za pokretanje JOT komponente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5641">**JOT_MAIN_APP_INIT_TIME_MAIN_APP_INIT_TIME** - Time taken to initialize JOT component</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5642">**LAUNCH_POINT** - Označava da li je aplikacija pokrenuta putem vidžeta, ikone ili hiperveze ili Deljenja itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5642">**LAUNCH_POINT** - Indicates if the App is opened from Widget or App Icon or Hyperlink or Share to ON etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5643">**MSO_ACTIVATION_TIME_ACTIVATION_TIME** - Vreme potrebno za pokretanje MSO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5643">**MSO_ACTIVATION_TIME_ACTIVATION_TIME** - Time taken to initialize MSO</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5644">**NATIVE_LIBRARIES_LOAD_TIME** - Vreme potrebno za učitavanje biblioteka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5644">**NATIVE_LIBRARIES_LOAD_TIME** - Time taken to load libraries</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5645">**NAVIGATION_CREATE_TO_NAVIGATION_RESUME_CREATE_TO_NAVIGATION_RESUME** - Vreme potrebno za dovršavanje navigacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5645">**NAVIGATION_CREATE_TO_NAVIGATION_RESUME_CREATE_TO_NAVIGATION_RESUME** - Time taken to complete navigation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5646">**NAVIGATION_RESUME_TO_BOOT_END_RESUME_TO_BOOT_END** - Vreme potrebno za merenje odloženog učitavanja stranice posle pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5646">**NAVIGATION_RESUME_TO_BOOT_END_RESUME_TO_BOOT_END** - Time taken to measure delay in page load after boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5647">**NAVIGATION_SET_CONTENT_VIEW_TIME_SET_CONTENT_VIEW_TIME** - Vreme potrebno za dovođenje sadržaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5647">**NAVIGATION_SET_CONTENT_VIEW_TIME_SET_CONTENT_VIEW_TIME** - Time taken to bring in content</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5648">**NUMBER_Of_RUNNING_PROCESSES** - Označava broj aktivnih procesa koji su pokrenuti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5648">**NUMBER_Of_RUNNING_PROCESSES** - Indicates number of active processes running</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5649">**NUMBER_OF_SNAPSHOTS** - Broj dobavljanja structure beležnice pri pokretanju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5649">**NUMBER_OF_SNAPSHOTS** - Count of fetches of notebook structure during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5650">**OFFICEASSETMANAGER_INITIALIZATION_TIME** - Vreme potrebno za raspakivanje i pokretanje Upravljača resursima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5650">**OFFICEASSETMANAGER_INITIALIZATION_TIME** - Time taken to unzip and initialize Asset Manager</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5651">**ACTIVITY_BOOT_TIME_IN_MS** - Vreme potrebno za dovršetak kreiranja procesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5651">**PROCESS_BOOT_TIME_IN_MS** - Time taken to complete Process creation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5654">**ROOT_ACTIVITY_LAUNCH_NEXTACTIVITY_ACTIVITY_LAUNCH_NEXTACTIVITY** - Zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5654">**ROOT_ACTIVITY_LAUNCH_NEXTACTIVITY_ACTIVITY_LAUNCH_NEXTACTIVITY** - Obsolete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5655">**ROOT_ACTIVITY_PROCESS_INTENT_ACTIVITY_PROCESS_INTENT** - Zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5655">**ROOT_ACTIVITY_PROCESS_INTENT_ACTIVITY_PROCESS_INTENT** - Obsolete</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5656">**ROOT_ACTIVITY_SESSION_ACTIVITY_SESSION** - Vreme potrebno za prelazak iz korenog sloja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5656">**ROOT_ACTIVITY_SESSION_ACTIVITY_SESSION** - Time taken to transition from Root layer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5660">**SPLASH_TO_ROOT_TRANSITION_TO_ROOT_TRANSITION** - Vreme potrebno za prelazak iz korenog sloja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5660">**SPLASH_TO_ROOT_TRANSITION_TO_ROOT_TRANSITION** - Time taken to transition from Root layer</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5661">**TIME_BETWEEN_PROCESS_BOOT_AND_ACTIVITY_BEGIN_IN_MS** - Vreme izmeðu kreiranja procesa i aktivnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5661">**TIME_BETWEEN_PROCESS_BOOT_AND_ACTIVITY_BEGIN_IN_MS** - Time between process & activity creation</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5662">**TIME_TAKEN_IN_MS** - vreme utrošeno na dovršavanje pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5662">**TIME_TAKEN_IN_MS** - Time taken to complete boot</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5697">Prikuplja se svaki put kada se otvori datoteka u programu PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5697">Collected whenever PowerPoint opens a file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5698">Sadrži informacije o uspehu, detalje o greškama, metriku performansi i osnovne podatke o datoteci uključujući tip formata i metapodatke dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5698">Contains success information, failure details, performance metrics, and basic details about the file including file format type and document metadata.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5699">Ove informacije su potrebne da bismo proverili da li PowerPoint može uspešno da otvara datoteke bez degradacije u performansama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5699">This information is necessary to ensure PowerPoint can open files successfully with no degradation in performance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5700">Omogućavaju nam da dijagnostikujemo sve probleme koje otkrijemo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5700">It allows us to diagnose any problems we discover.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5704">**Data\_AlreadyOpened –** Da li je ovaj dokument prethodno otvoren (u kontekstu iste sesije procesa)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5704">**Data\_AlreadyOpened -** Was this document previously opened (within the context of the same process session)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5706">**Data\_AntiVirusScanStatus -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti za antivirusno skeniranje koje se izvršava za svaki otvoreni dokument (nisu otkrivene pretnje, neuspelo, otkriven je malver, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5706">**Data\_AntiVirusScanStatus -** Predefined set of values of anti-virus scan that happens for every document opened (NoThreatsDetected, Failed, MalwareDetected, etc.)</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointpptdesktopbootime"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5873">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Desktop.Bootime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5873">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Desktop.Bootime</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5874">Prikuplja podatke o načinu na koji je pokrenut program PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5874">Collecting how PowerPoint is booted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5875">To uključuje pokretanje u zaštićenom prikazu, u režimu za čitanje, iz makroa, za štampanje, kao novi i prazan dokument, za oporavak dokumenta, automatizacijom, i ako je pokrenut pomoću „Klikni i pokreni“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5875">It includes boot PowerPoint in protected view, in assisted reading mode, from Macro, print, new and blank document, document recovery, from automation and if it is click- to-run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5876">Prikuplja i podatke o tome koliko vremena mu je potrebno za pokretanje. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5876">It also collects how long it takes PowerPoint to boot.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5877">Ovi podaci su od presudnog značaja za garanciju dobrog funkcionisanja kada se pokreće u različitim režimima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5877">This data is critical to guarantee PowerPoint performs well when booted from different modes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5878">Microsoft ih koristi da bi primetili dugo vreme pokretanja kada se PowerPoint otvara u različitim režimima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5878">Microsoft uses this data to catch long booting time when opening PowerPoint from different modes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5879">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5879">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5880">**AssistedReading -** u režimu za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5880">**AssistedReading -** in assisted reading mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5881">**Automation -** automatizacijom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5881">**Automation -** from automation</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5882">**Benchmark -** Izvršavanje testiranja performansi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5882">**Benchmark -** run performance benchmark</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5883">**Blank -** prazan dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5883">**Blank -** blank document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5884">**BootTime -** vreme pokretanja sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5884">**BootTime -** session boot time</span></span>

#### <a name="officeprojectbootandopenproject"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5906">Office.Project.BootAndOpenProject</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5906">Office.Project.BootAndOpenProject</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5912">**Data\_BootTime -** Vreme koje je bilo potrebno za pokretanje programa Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5912">**Data\_BootTime -** The amount of time it took to boot Project</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5913">**Data\_CacheFileSize -** Veličina datoteke ako je keširana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5913">**Data\_CacheFileSize -** If the file was cached, the size of the file</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5914">**Data\_EntDocType -** Tip datoteke koja je otvorena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5914">**Data\_EntDocType -** The type of file that was opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5915">**Data\_IsInCache -** Da li je otvorena datoteka keširana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5915">**Data\_IsInCache -** Whether the file opened was cached</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5916">**Data\_LoadSRAs -** Ako korisnik želi da učita SRAs ili ne želi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5916">**Data\_LoadSRAs -** If the user wants to load SRAs or not</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5917">**Data\_Outcome -** Ukupno vreme pokretanja i otvaranja datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5917">**Data\_Outcome -** Total boot and file open time.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5918">**Data\_OpenFromDocLib -** Ako je datoteka programa Project otvorena iz biblioteke dokumenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5918">**Data\_OpenFromDocLib -** If the Project file opened was from the document library</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5919">**Data\_ProjectServerVersion -** Trenutna verzija i izdanje programa Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5919">**Data\_ProjectServerVersion -** The version and build that Project is currently on</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5930">**Data\_ProjectServerVersion -** Trenutna verzija i izdanje programa Project</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5930">**Data\_ProjectServerVersion -** The version and build that Project is currently on</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5940">**Data\_IsInCache -** da li je otvorena datoteka keširana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5940">**Data\_IsInCache -** whether the file opened was cached</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5941">**Data\_LoadSRAs -** Ako korisnik želi da učita SRAs ili ne želi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5941">**Data\_LoadSRAs -** If the user wants to load SRAs or not</span></span>
