#### <a name="officesessionidproviderofficeprocesssessionstart"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5946">Office.SessionIdProvider.OfficeProcessSessionStart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5946">Office.SessionIdProvider.OfficeProcessSessionStart</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5947">Primenjuje se na sve Office aplikacije koje se zasnivaju na operativnom sistemu Windows: Win32 i UWP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5947">Applicable to all the Office windows-based applications: win32 and UWP</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5948">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5948">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5949">**OfficeProcessSessionStart** šalje osnovne informacije posle pokretanja nove sesije sistema Office. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5949">**OfficeProcessSessionStart** sends basic information upon the start of a new Office session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5950">Koristi se za izračunavanje broja jedinstvenih sesija koje su primećene na datom uređaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5950">This is used to count the number of unique sessions seen on a given device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5951">Koristi se kao događaj otkucaja da bi se proverilo da li je aplikacija pokrenuta na uređaju ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5951">This is used as a heartbeat event to ensure that the application is running on a device or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5952">Osim toga, služi i kao bitan pokazatelj celokupne pouzdanosti aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5952">In addition, it serves as a critical signal for overall application reliability</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5953">**AppSessionGuid** - Identifikator sesije za određenu aplikaciju počevši od vremena kreiranja procesa do kraja procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5953">**AppSessionGuid** - An identifier of a particular application session starting at process creation time and persisting until process end.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5954">Oblikovan je kao standardni 128–bitni GUID, ali se sastoji iz 4 dela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5954">It is formatted as a standard 128-bit GUID but constructed of four parts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5955">Ta četiri dela su po redu (1) 32–bitni ID procesa (2) 16–bitni ID sesije (3) 16–bitni ID za pokretanje (4) 64–bitni proces nastanka u UTC 100ns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5955">Those four parts in order are (1) 32-bit Process ID (2) 16-bit Session ID (3) 16 bit Boot ID (4) 64-bit Process creation time in UTC 100 ns</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5956">**processSessionId** - nasumično generisan guid za identifikovanje sesije aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5956">**processSessionId** - Randomly generated guid to identify the app session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5957">**UTCReplace_AppSessionGuid** - Nepromenjiva logička vrednost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5957">**UTCReplace_AppSessionGuid** - Constant boolean value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5958">Uvek ima vrednost TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5958">Always true.</span></span>

#### <a name="officesystemsessionhandoff"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5959">Office.System.SessionHandoff</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5959">Office.System.SessionHandoff</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5960">Označava da je trenutna sesija aplikacije Office sesija predaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5960">Indicates that the current Office session is a handoff session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5961">To znači da se rukovanje zahtevom korisnika za otvaranje dokumenta predaje već pokrenutoj instanci iste aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5961">This means that handling of a user's request to open a document is being handed off to an already running instance of the same application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5962">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5962">The following fields are collected.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5963">**ParentSessionId** – ID sesije koja će preuzeti upravljanje zahtevom korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5963">**ParentSessionId** - The ID of the session that will be taking over handling of the users' request.</span></span>

#### <a name="officetelemetryengineisprelaunch"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5964">Office.TelemetryEngine.IsPreLaunch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5964">Office.TelemetryEngine.IsPreLaunch</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5965">Primenjuje se za Office aplikacije za UWP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5965">Applicable for Office UWP applications.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5966">Ovaj događaj se aktivira kada se Office aplikacija pokrene po prvi put nakon ažuriranja/instalacije iz prodavnice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5966">This event is fired when an Office application is initiated for the first-time post upgrade/install from the store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5967">Ovo je deo osnovnih dijagnostičkih podataka koji se koriste za praćenje da li je sesija pokretanja ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5967">This is part of basic diagnostic data, used to track whether a session is launch session or not.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5968">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5968">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5969">**appVersionBuild** - Broj verzije izdanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5969">**appVersionBuild** - The app build version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5970">**appVersionMajor** - Broj glavne verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5970">**appVersionMajor** - The app major version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5971">**appVersionMinor** - Broj sporedne verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5971">**appVersionMinor** - The app minor version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5972">**appVersionRev** - Broj revizije verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5972">**appVersionRev** - The app revision version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5973">**SessionID** - nasumično generisan GUID za identifikovanje sesije aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5973">**SessionID** - Randomly generated GUID to identify the app session</span></span>

#### <a name="officetelemetryenginesessionhandoff"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5974">Office.TelemetryEngine.SessionHandOff</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5974">Office.TelemetryEngine.SessionHandOff</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5975">Primenjuje se za Office aplikacije za Win32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5975">Applicable to Win32 Office applications.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5976">Ovaj događaj nam pomaže da shvatimo da li je nova sesija kreirana da bi rukovala događajem otvaranja datoteke koji je pokrenuo korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5976">This event helps us understand whether there was a new session created to handle a user-initiated file open event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5977">To su bitne dijagnostičke informacije koje se koriste za slanje signala za pouzdanost i za proveravanje da li aplikacija radi kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5977">It is a critical diagnostic information that is used to derive reliability signal and ensure that the application is working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5978">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5978">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5979">**appVersionBuild** - Broj verzije izdanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5979">**appVersionBuild** - The app build version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5980">**appVersionMajor** - Broj glavne verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5980">**appVersionMajor** - The app major version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5981">**appVersionMinor** - Broj sporedne verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5981">**appVersionMinor** - The app minor version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5982">**appVersionRev** - Broj revizije verzije aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5982">**appVersionRev** - The app revision version number.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5983">**childSessionID** - nasumično generisan guid za identifikovanje sesije aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5983">**childSessionID** - Randomly generated guid to identify the app session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5984">**parentSessionId** - nasumično generisan guid za identifikovanje sesije aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5984">**parentSessionId** - Randomly generated guid to identify the app session</span></span>

#### <a name="officevisiovisioiosappboottime"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5985">Office.Visio.VisioIosAppBootTime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5985">Office.Visio.VisioIosAppBootTime</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5986">Ovo se pokreće svaki put kada se Visio iOS aplikacija pokrene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5986">This is triggered every time the Visio iOS application boots.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5987">Neophodno je razumeti performanse pokretanja Visio iOS aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5987">It is essential to understand boot performance of the Visio iOS app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5988">Koristi se za rešavanje problema loših performansi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5988">Used to troubleshoot poor performance.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5989">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5989">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5990">**Data_AppBootTime** - trajanje potrebno za pokretanje aplikacije u milisekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5990">**Data_AppBootTime** - Duration taken for app to boot, in milliseconds.</span></span>

#### <a name="officevisiovisioiosappresumetime"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5991">Office.Visio.VisioIosAppResumeTime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5991">Office.Visio.VisioIosAppResumeTime</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5992">Ovaj događaj se pokreće svaki put kada Visio iOS aplikacija nastavi s radom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5992">This event is triggered every time the Visio iOS app resumes focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5993">Važno je da merite performanse nastavka aplikacije i rešite probleme performansi aplikacije Visio iOS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5993">It is essential to measure app resume performance and troubleshoot performance issues of Visio iOS app.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5994">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5994">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5995">**Data_AppResumeTime** - trajanje potrebno za nastavak rada aplikacije u milisekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5995">**Data_AppResumeTime** - Duration for app to resume in milliseconds.</span></span>

#### <a name="officewordfileopenopencmdfilemrupriv"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5996">Office.Word.FileOpen.OpenCmdFileMruPriv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5996">Office.Word.FileOpen.OpenCmdFileMruPriv</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5997">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da program Office Word otvara dokument sa liste nedavno korišćenih dokumenata (MRU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5997">This event indicates Office Word opens a document from the Most Recent Used (MRU) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5998">Sadrži i bitne podatke o performansama otvaranja datoteke i o tome da li je u pitanju događaj pokretanja aplikacije iz perspektive korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5998">It also contains critical file open performance data and is an app start event from user perspective.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-5999">Događaj prati da li otvaranje datoteke iz MRU liste radi kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-5999">The event monitors whether fileopen-from-MRU is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6000">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6000">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices, and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6001">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6001">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6002">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** – Izveštava da li smo u slučaju mogli pravilno da popunimo druge vrednosti povezane sa telemetrijom dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6002">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** - Reports whether we were able to properly populate other document telemetry-related values in the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6003">Koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6003">Used for data quality diagnostics.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6004">**Data_BytesAsynchronous** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možemo da otvorimo datoteku ako ih preuzmemo pre nego što korisnik započne uređivanje ili čuvanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6004">**Data_BytesAsynchronous** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we believe we can open the file without if we get them before the user wants to start editing or maybe saving</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6005">**Data_BytesAsynchronousWithWork** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možda možemo da otvorimo dokument, ali potrebno je značajno investiranje u kôd da bi se to omogućilo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6005">**Data_BytesAsynchronousWithWork** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we might be able to open the file without but would require significant code investments to make it happen</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6006">**Data_BytesSynchronous** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) koji moramo da imamo da bismo započeli otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6006">**Data_BytesSynchronous** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we must have before we can start opening the file</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6007">**Data_BytesUnknown** – Broj bajtova u segmentima dokumenta koji ne očekujemo da nađemo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6007">**Data_BytesUnknown** - Number of bytes in document parts that we don't expect to find</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6008">**Data_DetachedDuration** - Koliko dugo je radnja odvojena od niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6008">**Data_DetachedDuration** - How long was the activity detached from the thread</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6009">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** -Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6009">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - Document is read only/editable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6010">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6010">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6011">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6011">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6012">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Jedinice koje se koriste za postepeno otvaranje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6012">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Units used for incremental document open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6013">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Postavke elektronske zaštite podataka za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6013">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6014">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta (docx/xlsb/pptx, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6014">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Document extension (docx/xlsb/pptx etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6015">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - Verzija protokola za format datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6015">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - File format protocol version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6016">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - Ime domena za OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6016">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - OneDrive or SharePoint Online Domain Name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6017">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - Jednosmerni heš imena domena koji se može identifikovati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6017">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - One-way hash of customer identifiable domain name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6018">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6018">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6019">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Beleži način na koji je otvoren dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6019">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Records how the document was opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6020">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Izveštava o keširanim zastavicama koje su korišćene za podešavanje postavki zahteva za otvaranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6020">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Reports on the cached flags used to set open request options</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6021">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Radnje koje su dozvoljene putem smernica za elektronskih zaštitu podataka koje su primenjene na dokument/korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6021">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Actions permitted by the Electronic Data Protection policy that has been applied to the document/user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6022">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Zastavica koja označava da je dokument postepeno otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6022">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Flag indicating that the document has been incrementally opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6023">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je dokument podržan u usluzi saradnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6023">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Flag indicating that the document is supported in the collaboration service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6024">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to je otvorena vanmrežna kopija dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6024">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Flag indicating that the offline copy of a document was opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6025">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da na računaru postoji kopija koja se automatski sinhronizuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6025">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** - Flag indicating that an auto-synced copy of the document exists on the computer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6026">**Data_Doc_Location** - Ukazuje na to koja je usluga obezbedila dokument (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6026">**Data_Doc_Location** - Indicates which service provided the document (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6027">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Ukazuje na to koja „Poznata fascikla“ je obezbedila lokalno uskladišteni dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6027">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Indicates which Known Folder provided a locally stored document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6028">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Izračunavanje broja drugih korisnika u sesiji zajedničkog uređivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6028">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Count of the number of fellow users in a collaborative editing session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6029">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Ukazuje na to da je postavljena zastavica za lozinku za čitanje ili čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6029">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Indicates read or read/write password flags set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6030">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Razlozi zbog kojih je dokument otvoren samo za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6030">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Reasons why the document was opened read only</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6031">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - Anonimni Identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6031">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - An anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6032">**Data_Doc_RtcType** –  Označava kako je postavljen kanal u realnom vremenu (RTC) za trenutnu datoteku (onemogućeno, nepodržano, na zahtev, uvek uključeno itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6032">**Data_Doc_RtcType** -  Indicates how the real-time channel (RTC) was set up for current file (Disabled, unsupported, on demand, always on, etc.).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6033">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - Nepromenljivi anonimni Identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6033">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - An immutable anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6034">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - verzija protokola koji se koristi za komunikaciju sa uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6034">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - the protocol version used to communicate with the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6035">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - tip servera koji nudi uslugu (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6035">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - the type of the server offering the service (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI, etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6036">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - verzija servera koji nudi uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6036">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - the server version offering the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6037">**Data_Doc_SessionId** -Identifikuje određenu sesiju uređivanja dokumenta u okviru cele sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6037">**Data_Doc_SessionId** - Identifies a specific document edit session within the full session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6038">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Informacije o dijagnostici iz zahteva usluge SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6038">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Diagnostic information from SharePoint Online requests</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6039">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Indikator veličine dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6039">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Indicator of document size</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6040">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - Indikator specijalnih znakova u URL adresi dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6040">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - Indicator of special chars in the document's URL</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6041">**Data_Doc_SyncBackedType** - Indikator tipa dokumenta (lokalni ili iz usluge)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6041">**Data_Doc_SyncBackedType** - Indicator as to the type of document (local or service based)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6042">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - Jednosmerni heš za kreiranje identifikatora jednostavnog dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6042">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - One-way hash to create a naïve document identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6043">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - Sadrži jedinstveni identifikator WOPI dobavljača usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6043">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - Contains unique identifier of WOPI service provider</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6044">**Data_EditorDisablingRename** -Identifikator prvog urednika zbog kojeg je onemogućeno preimenovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6044">**Data_EditorDisablingRename** - Identifier of the first editor that caused for rename to be disabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6045">**Data_EditorsCount** - Broj urednika dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6045">**Data_EditorsCount** - Number of editors in the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6046">**Data_ForceReadWriteReason** -Vrednost celog broja koja predstavlja razlog zbog kog je datoteka primorana da se otvori u režimu za čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6046">**Data_ForceReadWriteReason** - Integer value representing the reason why the file was forced into read/write mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6047">**Data_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure** - Ukazuje na to da je otvaranje uspelo nakon popravke greške prilikom otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6047">**Data_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure** - Indicates that open succeeded after repairing a failure while opening the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6048">**Data_LastLoggedTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za identifikovanje kada otvaranje dva puta ne uspe (koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6048">**Data_LastLoggedTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to identify when we try to fail the open twice (used for data quality diagnostics)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6049">**Data_LinkStyles** - Ukazuje na to da li se povezujemo sa stilovima predložaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6049">**Data_LinkStyles** - Indicates whether we are linking to the template styles</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6050">**Data_MainPdod** - Identifikator dokumenta koji se obrađuje u programu Office Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6050">**Data_MainPdod** - The document identifier in Office Word process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6051">**Data_Measurements** - Šifrovana niska koja sadrži analizu vremena otvaranja različitih segmenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6051">**Data_Measurements** - Encoded string containing the time breakdown of the different parts of open.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6052">Koristi se za merenje performansi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6052">Used to measure performance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6053">**Data_MoveDisabledReason** - Greška koja onemogućava premeštanje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6053">**Data_MoveDisabledReason** - Error that is disabling move for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6054">**Data_MoveFlightEnabled** - Da li je omogućena putanja za funkciju premeštanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6054">**Data_MoveFlightEnabled** - Whether the flight for the move feature is enabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6055">**Data_PartsUnknown** – broj segmenata dokumenta za koji nismo mogli da dobijemo podatke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6055">**Data_PartsUnknown** - the number of document parts that we couldn't get data for</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6056">**Data_RecoverableFailureInitiationLocationTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi da bi se identifikovalo mesto u kodu na kom pokušavamo da popravimo datoteku pre nego što je otvorimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6056">**Data_RecoverableFailureInitiationLocationTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to identify the place in code where we attempt to fix the file before opening it</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6057">**Data_RenameDisabledReason** - Greška koja uzrokuje da preimenovanje ovog dokumenta bude onemogućeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6057">**Data_RenameDisabledReason** - Error that is causing for rename to be disabled for this document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6058">**Data_RenameFlightEnabled** - Da li je omogućena putanja za funkciju preimenovanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6058">**Data_RenameFlightEnabled** - Whether the flight for the rename feature is enabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6059">**Data_SecondaryTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za dodavanje dodatnih podataka o grešci otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6059">**Data_SecondaryTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to add additional failure data for open</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6060">**Data_TemplateFormat** - Format datoteke predloška na kome je zasnovan dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6060">**Data_TemplateFormat** - File format of the template that the document is based on.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6061">**Data_UsesNormal** - Ukazuje na to da li je otvoreni dokument zasnovan na normalnom predlošku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6061">**Data_UsesNormal** - Indicates whether the open document is based on the normal template</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6062">**PathData_Doc_StreamAvailability** - Indikator koji ukazuje na to da li je protok dokumenta omogućen/onemogućen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6062">**PathData_Doc_StreamAvailability** - Indicator if document stream is available/disabled</span></span>


#### <a name="officewordfileopenopenffileopenxstzcore"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6063">Office.Word.FileOpen.OpenFFileOpenXstzCore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6063">Office.Word.FileOpen.OpenFFileOpenXstzCore</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6064">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da Office Word otvara dokument na koji je korisnik kliknuo dvaput.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6064">This event indicates Office Word opens a document who is double-clicked by a user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6065">Sadrži i bitne podatke o performansama otvaranja datoteke i o tome da li je u pitanju događaj pokretanja aplikacije iz perspektive korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6065">It also contains critical file open performance data and is an app start event from user perspective.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6066">Događaj prati da li otvaranje datoteke pomoću dvostrukog klika radi kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6066">The event monitors whether file-openfrom-file-double-click is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6067">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6067">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices, and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6068">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6068">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6069">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** – Izveštava da li smo u slučaju mogli pravilno da popunimo druge vrednosti povezane sa telemetrijom dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6069">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** - Reports whether we were able to properly populate other document telemetry-related values in the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6070">Koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6070">Used for data quality diagnostics</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6071">**Data_BytesAsynchronous** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možemo da otvorimo datoteku ako ih preuzmemo pre nego što korisnik započne uređivanje ili čuvanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6071">**Data_BytesAsynchronous** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we believe we can open the file without if we get them before the user wants to start editing or maybe saving</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6072">**Data_BytesAsynchronousWithWork** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možda možemo da otvorimo dokument, ali potrebno je značajno investiranje u kôd da bi se to omogućilo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6072">**Data_BytesAsynchronousWithWork** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we might be able to open the file without but would require significant code investments to make it happen</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6073">**Data_BytesSynchronous** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) koji moramo da imamo da bismo započeli otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6073">**Data_BytesSynchronous** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we must have before we can start opening the file</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6074">**Data_BytesUnknown** – Broj bajtova u segmentima dokumenta koji ne očekujemo da nađemo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6074">**Data_BytesUnknown** - Number of bytes in document parts that we don't expect to find</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6075">**Data_DetachedDuration** - Koliko dugo je radnja odvojena od niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6075">**Data_DetachedDuration** - How long was the activity detached from the thread</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6076">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** -Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6076">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - Document is read only/editable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6077">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6077">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6078">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6078">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6079">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Jedinice koje se koriste za postepeno otvaranje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6079">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Units used for incremental document open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6080">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Postavke elektronske zaštite podataka za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6080">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6081">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta (docx/xlsb/pptx, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6081">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Document extension (docx/xlsb/pptx etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6082">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - Verzija protokola za format datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6082">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - File format protocol version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6083">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - Ime domena za OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6083">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - OneDrive or SharePoint Online Domain Name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6084">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - Jednosmerni heš imena domena koji se može identifikovati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6084">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - One-way hash of customer identifiable domain name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6085">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Izveštava o keširanim zastavicama koje su korišćene za podešavanje postavki zahteva za otvaranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6085">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Reports on the cached flags used to set open request options</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6086">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6086">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6087">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Beleži način na koji je otvoren dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6087">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Records how the document was opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6088">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Radnje koje su dozvoljene putem smernica za elektronskih zaštitu podataka koje su primenjene na dokument/korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6088">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Actions permitted by the Electronic Data Protection policy that has been applied to the document/user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6089">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Zastavica koja označava da je dokument postepeno otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6089">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Flag indicating that the document has been incrementally opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6090">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je dokument podržan u usluzi saradnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6090">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Flag indicating that the document is supported in the collaboration service</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6091">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to je otvorena vanmrežna kopija dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6091">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Flag indicating that the offline copy of a document was opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6092">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** -Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da na računaru postoji kopija koja se automatski sinhronizuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6092">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** - Flag indicating that an auto synced copy of the document exists on the computer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6093">**Data_Doc_Location** - Ukazuje na to koja je usluga obezbedila dokument (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6093">**Data_Doc_Location** - Indicates which service provided the document (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint etc.)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6094">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Ukazuje na to koja „Poznata fascikla“ je obezbedila lokalno uskladišteni dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6094">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Indicates which Known Folder provided a locally stored document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6095">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Izračunavanje broja drugih korisnika u sesiji zajedničkog uređivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6095">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Count of the number of fellow users in a collaborative editing session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6096">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Ukazuje na to da je postavljena zastavica za lozinku za čitanje ili čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6096">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Indicates read or read/write password flags set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6097">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Razlozi zbog kojih je dokument otvoren samo za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6097">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Reasons why the document was opened read only</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6098">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - Anonimni Identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6098">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - An anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6099">**Data_Doc_RtcType** –  Označava kako je postavljen kanal u realnom vremenu (RTC) za trenutnu datoteku (onemogućeno, nepodržano, na zahtev, uvek uključeno itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6099">**Data_Doc_RtcType** -  Indicates how the real-time channel (RTC) was set up for current file (Disabled, unsupported, on demand, always on, etc.).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6100">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - Nepromenljivi anonimni Identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6100">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - An immutable anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6101">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - verzija protokola koji se koristi za komunikaciju sa uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6101">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - the protocol version used to communicate with the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6102">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - tip servera koji nudi uslugu (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6102">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - the type of the server offering the service (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI etc.)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6103">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - verzija servera koji nudi uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6103">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - the server version offering the service</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6104">**Data_Doc_SessionId** -Identifikuje određenu sesiju uređivanja dokumenta u okviru cele sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6104">**Data_Doc_SessionId** - Identifies a specific document edit session within the full session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6105">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Informacije o dijagnostici iz zahteva usluge SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6105">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Diagnostic information from SharePoint Online requests</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6106">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Indikator veličine dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6106">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Indicator of document size</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6107">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - Indikator specijalnih znakova u URL adresi ili putanji dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6107">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - Indicator of special chars in the document's URL or Path</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6108">**Data_Doc_StreamAvailability** - Indikator koji ukazuje na to da li je protok dokumenta omogućen/onemogućen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6108">**Data_Doc_StreamAvailability** - Indicator if document stream is available/disabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6109">**Data_Doc_SyncBackedType** - Indikator tipa dokumenta (lokalni ili iz usluge)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6109">**Data_Doc_SyncBackedType** - Indicator as to the type of document (local or service based)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6110">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - Jednosmerni heš za kreiranje identifikatora jednostavnog dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6110">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - One-way hash to create a naïve document identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6111">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - Sadrži jedinstveni identifikator WOPI dobavljača usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6111">**Data_Doc_WopiServiceId** - Contains unique identifier of WOPI service provider</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6112">**Data_EditorDisablingRename** -Identifikator prvog urednika zbog kojeg je onemogućeno preimenovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6112">**Data_EditorDisablingRename** - Identifier of the first editor that caused for rename to be disabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6113">**Data_EditorsCount** - Broj urednika dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6113">**Data_EditorsCount** - Number of editors in the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6114">**Data_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure** - Ukazuje na to da je otvaranje uspelo nakon popravke greške prilikom otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6114">**Data_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure** - Indicates that open succeeded after repairing a failure while opening the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6115">**Data_ForceReadWriteReason** -Vrednost celog broja koja predstavlja razlog zbog kog je datoteka primorana da se otvori u režimu za čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6115">**Data_ForceReadWriteReason** - Integer value representing the reason why the file was forced into read/write mode</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6116">**Data_LastLoggedTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za identifikovanje kada otvaranje dva puta ne uspe (koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6116">**Data_LastLoggedTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to identify when we try to fail the open twice (used for data quality diagnostics)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6117">**Data_LinkStyles** - Ukazuje na to da li se povezujemo sa stilovima predložaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6117">**Data_LinkStyles** - Indicates whether we are linking to the template styles</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6118">**Data_MainPdod** - Identifikator dokumenta koji se obrađuje u programu Office Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6118">**Data_MainPdod** - The document identifier in Office Word process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6119">**Data_Measurements** - Šifrovana niska koja sadrži analizu vremena otvaranja različitih segmenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6119">**Data_Measurements** - Encoded string containing the time breakdown of the different parts of open.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6120">Koristi se za merenje performansi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6120">Used to measure performance.</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6121">**Data_MoveDisabledReason** - Greška koja onemogućava premeštanje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6121">**Data_MoveDisabledReason** - Error that is disabling move for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6122">**Data_MoveFlightEnabled** - Da li je omogućena putanja za funkciju premeštanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6122">**Data_MoveFlightEnabled** - Whether the flight for the move feature is enabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6123">**Data_PartsUnknown** – broj segmenata dokumenta za koji nismo mogli da dobijemo podatke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6123">**Data_PartsUnknown** - the number of document parts that we couldn't get data for</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6124">**Data_RecoverableFailureInitiationLocationTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi da bi se identifikovalo mesto u kodu na kom pokušavamo da popravimo datoteku pre nego što je otvorimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6124">**Data_RecoverableFailureInitiationLocationTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to identify the place in code where we attempt to fix the file before opening it.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6125">**Data_RenameDisabledReason** - Greška koja uzrokuje da preimenovanje ovog dokumenta bude onemogućeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6125">**Data_RenameDisabledReason** - Error that is causing for rename to be disabled for this document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6126">**Data_RenameFlightEnabled** - Da li je omogućena putanja za funkciju preimenovanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6126">**Data_RenameFlightEnabled** - Whether the flight for the rename feature is enabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6127">**Data_SecondaryTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za dodavanje dodatnih podataka o grešci otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6127">**Data_SecondaryTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to add additional failure data for open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6128">**Data_TemplateFormat** - Format datoteke predloška na kome je zasnovan dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6128">**Data_TemplateFormat** - File format of the template that the document is based on.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6129">**Data_UsesNormal** - Ukazuje na to da li je otvoreni dokument zasnovan na normalnom predlošku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6129">**Data_UsesNormal** - Indicates whether the open document is based on the normal template.</span></span>


#### <a name="officewordfileopenopenifrinitargs"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6130">Office.Word.FileOpen.OpenIfrInitArgs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6130">Office.Word.FileOpen.OpenIfrInitArgs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6131">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da Office Word otvara dokument putem COM aktivacije ili komandne linije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6131">This event indicates Office Word opens a document via COM activation or command line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6132">Sadrži i bitne podatke o performansama otvaranja datoteke i o tome da li je u pitanju događaj pokretanja aplikacije iz perspektive korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6132">It also contains critical file open performance data, and is an app start event from user perspective.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6133">Događaj prati da li otvaranje datoteke iz komandne linije radi kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6133">The event monitors whether file-open-from-command-line is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6134">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6134">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices, and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6135">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6135">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6136">**Data\_AddDocTelemRes –** Izveštava da li smo u događaju mogli ispravno da unesemo druge vrednosti koje se tiču telemetrije dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6136">**Data\_AddDocTelemRes -** Reports whether we were able to properly populate other document telemetry-related values in the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6137">Koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6137">Used for data quality diagnostics.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6138">**Data\_BytesAsynchronous -** Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možemo da otvorimo datoteku ako ih preuzmemo pre nego što korisnik započne uređivanje ili čuvanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6138">**Data\_BytesAsynchronous -** Number of bytes (compressed) that we believe we can open the file without if we get them before the user wants to start editing or maybe saving.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6139">**Data\_BytesAsynchronousWithWork -** Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možda možemo da otvorimo dokument, ali potrebno je značajno investiranje u kôd da bi se to omogućilo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6139">**Data\_BytesAsynchronousWithWork -** Number of bytes (compressed) that we might be able to open the file without but would require significant code investments to make it happen</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6140">**Data\_BytesSynchronous -** Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) koji moramo da imamo da bismo započeli otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6140">**Data\_BytesSynchronous -** Number of bytes (compressed) that we must have before we can start opening the file</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6141">**Data\_BytesUnknown –** Broj bajtova u segmentima dokumenta koji ne očekujemo da nađemo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6141">**Data\_BytesUnknown -** Number of bytes in document parts that we don't expect to find.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6142">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode -** Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6142">**Data\_Doc\_AccessMode -** Document is read only/editable</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6143">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons -** Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6143">**Data\_Doc\_AssistedReadingReasons -** Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6144">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6144">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6145">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType -** Jedinice koje se koriste za postepeno otvaranje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6145">**Data\_Doc\_ChunkingType -** Units used for incremental document open</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6146">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState -** Postavke za zaštitu elektronskih podataka dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6146">**Data\_Doc\_EdpState -** Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6147">**Data\_Doc\_Ext -** Oznaka tipa dokumenta (docx/xlsb/pptx, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6147">**Data\_Doc\_Ext -** Document extension (docx/xlsb/pptx, etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6148">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat -** Verzija protokola za format datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6148">**Data\_Doc\_FileFormat -** File format protocol version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6149">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn -** Ime domena za OneDrive ili SharePoint Online </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6149">**Data\_Doc\_Fqdn -** OneDrive or SharePoint Online Domain Name</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6150">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash -** Jednosmerni heš imena domena koji se može identifikovati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6150">**Data\_Doc\_FqdnHash -** One-way hash of customer identifiable domain name</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6151">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags -** Izveštava o keširanim zastavicama koje su korišćene za podešavanje postavki zahteva za otvaranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6151">**Data\_Doc\_IOFlags -** Reports on the cached flags used to set open request options</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6152">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId -** Jednosmerni heš identiteta korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6152">**Data\_Doc\_IdentityTelemetryId -** A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6153">**Data\_Doc\_InitializationScenario -** Beleži način na koji je otvoren dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6153">**Data\_Doc\_InitializationScenario -** Records how the document was opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6154">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights -** Radnje koje su dozvoljene putem smernica za zaštitu elektronskih podataka koje su primenjene na dokument/korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6154">**Data\_Doc\_IrmRights -** Actions permitted by the Electronic Data Protection policy that has been applied to the document/user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6155">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen -** Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je dokument postepeno otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6155">**Data\_Doc\_IsIncrementalOpen -** Flag indicating that the document has been incrementally opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6156">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported -** Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je dokument podržan u usluzi saradnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6156">**Data\_Doc\_IsOcsSupported -** Flag indicating that the document is supported in the collaboration service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6157">**Data\_Doc\_IsOpeningOfflineCopy -** Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je otvorena vanmrežna kopija dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6157">**Data\_Doc\_IsOpeningOfflineCopy -** Flag indicating that the offline copy of a document was opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6158">**Data\_Doc\_IsSyncBacked -** Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da na računaru postoji kopija dokumenta koja se automatski sinhronizuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6158">**Data\_Doc\_IsSyncBacked -** Flag indicating that an auto synced copy of the document exists on the computer</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6159">**Data\_Doc\_Location -** Ukazuje na to koja je usluga obezbedila dokument (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6159">**Data\_Doc\_Location -** Indicates which service provided the document (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6160">**Data\_Doc\_LocationDetails -** Ukazuje na to koja „Poznata fascikla“ je obezbedila lokalno uskladišteni dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6160">**Data\_Doc\_LocationDetails -** Indicates which Known Folder provided a locally stored document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6161">**Data\_Doc\_NumberCoAuthors -** Izračunavanje broja drugih korisnika u sesiji zajedničkog uređivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6161">**Data\_Doc\_NumberCoAuthors -** Count of the number of fellow users in a collaborative editing session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6162">**Data\_Doc\_PasswordFlags -** Ukazuje na skup zastavica koje obeležavaju lozinke za čitanje ili čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6162">**Data\_Doc\_PasswordFlags -** Indicates read or read/write password flags set</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6163">**Data\_Doc\_ReadOnlyReasons -** Razlozi zbog kojih je dokument otvoren samo za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6163">**Data\_Doc\_ReadOnlyReasons -** Reasons why the document was opened read only</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6164">**Data\_Doc\_ResourceIdHash -** Anonimni identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6164">**Data\_Doc\_ResourceIdHash -** An anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6165">**Data_Doc_RtcType –**  Označava kako je postavljen kanal u realnom vremenu (RTC) za trenutnu datoteku (onemogućeno, nepodržano, na zahtev, uvek uključeno itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6165">**Data_Doc_RtcType -**  Indicates how the real-time channel (RTC) was set up for current file (Disabled, unsupported, on demand, always on, etc.).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6166">**Data\_Doc\_ServerDocId -** Nepromenljivi anonimni identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6166">**Data\_Doc\_ServerDocId -** An immutable anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6167">**Data\_Doc\_ServerProtocol -** Verzija protokola koji se koristi za komunikaciju sa uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6167">**Data\_Doc\_ServerProtocol -** the protocol version used to communicate with the service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6168">**Data\_Doc\_ServerType -** Tip servera koji nudi uslugu (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6168">**Data\_Doc\_ServerType -** the type of the server offering the service (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI etc.)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6169">**Data\_Doc\_ServerVersion -** Verzija servera koji nudi uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6169">**Data\_Doc\_ServerVersion -** the server version offering the service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6170">**Data\_Doc\_SessionId -** Verzija servera koji nudi uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6170">**Data\_Doc\_SessionId -** the server version offering the service</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6171">**Data\_Doc\_SharePointServiceContext -** Informacije o dijagnostici iz zahteva za SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6171">**Data\_Doc\_SharePointServiceContext -** Diagnostic information from SharePoint Online requests</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6172">**Data\_Doc\_SizeInBytes -** Indikator veličine dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6172">**Data\_Doc\_SizeInBytes -** Indicator of document size</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6173">**Data\_Doc\_SpecialChars -** Indikator specijalnih znakova u URL adresi ili putanji dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6173">**Data\_Doc\_SpecialChars -** Indicator of special chars in the document's URL or Path</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6174">**Data\_Doc\_StreamAvailability -** Indikator koji ukazuje na to da li je protok dokumenta omogućen/onemogućen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6174">**Data\_Doc\_StreamAvailability -** Indicator if document stream is available/disabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6175">**Data\_Doc\_SyncBackedType -** Indikator tipa dokumenta (lokalni ili iz usluge)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6175">**Data\_Doc\_SyncBackedType -** Indicator as to the type of document (local or service based)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6176">**Data\_Doc\_UrlHash -** Jednosmerni heš za kreiranje identifikatora jednostavnog dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6176">**Data\_Doc\_UrlHash -** One-way hash to create a naïve document identifier</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6177">**Data\_Doc\_WopiServiceId -** Sadrži jedinstveni identifikator WOPI dobavljača usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6177">**Data\_Doc\_WopiServiceId -** Contains unique identifier of WOPI service provider</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6178">**Data\_EditorDisablingRename -** Identifikator prvog urednika koji je uzrokovao onemogućavanje opcije preimenovanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6178">**Data\_EditorDisablingRename -** Identifier of the first editor that caused for rename to be disabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6179">**Data\_EditorsCount -** Broj urednika dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6179">**Data\_EditorsCount -** Number of editors in the document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6180">**Data\_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure -** Ukazuje na to da je otvaranje uspelo nakon popravke greške prilikom otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6180">**Data\_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure -** Indicates that open succeeded after repairing a failure while opening the document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6181">**Data\_ForceReadWriteReason -** Vrednost celog broja koja predstavlja razlog zbog kog je datoteka primorana da se otvori u režimu za čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6181">**Data\_ForceReadWriteReason -** Integer value representing the reason why the file was forced into read/write mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6182">**Data\_LastLoggedTag -** Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za identifikovanje kada otvaranje dva puta ne uspe (koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6182">**Data\_LastLoggedTag -** Unique tag for code call site used to identify when we try to fail the open twice (used for data quality diagnostics)</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6183">**Data\_LinkStyles -** Ukazuje na to da li se povezujemo sa stilovima predložaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6183">**Data\_LinkStyles -** Indicates whether we are linking to the template styles</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6184">**Data\_MainPdod -** Identifikator dokumenta koji se obrađuje u programu Office Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6184">**Data\_MainPdod -** The document identifier in Office Word process</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6185">**Data\_Measurements -** Šifrovana niska koja sadrži analizu vremena otvaranja različitih segmenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6185">**Data\_Measurements -** Encoded string containing the time breakdown of the different parts of open.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6186">Koristi se za dijagnostikovanje performanse otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6186">Used to diagnose open performance.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6187">**Data\_MoveDisabledReason -** Greška koja onemogućava premeštanje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6187">**Data\_MoveDisabledReason -** Error that is disabling move for the document</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6188">**Data\_MoveFlightEnabled -** Da li je omogućena putanja za funkciju premeštanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6188">**Data\_MoveFlightEnabled -** Whether the flight for the move feature is enabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6189">**Data\_PartsUnknown –** broj segmenata dokumenta za koji nismo mogli da dobijemo podatke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6189">**Data\_PartsUnknown -** the number of document parts that we couldn't get data for</span></span>
