  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6193">**Data\_SecondaryTag -** Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za dodavanje dodatnih podataka o grešci otvaranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6193">**Data\_SecondaryTag -** Unique tag for code call site used to add additional failure data for open.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6194">**Data\_TemplateFormat -** Format datoteke predloška na kome je zasnovan dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6194">**Data\_TemplateFormat -** File format of the template that the document is based on.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6195">**Data\_UsesNormal -** Ukazuje na to da li je otvoreni dokument zasnovan na normalnom predlošku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6195">**Data\_UsesNormal -** Indicates whether the open document is based on the normal template.</span></span>


#### <a name="officewordfileopenopenloadfile"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6196">Office.Word.FileOpen.OpenLoadFile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6196">Office.Word.FileOpen.OpenLoadFile</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6197">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da Office Word otvara dokument putem dijaloga „Otvaranje“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6197">This event indicates Office Word opens a document via Open dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6198">Sadrži i bitne podatke o performansama otvaranja datoteke i o tome da li je u pitanju događaj pokretanja aplikacije iz perspektive korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6198">It also contains critical file open performance data and is an app start event from user perspective.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6199">Događaj prati da li otvaranje datoteke pomoću dijaloga „Otvaranje“ radi kao što je očekivano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6199">The event monitors whether file-open-from-the-open-filedialog is working as expected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6200">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje mesečno aktivnih korisnika/uređaja i metrike pouzdanosti oblaka. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6200">It is also used to calculated monthly active users/devices, and cloud reliability metrics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6201">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6201">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6202">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** – Izveštava da li smo u slučaju mogli pravilno da popunimo druge vrednosti povezane sa telemetrijom dokumenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6202">**Data_AddDocTelemRes** - Reports whether we were able to properly populate other document telemetry-related values in the event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6203">Koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6203">Used for data quality diagnostics.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6204">**Data_BytesAsynchronous** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možemo da otvorimo datoteku ako ih preuzmemo pre nego što korisnik započne uređivanje ili čuvanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6204">**Data_BytesAsynchronous** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we believe we can open the file without if we get them before the user wants to start editing or maybe saving</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6205">**Data_BytesAsynchronousWithWork** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) bez kojeg možda možemo da otvorimo dokument, ali potrebno je značajno investiranje u kôd da bi se to omogućilo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6205">**Data_BytesAsynchronousWithWork** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we might be able to open the file without but would require significant code investments to make it happen</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6206">**Data_BytesSynchronous** - Broj bajtova (komprimovanih) koji moramo da imamo da bismo započeli otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6206">**Data_BytesSynchronous** - Number of bytes (compressed) that we must have before we can start opening the file</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6207">**Data_BytesUnknown** – Broj bajtova u segmentima dokumenta koji ne očekujemo da nađemo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6207">**Data_BytesUnknown** - Number of bytes in document parts that we don't expect to find</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6208">**Data_DetachedDuration** - Koliko dugo je radnja odvojena od niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6208">**Data_DetachedDuration** - How long was the activity detached from the thread</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6209">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** -Dokument je samo za čitanje/ili može da se uređuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6209">**Data_Doc_AccessMode** - Document is read only/editable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6210">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Unapred definisani skup vrednosti koji se odnosi na razloge zbog kojih je dokument otvoren u režimu pomoći za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6210">**Data_Doc_AssistedReadingReasons** - Predefined set of values of why document was opened in assisted reading mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6211">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Ukazuje na to da li je otvorena keširana verzija dokumenta u oblaku i koja je logika nesinhronizovanog osvežavanja korišćena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6211">**Data_Doc_AsyncOpenKind –** Indicates whether a cached version of the cloud document was opened and which asynchronous refresh logic was used.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6212">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Jedinice koje se koriste za postepeno otvaranje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6212">**Data_Doc_ChunkingType** - Units used for incremental document open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6213">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Postavke elektronske zaštite podataka za dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6213">**Data_Doc_EdpState** - Electronic Data Protection setting for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6214">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Oznaka tipa dokumenta (docx/xlsb/pptx, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6214">**Data_Doc_Ext** - Document extension (docx/xlsb/pptx etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6215">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - Verzija protokola za format datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6215">**Data_Doc_FileFormat** - File format protocol version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6216">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - Ime domena za OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6216">**Data_Doc_Fqdn** - OneDrive or SharePoint Online Domain Name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6217">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - Jednosmerni heš imena domena koji se može identifikovati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6217">**Data_Doc_FqdnHash** - One-way hash of customer identifiable domain name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6218">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - Jednosmerni heš za identitet korisnika koji se koristi za izvršavanje otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6218">**Data_Doc_IdentityTelemetryId** - A one-way hash of the user identity used to perform the open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6219">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Beleži način na koji je otvoren dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6219">**Data_Doc_InitializationScenario** - Records how the document was opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6220">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Izveštava o keširanim zastavicama koje su korišćene za podešavanje postavki zahteva za otvaranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6220">**Data_Doc_IOFlags** - Reports on the cached flags used to set open request options</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6221">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Radnje koje su dozvoljene putem smernica za elektronskih zaštitu podataka koje su primenjene na dokument/korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6221">**Data_Doc_IrmRights** - Actions permitted by the Electronic Data Protection policy that has been applied to the document/user</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6222">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Zastavica koja označava da je dokument postepeno otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6222">**Data_Doc_IsIncrementalOpen** - Flag indicating that the document has been incrementally opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6223">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da je dokument podržan u usluzi saradnje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6223">**Data_Doc_IsOcsSupported** - Flag indicating that the document is supported in the collaboration service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6224">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Zastavica koja ukazuje na to je otvorena vanmrežna kopija dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6224">**Data_Doc_IsOpeningOfflineCopy** - Flag indicating that the offline copy of a document was opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6225">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** -Zastavica koja ukazuje na to da na računaru postoji kopija koja se automatski sinhronizuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6225">**Data_Doc_IsSyncBacked** - Flag indicating that an auto synced copy of the document exists on the computer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6226">**Data_Doc_Location** - Ukazuje na to koja je usluga obezbedila dokument (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6226">**Data_Doc_Location** - Indicates which service provided the document (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6227">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Ukazuje na to koja „Poznata fascikla“ je obezbedila lokalno uskladišteni dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6227">**Data_Doc_LocationDetails** - Indicates which Known Folder provided a locally stored document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6228">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Izračunavanje broja drugih korisnika u sesiji zajedničkog uređivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6228">**Data_Doc_NumberCoAuthors** - Count of the number of fellow users in a collaborative editing session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6229">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Ukazuje na to da je postavljena zastavica za lozinku za čitanje ili čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6229">**Data_Doc_PasswordFlags** - Indicates read or read/write password flags set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6230">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Razlozi zbog kojih je dokument otvoren samo za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6230">**Data_Doc_ReadOnlyReasons** - Reasons why the document was opened read only</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6231">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - Anonimni Identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6231">**Data_Doc_ResourceIdHash** - An anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6232">**Data_Doc_RtcType** –  Označava kako je postavljen kanal u realnom vremenu (RTC) za trenutnu datoteku (onemogućeno, nepodržano, na zahtev, uvek uključeno itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6232">**Data_Doc_RtcType** -  Indicates how the real-time channel (RTC) was set up for current file (Disabled, unsupported, on demand, always on, etc.).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6233">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - Nepromenljivi anonimni Identifikator dokumenta koji se koristi da bi se dijagnostikovali problemi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6233">**Data_Doc_ServerDocId** - An immutable anonymized document Identifier used to diagnose problems</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6234">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - verzija protokola koji se koristi za komunikaciju sa uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6234">**Data_Doc_ServerProtocol** - the protocol version used to communicate with the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6235">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - tip servera koji nudi uslugu (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6235">**Data_Doc_ServerType** - the type of the server offering the service (SharePoint, OneDrive, WOPI, etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6236">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - verzija servera koji nudi uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6236">**Data_Doc_ServerVersion** - the server version offering the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6237">**Data_Doc_SessionId** -Identifikuje određenu sesiju uređivanja dokumenta u okviru cele sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6237">**Data_Doc_SessionId** - Identifies a specific document edit session within the full session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6238">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Informacije o dijagnostici iz zahteva usluge SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6238">**Data_Doc_SharePointServiceContext** - Diagnostic information from SharePoint Online requests</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6239">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Indikator veličine dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6239">**Data_Doc_SizeInBytes** - Indicator of document size</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6240">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - Indikator specijalnih znakova u URL adresi ili putanji dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6240">**Data_Doc_SpecialChars** - Indicator of special chars in the document's URL or Path</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6241">**Data_Doc_StreamAvailability** - Indikator koji ukazuje na to da li je protok dokumenta omogućen/onemogućen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6241">**Data_Doc_StreamAvailability** - Indicator if document stream is available/disabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6242">**Data_Doc_SyncBackedType** - Indikator tipa dokumenta (lokalni ili iz usluge)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6242">**Data_Doc_SyncBackedType** - Indicator as to the type of document (local or service based)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6243">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - Jednosmerni heš za kreiranje identifikatora jednostavnog dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6243">**Data_Doc_UrlHash** - One-way hash to create a naïve document identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6244">**Data_EditorDisablingRename** -Identifikator prvog urednika zbog kojeg je onemogućeno preimenovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6244">**Data_EditorDisablingRename** - Identifier of the first editor that caused for rename to be disabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6245">**Data_EditorsCount** - Broj urednika dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6245">**Data_EditorsCount** - Number of editors in the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6246">**Data_ForceReadWriteReason** -Vrednost celog broja koja predstavlja razlog zbog kog je datoteka primorana da se otvori u režimu za čitanje/pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6246">**Data_ForceReadWriteReason** - Integer value representing the reason why the file was forced into read/write mode</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6247">**Data_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure** - Ukazuje na to da je otvaranje uspelo nakon popravke greške prilikom otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6247">**Data_FSucceededAfterRecoverableFailure** - Indicates that open succeeded after repairing a failure while opening the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6248">**Data_LastLoggedTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za identifikovanje kada pokušaj čuvanja dva puta ne uspe (koristi se za dijagnostiku kvaliteta podataka)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6248">**Data_LastLoggedTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to identify when we fail to try the save twice (used for data quality diagnostics)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6249">**Data_LinkStyles** - Ukazuje na to da li se povezujemo sa stilovima predložaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6249">**Data_LinkStyles** - Indicates whether we are linking to the template styles</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6250">**Data_MainPdod** - Identifikator dokumenta koji se obrađuje u programu Office Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6250">**Data_MainPdod** - The document identifier in Office Word process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6251">**Data_Measurements** - Šifrovana niska koja sadrži analizu vremena otvaranja različitih segmenata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6251">**Data_Measurements** - Encoded string containing the time breakdown of the different parts of open.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6252">Koristi se za merenje performansi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6252">Used to measure performance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6253">**Data_MoveDisabledReason** - Greška koja onemogućava premeštanje dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6253">**Data_MoveDisabledReason** - Error that is disabling move for the document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6254">**Data_MoveFlightEnabled** - Da li je omogućena putanja za funkciju premeštanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6254">**Data_MoveFlightEnabled** - Whether the flight for the move feature is enabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6255">**Data_PartsUnknown** – broj segmenata dokumenta za koji nismo mogli da dobijemo podatke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6255">**Data_PartsUnknown** - the number of document parts that we couldn't get data for</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6256">**Data_RecoverableFailureInitiationLocationTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi da bi se identifikovalo mesto u kodu na kom pokušavamo da popravimo datoteku pre nego što je otvorimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6256">**Data_RecoverableFailureInitiationLocationTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to identify the place in code where we attempt to fix the file before opening it</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6257">**Data_RenameDisabledReason** - Greška koja uzrokuje da preimenovanje ovog dokumenta bude onemogućeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6257">**Data_RenameDisabledReason** - Error that is causing for rename to be disabled for this document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6258">**Data_RenameFlightEnabled** - Da li je omogućena putanja za funkciju preimenovanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6258">**Data_RenameFlightEnabled** - Whether the flight for the rename feature is enabled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6259">**Data_SecondaryTag** - Jedinstvena oznaka za lokaciju poziva koda koja se koristi za dodavanje dodatnih podataka o grešci otvaranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6259">**Data_SecondaryTag** - Unique tag for code call site used to add additional failure data for open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6260">**Data_TemplateFormat** - Format datoteke predloška na kome je zasnovan dokument</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6260">**Data_TemplateFormat** - File format of the template that the document is based on</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6261">**Data_UsesNormal** - Ukazuje na to da li je otvoreni dokument zasnovan na normalnom predlošku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6261">**Data_UsesNormal** - Indicates whether the open document is based on the normal template</span></span>


#### <a name="renewuserop"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6262">RenewUserOp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6262">RenewUserOp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6263">Sakuplja se kada korisnik pokuša da otvori IRM zaštićeni dokument ili primeni IRM zaštitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6263">Collected when a user attempts to open an IRM protected doc or apply IRM protections.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6264">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se događaju prilikom izvršavanja operacije obnavljanja korisničkih certifikata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6264">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen when renew user certificates operation is performed.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6265">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6265">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6266">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** – Hijerarhija klijenata koja označava da aplikacija radi u proizvodnom okruženju ili razvojnom okruženju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6266">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** - Client hierarchy, which indicates the application runs in production environment or developer environment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6267">**AppInfo.Name** – Ime aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6267">**AppInfo.Name** - Application name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6268">**AppInfo.Version** - Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6268">**AppInfo.Version** - Application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6269">**iKey** – Id servera sistema za evidenciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6269">**iKey** - Logger server ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6270">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** – Id scenarija koji obezbeđuje aplikacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6270">**RMS.ApplicationScenarioId** - Scenario ID provided by the application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6271">**RMS.Duration** - Ukupno vreme za dovršavanje operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6271">**RMS.Duration** - Total time for the operation to complete</span></span>

### <a name="office-accessibility-configuration-subtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6302">*Podtip konfiguracije pristupačnosti sistema Office*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6302">*Office accessibility configuration subtype*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6303">Funkcije pristupačnosti u sistemu Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6303">Office accessibility features</span></span>

#### <a name="officeaccessibilityaccessibilitytoolsessionpresencewin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6304">Office.Accessibility.AccessibilityToolSessionPresenceWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6304">Office.Accessibility.AccessibilityToolSessionPresenceWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6305">Omogućava nam da otkrijemo da li korisnik ima alatku za pomoćnu tehnologiju i koje je njeno ime.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6305">Allows us to detect that the user has an Assistive technology tool and its name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6306">Time možemo da razumemo da li korisnik sistema Office ima probleme sa određenom alatkom za pomoćnu tehnologiju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6306">This allows us to understand if an Office user is experiencing issues with a specific Assistive Technology tool.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6307">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6307">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6308">**Data\_Data\_Jaws -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „Jaws“ radila tokom sesije **Data\_Data\_Magic -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „Magic“ radila tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6308">**Data\_Data\_Jaws -** indicates if Jaws was running during the session **Data\_Data\_Magic -** indicates if Magic was running during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6309">**Data\_Data\_Magnify -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „Lupa“ radila tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6309">**Data\_Data\_Magnify -** indicates if Magnify was running during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6310">**Data\_Data\_Narrator -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „Narator“ radila tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6310">**Data\_Data\_Narrator -** indicates if Narrator was running during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6311">**Data\_Data\_NVDA -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „NVDA“ radila tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6311">**Data\_Data\_NVDA -** indicates if NVDA was running during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6312">**Data\_Data\_SA -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „SA“ radila tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6312">**Data\_Data\_SA -** indicates if SA was running during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6313">**Data\_Data\_Supernova -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „Supernova“ radila tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6313">**Data\_Data\_Supernova -** indicates if Supernova was running during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6314">**Data\_Data\_SuperNovaessSuite -** ukazuje na to da li je SuperNovaAccessSuite radio tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6314">**Data\_Data\_SuperNovaessSuite -** indicates if SuperNovaAccessSuite was running during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6315">**Data\_Data\_WinEyes -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „WinEyes“ radila tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6315">**Data\_Data\_WinEyes -** indicates if WinEyes was running during the session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6316">**Data\_Data\_ZoomText -** ukazuje na to da li je alatka „Zumiranje teksta“ radila tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6316">**Data\_Data\_ZoomText -** indicates if ZoomText was running during the session</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappledarkmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6317">Office.Apple.DarkMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6317">Office.Apple.DarkMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6318">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6318">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6319">Događaj nam govori da li je korisnik pokrenuo sistem u Tamnom režimu i da li je korisnik zamenio postavku sistema Tamnog režima u aplikaciji Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6319">The event tells us if user is running a System on DarkMode and whether the user overwrote the DarkMode System setting in Office.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6320">Koristimo ovaj događaj da bismo obezbedili pristupačnost i odredili prioritete u optimizaciji korisničkog iskustva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6320">We use this event to help ensure accessibility and prioritize user-experience optimization.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6321">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6321">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6322">**Data_DarkModeIsEnabled** - da li je Tamni režim omoguće u sistemu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6322">**Data_DarkModeIsEnabled** - Whether DarkMode is enabled in the system.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6323">**Data_RequiresAquaSystemAppearanceEnabled** - da li je Tamni režim zamenjen u aplikaciji Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6323">**Data_RequiresAquaSystemAppearanceEnabled** - Whether DarkMode is overwritten in Office.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeapplehardwarekeyboardinuseapple"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6324">Office.Apple.HardwareKeyboardInUse.Apple</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6324">Office.Apple.HardwareKeyboardInUse.Apple</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6325">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6325">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6326">Događaj nam govori da korisnik priključuje tastaturu na svoj mobilni uređaj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6326">The event tells us that a user is attaching a keyboard to their mobile device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6327">Događaj nam pomaže da poboljšamo pristupačnost i optimizujemo korisničko iskustvo.
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6327">The event helps us improve accessibility and optimize our user experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6328">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6328">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6329">**Data_CollectionTime** - vremenska oznaka koja označava vreme prikupljanja događaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6329">**Data_CollectionTime** - A timestamp denoting the event collection time.</span></span>

### <a name="privacy-subtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6369">*Podtip privatnosti*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6369">*Privacy subtype*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6370">Postavke privatnosti za Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6370">Office privacy settings</span></span> 

#### <a name="officeintelligentserviceprivacyconsentprivacyevent"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6371">Office.IntelligentService.PrivacyConsent.PrivacyEvent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6371">Office.IntelligentService.PrivacyConsent.PrivacyEvent</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6372">Ovaj događaj predstavlja akciju koju je pokrenuo korisnik ili sistem koji je deo korisničkog iskustva za Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6372">This event represents a user or system initiated action that is part of the privacy User experience for Office.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6373">Pokreće se u dijalozima Prvo pokretanje privatnosti, dijalogu Privatnost naloga i obaveštenjima o privatnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6373">It is triggered on the privacy First Run dialogs, Account Privacy dialog, and privacy notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6374">Događaj se koristi da bi se razumelo sledeće: korisnici koji su saglasni sa postavkama privatnosti za Office, korisnici koji menjaju postavke privatnosti za Office i postavke privatnosti za Office koje se ažuriraju u korisničkim sesijama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6374">The event is used to understand the following: users consenting to Office privacy settings, users changing Office privacy settings, and Office privacy settings getting updated in user sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6375">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6375">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6376">**Data_ActionId -** Radnja korisnika u dijalogu „Privatnost“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6376">**Data_ActionId -** User action in a privacy dialog</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6377">**Data_ControllerConnectedServicesState –** Postavka korisničke politike za dodatna opciona povezana iskustva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6377">**Data_ControllerConnectedServicesState -** User policy setting for additional optional connected experiences</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6378">**Data_DownloadedContentServiceGroupState –** Korisničke postavke za preuzet sadržaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6378">**Data_DownloadedContentServiceGroupState -** User setting for downloaded content</span></span> 
 
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6379">**Data_ForwardLinkId-** Veza sa dokumentacijom o privatnosti za korisnički scenario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6379">**Data_ForwardLinkId -** Link to privacy documentation for the user scenario</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6380">**Data_HRESULT-** Zapis grešaka tokom interakcije sa dijalogom o privatnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6380">**Data_HRESULT -** Record of errors during interaction with a privacy dialog</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6381">**Data_IsEnterpriseUser –** Kategorija licence korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6381">**Data_IsEnterpriseUser -** User license category</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6382">**Data_OfficeServiceConnectionState –** Korisnička podešavanje za povezane usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6382">**Data_OfficeServiceConnectionState -** User setting for connected services</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6383">**Data_RecordRegistry –** Zapis o prikazivanju dijaloga o privatnosti preduzeća</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6383">**Data_RecordRegistry -** Record of showing the enterprise privacy dialog</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6384">**Data_Scenario –** Scenario prvog pokretanja zasnovan na korisničkoj licenci i kategoriji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6384">**Data_Scenario -** First run scenario based on the user license and category</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6385">**Data_SeenInsidersDialog –** Zapis o prikazivanju dijaloga o privatnosti insajdera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6385">**Data_SeenInsidersDialog -** Record of showing the Insiders privacy dialog</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6386">**Data_SendTelemetryOption –** Korisničko podešavanje za telemetriju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6386">**Data_SendTelemetryOption -** User setting for telemetry</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6387">**Data_SendTelemetryOption –** Postavka korisničkih smernica za telemetriju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6387">**Data_SendTelemetryOptionPolicy -** User policy setting for telemetry</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6388">**Data_UserCategory –** Tip korisničkog naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6388">**Data_UserCategory -** User account type</span></span>  

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6389">**Data_UserCCSDisabled-** Korisnička razmena za dodatna opciona povezana iskustva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6389">**Data_UserCCSDisabled -** User override for additional optional connected experiences</span></span>

   - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6390">**Data_UserContentServiceGroupState –** Korisničke postavke za analizu sadržaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6390">**Data_UserContentServiceGroupState -** User setting for analyzing content</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6391">**Data_WillShowDialogs –** Zapis korisnika koji treba da vidi prvi put pokrenut dijalog o privatnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6391">**Data_WillShowDialogs -** Record of user needing to see privacy First Run dialogs</span></span>

### <a name="unexpected-application-exit-crash-subtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6397">*Podtip neočekivanog izlaza iz aplikacije (pad)*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6397">*Unexpected application exit (crash) subtype*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6398">Neočekivani izlazi iz aplikacije i njeno stanje u trenutku kada se to dogodi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6398">Unexpected application exits and the state of the application when that happens.</span></span>

#### <a name="appstartupreason"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6399">app.startup.reason</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6399">app.startup.reason</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6400">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo i rešimo probleme tamo gde je Outlook pao tokom pokretanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6400">This event lets us detect and fix issues where Outlook crashed during app startup.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6401">Ovaj događaj obuhvata informacije o tome zašto se pad dogodio, tako da brzo možemo da rešimo problem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6401">This event includes information on why the crash happened so we can fix the issue quickly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6402">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6402">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6403">**app_background_time** - trajanje aplikacije u pozadini u poslednjoj sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6403">**app_background_time** - duration of how long app was in background last session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6404">**startup_reason_type** - označava zašto se aplikacija pokreće, to će ukazati na to da li je zbog toga što je prinudno zaustavljena ili zbog drugog razloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6404">**startup_reason_type** - indicates why the app is starting up, this will indicate if it was due to force quit, or other reason.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6405">**watch_status_info** - prati sledeće informacije, ako je primenljivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6405">**watch_status_info** - keeps track of the following information, if applicable.</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6406">**is_watch_app_installed** - utvrđuje da li korisnik ima instaliranu Watch aplikaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6406">**is_watch_app_installed** - determines if the user has the Watch app installed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6407">**is_watch_paired** - utvrđuje da li je iOS uređaj uparen za sat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6407">**is_watch_paired** - determines if iOS device is paired to a watch</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6408">**is_watch_supported_and_active** - označava da li je sat podržan i aktivan tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6408">**is_watch_supported_and_active** - indicates whether a watch is supportive and active during the session</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6409">Sledeća polja se prikupljaju samo za Outlook Mobile za iOS:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6409">The following fields are collected for only Outlook Mobile for iOS:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6410">**clean_exit_reason** - niska reči koje ukazuju na to zašto je postojao razlog za zaustavljanje aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6410">**clean_exit_reason** - A string of words indicating why if there was a reason for the app stop</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6411">**is_agenda_user** – označava da li je korisnik nedavno otvarao dnevni red koji ukazuje na to da li pišemo na disku za pokretanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6411">**is_agenda_user** - Indicates if the user has opened the agenda recently, which indicates if we are writing disk on the startup</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6412">**is_watch_supported_and_active** - označava da li je sat podržan i aktivan tokom sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6412">**is_watch_supported_and_active** - indicates whether a watch is supportive and active during the session</span></span>


#### <a name="applicationcrash"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6413">application.crash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6413">application.crash</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6414">Koristi se za nadgledanje pada kritičnih aplikacija i pomaže nam da sakupimo informacije o tome zašto je aplikacija pala i kako da to sprečite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6414">Used for monitoring critical app crashes and helps us collect information on why the app has crashed and how to prevent it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6415">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6415">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6416">**android.hardware.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6416">**android.hardware.**</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6417">– vrednosti konfiguracije hardvera (npr. android.hardware.bluetooth) koje pruža Android platforma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6417">- (for example, android.hardware.bluetooth) Hardware configuration values provided by the Android platform</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6418">**android.software.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6418">**android.software.**</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6419">– (npr. android. software.device_admin) vrednosti konfigurisanja softvera koje pruža Android platforma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6419">- (for example, android.software.device_admin) Software configuration values provided by the Android platform</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6420">**android_version** - ime verzije Android na uređaju, kao što je naznačeno android.os.Build.VERSION#RELEASE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6420">**android_version** - Device android version name as indicated by android.os.Build.VERSION#RELEASE</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6421">**application_package_name** - ime paketa aplikacije kao što je naznačio android.content.Context#getPackageName()</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6421">**application_package_name** - Application package name as indicated by android.content.Context#getPackageName()</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6422">**application_stack_trace** - praćenje steka pri padu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6422">**application_stack_trace** - the stack trace of the crash</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6423">**application_version_code** - kôd verzije aplikacije definisane od strane aplikacije Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6423">**application_version_code** - Application version code defined by the Outlook app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6424">**application_version_name** - ime verzije aplikacije definisane od strane aplikacije Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6424">**application_version_name** - Application version name defined by the Outlook app</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6425">**com.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6425">**com.**</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6426">(e.g. com.google.android.feature.FASTPASS_BUILD, com.amazon.feature.PRELOAD, com.samsung.android.bio.face) Vrednosti konfiguracije specifične za proizvođača koje pruža Android platforma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6426">(for example, com.google.android.feature.FASTPASS_BUILD, com.amazon.feature.PRELOAD, com.samsung.android.bio.face) Manufacturer-specific configuration values provided by the Android platform</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6427">**crash_report_sdk** – SDK za slanje evidencija o padu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6427">**crash_report_sdk** - SDK to send crash logs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6428">Ili Hockey ili AppCenter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6428">Either Hockey or AppCenter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6429">**crash_type** – crash_type će za tip imati java, osnovni i otklonjivi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6429">**crash_type** - crash_type will have java, native, non-fatal as types.</span></span>

     - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6430">java – ako je pad zabeležen na sloju aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6430">java - if crash recorded on application Layer.</span></span>

     - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6431">osnovni – ako je pad zabeležen na osnovnom sloju unutar aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6431">native - if crash recorded on native layer within the app.</span></span> 

     - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6432">otklonjivi – padovi koji se zabeleže da bi se otklonile greške u bilo kojoj funkciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6432">non-fatal - crashes being recorded to debug any feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6433">Aplikacije neće pasti već će otpremiti evidencije o otklonjivim padovima radi lakšeg otklanjanja greške u funkciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6433">Application won’t crash but it will upload non-fatal crash logs to help in debugging a feature.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6434">**device_brand** - marka uređaja (proizvođač ili operater) kao što je naznačio android.os.Build#BRAND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6434">**device_brand** - Device brand (manufacturer or carrier) as indicated by android.os.Build#BRAND</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6435">**device_ID** - jedinstveni ID uređaja (IMEI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6435">**device_ID** - Device unique ID (IMEI)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6436">**device_manufacturer** - proizvođač uređaja kao što je naznačio android.os.Build#PROIZVOĐAČ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6436">**device_manufacturer** - Device manufacturer as indicated by android.os.Build#MANUFACTURER</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6437">**device_model** - model uređaja, kao što je označio android.os.Build#MODEL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6437">**device_model** - Device model as indicated by android.os.Build#MODEL</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6438">**device_name** - ime uređaja, kao što je označio android.os.Build#UREĐAJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6438">**device_name** - Device name as indicated by android.os.Build#DEVICE</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6439">**device_total_memory** - ocena ukupne veličine memorije uređaja na osnovu vrednosti datoteke okviru sistema datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6439">**device_total_memory** - Estimation of the total device memory size based on filesystem stats.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6440">**glEsVersion** - OpenGL Embedded Systems verzije ključa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6440">**glEsVersion** - OpenGL Embedded Systems version key</span></span>


#### <a name="crashevent"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6441">crash.event</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6441">crash.event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6442">Omogućava nam da otkrijemo i rešimo situacije u kojima su se desile kritične aplikacije za pad i pomaže nam da sakupimo informacije o tome zašto je aplikacija pala i kako da to sprečite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6442">Allows us to detect and fix situations where critical app crashes have occurred and helps us collect information on why the app has crashed and how to prevent it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6443">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6443">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6444">**crashTime** - datum i vreme kada se pad dogodio da bi pomogao u vezi sa istragom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6444">**crashTime** - Date and time the crash occurred to help with investigation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6445">**crash_time_from_start** – proteklo vreme od pokretanja aplikacije do rušenja, kao pomoć tokom istrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6445">**crash_time_from_start** – The elapsed time from app start to the crash occurred, to help with investigation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6446">**exceptionName** – ime izuzetka koji je pokrenuo pad da bi pomogao u vezi sa istragom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6446">**exceptionName** - The name of the exception that triggered the crash to help with investigation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6447">**exception_reason** – naziv razloga koji je izazvao rušenje kao pomoć tokom istrage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6447">**exception_reason** – The reason of the exception that triggered the crash to help with investigation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6448">**hasHx** - govori nam da nalog koristi našu novu uslugu sinhronizacije kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme izazvane uslugom sinhronizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6448">**hasHx** - Tells us the account is using our new sync service to help us detect issues caused by our sync service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6449">**incidentIdentifier** - jedinstveni ID za izveštaj o padu tako da možemo da pronađemo odgovarajući problem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6449">**incidentIdentifier** - A unique ID for the crash report so we can find the corresponding issue</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6450">**isAppKill** - pomaže nam da shvatimo da li je ta aplikacija prekinuta ili zatvorena na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6450">**isAppKill** - Helps us understand if that app was killed or close on the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6451">**is_crashloop** – Pomaže nam da razumemo kolika je verovatnoća da je pad petlja padova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6451">**is_crashloop** – Helps us understand if the crash could likely be a crash loop.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6452">**reportKey** - jedinstveni ID za instalaciju aplikacije om uređaj za istragu o problemima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6452">**reportKey** - A unique ID for the application installation om the device for issue investigation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6453">**signal** - signal koji je izazvao sudar daje nam više detalja da istražimo ovaj pad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6453">**signal** - A signal that caused the crash to give us more details to investigate this crash</span></span>


#### <a name="error"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6454">Greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6454">Error</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6455">Dozvoljava nam da shvatimo probleme sa kojima se suočavaju aplikacije za mobilne uređaje kada pokušaju da pokupe postavke privatnosti sa servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6455">Allows us to understand the issues that mobile apps are facing when attempting to fetch privacy settings from the server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6456">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6456">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6457">**correlationId** - jedinstveni identifikator za vezu usluge koja je rezultirala greškom, omogućavajući nam da ustanovimo šta je moglo da se pogreši</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6457">**correlationId** - a unique identifier for a service connection that resulted in an error, allowing us to diagnose what might have gone wrong</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6458">**errorCode** - identifikuje relevantni kôd greške primljen od usluge koji se može koristiti za dijagnozu problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6458">**errorCode** - identifies the relevant error code received from the service that could be used to diagnose the problem</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6459">**exceptionType** - tip greške sa kojom se biblioteka susrela prilikom postavljanju postake</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6459">**exceptionType** - type of error that the library encountered when fetching the setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6460">**message** - prepoznaje poruku o grešci koju ste dobili od usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6460">**message** - identifies the error message received from the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6461">**roamingSettingType** - identifikuje lokaciju od koje pokušavamo da pročitamo postavke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6461">**roamingSettingType** - identifies the location from which we attempt to read settings</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6462">**settingId** - postavka koja je Pokušana da se uradi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6462">**settingId** - the setting that was attempted to be fetched</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappdomainunhandledexceptionhandlerfailed"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6463">Office.AppDomain.UnhandledExceptionHandlerFailed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6463">Office.AppDomain.UnhandledExceptionHandlerFailed</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6464">Prikuplja informacije o nekontrolisanim izuzecima pomoću aplikacije Data Streamer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6464">Collects information for any unhandled exceptions using the Data Streamer App.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6465">Ti podaci se koriste za praćenje ispravnosti aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6465">This data is used to monitor the health of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6466">Ovaj događaj je generisao programski dodatak Microsoft Data Streamer za Excel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6466">This event is generated by Microsoft Data Streamer for Excel Add-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6467">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6467">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6468">**Exception** - Niz poziva za izuzetak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6468">**Exception** - Call stack for the Exception</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6469">**Event Name** - Ime događaja, što je kategorija i oznaka događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6469">**Event Name** - Event Name is the Event Category and Event Label.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappleidentitydomainname"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6470">Office.Apple.IdentityDomainName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6470">Office.Apple.IdentityDomainName</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6471">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6471">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6472">Događaj se koristi za nadgledanje stanja našeg sistema kao i za istraživanje uzroka neuspeha određenih korisnika domena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6472">The event is used to monitor the health of our system as well as investigating causes of failures by certain domain users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6473">Prikupljamo domen koji koriste naši korisnici prilikom potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6473">We collect the domain used by our users when they authenticate.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6474">Ove podatke koristimo da bismo pomogli da identifikujemo i ispravimo one probleme koji na širem nivou možda ne deluju previše uticajno, ali za koje se ispostavi da su vrlo uticajni za određeni domen korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6474">We use this data to help identify and fix those issues that might not seem too impactful at a broader level, but that turn out to be very impactful to a certain domain of users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6475">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6475">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6476">**Data_Domain** - domen koji se koristi za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6476">**Data_Domain** - the domain used for authentication</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6477">**Data_IdentityProvider** - ime dobavljača identiteta za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6477">**Data_IdentityProvider** - The authentication identity provider name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6478">(to jest, Ћiveid ili ADAL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6478">(that is, LiveId or ADAL)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6479">**Data_IdentityProviderEnum** - kod dobavljača identiteta za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6479">**Data_IdentityProviderEnum** - The authentication identity provider code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6480">(Broj)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6480">(A number)</span></span>

#### <a name="officeapplesystemhealthappexitmacandios"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6481">Office.Apple.SystemHealthAppExitMacAndiOS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6481">Office.Apple.SystemHealthAppExitMacAndiOS</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6482">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6482">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6483">Događaj se koristi za nadgledanje stanja naših Office aplikacija kao i za istraživanje uzroka neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6483">The event is used to monitor the health of our Office applications and for investigating causes of failures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6484">Prikupljamo podatke o svakom izlazu iz aplikacije kako bismo utvrdili da li je aplikacija zatvorena bez poteškoća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6484">We collect data on each application exit to determine whether an application exited gracefully.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6485">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6485">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6486">**Data_AffectedProcessSessionID** - identifikator za sesiju koja ima izlaz iz aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6486">**Data_AffectedProcessSessionID** - The identifier for the session that experience the application exit.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6487">**Data_AffectedSessionBuildNumber** - pomoćna verzija aplikacije u kojoj je uočen izlaz iz aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6487">**Data_AffectedSessionBuildNumber** - The minor version of the application in which an application exit was observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6488">**Data_AffectedSessionDuration** - dužina sesije od početka do kraja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6488">**Data_AffectedSessionDuration** - The length of the session from start to exit</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6489">**Data_AffectedSessionIDSMatch** - indikator stanja telemetrije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6489">**Data_AffectedSessionIDSMatch** - An indicator of telemetry health.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6490">**Data_AffectedSessionMERPSessionID** - indikator stanja telemetrije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6490">**Data_AffectedSessionMERPSessionID** - An indicator of telemetry health.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6491">**Data_AffectedSessionOSLocale** - lokalni standard OS-a pod kojim je uočen izlaz iz aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6491">**Data_AffectedSessionOSLocale** - The Locale of the OS under which the application exit was observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6492">**Data_AffectedSessionOSVersion** - verzija OS-a u kojoj je uočen izlaz iz aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6492">**Data_AffectedSessionOSVersion** - The OS version under which the application exit was observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6493">**Data_AffectedSessionResidentMemoryOnCrash** - količina ugrađene memorije koja je potrošena kada je došlo do izlaza iz aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6493">**Data_AffectedSessionResidentMemoryOnCrash** - The amount of resident memory that was consumed when the application exit occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6494">**Data_AffectedSessionStackHash** - identifikator koji označava da je pogođena određena greška.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6494">**Data_AffectedSessionStackHash** - An identifier that will denote the specific error being hit.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6495">**Data_AffectedSessionStartTime** - vreme kada je sesija počela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6495">**Data_AffectedSessionStartTime** - The time at which the session started.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6496">**Data_AffectedSessionUAEType** - tip uočenog izlaza iz aplikacije (ako je to bio izlaz sa poteškoćama, ovaj kod će označavati tip uočene greške)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6496">**Data_AffectedSessionUAEType** - The type of application exit observed (if it was an ungraceful exit, this code will denote the type of error observed)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6497">**Data_AffectedSessionVersion** - glavna verzija aplikacije u kojoj je uočen izlaz iz aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6497">**Data_AffectedSessionVersion** - The major version of the application in which an application exit was observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6498">**Data_AffectedSessionVirtualMemoryOnCrash** - količina virtualne memorije koja je potrošena kada je došlo do izlaza iz aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6498">**Data_AffectedSessionVirtualMemoryOnCrash** - The amount of virtual memory that was consumed when the application exit occurred.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6499">**Data_ExitWasGraceful** - da li je izlaz iz aplikacije protekao bez poteškoća ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6499">**Data_ExitWasGraceful** - Whether the application Exit was graceful or ungraceful.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeextensibilitycomaddinunhandledexception"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6500">Office.Extensibility.COMAddinUnhandledException</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6500">Office.Extensibility.COMAddinUnhandledException</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6501">Događaj koji se generiše kada padne programski dodatak COM na potrošačkoj verziji Office aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6501">Event generated when COM Add-in crashes on a consumer version of Office applications.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6502">Upotreba: koristi se za računanje globalnog „usvajanja“ programa Microsoft 365 Apps za neodređena velika preduzeća za dodatak koji zatim koriste druge alatke kao što je Readiness Toolkit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6502">This is used to compute a global, non-enterprise-specific Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise "adoption" for an add-in, which is then used by tools like the Readiness Toolkit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6503">To omogućava poslovnim kupcima da provere da li su programski dodaci koje su ugradili u njihove organizacije kompatibilni sa najnovijim verzijama programa Microsoft 365 Apps i da na odgovarajući način planiraju nadogradnje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6503">This allows enterprise customers to validate if the add-ins they have deployed in their organizations are compatible with the latest versions of Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise and plan their upgrades accordingly.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6504">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6504">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6505">**ScopeId** - trenutni opseg niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6505">**ScopeId** – the current thread scope</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6506">**Method** - Office metod u kome je došlo do izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6506">**Method** – Office method where exception occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6507">**Interface** - Interfejs sistema Office u kome je došlo do izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6507">**Interface** – Office interface where exception occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6508">**AddinId** – ID klase programskog dodatka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6508">**AddinId** – the add-in Class ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6509">**AddinProgId** – zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6509">**AddinProgId** – deprecated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6510">**AddinFriendlyName** – zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6510">**AddinFriendlyName** – deprecated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6511">**AddinTimeDateStamp** – vremenska oznaka programskog dodatka dobijena iz DLL metapodataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6511">**AddinTimeDateStamp** – the add-in timestamp from the DLL metadata</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6512">**AddinVersion** – zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6512">**AddinVersion** – deprecated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6513">**AddinFileName** – zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6513">**AddinFileName** – deprecated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6514">**VSTOAddIn** - da li je VSTO programski dodatak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6514">**VSTOAddIn** – whether add-in is VSTO</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6515">**AddinConnectFlag** - trenutno ponašanje učitavanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6515">**AddinConnectFlag** – current load behavior</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6516">**LoadAttempts** - broj pokušaja učitavanja programskog dodatka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6516">**LoadAttempts** – number of attempts to load add-in</span></span>

#### <a name="officeextensibilitycomaddinunhandledexceptionenterprise"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6517">Office.Extensibility.COMAddinUnhandledExceptionEnterprise</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6517">Office.Extensibility.COMAddinUnhandledExceptionEnterprise</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6518">Događaj koji se generiše kada padne programski dodatak COM na poslovnoj verziji Office aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6518">Event generated when COM Add-in crashes on an enterprise version of Office applications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6519">Upotreba: koristi se za računanje globalnog „usvajanja“ programa Microsoft 365 Apps za neodređena velika preduzeća za dodatak koji zatim koriste druge alatke kao što je Readiness Toolkit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6519">This is used to compute a global, non-enterprise-specific Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise "adoption" for an add-in, which is then used by tools like the Readiness Toolkit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6520">To omogućava poslovnim kupcima da provere da li su programski dodaci koje su ugradili u njihove organizacije kompatibilni sa najnovijim verzijama programa Microsoft 365 Apps i da na odgovarajući način planiraju nadogradnje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6520">This allows enterprise customers to validate if the add-ins they have deployed in their organizations are compatible with the latest versions of Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise and plan their upgrades accordingly.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6521">**ScopeId** - trenutni opseg niti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6521">**ScopeId** – the current thread scope</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6522">**Method** - Office metod u kome je došlo do izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6522">**Method** – Office method where exception occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6523">**Interface** - Interfejs sistema Office u kome je došlo do izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6523">**Interface** – Office interface where exception occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6524">**AddinId** – ID klase programskog dodatka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6524">**AddinId** – the add-in Class ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6525">**AddinProgId** – zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6525">**AddinProgId** – deprecated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6526">**AddinFriendlyName** – zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6526">**AddinFriendlyName** – deprecated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6527">**AddinTimeDateStamp** – vremenska oznaka programskog dodatka dobijena iz DLL metapodataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6527">**AddinTimeDateStamp** – the add-in timestamp from the DLL metadata</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6529">**AddinFileName** – zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6529">**AddinFileName** – deprecated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6530">**VSTOAddIn** - da li je VSTO programski dodatak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6530">**VSTOAddIn** – whether add-in is VSTO</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6531">**AddinConnectFlag** - trenutno ponašanje učitavanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6531">**AddinConnectFlag** – current load behavior</span></span>
