- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6939">**RMS.PL.KeyType** – Vrednosti „Jedan“ ili „Dupli“ Ukazuje na to da li je PL zaštićen pomoću zaštite jednim ključem ili zaštite duplim ključem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6939">**RMS.PL.KeyType** - Values of "Single" or "Double" Indicates whether the PL was protected with Single Key Protection or Double Key Protection</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6940">**RMS.RACType** - Tip Certifikata o pravima naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6940">**RMS.RACType** - The type of Rights Accounts Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6941">**RMS.Result** - Uspešan ili neuspešan API poziv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6941">**RMS.Result** - Success or fail of the API call</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6942">**RMS.ScenarioId** – Id scenarija definisan API–jem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6942">**RMS.ScenarioId** - Scenario ID defined by the API</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6943">**RMS.SDKVersion** - Verzija klijenta usluge Rights Management</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6943">**RMS.SDKVersion** - The version of Rights Management Service Client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6944">**RMS.ServerType** - Tip servera Usluge upravljanja pravima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6944">**RMS.ServerType** - The type of Rights Management Service Server</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6945">**RMS.StatusCode** - Kod statusa vraćenog rezultata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6945">**RMS.StatusCode** - Status code of the returned result</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6946">**RMS.TemplatesCount** - Broj predložaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6946">**RMS.TemplatesCount** - The number of the templates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6947">**RMS.TokenProvided** - Označava da li obezbeđuje token kao unos API poziva ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6947">**RMS.TokenProvided** - Indicate if provides the token as input of the API call or not</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6948">**RMS.TokenProvided** - Označava da li obezbeđuje korisnika kao unos API poziva ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6948">**RMS.UserProvided** - Indicate if provides the consumer as input of the API call or not</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6949">**UserInfo.UserObjectId** – Id korisničkog objekta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6949">**UserInfo.UserObjectId** - The user object ID</span></span>

#### <a name="jsonparseerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6950">json.parse.error</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6950">json.parse.error</span></span> 
 
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6951">Ovaj događaj označava da je grešku ubacio JSON analizator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6951">This event denotes that an error is thrown by the json parser.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6952">Moći ćemo da otklonimo grešku pročitanog registra niske koja je poslata u JSON analizator, da bismo omogućili glatko iskustvo našim korisnicima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6952">We will be able to debug the read registry string that was sent to the json parser, to allow a smooth experience for our users.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6953">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6953">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6954">**Error** - sastoji se od poruke o grešci koju objekt greške vraća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6954">**Error** - This consists of the error message that the error object returns.</span></span>

#### <a name="mailfiltercomponent"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6955">mail.filter.component</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6955">mail.filter.component</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6956">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo i rešimo probleme tamo gde postoji uticaj učinka na iskustvo filtriranja pošte što bi izazvalo da se filteri ne učitaju ili prikažu ispravno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6956">This event lets us detect and fix issues where there is perceivable performance impact on your mail filtering experience, which would cause your filters to not load or display properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6957">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6957">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6958">**above_40fps** – prebrojavanje okvira prikazanih preko 40 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6958">**above_40fps** - count of frames rendered above 40 fps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6959">**above_40rate** – radio okvira prikazanih preko 40 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6959">**above_40rate** - radio of frames rendered above 40 fps</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6960">**above_50fps** – broj okvira prikazanih preko 50 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6960">**above_50fps** - count of frames rendered above 50 fps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6961">**above_50rate** – radio okvira prikazanih preko 50 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6961">**above_50rate** - radio of frames rendered above 50 fps</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6962">**above_55fps** – prebrojavanje okvira prikazanih preko 55 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6962">**above_55fps** - count of frames rendered above 55 fps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6963">**above_55rate** – radio okvira prikazanih preko 55 o/s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6963">**above_55rate** - radio of frames rendered above 55 fps</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6964">**account_counter**- prebrojavanje za svaki tip naloga koji je prisutan na uređaju, na primer, Office 365 nalog = 1 nalog, Outlook.com nalog = 1 nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6964">**account_counter** - count of each account type present on the device, for example, an Office 365 account = 1 account, Outlook.com account = 1 account.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6965">**ad_not_shown_reason** - razlog zašto se oglasi ne prikazuju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6965">**ad_not_shown_reason** - reason why ads are not being shown</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6966">**ad_shown** - da li je reklama prikazana (ako su oglasi omogućeni)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6966">**ad_shown** - whether an add was shown (if ads enabled)</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6967">**age** - starost osobe (koja se koristi za potvrdu usaglašenosti sa ograničenjima uzrasta na oglasima)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6967">**age** - age of the person (used to confirm compliance with age limitations on ads)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6968">**app_instance** – Outlook ima 2 ulazna mesta za duo, jedan je za kalendar i jedan je za poštu i oba mogu da se lansiraju uporedo u okruženju sa više instanci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6968">**app_instance** – Outlook has two entry points for Duo, one is for Calendar and one is for Mail and both can be launched side by side in multi instance environment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6969">Tako ćemo znati koja instanca obavlja ovaj poziv izveštavanja, bilo poštom ili kalendarom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6969">This will let us know which instance is making this reporting call, either Mail or Calendar</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6970">**component_name** – ime komponente/prikaz koji je aktivan tokom filtriranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6970">**component_name** - the name of the component/view that is active during the filtering</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6971">**folder_type** – tip fascikle koja se filtrira (npr. prijemno sanduče, smeće, nesistemsko)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6971">**folder_type** - the type of folder that is being filtered (for example, Inbox, Trash, NonSystem)</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6972">**has_hx** - da li uređaj ima barem jedan Hx nalog (novi servis za sinhronizaciju e-pošte)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6972">**has_hx** - whether the device has at least one Hx (the new email syncing service) account</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6973">**has_subscription** - da li uređaj ima pretplatu na oglase</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6973">**has_subscription** - whether the device has an ads subscription</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6974">**is_all_accounts_inbox** – bez obzira na to da li je aktuelno prijemno sanduče „Svi nalozi“ fascikla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6974">**is_all_accounts_inbox** - whether the current inbox is the "all accounts" folder</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6975">**is_current_account** - bez obzira na to da li je aktuelni aktivni nalog, nalog oglasa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6975">**is_current_account** - whether the current active account is the ads account</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6976">**load_error_code** - kôd greške prilikom učitavanja oglasa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6976">**load_error_code** - error code when loading ads</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6977">**network_error_code** - kôd greške mreže prilikom zahteva oglasa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6977">**network_error_code** - network error code when requesting ads</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6978">**orientation** - položaj ekrana u trenutku ravnomernosti (uspravno ili položeno)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6978">**orientation** - the screen orientation at the time of the even (portrait or landscape)</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6979">**sub_error_type** - detaljan tip greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6979">**sub_error_type** - detailed error type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6980">**taskId** – TaskId će nam dati taskId aktuelne instance.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6980">**taskId** – TaskId will give us the current instance’s taskId.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6981">Ovo će biti obavezno u okruženju sa više instanci ako korisnik želi da uporedo lansira iste instance (kalendar, kalendar ili pošta, pošta)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6981">This will be required in multi instance environment if user wants to launch same instances (Calendar, Calendar or Mail, Mail) side by side</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6982">**total_count** - ukupni okviri koje prikazuje komponenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6982">**total_count** - total frames displayed by the component</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6983">**view_duration** - koliko dugo korisnik prikazuje komponentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6983">**view_duration** - how long the component was viewed by the user</span></span>

#### <a name="messagerenderingintercepted"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6984">message.rendering.intercepted</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6984">message.rendering.intercepted</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6985">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da pratimo koliko često korisnici presreću postupak prikazivanja pre nego što je završen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6985">This event enables us to track how often the users intercept the rendering process before it is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6986">Ove podatke koristimo za otkrivanje problema sa performansama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6986">We use this data to detect performance issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6987">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6987">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6988">**is_cache** – da li je tijelo poruke učitano iz keširanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6988">**is_cache** - whether the message body is loaded from cache</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6989">**is_on_screen** – da li je proces prikazivanja vidljiv korisnicima (normalno prikazivanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6989">**is_on_screen** - whether the rendering process is visible to users (normal rendering)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6990">**is_rendering_complete** – da li se proces prikazivanja dovršio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6990">**is_rendering_complete** - whether the rendering process is completed</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6991">**is_trimmed_body** – da li je telo poruke skraćeno tijelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6991">**is_trimmed_body** - whether the message body is trimmed body</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6992">**rendering_method** – metod prikazivanja poruke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6992">**rendering_method** - the method of rendering message</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6993">**rendering_time** – trajanje prikazivanja poruke dok korisnik ne napusti stranicu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6993">**rendering_time** - the duration of rendering the message until user leaves the page</span></span>

#### <a name="messagerenderingperformance"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6994">message.rendering.performance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6994">message.rendering.performance</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6995">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava praćenje performansi procesa prikazivanja poruka, tako da možemo analizirati performanse različitih procesa prikazivanja i otkriti probleme sa performansama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6995">This event lets us monitor the performance of the message rendering process, so that we can analyze the performance of different rendering processes and detect performance issues.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6996">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6996">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6997">**bundle_prepare_time** – vreme za pripremu paketa za prikazivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6997">**bundle_prepare_time** - the time to prepare the bundle for rendering</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6998">**full_rendering_time** – vreme punog procesa prikazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6998">**full_rendering_time** - the time of full rendering process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-6999">**is_cache** – da li je tijelo poruke učitano iz keširanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-6999">**is_cache** - whether the message body is loaded from cache</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7000">**is_on_screen** – da li je proces prikazivanja vidljiv korisnicima (normalno prikazivanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7000">**is_on_screen** - whether the rendering process is visible to users (normal rendering)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7001">**is_trimmed_body** – da li je telo poruke skraćeno tijelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7001">**is_trimmed_body** - whether the message body is trimmed body</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7002">**load_message_time** – vreme učitavanja poruke sa pozadine (može biti 0 ako je poruka keširana)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7002">**load_message_time** - the time to load message from backend (can be 0 if the message has been cached)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7003">**native_preprocess_time** – vreme za prethodnu obradu tela poruke na izvornoj strani</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7003">**native_preprocess_time** - the time to preprocess message body in native side</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7004">**prepare_body_time** – vreme za pripremu tela poruke (uključujući poruku učitavanja i predobrade)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7004">**prepare_body_time** - the time to prepare message body (including load and preprocess message)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7005">**rendering_method** – metod prikazivanja poruke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7005">**rendering_method** - the method of rendering message</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7006">**rendering_time** – vreme za prikazivanje poruke po paketu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7006">**rendering_time** - the time to render message by the bundle</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7007">**wait_time** – vreme za pravljenje URL adrese poruke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7007">**wait_time** - the time to build message URL</span></span>


#### <a name="officeandroidandroidofficelaunchtolandingpagelatency"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7008">Office.Android.AndroidOfficeLaunchToLandingPageLatency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7008">Office.Android.AndroidOfficeLaunchToLandingPageLatency</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7009">Veoma važno za snimanje metrike performansi aplikacije u odnosu na vreme odziva aplikacije od pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7009">Critical to capture for app performance metric with respect to the response time of the app from the boot.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7010">Microsoft koristi ovo da prikuplja informacije o vremenu utrošenom da bi se aplikacija odazvala i za otkrivanje scenarija koji utiču na vreme pokretanja u aplikacijama Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7010">Microsoft uses this to collect the time taken for the app to be responsive and also detect scenarios that may impact boot time in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7011">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7011">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7012">**AnyCrashInteractionDuringBoot** - Logička vrednost za bilo kakav pad aplikacije tokom pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7012">**AnyCrashInteractionDuringBoot** - Boolean for any crash encountered during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7013">**AppActivationTimeInMs** - Vremenska faza aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7013">**AppActivationTimeInMs** - App phase time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7014">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** - Logička vrednost za obustavljanje aplikacije tokom pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7014">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** - Boolean for app suspension during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7015">**AvailableMemoryInMB** - Dostupna memorija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7015">**AvailableMemoryInMB** - available memory</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7016">**CollectionTime** - Vreme događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7016">**CollectionTime** - time of event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7017">**DalvikHeapLimitInMB** - Podaci o dinamičkoj memoriji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7017">**DalvikHeapLimitInMB** - Heap info</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7018">**DocumentRecoveryInvoked** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li je bilo koji dokument oporavljen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7018">**DocumentRecoveryInvoked** - Boolean to indicate if any document was recovered</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7019">**ExtractionDone** - Vreme izdvajanja izvorne biblioteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7019">**ExtractionDone** - Native library extraction time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7020">**FastBootGainTimeInMs** - Vreme za dovršavanje brzog pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7020">**FastBootGainTimeInMs** - Time for fast boot completion</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7021">**FileActivationAttempted** - Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je aplikacija pokrenuta zbog pokretanja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7021">**FileActivationAttempted** - Boolean to indicate if app was launched due to File activation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7022">**HasLogcatLoggingImpactOnBoot** - Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je evidencija uticala na vreme pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7022">**HasLogcatLoggingImpactOnBoot** - Boolean to indicate if logcat impacted boot time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7049">**Data_EvtBootTimerLaunchStart** - vreme proteklo do dostizanja određene tačke u kodu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7049">**Data_EvtBootTimerLaunchStart** - Time elapsed until reaching certain point in code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7050">**Data_EvtBootTimerMainStart** - vreme proteklo do dostizanja određene tačke u kodu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7050">**Data_EvtBootTimerMainStart** - Time elapsed until reaching certain point in code.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeapplemsoappdelegatebootperf"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7126">Office.Apple.MsoAppDelegate.BootPerf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7126">Office.Apple.MsoAppDelegate.BootPerf</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7127">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7127">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7128">Događaj se koristi za prikupljanje vremena i memorije utrošene tokom pokretanja od strane Office aplikacija, kao i neke detalje o tipu izvršenog pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7128">The event is used to collect time and memory consumed during boot by Office apps, as well as some details on the type of boot done.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7129">Ovaj događaj nam pomaže da nadgledamo performanse i pružimo poboljšanja performansi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7129">This event helps us monitor our performance and provide performance improvements.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7131">**Data_AppLaunchDurationMicroSec** - trajanje procesa pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7131">**Data_AppLaunchDurationMicroSec** - The duration of the boot process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7133">**Data_AppLaunchStartSystemTime** - vremenska oznaka na određenom označivaču koda za pokretanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7133">**Data_AppLaunchStartSystemTime** - A timestamp at a particular boot code marker</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7134">**Data_ResidentMemory** - snimak raspoložive ugrađene memorije tokom pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7134">**Data_ResidentMemory** - A snapshot of the available resident memory during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7135">**Data_VirtualMemory** - snimak raspoložive virtuelne memorije tokom pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7135">**Data_VirtualMemory** - A snapshot of the available virtual memory during boot</span></span>

#### <a name="officeappleungracefulappexithangsinprevioussession"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7136">Office.Apple.UngracefulAppExitHangsInPreviousSession</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7136">Office.Apple.UngracefulAppExitHangsInPreviousSession</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7137">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7137">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7138">Događaj se koristi za nadgledanje stanja naših Office aplikacija kao i za istraživanje uzroka neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7138">The event is used to monitor the health of our Office applications as well as for investigating causes of failures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7139">Prikupljamo podatak koliko se puta činilo da aplikacija ne reaguje pre nego što je došlo do izlaza iz aplikacije sa poteškoćama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7139">We collect the number of times an application appeared to be unresponsive prior to hitting an ungraceful application exit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7140">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7140">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7141">**Data_HangsDetected** - podatak koliko se puta činilo da aplikacija ne reaguje pre nego što je uočen izlaz iz aplikacije sa poteškoćama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7141">**Data_HangsDetected** - The number of times the application appeared to become unresponsive prior to observing the ungraceful application exit.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7142">**Data_LastSessionId** - identifikator za sesiju u kojoj je uočen izlaz iz aplikacije sa poteškoćama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7142">**Data_LastSessionId** - The identifier for the session in which the ungraceful application exit was observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7143">**Data_SessionBuildNumber** - pomoćna verzija aplikacije u kojoj je uočen izlaz iz aplikacije sa poteškoćama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7143">**Data_SessionBuildNumber** - The minor version of the application in which an ungraceful application exit was observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7144">**Data_SessionVersion** - glavna verzija aplikacije u kojoj je uočen izlaz iz aplikacije sa poteškoćama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7144">**Data_SessionVersion** - The major version of the application in which an ungraceful application exit was observed.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeapplewhatsnewerrorandwarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7145">Office.Apple.WhatsNewErrorAndWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7145">Office.Apple.WhatsNewErrorAndWarning</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7146">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7146">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7147">Događaj se koristi za nadgledanje stanja funkcije „Šta je novo“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7147">The event is used to monitor the health of the What's New feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7148">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da je došlo do greške/upozorenja tokom raščlanjivanja sadržaja „Šta je novo“, što ukazuje na potencijalni problem sa kreiranjem sadržaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7148">This event denotes that an error/warning occurred while parsing What's New content, pointing to potential content authoring issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7149">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7149">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7150">**Data_ContentKey** - pokazivač na deo sadržaja koji je verovatno prouzrokovao grešku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7150">**Data_ContentKey** - A pointer to the section of the content that is likely to have caused the error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7151">**Data_ErrorCode** - uočeni kôd greške (ako je dostupno)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7151">**Data_ErrorCode** - The observed error code (if available)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7152">**Data_ErrorDescription** - opis greške (ako je dostupno)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7152">**Data_ErrorDescription** - A description of the error (if available)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7153">**Data_EventID** - prikupljamo nisku koja predstavlja tip uočene greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7153">**Data_EventID** - We collect a string representing the type of error observed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7154">**Data_IncludesHTMLTag** - da li sadržaj ima obogaćeni html</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7154">**Data_IncludesHTMLTag** - Whether the content contains rich html</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7155">**Data_IncludesItemsTag** - da li sadržaj ima hijerarhiju stavki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7155">**Data_IncludesItemsTag** - Whether the content contains a hierarchy of items</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7156">**Data_LengthOfRawData** - veličina sadržaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7156">**Data_LengthOfRawData** - The size of the content</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7157">**Data_RequestURL** - URL adresa sa koje je sadržaj preuzet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7157">**Data_RequestURL** - The URL from which the content was downloaded</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7158">**Data_ServerLanguageTag** - jezik na kojem je sadržaj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7158">**Data_ServerLanguageTag** - The language the content was in.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7159">**Data_StatusCode** - status greške (ako je dostupno)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7159">**Data_StatusCode** - The status of the error (if available)</span></span>

#### <a name="officeextensibilityrichapimethodinvocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7160">Office.Extensibility.RichApiMethodInvocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7160">Office.Extensibility.RichApiMethodInvocation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7161">Kada klijent koristi programski dodatak za Office i telefonira obogaćeni API za pružanje usluge, ovaj događaj će biti aktiviran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7161">When customer uses an Office Add-in and calls Rich API for providing service, this event will be triggered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7162">Koristi se za merenje pouzdanosti usluge, performansi i upotrebe za pozivanje metoda Rich API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7162">Used to measure the service reliability, performance, and usage for Rich API method invocation.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7163">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7163">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7164">**API** - ime punog API-ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7164">**Api** - Full name of the API</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7165">**DispFlag** - Mala zastava opisuje tip metoda poziva (Na primer: 0x1 = METHOD, 0x2 = PROPERTYGET, 0x4 = PROPERTYPUT, 0x8 = PROPERTYPUTREF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7165">**DispFlag** - A bit flag describing the type of method call (Ex: 0x1 = METHOD, 0x2 = PROPERTYGET, 0x4 = PROPERTYPUT, 0x8 = PROPERTYPUTREF)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7166">**DispId** - ID za metod koji se zove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7166">**DispId** - Dispatch ID for the method being called</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7167">**HResult** - HResult za poziv metode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7167">**HResult** - HResult for the method call</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7168">**Latency** - Kašnjenje za poziv u mikrosekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7168">**Latency** - Latency for the call, in microseconds</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7169">**ReqId** -GUID za zahtev za grupnu obradu koji ovaj metod pripada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7169">**ReqId** - GUID for the batch request that this method belongs to</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7170">**TypeId** -GUID za interfejs za koji se ovaj metod zove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7170">**TypeId** - GUID for the interface on which this method being called</span></span>

#### <a name="officeiospaywallfailedscreenretrybuttontap"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7171">Office.iOS.Paywall.FailedScreen.RetryButtonTap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7171">Office.iOS.Paywall.FailedScreen.RetryButtonTap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7172">Ova telemetrija korišćenja se sakuplja da bi se znalo kada kupovina/obezbeđivanje/aktivacija nije uspela, a korisnik je dodirnuo dugme "Pokušaj ponovo".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7172">This usage telemetry is collected to know when the Purchase/Provisioning/Activation failed, and the user tapped the “Retry” button.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7173">Koristi se za rešavanje problema sa scenarijima grešaka u kupovini koji dovode do ponovnog pokušaja i poboljšanja pouzdanosti procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7173">Used to troubleshoot purchase error scenarios that lead to retry and improve process reliability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7174">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7174">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7175">**Razlog za neuspeh** – Niska – Označava koji neuspeh korisnik ponovo pokušava.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7175">**failureReason** - String – Indicates what the failure was the user is retrying.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7176">Kao što je "obezbeđivanje nije uspelo", ", "kupovina nije uspela", „aktivacija nije uspela“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7176">Like “provisioningFailed”, “purchaseFailed”, “activationFailed”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7177">**ID proizvoda** – Niska – ID proizvoda u App Store za koji korisnik ponovo pokušava neuspeli zahtev</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7177">**productid** - String – App Store ID of the product for which user is retrying the failed request</span></span>


#### <a name="officemanageabilityserviceapplypolicy"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7178">Office.Manageability.Service.ApplyPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7178">Office.Manageability.Service.ApplyPolicy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7179">Telemetrija koja je ključna za praćenje neuspeha\\uspeha primene regulatornih postavki oblaka na registrator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7179">Critical telemetry to track failure\\Success of applying cloud policy settings to registry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7180">„LastError“ ukazuje na to zašto i gde u registratoru nije uspela primena smernica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7180">LastError tells why and where the Application of policy in registry failed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7181">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7181">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7182">**Data.ApplyLogMsg** - poruka o izuzetku prilikom primene smernica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7182">**Data.ApplyLogMsg** - The exception msg if any while policy was being applied</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7183">**Data.Cid** - dinamički generisan identifikator korelacije koji se šalje usluzi kada je ona pozvana da bi dobavila smernice za oblak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7183">**Data.Cid** - dynamically generated correlation identifier sent to the service when the service call was made to fetch the cloud policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7184">Koristi se za označavanje uzajamne veze poziva koji je izazvao problem i smernica koje su u tom trenutku primenjene na oblak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7184">Used to correlate which call caused an issue while applying the policies on the cloud.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7185">**Data.Last Error** - Jedna od pet vrednosti niske (brojači) koja evidentira fazu izvršavanja primene smernica tokom koje je došlo do izuzetka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7185">**Data.Last Error** - One of five string values (enumerators) to log which stage of policy application was being executed when the exception occurred</span></span>

#### <a name="officeonenoteandroidsyncprovisioningcompleted"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7186">Office.OneNote.Android.Sync.ProvisioningCompleted</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7186">Office.OneNote.Android.Sync.ProvisioningCompleted</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7187">*[Ovaj događaj je prethodno nazvan OneNote.Sync.ProvisioningCompleted.]*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7187">*[This event was previously named OneNote.Sync.ProvisioningCompleted.]*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7188">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za obezbeđivanje aplikacije korisnika u OneNote aplikaciji OneNote android, beležnice su propisno obezbeđene tako da se mogu lako pristupiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7188">The critical signal used to ensure that after a user signs-into a OneNote Android App, notebooks are properly provisioned so that they can be easily accessed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7189">Koristi se da obezbedi otkrivanje kritičnih regresija OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7189">This is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7190">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7190">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7191">**AppSuspendedDuringEvent** - vraća Boolean da ukaže na to da li je aplikacija obustavljena tokom obezbeđivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7191">**AppSuspendedDuringEvent** - Returns Boolean to indicate if app was suspended during provisioning</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7192">**NetworkConnection** - tip mrežnog povezivanja uređaja u upotrebi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7192">**NetworkConnection** - The type of network connectivity of the device in use</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7193">**NetworkDataExchange** - evidentira se broj bajtova koji se razmenjuju tokom dodeljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7193">**NetworkDataExchange** - Records the number of bytes exchanged during provisioning.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7201">**ErrorCode** – Daje šifru greške odgovorne za neuspeh obezbeđivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7201">**ErrorCode** – Returns the error code responsible for failure of provisioning</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7202">**NetworkConnection**: Tip mrežnog povezivanja uređaja u upotrebi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7202">**NetworkConnection**: The type of network connectivity of the device in use</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7203">**NetworkDataExchange** – Evidentira se broj bajtova koji se razmenjuju tokom dodeljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7203">**NetworkDataExchange** - Records the number of bytes exchanged during provisioning.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7204">**ServerType**: Daje tip servera koji nudi uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7204">**ServerType**: Returns the type of the server offering the service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7205">**TimeTakenInMilliSeconds**: Daje vreme vraćanja u vidu potpunog obezbeđivanja u milisekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7205">**TimeTakenInMilliSeconds**: Returns time taken to complete provisioning in millisecond</span></span>

#### <a name="officeonenotesystembootdialogssafebootdialogpending"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7213">Office.OneNote.System.BootDialogs.SafeBootDialogPending</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7213">Office.OneNote.System.BootDialogs.SafeBootDialogPending</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7214">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za praćenje kada odlučimo da korisniku prikažemo dijalog „Bezbedno pokretanja aplikacije“ prilikom narednog pokretanja aplikacije jer smo uzastopno više puta padali prilikom pokretanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7214">The critical signal used to track when we decide to show user a safe boot dialog on next boot because we have been crashing on boot multiple times continuously.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7215">Koristi se da obezbedi otkrivanje kritičnih regresija OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7215">This is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7216">Ako korisnici vide dijalog „Bezbedno pokretanja aplikacije“, onda imamo grešku kritičnog pada pokretanja aplikacije i ta informacija će nam pomoći da saznamo koliko korisnika ima taj problem a koliko korisnika ponovo pokreće aplikaciju da bi zapravo videli dijalog „Bezbedno pokretanja aplikacije“ nasuprot onih koji se ne vrate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7216">If users are seeing the safe boot dialog, then we have a critical boot crash bug and this info will help us know how many users are facing this issue and how many users boot the app again to actually see the safe boot dialog vs how many don’t return.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7217">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7217">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7218">Nijedno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7218">None</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopbootperfmetrics"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7219">Office.Outlook.Desktop.BootPerfMetrics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7219">Office.Outlook.Desktop.BootPerfMetrics</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7220">Prikuplja vreme koje je potrebno za pokretanje programa Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7220">Collects time taken to boot Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7221">Vreme pokretanja programa se aktivno prati da bi se otkrile i dijagnostikovale regresije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7221">The boot time of Outlook is actively monitored to detect and diagnose regressions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7222">Koristi se i za dijagnostikovanje eskalacije nezadovoljstva korisnika kao i za poboljšanje performansi pokretanja programa tokom vremena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7222">It is also used to diagnose customer escalations and improve boot performance over time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7223">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7223">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7224">**AddinElapsedTotal** - Ukupno vreme koje je bilo potrebno za učitavanje programskih dodataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7224">**AddinElapsedTotal** - Total time spent for loading add-ins</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7225">**CredPromptCount** - Broj prikazanih upita o akreditivima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7225">**CredPromptCount** – Number of credential prompts shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7226">**ElapsedTotal** - Ukupno vreme koje je bilo potrebno za pokretanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7226">**ElapsedTotal** - Total time spent for boot</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7227">**IsLoggingEnabled** - Da li je omogućeno evidentiranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7227">**IsLoggingEnabled** - Is logging enabled</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7228">**ShowChooseProfileDlg** - Da li je prikazan dijalog „Izbor profila“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7228">**ShowChooseProfileDlg** – Whether the Choose Profile Dialog was shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7229">**ShowFirstRunDlg** - da li je Outlook pokrenut prvi put</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7229">**ShowFirstRunDlg** - is outlook launched for the first time</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7230">**ShowIMAPSrchfldWarningDlg** - Upozorenja u slučaju da imamo IMAP nalog sa ANSI PST-om</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7230">**ShowIMAPSrchfldWarningDlg** - Warnings in case we have an IMAP account with an ANSI PST</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7231">**ShowNeedSupportDlg** - Greška u pokretanju koja je aktivirala dijalog korisničke podrške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7231">**ShowNeedSupportDlg** - Boot failure triggered support dialog</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7232">**ShowSafeModeDlg** - da li je sesija otvorena u bezbednom režimu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7232">**ShowSafeModeDlg** - is the session opened in safe mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7233">**ShowScanPstDlg** - Provera popravki u prodavnici prikazuje poruku o grešci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7233">**ShowScanPstDlg** - Store repair check displayed error message</span></span>


#### <a name="officeoutlookmacbootperf"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7234">Office.Outlook.Mac.BootPerf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7234">Office.Outlook.Mac.BootPerf</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7235">Prikuplja vreme koje je potrebno za pokretanje programa Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7235">Collects time taken to boot Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7236">Vreme pokretanja programa se aktivno prati da bi se otkrile i dijagnostikovale regresije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7236">The boot time of Outlook is actively monitored to detect and diagnose regressions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7237">Koristi se i za dijagnostikovanje eskalacije nezadovoljstva korisnika kao i za poboljšanje performansi pokretanja programa tokom vremena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7237">It is also used to diagnose customer escalations and improve boot performance over time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7238">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7238">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7239">**MacOLKBootPerfDuration** – ukupno vreme potrošeno na pokretanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7239">**MacOLKBootPerfDuration** - total time spent booting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7240">**MacOLKBootPerfID** – identifikator za potrošeno vreme za pokretanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7240">**MacOLKBootPerfID** - identifier for the time spent booting</span></span>


#### <a name="officeoutlookmacperformanceunresponsive"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7241">Office.Outlook.Mac.PerformanceUnresponsive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7241">Office.Outlook.Mac.PerformanceUnresponsive</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7242">Koristi se za prepoznavanje problema koji utiču na korisnike u programu Outlook koji se mogu pokazati kao smanjena performansa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7242">Used to identify user impacting issues in Outlook that may manifest as degraded performance.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7243">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7243">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7244">**Duration** - vreme isteklo od degradiranog učinka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7244">**Duration** - time elapsed of degraded performance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7245">**EventType** - tip događaja sa degradiranim performansama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7245">**EventType** - type of event experiencing degraded performance</span></span>


#### <a name="officeperformanceboot"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7246">Office.Performance.Boot</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7246">Office.Performance.Boot</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7247">Sakuplja se pri pokretanju Office aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7247">Collected when an Office application is booted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7248">Obuhvata podatke o tome da li je do pokretanja došlo otvaranjem datoteke ili pokretanjem pomoću menija „Start“, da li je to bilo prvo pokretanje aplikacije, koliko memorije aplikacija koristi, kao i da li je korisniku prikazan bilo koji blokirajući korinički interfejs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7248">Includes whether the boot was initiated by opening a file or launching via the Start menu, whether this was the first boot of the application, how much memory the application is using, and whether there was any blocking UI shown to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7249">Koristi se za merenje brzine pokretanja Office aplikacija i koliko memorije koriste pri pokretanju da bi se osigurao prihvatljiv utisak korisnika pri radu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7249">Used to measure how fast Office applications boot and how much memory they use when they start, to ensure there is an acceptable user experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7250">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7250">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7251">**ActivationKind** – Da li je aplikacija pokrenuta iz menija „Start“, otvaranjem datoteke ili putem OLE automatizacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7251">**ActivationKind** - Whether the application was started by launching from the Start menu, by opening a file, or through OLE Automation.</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7252">**BootToStart** – Da li je korisnik odlučio da prikaže početni ekran kada se pokrene ova aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7252">**BootToStart** - Whether the user has chosen to show the start screen when this application starts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7253">**ColdBoot** – Da li se Office aplikacija prvi put pokreće nakon ponovnog pokretanja sistema ili se binarni aplikacije morao učitati sa diska.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7253">**ColdBoot** - Whether is first time Office application runs after a system restart or application binary had to be loaded from disk.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7254">**DeviceModel** – Model uređaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7254">**DeviceModel** - The model of the device.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7255">**DocLocation** – Pri otvaranju dokumenta naznačeno je koja je usluga obezbedila dokument (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint itd.).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7255">**DocLocation** -  When opening a document, indicates which service provided the document (OneDrive, File Server, SharePoint, etc.).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7256">**DurationUntilMso20Initialization** – Trajanje koliko je u mikrosekundama trajalo od kada je Office proces započet a mso20win32client.dll učitan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7256">**DurationUntilMso20Initialization** - The duration in microseconds it took between when the Office process was initialized and mso20win32client.dll was loaded.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7257">**Embedding** – da li je aplikacija otvorena za OLE ugradnju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7257">**Embedding** – Whether the app was opened for OLE embedding.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7258">**FirstBoot** – Da li je ovo bilo prvo pokretanje aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7258">**FirstBoot** - Whether this was a first boot of the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7259">**InitializationDuration** - Koliko je mikrosekundi bilo potrebo za prvo pokretanje Office procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7259">**InitializationDuration** - The duration in microseconds it took to first initialize the Office process.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7260">**InterruptionMessageId** - Da li je pokretanje prekinuto dijalogom u kome se traži korisnički unos i ID dijaloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7260">**InterruptionMessageId** - If the boot was interrupted by a dialog asking for user input, the ID of the dialog.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7261">**LegacyDuration** – koliko je dugo trebalo da se aktivnost izvrši, izmereno koristeći različite početne i završne tačke u odnosu na Activity.Duration.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7261">**LegacyDuration** - The length of time the activity took to execute, measured using different starting and ending points than Activity.Duration.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7262">**OpenAsNew** – da li je aplikacija pokrenuta otvaranjem postojećeg dokumenta kao predloška za novi dokument.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7262">**OpenAsNew** – Whether the app was started by opening an existing document as the template for a new one.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7263">**TotalWorkingSetMB** – Količina memorije u megabajtima u radnom skupu procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7263">**TotalWorkingSetMB** - The amount of memory in megabytes in the process's working set.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7264">**VirtualSetMB** – Količina memorije u megabajtima u virtualnom skupu procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7264">**VirtualSetMB** - The amount of memory in megabytes in the process's virtual set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7265">(Samo za MacOS/iOS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7265">(macOS / iOS only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7266">**WorkingSetPeakMB** – najveća količina memorije u megabajtima koja je do sada bila u radnom skupu procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7266">**WorkingSetPeakMB** - The largest amount of memory in megabytes that was ever in the process's working set so far.</span></span>


#### <a name="officepowerpointpptandroidrehearseview"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7267">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Android.RehearseView</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7267">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Android.RehearseView</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7268">Ovaj događaj označava da je korisnik zaustavio sesiju vežbe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7268">This event is denoting that user has stopped the rehearsal session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7269">U kombinaciji sa Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Android.RehearseView.StartSession ovo će biti prvi indikator bilo kog pada ili greške koja se dogodi korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7269">In combination with Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Android.RehearseView.StartSession this will be the first indicator of any crashes or errors that user faces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7270">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7270">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7271">**Vreme kreiranja veze** – vreme potrošeno na kreiranje veza na strani usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7271">**ConnectionCreationTime** - time taken to create service side connections.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7272">**CountDownAlertTime** – Vreme za koje je prikazano upozorenje za odbrojavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7272">**CountDownAlertTime** – Time for which countdown alert was displayed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7273">**CountdownInitTime–** Vreme između dovršenog učitavanja projekcije slajdova i početka odbrojavanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7273">**CountdownInitTime–** Time between slideshow load completed and countdown started.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7274">**CritiqueSummary** – Rezime svih kritika koje su korisnici videli uz svoje brojeve.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7274">**CritiqueSummary** - Summary of what all critiques user saw with their counts.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7275">**ExitEventCode** – Kôd za prepoznavanje u kom scenariju korisnik izlazi iz sesije vežbanja, bez obzira na to je li reč o scenariju greške ili uspešnom izlazu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7275">**ExitEventCode** – Code to identify under which scenario user exit out of rehearse session, whether it was error scenario or successful exit.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7277">**Vreme za dozvolu za mikrofon** – Vreme tokom kojeg je prikazano upozorenje za dozvolu mikrofona dok korisnik ne odabere jednu od opcija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7277">**MicrophonePermissionTime** - Time for which microphone permission alert was displayed until user select one of the options.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7281">**Sessionid** – ovo je ID sesije prednjih vrata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7281">**Sessionid** - This is speech frontdoor session ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7282">Ovo se koristi za otklanjanje grešaka u evidencijama usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7282">This is used to debug service logs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7290">**PayloadCreationTime** – vreme koje je potrebno u milisekundama za stvaranje opterećenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7290">**PayloadCreationTime** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to create payload.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7291">**PostUrlCallTime** – vreme koje je potrebno u milisekundama za slanje naknadnog URL poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7291">**PostUrlCallTime** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to send the post Url call.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7294">**RequestPayloadSize** – to je veličina zahtevanog opterećenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7294">**RequestPayloadSize** – This is the size of the request payload.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7295">**ResourcesLoadTime** – to je vreme u milisekundama koje je potrebno za učitavanje resursa (js, css).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7295">**ResourcesLoadTime** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to load resources (js, css).</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7296">**SummaryPageErrorReceived** – ovo je Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li je primljena stranica rezimea ili je došlo do greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7296">**SummaryPageErrorReceived** – This is a Boolean value that indicates if summary page was received or error occurred.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7297">**SummaryPageHtmlLoadTime** – to je vreme u milisekundama koje je potrebno za učitavanje summarypageHtml.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7297">**SummaryPageHtmlLoadTime** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to load summarypageHtml.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7298">**SummaryPageLoadStartTime** – to je vreme u milisekundama za primanje prvog odgovora sa servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7298">**SummaryPageLoadStartTime** – This is the time taken in milliseconds receive first response from the server.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7299">**SummaryPageLoadTime** – vreme (u ms) potrebno za učitavanje stranice rezimea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7299">**SummaryPageLoadTime** – Time (in ms) taken to load summary page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7300">Ovo obuhvata vreme kreiranja korisnog tereta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7300">This includes payload creation time</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7301">**ThumbnailsCount** – to je ukupan broj minijatura koje će biti deo stranice rezimea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7301">**ThumbnailsCount** – This is the total number of thumbnails that will be part of summary page.</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7308">Nijedno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7308">None</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointrehearsalsessionmetrics"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7316">Office.PowerPoint.Rehearsal.SessionMetrics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7316">Office.PowerPoint.Rehearsal.SessionMetrics</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7317">Događaj se aktivira kada se sesija govora zaustavi za trenera za izlagače.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7317">Event triggered when the speech session is stopped for Presenter Coach.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7318">Ovaj događaj nam pomaže da uhvatimo neku metriku za probnu sesiju u treneru za izlagače.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7318">This event helps us in capturing some metrics for a rehearsal session in Presenter Coach.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7319">On će vam pomoći da održite visok kvalitet usluge za ovu funkciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7319">It will help in maintaining a high quality of service for this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7320">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7320">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7321">**ActualRehearseBootTimeInMs** – to je stvarno utrošeno vreme za stvaranje veza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7321">**ActualRehearseBootTimeInMs** – This is the actual time taken for the connections to be created.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7322">**AdaptationTextSize** – to je veličina teksta koji se šalje u uslugu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7322">**AdaptationTextSize** – This is the size of the text that is sent to service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7323">**AuthDurationInMs** – Ovo je vreme u milisekundama potrebno za potvrdu identiteta (osvežite token za potvrdu identiteta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7323">**AuthDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds for authentication (refresh the auth token).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7324">**AuthError** – Ovo opisuje grešku pri potvrdi identiteta do koje je došlo (ako je uopšte došlo do nje).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7324">**AuthError** – This describes the authentication error that occurred (if at all).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7325">**AvgFragmentLatencyInMs** – Ovo je prosečno vreme povratnog puta za govorne poruke na mreži.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7325">**AvgFragmentLatencyInMs** – This is the average round-trip time for network speech messages.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7326">**ConnectDurationInMs** – Ovo je vreme u milisekundama potrebno da sesija dovrši vezu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7326">**ConnectDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds for the session to complete the connection.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7327">**FirstAudioDelayInMs** – Ovo je vreme u milisekundama potrebno da se prime prvi zvučni podaci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7327">**FirstAudioDelayInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds for the first audio data to be received.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7328">**FRetriedOnOpenConnection** – to je Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje je li došlo do ponovnog pokušaja za openconnection ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7328">**FRetriedOnOpenConnection** – This is a Boolean that indicates whether retry happens for openconnection or not.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7329">**InitMediaCaptureLayerDurationInMs** – Ovo je vreme u milisekundama potrebno da se pokrene sloj hvatanja medija/zvuka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7329">**InitMediaCaptureLayerDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to initialize the media/audio capture layer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7330">**LocallyDroppedMessageCount** – Ovo je ukupan broj lokalno otpuštenih poruka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7330">**LocallyDroppedMessageCount** – This is the total number of messages dropped locally.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7331">**NumReconnectAttemptsDuringSession** – to pokazuje koliko je puta pokušano ponovno povezivanje na speechservice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7331">**NumReconnectAttemptsDuringSession** – This indicates how many times the attempt was made to reconnect to speechservice.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7332">**NumTriesDuringEachReconnectAttempt** – to je polje koje pokazuje broj izvršenih pokušaja tokom svakog pokušaja ponovnog povezivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7332">**NumTriesDuringEachReconnectAttempt** – This is an array that indicates number of tries that were done during each reconnect attempt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7333">**OpenFrontDoorConnectionDurationInMs** – Ovo je vreme u milisekundama potrebno za otvaranje veze ka usluzi prednjeg ulaza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7333">**OpenFrontDoorConnectionDurationInMs** – This is the time in milliseconds taken to open the connection to the FrontDoor service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7334">**SendAdaptationTextDurationInMs** – Ovo je vreme u milisekundama potrebno za slanje teksta adaptacije u uslugu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7334">**SendAdaptationTextDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to send the adaptation text to the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7335">**ServiceDroppedMessageCount** – Ovo je ukupan broj poruka koje je otpustila usluga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7335">**ServiceDroppedMessageCount** – This is the total number of messages dropped by the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7336">**SessionDurationInMs** – to je vreme trajanja cele sesije od kada je korisnik kliknuo za početak do kada je kliknuo za kraj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7336">**SessionDurationInMs** – This is the time duration of entire session from when user clicked start to when user clicked stop.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7337">**Sessionid** – ovo je ID sesije prednjih vrata govora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7337">**SessionId** – This is the speech frontdoor session ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7338">Ovo možemo da koristimo za otklanjanje grešaka u evidencijama usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7338">We can use this to debug service logs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7339">**SpeechClientResultEventsWithTimestamps** – Ovo je niz kodova greške primljenih zajedno sa vremenskim oznakama koje mogu pomoći pri otklanjanju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7339">**SpeechClientResultEventsWithTimestamps** – This is an array of error codes received along with the timestamps, which can help in debugging.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7340">**SpeechHResultsWithTimestamps** – Ovo je niz kodova greške primljenih zajedno sa vremenskim oznakama koje mogu pomoći pri otklanjanju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7340">**SpeechHResultsWithTimestamps** – This is an array of error codes received along with the timestamps, which can help in debugging.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7341">**StartSpeechCaptureDurationInMs** – Ovo je vreme u milisekundama potrebno za pokretanje hvatanja govora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7341">**StartSpeechCaptureDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to start speech capture.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7342">**StartSpeechServiceDurationInMs** – to je polje vremena koliko je potrebno da sesija govora započne svaki put kada dođe do ponovnog povezivanja, uključujući trajanje prve pokrenute sesije govora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7342">**StartSpeechServiceDurationInMs** – This is an array of time taken to start speech session every time there is a reconnect, including first start speech session duration also.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7343">**TotalMessageCount** – Ovo je ukupan broj audio poruka poslatih u uslugu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7343">**TotalMessageCount** – This is the total number of audio messages sent to the service.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7344">**WebSocketConnectDurationInMs** – Ovo je vreme u milisekundama potrebno za dovršenje veze sa veb priključkom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7344">**WebSocketConnectDurationInMs** – This is the time taken in milliseconds to complete the web socket connection.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeuxofficeinsiderregistercurrentinsider"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7352">Office.UX.OfficeInsider.RegisterCurrentInsider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7352">Office.UX.OfficeInsider.RegisterCurrentInsider</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7353">Kritični signal za praćenje uspeha ili neuspeha registracije korisnika koji koriste Office Insider verzije a koji ranije nisu bili registrovani kao učesnici programa Office Insider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7353">Critical signal for tracking success or failure of registering users using Office Insider builds who weren't registered as Office Insiders before.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7354">Glavni scenario za ovo su aktuelni učesnici programa Office Insider koji su se pridružili programu Office Insider pre dodavanja registracije programa Office Insider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7354">Main scenario for this is current Office Insiders who joined Office Insider program before registration of Office Insiders was added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7355">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7355">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7356">**Data_RegisterInsider** – Status Office Insider registracije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7356">**Data_RegisterInsider** - Status of Office Insider registration</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7357">**Data_RegisterInsider** – Kod rezultata za registraciju Office Insider-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7357">**Data_RegisterInsiderHr** - Result code for Office Insider registration</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7358">**Data_RegistrationStateCurrent** – Trenutno stanje registracije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7358">**Data_RegistrationStateCurrent** - Current registration state</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7359">**Data_RegistrationStateDesired** – Traženo stanje registracije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7359">**Data_RegistrationStateDesired** - Requested registration state</span></span>


#### <a name="officeuxofficeinsidershowofficeinsiderdlg"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7360">Office.UX.OfficeInsider.ShowOfficeInsiderDlg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7360">Office.UX.OfficeInsider.ShowOfficeInsiderDlg</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7361">Kritična interakcija korisnika znaka za praćenje pomoću pridruživanja Office Insider dijalogu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7361">Critical signal tracking user interaction with Join Office Insider dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7362">Koristi se za prepoznavanje bilo kakvih problema u izvršavanju promena koje je inicirao korisnik, kao što su pridruživanje ili napuštanje Office Insider programa i promena nivoa programa Office Insider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7362">It is used for identifying any issues in performing user-initiated changes such as joining or leaving Office Insider program and changing Office Insider level.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7365">**Data_InsiderLevel** –Insider Level za otvaranje dijaloga "pridruži se sistemu Office Insider"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7365">**Data_InsiderLevel** - Insider Level on opening of "Join Office Insider" dialog</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7366">**Data_InsiderLevel** –Insider level za zatvaranje dijaloga "pridruži se sistemu Office Insider"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7366">**Data_InsiderLevelNew** - Insider level on closing of "Join Office Insider" dialog</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7367">**Data_IsInternalUser** – Ukazuje na to da li je aplikacija pokrenuta pod akreditivima Microsoft korporativnog naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7367">**Data_IsInternalUser** - Indicates whether the application runs under the credentials of a Microsoft corporate account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7368">**Data_IsInternalUserInit** - Označava da li je kod mogao da utvrdi da li je aplikacija pokrenuta pod akreditivima Microsoft korporativnog naloga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7368">**Data_IsInternalUserInit** - Indicates whether the code could determine whether the application runs under the credentials of a Microsoft corporate account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7369">**Data_OpenNewsletterWebpage** – Ukazuje na to da li je veza pretplate na Office Insider bilten aktivirana pod uslovom da se korisnik pridružio programu Office Insider, funkcija pretplate na bilten je omogućena i da korisnik nije otkazao Otvaranje stranice pretplate na Office Insider bilten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7369">**Data_OpenNewsletterWebpage** - Indicates whether Office Insider Newsletter Subscription link was triggered under condition that user has joined Office Insider program, Newsletter Subscription feature is enabled, and the user have not canceled opening of Office Insider Newsletter Subscription webpage.</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7370">**Data_RegisterInsider** - Status Office Insider registracije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7370">**Data_RegisterInsider** - Status of Office Insider registration</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7371">**Data_RegisterInsider** – Kod rezultata za registraciju Office Insider-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7371">**Data_RegisterInsiderHr** - Result code for Office Insider registration</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7372">**Data_RegistrationStateCurrent** – Trenutno stanje registracije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7372">**Data_RegistrationStateCurrent** - Current registration state</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7373">**Data_RegistrationStateDesired** – Traženo stanje registracije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7373">**Data_RegistrationStateDesired** - Requested registration state</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7378">**Data\_AvgTime: integer** - Prosečno vreme koje je potrebno za prikazivanje Visio crteža u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7378">**Data\_AvgTime: integer** - Average time it took to render Visio drawing in a session</span></span>
