  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7380">**Data\_Count: integer** – koliko puta Visio prikazuje crtež u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7380">**Data\_Count: integer** - Number of times Visio renders the drawing in a session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7381">**Data\_FirstRenderTime: long** - trajanje prikazivanja datoteke pri prvom pokretanju u milisekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7381">**Data\_FirstRenderTime: long** - duration to render file on first launch in millisecond</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7382">**Data\_MaxTime: integer** - Maksimalno vreme koje je potrebno za prikazivanje Visio crteža u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7382">**Data\_MaxTime: integer** - Max time it took to render Visio drawing in a session</span></span>


#### <a name="officevisiovisiofileopenreliability"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7383">Office.Visio.VisioFileOpenReliability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7383">Office.Visio.VisioFileOpenReliability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7387">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7387">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7388">**Data\_CorrelationId: string -** Identifikator korelacije dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7388">**Data\_CorrelationId: string -** Document correlation identifier</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7389">**Data\_DocIsEnterpriseProtected: bool -** tačno ako je dokument zaštićen sa Windows zaštitom informacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7389">**Data\_DocIsEnterpriseProtected: bool -** true if document is protected with Windows information protection</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7390">**Data\_DocumentId: string -** GUID putanje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7390">**Data\_DocumentId: string -** GUID of file path</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7391">**Data\_DurationToCompleteInMilliseconds: double -** Trajanje izvršavanja čuvanja u milisekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7391">**Data\_DurationToCompleteInMilliseconds: double -** Duration to complete save as in millisecond</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7392">**Data\_DurationToCompleteInMillisecondsSquared: double -** kvadratna vrednost za trajanje izvršavanja čuvanja u milisekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7392">**Data\_DurationToCompleteInMillisecondsSquared: double -** squared value for DurationToCompleteInMilliseconds</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7393">**Data\_ErrorCode: integer -** Unutrašnji kôd greške koji se odnosi na grešku otvaranja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7393">**Data\_ErrorCode: integer -** Internal error code for file open failure</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7394">**Data\_Extension\_Docs: string -** Oznaka tipa datoteke dijagrama koji je otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7394">**Data\_Extension\_Docs: string -** File extension of diagram opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7395">**Data\_FileIOBytesRead:int -** Ukupno bajtova koji su pročitani prilikom čuvanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7395">**Data\_FileIOBytesRead: int -** total bytes read while saving</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7396">**Data\_FileIOBytesReadSquared: int -** kvadratna vrednost podataka\_FileIOBytesRead</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7396">**Data\_FileIOBytesReadSquared: int -** squared value of Data\_FileIOBytesRead</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7397">**Data\_FileIOBytesWritten: int -** ukupno bajtova koji su napisani prilikom čuvanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7397">**Data\_FileIOBytesWritten: int -** total bytes written while saving</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7398">**Data\_FileIOBytesWrittenSquared: int -** kvadratna vrednost podataka\_FileIOBytesWritten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7398">**Data\_FileIOBytesWrittenSquared: int -** squared value of Data\_FileIOBytesWritten</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7399">**Data\_FileName: binary -** Binarni heš imena datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7399">**Data\_FileName: binary -** Binary Hash of file name</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7400">**Data\_FileOpenDownloadDurationInMs: long -** trajanje preuzimanja datoteke u milisekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7400">**Data\_FileOpenDownloadDurationInMs: long -** duration to download file in milliseconds</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7401">**Data\_FileOpenDownloadDurationInMs: long -** trajanje otvaranja datoteke u milisekundama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7401">**Data\_FileOpenEndDurationInMs: long: -** duration to open file in millisecond</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7402">**Data\_FileOpenTimeStamp: time: -** Vremenska oznaka za početak otvaranja dokumenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7402">**Data\_FileOpenTimeStamp: time: -** Time stamp when file started opening</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7403">**Data\_FilePathHash: binary -** GUID za putanju datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7403">**Data\_FilePathHash: binary -** GUID for file path</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7405">**Data\_FileType: string -** Oznaka tipa datoteke dijagrama koji je otvoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7405">**Data\_FileType: string -** File extension of diagram opened</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7408">**Data\_IsIRM: bool -** tačno ako je datoteka zaštićena pravima o informacijama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7408">**Data\_IsIRM: bool -** true if file is Information Right Protected</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7409">**Data\_IsReadOnly: bool -** tačno ako je datoteka samo za čitanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7409">**Data\_IsReadOnly: bool -** true if the file is read only</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7410">**Data\_IsSuccess: bool -** tačno ako je otvaranje datoteke uspešno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7410">**Data\_IsSuccess: bool -** true when file open was successful</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7411">**Data\_Location: string -** lokacija datoteke kao što je lokalna, SharePoint, OneDrive, WopiConsumer, WopiBusiness, GenericThirdPartyConsumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7411">**Data\_Location: string -** location of the file like Local, SharePoint, OneDrive, WopiConsumer, WopiBusiness, GenericThirdPartyConsumer</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7412">**Data\_NetworkIOBytesRead: int -** ukupno mrežnih bajtova koji su pročitani prilikom čuvanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7412">**Data\_NetworkIOBytesRead: int -** total network bytes read while saving</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7413">**Data\_NetworkIOBytesReadSquared: int -** kvadratna vrednost podataka\_NetworkIOBytesRead</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7413">**Data\_NetworkIOBytesReadSquared: int -** squared value of Data\_NetworkIOBytesRead</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7414">**Data\_NetworkIOBytesWritten: int -** Ukupno mrežnih bajtova koji su pročitani prilikom čuvanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7414">**Data\_NetworkIOBytesWritten: int -** total network bytes written while saving</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7415">**Data\_NetworkIOBytesWrittenSquared: int -** kvadratna vrednost podataka NetworkIOBytesWritten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7415">**Data\_NetworkIOBytesWrittenSquared: int -** squared value of NetworkIOBytesWritten</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7416">**Data\_OpenLocation: integer –** Lokacija datoteke sa koje je otvorena 0, lokalno, 1, mreža, 2, usluga SharePoint, 3 – internet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7416">**Data\_OpenLocation: integer -** Location of the file from which it was opened 0, Local, 1, Network, 2, SharePoint, 3 – Web</span></span>

#### <a name="onenoteappsafebootdialogactiontaken-officeonenoteandroidsafebootdialogactiontaken-officeandroidearlytelemetrysafebootdialogactiontaken"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7420">OneNote.App.SafeBootDialogActionTaken, Office.OneNote.Android.SafeBootDialogActionTaken, Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.SafeBootDialogActionTaken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7420">OneNote.App.SafeBootDialogActionTaken, Office.OneNote.Android.SafeBootDialogActionTaken, Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.SafeBootDialogActionTaken</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7421">Kritičan signal koji se koristi za praćenje odgovora korisnika kada vidi dijalog „Bezbedno pokretanje aplikacije“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7421">The critical signal used to track user response when the user sees a safe boot dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7422">Dijalog „Bezbedno pokretanje aplikacije“ se prikazuje kada nismo bili u mogućnosti da pokrećemo više puta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7422">Safe boot dialog is shown when we were unable to launch repeatedly.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7423">Izbor korisnika da bezbedno pokrene aplikaciju koristi se kao dozvola za čišćenje podataka aplikacije za uspešno pokretanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7423">User choice to safe boot is used as permission to clear app data to launch successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7424">Koristi se da obezbedi otkrivanje kritičnih regresija OneNote aplikacije i ispravnost usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7424">This is used to ensure critical regression detection for OneNote app and service health.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7425">Korisnik vidi kada naiđe na kritičnu grešku kritičnog pada prilikom pokretanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7425">User sees when they encounter critical boot crash bug.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7426">Ove informacije će pomoći da se prati da li je rešen uzrok pada i da li korisnik može da uspešno pokrene aplikaciju ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7426">This info will help track if they crash cause has been resolved and user can launch the app successfully or not.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7427">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7427">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7428">**DIALOG_ACTION** – Na koje je dugme dijaloga korisnik kliknuo – Pozitivno ili negativno dugme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7428">**DIALOG_ACTION** - Which dialog button did the user click on – Positive button or negative button</span></span>


#### <a name="perfevent"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7429">perf.event</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7429">perf.event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7430">Koristi se za monitoring mogućeg negativnog uticaja na performanse učitavanja različitih delova aplikacije, na primer, da se uverite kada prvi put otvorite aplikaciju, da će se prijemno poštansko sanduče brzo učitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7430">Used for monitoring possible negative impact on performance of loading different parts of the app, for example to ensure when you first open the app, your inbox loads as quickly as possible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7431">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7431">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7432">**app_start_show_message_list** - to znači da je došlo do problema sa pokretanjem aplikacije koji uzrokuje da se na lista poruka iz prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta učitava duže vreme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7432">**app_start_show_message_list** - that means there was a performance issue with the app start-up causing your inbox message list to take a long time to load</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7433">**average** – prikuplja količinu ponovnih učitavanja koja se dešavaju u konverzaciji podeljenu količinom poruka u toj konverzaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7433">**average** - collects the number of reloads that happen on a conversation divided by the number of messages in that conversation.</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7434">**event_type** – objašnjava tip događaja performansi koji je izazvao problem sa performansama kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa određenim tipom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7434">**event_type** - tells us the type of performance event that caused a performance issue to help us detect issues related to a specific type.</span></span>   

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7435">**extra_params** – programer ovde može da doda dodatne parametre da bi nam omogućio više detalja o tome šta može da izazove ove probleme sa učinkom, tj. kada je ova radnja počela i završena itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7435">**extra_params** - A developer can add additional parameters here to help give us more details about what could be causing this performance issue, that is, when did this action start and end, etc.</span></span> 

-   <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7436">**has_work_profile** – označava da li aplikacija radi u okviru programa Android Work profile ili sličnu konfiguraciju kako bi se ispravljene analize performansi imale u tim okruženjima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7436">**has_work_profile** - indicates whether the app is running under Android Work Profile or similar configuration, in order to correlate performance analysis to these environments.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7437">**profiling_summary** – pruža informacije o grupi zadataka, broju zadataka i prosečnom vremenu da te grupe pomognu u shvatanju mogućih regresija u određenim oblastima prilikom učitavanja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7437">**profiling_summary** - provides information about the group of tasks, the number of tasks and the average time for those groups to help understand potential regressions in specific areas when loading the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7438">**runtime_performance_monitoring_data** – pruža podatke o performansama (vreme učitavanja, broj zapisa) prilikom učitavanja podataka u različitim delovima aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7438">**runtime_performance_monitoring_data** - provides the performance data (loading time, record count) when loading data in different parts of the app.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7439">**average_cost_time_ns** – Prosečno vreme troškova izmereno u nanosekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7439">**average_cost_time_ns** - The average cost time measured in nanoseconds.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7440">**cost_type** – pokazuje nam da li se ovaj događaj odnosi na merenje ili trajanje skladištenja slojeva skladišta ili ukupne trajanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7440">**cost_type** - Tells us whether this event is for measuring storage layer execution or total duration.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7441">**hx_object_type** – pruža detaljni tip objekta merenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7441">**hx_object_type** - Provides the detail programming object type of the measuring.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7442">**is_main_thread** – pokazuje nam da li ovaj događaj zavisi samo od vremena izvršenja glavne niti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7442">**is_main_thread** - Tells us whether this event only measures main thread execution time.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7443">**record_count** – broj zapisa koji vraća osnovni sloj skladišta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7443">**record_count** - The number of records the underlying storage layer returns.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7444">**scopre** – navodi ime stranice / komponenata korisničkog interfejsa kojem ovaj događaj pripada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7444">**scope_name** - Provides the name of UI page/components this event belongs to.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7445">**total_cost_time_ns** – ukupno vreme izvršavanja izmereno u nanosekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7445">**total_cost_time_ns** - The total execution time measured in nanoseconds.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7446">**total_time_elapsed** - govori nam koliko dugo se odigrao događaj koji nam je pomogao da shvatimo ozbiljnost problema sa izvođenjem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7446">**total_time_elapsed** - Tells us how long the performance event took to help us understand the severity of the performance issue</span></span>

#### <a name="performancerecord"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7447">performance.record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7447">performance.record</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7448">Ovim događajem se prikuplja metrika performansi aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7448">This event collects performance metrics of the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7449">Omogućuje nam otkrivanje i rešavanje situacija kada iskorišćenost memorije aplikacije i CPU postanu kritično visoki ili postoje neki drugi problemi s performansama, što može dovesti do usporavanja vašeg uređaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7449">This allows us to detect and fix situations where the app memory usage and CPU usage becomes critically high or has other performance issues, which could cause your device to slow down.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7450">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7450">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7451">**app_exit_metric** – javlja nam metriku o broju različitih vrsti performansi za prednji i pozadinski izlaz iz aplikacije, kao pomoć u razumevanju neočekivanog izlaska iz aplikacije s razlozima negativnih performansi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7451">**app_exit_metric** - Tell us the metrics about counts of different performance types of foreground and background app exits, to help us understand app exits unexpectedly with negative performance reasons.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7452">**average_suspended_memory** – javlja nam prosečnu količinu memorije koju aplikacija upotrebljava kada je obustavljena kako bismo imali vrednost za poređenje i kako bismo razumeli negativan učinak na funkciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7452">**average_suspended_memory** - Tells us the average amount of memory in use by the app when it’s suspended so we have something to compare, to help us understand the negative performance impact.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7453">**category** - govori nam da li da li je aplikacija u prednjem planu ili u pozadini u tom trenutku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7453">**category** - Tells us if the app is in the foreground or background at the time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7454">Moguće vrednosti obuhvataju prednji plan i pozadinu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7454">Possible values include foreground and background.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7455">**cpu_usage** – govori nam koliko je aplikacija koristila CPU tako da imamo nešto da uporedimo, da bismo razumeli negativan uticaj na performanse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7455">**cpu_usage** - Tells us how much CPU was used by the app so we have something to compare, to help us understand the negative performance impact</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7456">**cumulative_CPU_time** – govori nam koliko ukupno CPU-a aplikacija koristi s merenjem trajanja kako bismo imali vrednost za poređenje i kako bismo razumeli negativan učinak na funkciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7456">**cumulative_CPU_time** - Tells us the total amount of CPU the app used with the measurement of duration of time, so we have something to compare, to help us understand the negative performance impact.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7457">**cumulative_GPU_time** – govori nam koliko ukupno GPU vremena aplikacija koristi kako bismo imali vrednost za poređenje i kako bismo razumeli negativan uticaj veka trajanja baterije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7457">**cumulative_GPU_time** - Tells us the total amount of GPU time used by the app, so we have something to compare, to help us understand the negative battery life impact.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7458">**is_watch_app_installed** – saopštava nam da li korisnik trenutno koristi Apple Watch i da li je instaliran da biste nam pomogli da shvatimo uticaj negativnih performansi zahvaljujući usluzi Watch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7458">**is_watch_app_installed** - Tells us if the user is currently using an Apple Watch and whether it is installed to help us understand the negative performance impact due to the Watch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7459">**is_watch_paired** – saopštava nam da li korisnik trenutno koristi Apple Watch i da li je uparen sa uređajem da biste nam pomogli da shvatimo uticaj negativnih performansi zahvaljujući usluzi Watch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7459">**is_watch_paired** - Tells us if the user is currently using an Apple Watch and whether it is paired with the device to help us understand the negative performance impact due to the Watch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7460">**is_watch_supported_and_active** – saopštava nam da li korisnik trenutno koristi Apple Watch i da li je aktivan da biste nam pomogli da shvatimo uticaj negativnih performansi zahvaljujući usluzi Watch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7460">**is_watch_supported_and_active** - Tells us if the user is currently using an Apple Watch and whether it is active to help us understand the negative performance impact due to the Watch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7461">**memoAry_used_percentage** – govori nam koji procenat memorije koristi aplikacija tako da imamo šta da uporedimo, da bi nam pomogao da shvatimo uticaj negativnih performansi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7461">**memoAry_used_percentage** - Tells us what percentage of memory was used by the app so we have something to compare, to help us understand the negative performance impact</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7462">**memory_used** – objašnjava koliko aplikacije koristi memorija, pa imamo šta da uporedimo, da bismo razumeli negativan uticaj na performanse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7462">**memory_used** - Tells us how much memory was used by the app so we have something to compare, to help us understand the negative performance impact</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7463">**peak_memory_usage** – govori nam koliko je najviše memorije aplikacija koristila kako bismo imali vrednost za poređenje i kako bismo razumeli negativan učinak na funkciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7463">**peak_memory_usage** - Tells us the largest amount of memory used by the app so we have something to compare, to help us understand the negative performance impact.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7464">**scroll_hitch_time_ratio** – govori nam koji je odnos vremena proveden u zastoju tokom kretanja kroz korisnički interfejs kako bismo razumeli negativan utjecaj na učinak korisničkog interfejsa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7464">**scroll_hitch_time_ratio** - Tells us the ratio of the time spent hitching while scrolling on UI, to help us understand the negative UI performance impact.</span></span>


### <a name="application-activity-error-subtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7465">*Podtip greške u aktivnosti aplikacije*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7465">*Application activity error subtype*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7466">Greške u funkcionalnosti funkcije ili korisničkog iskustva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7466">Errors in functionality of a feature or user experience.</span></span>

#### <a name="assertion"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7467">tvrdnja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7467">assertion</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7468">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo kada su se dogodile kritične greške u aplikaciji koje bi mogle prouzrokovati pad aplikacije ili ozbiljne probleme, kao što je prouzrokovanje da vidite prazne redove u pristigloj pošti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7468">This event lets us detect when critical app errors occurred that would cause your app to crash or experience serious issues like causing you to see empty rows in your inbox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7469">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7469">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7470">**count** - ukupni broj stavki povezanih sa greškom; na primer, broj kalendara koji imaju greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7470">**count** - Total number of items associated with the error; for example, number of calendars that have errors</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7471">**has_hx** - govori nam da nalog koristi našu novu uslugu sinhronizacije kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme izazvane uslugom sinhronizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7471">**has_hx** - Tells us the account is using our new sync service to help us detect issues caused by our sync service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7472">**host_name** - ime hosta usluge koji je učestvovao u grešci da bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme povezane sa određenim hostom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7472">**host_name** - the name of the service host that was involved in the error to help us detect issues related to a specific host</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7473">**host_type** - tip domaćina koji je umešan u grešku kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa određenim tipom domaćina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7473">**host_type** - the type of host that was involved in the error to help us detect issues related to a specific host type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7474">**message** - prilagođena poruka za tvrdnju koja se koristi za dijagnozu problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7474">**message** - custom message for the assertion that is used to diagnose the issue</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7475">**origin** - poreklo greške u kodu da nam pomogne da otkrijemo probleme povezane sa određenim delom koda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7475">**origin** - the origin of the error in the code to help us detect issues related to a certain part of the code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7476">**stacktrace** - praćenje steka gde je tvrdnja nastupila da bi nam pomogla u otkrivanju problema u vezi sa određenim dela kôda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7476">**stacktrace** - the stack trace where the assertion occurred to help us detect issues related to a certain part of the code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7477">**type** – tip greške potvrde koja se dogodila, npr. null_folder_name, compose_selected_null_account, da bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa određenim delom kôda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7477">**type** - the type of assertion error that occurred, for example, null_folder_name, compose_selected_null_account, to help us detect issues related to a certain part of the code</span></span>

#### <a name="editcontacterror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7478">edit.contact.error</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7478">edit.contact.error</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7479">Dozvoljava nam da otkrijemo i rešimo situacije u kojima je došlo do grešaka kada pokušavate da prikažete ili uredite kontakte kroz našu aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7479">Allows us to detect and fix situations where errors were caused when you're trying to view or edit contacts through our app.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7480">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7480">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7481">**errorType** - tip greške koji nam se dogodio da bi pomogao u dijagnozi problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7481">**errorType** - the type of error that occurred to help us diagnose the issue</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7482">**field** - polje za kontakt koje je korisnik pokušavao da uredi kako bi nam pomogao da ustanovimo problem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7482">**field** - The contact field that the user was trying to edit to help us diagnose the issue</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7483">**version** - verzija usluge kontaktnih vizitkarti koju koristimo da bismo joj pomogli da dijagnostikujemo problem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7483">**version** - The version of the contact card service we are using to help us diagnose the issue</span></span>

#### <a name="errorreport"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7484">error.report</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7484">error.report</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7485">Ovaj događaj omogućava nam da otkrijemo kada su se pojavile kritične greške u aplikaciji, tako da možemo sprečiti probleme koji mogu prouzrokovati pad aplikacije ili sprečiti čitanje e-pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7485">This event lets us detect when critical app errors occurred so that we can prevent issues that could cause your app to crash or prevent you from reading email.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7486">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7486">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7487">**client–request–id** – identifikator zahteva klijenta za zahtev koji je izazvao grešku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7487">**client-request-id** - the client request identifier for the request that caused the error</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7488">**date** – pečat datuma koji je izazvao grešku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7488">**date** - the datestamp of the request that caused the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7489">**error** – tip greške, npr. get_mailbox_location_failed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7489">**error** - the type of error, for example, get_mailbox_location_failed</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7490">**error_body** - telo poruke o grešci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7490">**error_body** - the body of the error message</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7491">**is_x_mailbox_anchor_set** - da li je vrednost podataka X-AnchorMailbox podešena na zahtev</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7491">**is_x_mailbox_anchor_set** - whether the X-AnchorMailbox property was set on the request</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7492">**reason** – razlog greške, tj. poruka o grešci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7492">**reason** - the reason for the error, that is, an error message</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7493">**request–id** – identifikator zahteva servera za zahtev koji je izazvao grešku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7493">**request-id** - the server request identifier for the request that caused the error</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7494">**source** - izvor greške unutar OM infrastrukture, obično jedan od sledećih „BE“ ili „FE“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7494">**source** - the source of the error within the OM infrastructure, typically one of 'BE' or 'FE'</span></span>


#### <a name="officeairspacebackendwin32graphicsdriversofthang"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7495">Office.AirSpace.Backend.Win32.GraphicsDriverSoftHang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7495">Office.AirSpace.Backend.Win32.GraphicsDriverSoftHang</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7496">Pomaže korporaciji Microsoft da razdvoji duge prekide u upravljačkom programu grafičke kartice od kratkih prekida, što zauzvrat pomaže da se odredi koji upravljački program grafičke kartice može imati probleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7496">Helps Microsoft separate long video card driver hangs from short ones, which in turn helps make decisions about which video card drivers may be having problems.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7497">Upravljački program grafičke kartice korisnika je izazvao prekid u sistemu Office, ali uticaj tog prekida još uvek nije poznat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7497">The user's video card driver has caused Office to hang, but the impact of the hang is not known yet</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7498">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7498">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7499">**Data\_InDeviceCall** - Pozvani metod na grafičkoj kartici koji je proizveo prekid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7499">**Data\_InDeviceCall** - The method called on the video card that produced the hang</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7500">**Data\_Timeout** - Koliko dugo je trajao prekid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7500">**Data\_Timeout** - How long the hang lasted</span></span>

  #### <a name="officeandroidadalsigninuiprompts"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7501">Office.Android.ADALSignInUIPrompts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7501">Office.Android.ADALSignInUIPrompts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7502">Ovaj događaj označava da je korisniku prikazan zahtev za prijavljivanje za lični ili poslovni nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7502">This event denotes that sign-in prompt came to the user, for school or work account.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7503">Ovaj događaj nam pomaže da razumemo ispravnost stanja prijavljivanja aplikacija i preduzmemo odgovarajuće radnje kada primetimo neočekivane ponovne zahteve za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7503">This event helps in understanding the health of signed in state of our apps and take appropriate actions, when we notice unexpected sign-in re-prompts.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7504">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7504">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7505">**LastLoginDelta** - Vreme proteklo od poslednjeg uspešnog prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7505">**LastLoginDelta** - The time delta from last successful login.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7506">**PreviousIdentityCredProviderState** - Označava stanje naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7506">**PreviousIdentityCredProviderState** - Indicates the state of the account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7507">**PreviousIdentityState** - Označava stanje naloga, npr. istekla sesija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7507">**PreviousIdentityState** - Indicates state of the account, like session expired.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7508">**SignInResultCode** - Označava kod rezultata kraja zahteva za prijavljivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7508">**SignInResultCode** - Indicates the result code of sign-in prompt end.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7509">**UseCache** - Označava da li smo naterali korisnika da ponovo unese lozinku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7509">**UseCache** - Indicates if we force prompted the user to provide the password again.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7510">**UserType** - Označava da li je nalog postojeći ili nov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7510">**UserType** - Indicates whether it is existing account or new account</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidandroidappdocsfileoperationends"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7511">Office.Android.AndroidAppDocsFileOperationEnds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7511">Office.Android.AndroidAppDocsFileOperationEnds</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7512">Podaci telemetrije kritičnih dokumenata samo za Android (AppDocs) za završavanje operacija File New/Open/SaveAs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7512">Critical Docs Android Only (AppDocs) telemetry data for File New/Open/SaveAs end operations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7513">Ovo beleži kodove grešaka za neuspešne AppDocs operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7513">This captures error codes for failures of these AppDocsOperations.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7514">Microsoft to koristi za identifikovanje grešaka u različitim operacijama datoteka i tačnog sloja na kojem je došlo do kvara u programu Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7514">Microsoft uses this to identify failures in various file operations and the exact layer at which the failure has occurred in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7515">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7515">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7516">**AccessMode** - nabrajanje za pristupni režim za datoteku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7516">**AccessMode** - enumeration value for the access mode for the file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7517">Vrednosti – nijedna, samo za čitanje, samo za čitanje sa nadogradnjom, čitanje i pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7517">Values- None, ReadOnly, ReadOnlyUpgradable, ReadWrite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7518">**BlockingUIShown** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li je bilo gde u toku prikazan blokirajući korisnički interfejs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7518">**BlockingUIShown** - Boolean to indicate if blocking UI was shown in the flow anywhere.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7519">**ContentUriAuthority** - autoritet URL adrese sadržaja iz sistema SAF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7519">**ContentUriAuthority** - the authority of the content URL from SAF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7520">**Correlation** - GUID za ID korelacije koji se odnosi na operaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7520">**Correlation** - GUID for the correlation ID related to the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7521">**DocId** - ID dokumenta koji generišu AppDocs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7521">**DocId** - the document ID generated by AppDocs</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7522">**DocInstanceId** - ID instance dokumenta koji generišu AppDocs koji je obuhvaćen instancom operacije na dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7522">**DocInstanceId** - DocInstanceId the document instance ID generated by AppDocs that is scoped to an operation instance on a document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7523">**DocIsEnterpriseProtected** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li je dokument zaštićen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7523">**DocIsEnterpriseProtected** - Boolean to indicate if document is protected.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7524">**DocUserId** - ID korisnika koji potiče iz MS sloja za proveru identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7524">**DocUserId** - user ID from the MS auth layer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7525">**DocUserIdProvider** - nabrajanje koje predstavlja dobavljača ID-ja korisnika, 0 = Nepoznat, 1 = LiveId, 2 = OrgId, 3 = SSPI, 4 = ADAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7525">**DocUserIdProvider** - enumeration that represents the user ID provider, 0 = Unkown, 1 = LiveId, 2 = OrgId, 3 = SSPI, 4 = ADAL</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7526">**DurationInMs** - vreme izraženo u milisekundama koje je potrebno za završetak operacije nad datotekom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7526">**DurationInMs** - time in millisecond for the file operation to end</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7527">**EndReason** - nabrajanje za razlog završetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7527">**EndReason** - enumeration value for the end reason.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7528">Vrednosti – nijedno, uspeh, neuspeh, otkazivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7528">Values - None, Success, Failure, Cancel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7529">**ErrorCode** - kôd greške za operaciju nad datotekom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7529">**ErrorCode** - error code for the file operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7530">**Extension** - Oznaka tipa datoteke koja je otvorena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7530">**Extension** - extension of the file being opened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7531">**FileSourceLocation** - nabrajanje za lokaciju datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7531">**FileSourceLocation** - enumeration value for file location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7532">Moguće vrednosti: nijedno, lokalno, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, nepoznati server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7532">Possible values: None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7533">**FILETIME** - Vreme događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7533">**FILETIME** - Time of the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7534">**FirstBCSClientError_Info** informacije o kôdu greške koja se tiče konverzije datoteka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7534">**FirstBCSClientError_Info** - Error code information related to file conversions</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7535">**HttpStatusCode** - HTTP kôd za odziv za zahtev za veb uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7535">**HttpStatusCode** - http response code for web service request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7536">**InitalizationReason** - Ulazna tačka za otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7536">**InitalizationReason** - entry point for file open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7537">**K2FileIOHresult**- Hresult kod za okončanje operacije otvaranja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7537">**K2FileIOHresult** - Hresult code for File open operation end</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7538">**LastBCSClientError_TagId** - poslednja greška u programu BCS (usluga binarne konverzije) klijenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7538">**LastBCSClientError_TagId** - last error of BCS (binary conversion service) client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7539">**OfficeWebServiceApiStatusFlag** - zastavica statusa za zahtev za Veb uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7539">**OfficeWebServiceApiStatusFlag** - status flag for the web service request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7540">**OpEndEventId** - oznaka koja predstavlja mesto na kojem je operacija zapravo završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7540">**OpEndEventId** - tag that represents where the operation actually ended</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7541">**OpFlags** - Oznake parametara operacije nad dokumentom koje koristi AppDocs sloj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7541">**OpFlags** - Document operation param flags used by AppDocs layer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7542">**OpSeqNum** – Broj koji predstavlja redosled poziva vezanih za operacije nad datotekama u AppDocs sloju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7542">**OpSeqNum** - A number that represents the sequencing of file operation related calls in AppDocs layer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7543">**OpType** - nabrajanje tipa operacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7543">**OpType** - operation type enumeration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7544">Vrednosti: "Ništa", "Kreiraj Document", "Otvori Document", "Kopiraj dokument", "Zatvori Document", "Sačuvaj dokument", "Otvori Verziju", "Zatvori verziju"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7544">Values: "None", "CreateDocument", "OpenDocument", "CopyDocument", "CloseDocument", "SaveDocument", "OpenVersion", "CloseVersion"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7545">**PreFetchState** - nabrajanje za učitavanje predložaka u pozadini za operacije kreiranja nove datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7545">**PreFetchState** - enumeration for prefetch state of templates for new file create operations.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7546">**ProviderApp** - ime paketa aplikacije iz koje je datoteka otvorena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7546">**ProviderApp** - the package name of the app from which file is opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7547">**ScopeInstanceId** - ID instance opsega koji se koristi za povezivanje konteksta podataka sa aktivnostima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7547">**ScopeInstanceId** - Scope Instance ID used to join data context to activities</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7548">**Size** - veličina datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7548">**Size** - file size</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7549">**State** - nabrajanje za stanje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7549">**State** - enumeration value for the state of the file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7550">Vrednosti: ništa, kreiranje, kreirano, kreiranje nije uspelo, otvaranje, otvoreno, otvaranje nije uspelo, kopiranje, iskopirano, kopiranje nije uspelo, zatvaranje, zatvoreno, zatvaranje nije uspelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7550">Values: None, Creating, Created, CreateFailed, Opening, Opened, OpenFailed, Copying, Copied, CopyFailed, Closing, Closed, CloseFail</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7551">**TemplateName** – ime binarnog predloška dokumenta iz usluge predložaka, npr. TF10002009. dotx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7551">**TemplateName** - the binary template name of the document template from the template service, for example, TF10002009.dotx</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7552">**UriScheme** – šema URL adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7552">**UriScheme** - scheme of the URL</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidandroidautherror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7553">Office.Android.AndroidAuthError</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7553">Office.Android.AndroidAuthError</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7554">Ovaj događaj označava osnovne greške pri potvrdi identiteta tokom nečujnog osvežavanja tokena, učitavanje stranice za prijavljivanje na uslugu itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7554">This event denotes core authentication failures during silent token refresh, loading sign in page from service and so on.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7555">Ovaj događaj nam pomaže da razumemo ispravnost stanja prijavljivanja naših aplikacija, napravljenih pokušaja prijavljivanja kao i preduzmemo odgovarajuće mere kada primetimo neočekivane greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7555">This event helps in understanding the health of signed in state of our apps, sign in attempts that are made, and take appropriate actions, when we notice unexpected failures.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7556">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7556">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7557">**ADALErrorCode** – označava kôd greške tokom prikazivanja zahteva za prijavljivanje ili pokušaja nečujnog preuzimanja tokena za poslovni nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7557">**ADALErrorCode** - Indicates error code while showing sign-in prompt or silent token fetch attempt for work account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7558">**ADALRawErrorCode** – Označava sirovi kôd greške tokom prikazivanja zahteva za prijavljivanje ili pokušaja nečujnog preuzimanja tokena za poslovni nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7558">**ADALRawErrorCode** - Indicates raw error code while showing sign-in prompt or silent token fetch attempt for work account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7559">**ErrorGroup** - Označava tip naloga kao što je lični, poslovni ili lokalni nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7559">**ErrorGroup** - Indicates the type of account like personal account or work account or on-premise work account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7560">**IDCRLErrorCode** – Označava kôd greške dok prikazuje zahtev za prijavljivanje za lični nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7560">**IDCRLErrorCode** - Indicates error code while showing sign-in prompt for personal account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7561">**IDCRLRawErrorCode** – Označava sirovi kôd greške dok prikazuje zahtev za prijavljivanje za lični nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7561">**IDCRLRawErrorCode** - Indicates raw error code while showing sign-in prompt for personal account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7562">**LiveOAuthErrorCode** – Označava kôd greške tokom pokušaja nečujnog osvežavanja tokena za lični nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7562">**LiveOAuthErrorCode** - Indicates error code during silent token refresh attempt for personal account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7563">**LiveOAuthRawErrorCode** – Označava sirovi kôd greške tokom pokušaja nečujnog osvežavanja tokena za lični nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7563">**LiveOAuthRawErrorCode** - Indicates raw error code during silent token refresh attempt for personal account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7564">**NTLMErrorCode** – Označava kôd greške dok prikazuje zahtev za prijavljivanje za lokalni poslovni nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7564">**NTLMErrorCode** - Indicates error code while showing sign-in prompt for on-premise work account.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidandroidfileasyncsavestatus"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7565">Office.Android.AndroidFileAsyncSaveStatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7565">Office.Android.AndroidFileAsyncSaveStatus</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7566">Beleži asinhrono stanje čuvanja datoteke i razne kodove grešaka koji potiču od drugih komponenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7566">Captures File async save status data and various error codes from different components.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7567">Kompanija Microsoft ove podatke koristi da analizira da li dolazi do gubitka korisničkih podatka u aplikaciji prilikom čuvanja datoteka u aplikacijama Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7567">Microsoft uses this data to analyze if there is any user data loss in the app during saving of files in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7568">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7568">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7569">**FileExtension** - oznake tipa datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7569">**FileExtension** - file extension</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7570">**FileIOSaveHResult** - Hrezultat za operaciju čuvanja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7570">**FileIOSaveHResult** - HResult for file save operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7571">**FileIOSaveIsCopy** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li operacija čuva kopiju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7571">**FileIOSaveIsCopy** - Boolean to indicate if operation is saving a copy.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7572">**FileSize** - veličina datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7572">**FileSize** - size of file</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7573">**FileSourceLocation** - nabrajanje za izvornu lokaciju datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7573">**FileSourceLocation** - enumeration for file source location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7574">Vrednosti: ništa, lokalno, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, nepoznati server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7574">Values: None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidandroidfileopenreliability"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7575">Office.Android.AndroidFileOpenReliability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7575">Office.Android.AndroidFileOpenReliability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7576">Ovo snima podatke o statusu otvorene datoteke i razne kodove grešaka da bi se identifikovalo koje se greške u otvaranju datoteka očekuju u odnosu na neočekivane i koji deo koda ih prijavljuje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7576">This captures File open status data and various error codes to identify what file open failures are expected versus unexpected and which part of the code is reporting them.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7577">Microsoft koristi ove podatke za analizu razloga grešaka pri otvaranju datoteka i izračunavanje kritične metrike kao što je stopa uspešnosti otvaranja datoteka u aplikacijama Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7577">Microsoft uses this data to analyze the reasons for file open failures and calculate critical metric like file open success rate in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7578">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7578">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7579">**AccessMode** - Nabrajanje režima pristupa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7579">**AccessMode** - Access mode enumeration</span></span>
