#### <a name="officeandroidandroidfilesavestatus"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7608">Office.Android.AndroidFileSaveStatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7608">Office.Android.AndroidFileSaveStatus</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7609">Od presudne važnosti za beleženje podataka o stanju čuvanja datoteke i raznim kodovima grešaka koji potiču od drugih komponenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7609">Critical to capture File save status data and various error codes from different components.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7610">Kompanija Microsoft ove podatke koristi da analizira da li dolazi do gubitka korisničkih podatka u aplikaciji prilikom čuvanja datoteka u aplikacijama Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7610">Microsoft uses this data to analyze if there is any user data loss in the app during saving of files in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7611">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7611">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7612">**AccessMode** - Vrednosti\*\* – ništa, samo za čitanje, samo za čitanje sa nadogradnjom, čitanje i pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7612">**AccessMode** - Values\*\* - None, ReadOnly, ReadOnlyUpgradable, ReadWrite.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7613">**AppDocsEndReason** - nabrajanje za File save Appdoc EndReason</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7613">**AppDocsEndReason** - enumeration for File save Appdoc EndReason.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7614">Vrednosti: ništa, uspeh, neuspeh, otkazivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7614">Values: None, Success, Failure, Cancel.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7615">**AppDocsErrorCode** - Konačan kod greške za neuspešno obavljeno čuvanje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7615">**AppDocsErrorCode** - Final Error Code for file save failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7616">**AppDocsTriggeringSaveDetails** - polje koje označava da li AppDocs pokreće čuvanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7616">**AppDocsTriggeringSaveDetails** - field to indicate if AppDocs is triggering the save</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7617">**DocInstanceId** - ID instance dokumenta koji generišu AppDocs koji je obuhvaćen instancom operacije na dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7617">**DocInstanceId** - DocInstanceId the document instance ID generated by AppDocs that is scoped to an operation instance on a document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7618">**ExcelFileSaveResult** – HRezultat specifičan za Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7618">**ExcelFileSaveResult** - Excel-specific HResult</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7619">**FileExtension** - Oznaka tipa datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7619">**FileExtension** - Extension of file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7620">**FileIOSaveErrorCode** - Kôd greške u FileIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7620">**FileIOSaveErrorCode** - Error code in FileIO</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7621">**FileIOSaveHResult** - Hrezultat u FileIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7621">**FileIOSaveHResult** - Hresult in FileIO</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7622">**FileIOSaveIsCopy** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li se radi o operaciji kopiranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7622">**FileIOSaveIsCopy** - Boolean to indicate if this is a copy operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7623">**FileSize** - Veličina datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7623">**FileSize** - Size of file</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7624">**FileSourceLocation** - Nabrajanje za lokaciju datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7624">**FileSourceLocation** - File location enumeration.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7625">Vrednosti: ništa, lokalno, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, nepoznati server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7625">Values: None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7626">**OpFlags** - Oznake za operaciju čuvanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7626">**OpFlags** - Operation flags for save</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7627">**PPTFileSaveFailHresult** - PPT hrezultat za greške pri čuvanju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7627">**PPTFileSaveFailHresult** - PPT hresult for save failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7628">**PPTFileSaveFailTag** - PPT oznaka za greške pri čuvanju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7628">**PPTFileSaveFailTag** - PPT tag for save failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7629">**State** - Nabrajanje stanja otvaranja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7629">**State** - File Open state enumeration.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7630">**Values** - ništa, kreiranje, kreirano, kreiranje nije uspelo, otvaranje, otvoreno, otvaranje nije uspelo, kopiranje, iskopirano, kopiranje nije uspelo, zatvaranje, zatvoreno, zatvaranje nije uspelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7630">**Values** - None, Creating, Created, CreateFailed, Opening, Opened, OpenFailed, Copying, Copied, CopyFailed, Closing, Closed, CloseFail</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7631">**WordFileCopyErrorTrackbackTag** - oznaka za praćenje greške u fazi kopiranja dokumenta u aplikaciji Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7631">**WordFileCopyErrorTrackbackTag** - trackback tag for failure is CopyDocument stage in Word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7632">**WordFileSaveCancelReason** - oznaka za praćenje otkazivanja u aplikaciji Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7632">**WordFileSaveCancelReason** - trackback tag for cancels in word</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7633">**WordFileSaveEid** – kôd greške specifičan za Word</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7633">**WordFileSaveEid** - Word-specific error code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7634">**WordFileSaveErrorTrackbackTag** - oznaka za praćenje grešaka pri čuvanju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7634">**WordFileSaveErrorTrackbackTag** - trackback tag for save failures</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7635">**WordFileSaveOpResult** - nabrajanje za status rezultata 0 ako je uspešan, 1 ako je bio neuspešan, 2 ako je otkazan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7635">**WordFileSaveOpResult** - enumeration for result status 0 if succeeded, 1 if failed, 2 if canceled</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7636">**WordFileSaveSuccess** – nabrajanje detalja specifičnih za Word za uspeh operacije spremanja datoteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7636">**WordFileSaveSuccess** - enumeration for Word-specific details for file save operation success.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidandroidofficeactivationlatency"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7637">Office.Android.AndroidOfficeActivationLatency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7637">Office.Android.AndroidOfficeActivationLatency</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7638">Podaci od ključne važnosti za prikupljanje ukupnog vremena za sva otvaranja datoteka u Windows operativnom sistemu i aplikacijama Excel i PowerPoint</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7638">Critical data to collect end-to-end file open time for all file opens in Windows, Excel, PowerPoint apps.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7639">Ove podatke Microsoft koristi za utvrđivanje performansi svih naših aplikacija pri otvaranju datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7639">This is used by Microsoft to find out the metric for file open performance of our apps</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7640">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7640">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7641">**AppBootingOccured** - Logička vrednost kojom se proverava da li je dovršeno pokretanje aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7641">**AppBootingOccured** - Boolean to check if app boot is complete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7642">**ApplicationBootTime** - vreme potrebno u toku određene faze pokretanja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7642">**ApplicationBootTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7643">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** - Logička vrednost kojom se proverava da li je aplikacija obustavljena tokom pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7643">**AppSuspendedDuringBoot** - Boolean to check if app was suspended during boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7644">**BlockingUIShownDuringFileOpen** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li se pojavio blokirajući dijalog tokom operacije otvaranja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7644">**BlockingUIShownDuringFileOpen** - Boolean to indicate if there was any blocking dialog during the file open operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7645">**CachedInfoAvailable** - Logička vrednost kojom se traže keširani podaci specifični za operaciju otvaranja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7645">**CachedInfoAvailable** - Boolean to look for cached info specific to file open operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7646">**DocumentRecoveryInvoked** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li je postojao dokument koji je bio na čekanju za oporavak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7646">**DocumentRecoveryInvoked** - Boolean to indicate if there was a document pending for recovery</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7647">**EndToEndActivationTime** - vreme potrebno za prikazivanje datoteke otvorene van aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7647">**EndToEndActivationTime** - time taken to render the file for files opened from outside the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7648">**EndToEndFileOpenTime** - vreme potrebno za prikazivanje datoteke otvorene unutar aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7648">**EndToEndFileOpenTime** - time taken to render the file for files opened from inside the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7649">**FileOpenPhaseDurationInMs** - vreme utrošeno na određenu fazu otvaranja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7649">**FileOpenPhaseDurationInMs** - file open operation time consumed by specific phase</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7650">**FileSourceLocation** - nabrajanje za lokaciju datoteke kao npr. nijedna, lokalna, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, nepoznati server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7650">**FileSourceLocation** - enumeration value for File location such as None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7651">**InitalizationReason** - Ulazna tačka za otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7651">**InitalizationReason** - entry point for file open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7652">**InitialBootPhaseTime** - vreme potrebno u toku određene faze pokretanja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7652">**InitialBootPhaseTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7653">**IsThisFirstLaunch** - Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je ovo prvo pokretanje aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7653">**IsThisFirstLaunch** - Boolean to indicate if this is the first launch of the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7654">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - vreme potrebno tokom određene faze pokretanja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7654">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7655">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - vreme potrebno tokom određene faze pokretanja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7655">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7656">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - vreme potrebno tokom određene faze pokretanja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7656">**MinimumLibraryLoadPhaseTime** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7657">**PostAppInitTimeInMs** - vreme potrebno u toku određene faze pokretanja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7657">**PostAppInitTimeInMs** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7658">**PPTRenderPhase** - vreme povezano sa određenom fazom prikazivanja PPT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7658">**PPTRenderPhase** - time related to specific phase in PPT rendering</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7659">**PreAppInitTimeInMs** - vreme potrebno u toku određene faze pokretanja aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7659">**PreAppInitTimeInMs** - time required during a specific phase of app boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7660">**ProviderApp** - ime paketa aplikacije iz koje je datoteka otvorena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7660">**ProviderApp** - the package name of the app from which file is opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7661">**TelemetryReason** – sličan razlogu za pokretanje, ali detaljnije nabrajanje u vezi ulazne tačke otvaranja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7661">**TelemetryReason** - similar to InitialisationReason, but more detailed enumeration value regarding the entry point for File open.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7662">**UserDialogInterruptionDuringBoot** - Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je došlo do blokiranja korisničkog interfejsa tokom pokretanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7662">**UserDialogInterruptionDuringBoot** - Boolean to indicate if there was any blocking dialog during the boot</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7663">**XLRenderPhase** - vreme povezano sa određenom fazom u prikazivanju u programu Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7663">**XLRenderPhase** - time related to specific phase in Excel rendering</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidappdocsfileoperationends"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7664">Office.Android.AppDocsFileOperationEnds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7664">Office.Android.AppDocsFileOperationEnds</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7665">Podaci telemetrije kritičnih dokumenata samo za Android (AppDocs) za završavanje operacija File New/Open/SaveAs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7665">Critical Docs Android Only (AppDocs) telemetry data for File New/Open/SaveAs end operations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7666">Ovo beleži kodove grešaka za neuspešne AppDocs operacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7666">This captures error codes for failures of these AppDocsOperations.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7667">Microsoft to koristi za identifikovanje grešaka u različitim operacijama datoteka i tačnog sloja na kojem je došlo do kvara u programu Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7667">Microsoft uses this to identify failures in various file operations and the exact layer at which the failure has occurred in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7668">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7668">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7669">**AccessMode** - nabrajanje za pristupni režim za datoteku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7669">**AccessMode** - enumeration value for the access mode for the file.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7670">Vrednosti: nijedna, samo za čitanje, samo za čitanje sa nadogradnjom, čitanje i pisanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7670">Values: None, ReadOnly, ReadOnlyUpgradable, ReadWrite</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7671">**BlockingUIShown** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li je bilo gde u toku prikazan blokirajući korisnički interfejs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7671">**BlockingUIShown** - Boolean to indicate if blocking UI was shown in the flow anywhere.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7672">**ContentUriAuthority** - autoritet URL adrese sadržaja iz sistema SAF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7672">**ContentUriAuthority** - the authority of the content URL from SAF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7673">**Correlation** - GUID za ID korelacije koji se odnosi na operaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7673">**Correlation** - GUID for the correlation ID related to the operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7674">**DocId** - ID dokumenta koji generišu AppDocs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7674">**DocId** - the document ID generated by AppDocs</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7675">**DocInstanceId** - ID instance dokumenta koji generišu AppDocs koji je obuhvaćen instancom operacije na dokumentu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7675">**DocInstanceId** - DocInstanceId the document instance ID generated by AppDocs that is scoped to an operation instance on a document</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7676">**DocIsEnterpriseProtected** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li je dokument zaštićen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7676">**DocIsEnterpriseProtected** - Boolean to indicate if document is protected.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7677">**DocUserId** - ID korisnika koji potiče iz MS sloja za proveru identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7677">**DocUserId** - user ID from the MS auth layer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7678">**DocUserIdProvider** - nabrajanje koje predstavlja dobavljača ID-ja korisnika, 0 = Nepoznat, 1 = LiveId, 2 = OrgId, 3 = SSPI, 4 = ADAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7678">**DocUserIdProvider** - enumeration that represents the user ID provider, 0 = Unkown, 1 = LiveId, 2 = OrgId, 3 = SSPI, 4 = ADAL</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7679">**DurationInMs** - vreme izraženo u milisekundama koje je potrebno za završetak operacije nad datotekom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7679">**DurationInMs** - time in milliseconds for the file operation to end</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7680">**EndReason** - nabrajanje za razlog završetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7680">**EndReason** - enumeration value for the end reason.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7681">Vrednosti: ništa, uspeh, neuspeh, otkazivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7681">Values: None, Success, Failure, Cancel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7682">**ErrorCode** - kôd greške za operaciju nad datotekom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7682">**ErrorCode** - error code for the file operation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7683">**Extension** – prva četiri znaka oznake tipa datoteke koja se otvara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7683">**Extension** - first four characters of the extension of the file being opened.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7684">**FileSourceLocation** - nabrajanje za lokaciju datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7684">**FileSourceLocation** - enumeration value for file location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7685">Moguće vrednosti: nijedno, lokalno, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, nepoznati server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7685">Possible values: None, Local, UncOrMappedNetworkDrive, SkyDrive, App, SharePoint, UnknownServer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7686">**FILETIME** - Vreme događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7686">**FILETIME** - Time of the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7687">**FirstBCSClientError_Info** informacije o kôdu greške koja se tiče konverzije datoteka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7687">**FirstBCSClientError_Info** - Error code information related to file conversions</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7688">**HttpStatusCode** - HTTP kôd za odziv za zahtev za veb uslugu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7688">**HttpStatusCode** - HTTP response code for web service request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7689">**InitalizationReason** - Ulazna tačka za otvaranje datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7689">**InitalizationReason** - entry point for file open</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7690">**K2FileIOHresult**- Hresult kod za okončanje operacije otvaranja datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7690">**K2FileIOHresult** - Hresult code for File open operation end</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7691">**LastBCSClientError_TagId** - poslednja greška u programu BCS (usluga binarne konverzije) klijenta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7691">**LastBCSClientError_TagId** - last error of BCS (binary conversion service) client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7692">**OfficeWebServiceApiStatusFlag** - zastavica statusa za zahtev za Veb uslugom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7692">**OfficeWebServiceApiStatusFlag** - status flag for the web service request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7693">**OpEndEventId** - oznaka koja predstavlja mesto na kojem je operacija zapravo završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7693">**OpEndEventId** - tag that represents where the operation actually ended</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7694">**OpFlags** - Oznake parametara operacije nad dokumentom koje koristi AppDocs sloj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7694">**OpFlags** - Document operation param flags used by AppDocs layer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7695">**OpSeqNum** – Broj koji predstavlja redosled poziva vezanih za operacije nad datotekama u AppDocs sloju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7695">**OpSeqNum** - A number that represents the sequencing of file operation related calls in AppDocs layer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7696">**OpType** - nabrajanje tipa operacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7696">**OpType** - operation type enumeration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7697">Vrednosti: "Ništa", "Kreiraj Document", "Otvori Document", "Kopiraj dokument", "Zatvori Document", "Sačuvaj dokument", "Otvori Verziju", "Zatvori verziju"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7697">Values: "None", "CreateDocument", "OpenDocument", "CopyDocument", "CloseDocument", "SaveDocument", "OpenVersion", "CloseVersion"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7698">**PreFetchState** - nabrajanje za učitavanje predložaka u pozadini za operacije kreiranja nove datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7698">**PreFetchState** - enumeration for prefetch state of templates for new file create operations.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7699">**ProviderApp** - ime paketa aplikacije iz koje je datoteka otvorena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7699">**ProviderApp** - the package name of the app from which file is opened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7700">**ScopeInstanceId** - ID instance opsega koji se koristi za povezivanje konteksta podataka sa aktivnostima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7700">**ScopeInstanceId** - Scope Instance ID used to join data context to activities</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7701">**Size** - veličina datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7701">**Size** - file size</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7702">**State** - nabrajanje za stanje datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7702">**State** - enumeration value for the state of the file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7703">Vrednosti: ništa, kreiranje, kreirano, kreiranje nije uspelo, otvaranje, otvoreno, otvaranje nije uspelo, kopiranje, iskopirano, kopiranje nije uspelo, zatvaranje, zatvoreno, zatvaranje nije uspelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7703">Values: None, Creating, Created, CreateFailed, Opening, Opened, OpenFailed, Copying, Copied, CopyFailed, Closing, Closed, CloseFail</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7704">**TemplateName** – ime binarnog predloška dokumenta iz usluge predložaka, npr. TF10002009. dotx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7704">**TemplateName** - the binary template name of the document template from the template service, for example, TF10002009.dotx</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7705">**UriScheme** – šema URL adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7705">**UriScheme** - scheme of the URL</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidauthaceerrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7706">Office.Android.AuthACEErrors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7706">Office.Android.AuthACEErrors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7707">Ovaj događaj koristi Microsoft nalog (MSA) da bi utvrdio koji korisnik pokušava da se prijavi u aplikaciju i tokom toga koja se telemetrija u diskusiji pokreće kao deo neuspelog pokušaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7707">This event uses the Microsoft Account (MSA) to determine which user is attempting to sign in to the app and during that which telemetry in discussion is getting triggered as part of an unsuccessful attempt.</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7708">Ovaj događaj pomaže u analizi grešaka distribucije MSA prijavljivanja, što pomaže u razumevanju razloga koji se nalaze iza neuspešnih tokova MSA prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7708">This event helps with MSA sign-in error distribution analysis, which helps in understanding reasons behind unsuccessful MSA sign-in flow end.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7709">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7709">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7710">**Nazivi izuzetaka** – Označava klase izuzetaka s obzirom na oznake izuzetaka koje se javljaju tokom toka prijave na Microsoft nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7710">**ExceptionsName** - indicates exception classes with regard to exception tags that occur during Microsoft account sign-in flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7711">**Oznake izuzetaka** – označava koji izuzeci ulaznog toka prisutni u uniji se javljaju za tok prijave na MSA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7711">**ExceptionsTag** - indicates which inflow exceptions present in union are occurring for MSA-sign in flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7712">**IDCRLACEErrorCode** – Daje kod greške koja se pojavljuje tokom MSA toka prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7712">**IDCRLACEErrorCode** - Gives error code occurring during MSA sign-in flow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7713">Različiti kodovi grešaka pomenuti u %SRCROOT%\identity\coreapi\public\IdentityData.h</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7713">Different error codes mentioned at %SRCROOT%\identity\coreapi\public\IdentityData.h</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7714">**IDCRLAuthenticationStatusErrorCode** – Označava kodove za greške za nevažeći status Rezultata potvrde identiteta koji dolazi iz Microsoft naloga (MSA). </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7714">**IDCRLAuthenticationStatusErrorCode** - Indicates error codes for invalid status of Authentication result coming from Microsoft Account (MSA).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7715">**IDCRLUserInteractionMissingError** – Označava da li je tok prijave na Microsoft nalog (MSA) pozvan showUI zastavicom kao greškom koja izaziva udarac.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7715">**IDCRLUserInteractionMissingError** - Indicates if Microsoft Account (MSA) sign-in flow invoked with showUI flag as false causing the hit.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeandroidbcserrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7716">Office.Android.BCS.Errors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7716">Office.Android.BCS.Errors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7717">Telemetrija za greške binarne konverzije za štampanje i deljenje PDF-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7717">Binary conversion Errors telemetry for Print and Share as PDF.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7718">Microsoft ovo koristi za identifikovanje tački u kojima dolazi do neuspešne BCS konverzije u aplikacijama Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7718">Microsoft uses this to identify failure points during BCS conversions in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7719">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7719">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7720">**DocumentFileSize** - Veličina datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7720">**DocumentFileSize** - File size.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7721">**FileExtension** – Prva četiri znaka oznake tipa datoteke koja se otvara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7721">**FileExtension** - First four characters of the extension of the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7722">**IsFileDirty** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li su postojale nesačuvane izmene u datoteci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7722">**IsFileDirty** - Boolean to indicate if there were unsaved changes in the file.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7723">**Location** - Nabrajanje za lokaciju datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7723">**Location** - File location enumeration.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7724">Vrednosti: OneDrive, SharePoint, Dropbox itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7724">Values: OneDrive, SharePoint, Dropbox, Others</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7725">**PDFConversionError** - oznaka kod koje dolazi do greške pri konverziji PDF-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7725">**PDFConversionError** - Tag at which error occurs for PDF conversion</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7726">**PdfConversionErrorCode** - kôd greške pri konverziji PDF-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7726">**PdfConversionErrorCode** - PDF conversion error code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7727">**PdfConversionHRStatus** - kôd greške pri konverziji PDF-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7727">**PdfConversionHRStatus** - PDF conversion status code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7728">**PdfConversionResult** – nabrajanje rezultata PDF konverzije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7728">**PdfConversionResult** - PDF Conversion result enumeration.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7729">Vrednosti: "uspešno", "neuspešno" i "otkazano"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7729">Values: "Success", "Failed" and "Canceled"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7730">**PdfFileSize** - Veličina PDF-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7730">**PdfFileSize** - Size of the PDF</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidclientsideiap"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7731">Office.Android.ClientSideIAP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7731">Office.Android.ClientSideIAP</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7732">Telemetrija kritičnih grešaka za otkazivanje baze podataka dok se datoteke pregledaju i dodaju mesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7732">Critical Error telemetry for Database Failure while file browsing and adds places.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7733">Microsoft koristi ovo za identifikovanje problema sa oštećenjem baze podatake u aplikacijama koje može da spreči korisnika da dodaje mesta ili da ih pretražuje iz aplikacija Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7733">Microsoft uses this to identify DB corruption issues in the apps which might hinder user to add places or browse through them from within the app in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7734">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7734">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7735">**ClientTransactionId** - GUID je prosleđen DSC-u za određeni zahtev za iskorišćavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7735">**ClientTransactionId** - GUID passed to DSC for a specific Redemption request.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7736">**CollectionTime** - vreme završetka kupovine pretplate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7736">**CollectionTime** - time of subscription purchase completion</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7737">**CountryCode** – kôd zemlje klijenta koji se šalje DSC–u za klijentov zahtev za iskorišćavanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7737">**CountryCode** - Client country code that is sent to DSC for client redemption request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7738">**GoPremiumEntryPoint** – Ulazna tačka za pokretanje kupovine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7738">**GoPremiumEntryPoint** - entry point for triggering purchase</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7739">**IsActivateExistingSubscription** – Logička vrednost koja ukazuje na to da li je bila pokrenuta postojeća pretplata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7739">**IsActivateExistingSubscription** - Boolean to indicate if there was an existing subscription that was activated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7740">**IsErrorRetriable** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li je moguće ponoviti iskorišćavanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7740">**IsErrorRetriable** - Boolean to indicate if redemption can be retried</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7741">**IsPreviousPurchase** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li se aktivacija dogodila sa prethodnom kupovinom pretplate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7741">**IsPreviousPurchase** - Boolean to indicate if activation occurred with a previous purchase of subscription</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7742">**IsProvisioningTriggeredByRetry** - Logička vrednost koja označava da li je došlo do ponovnog pokušaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7742">**IsProvisioningTriggeredByRetry** - Boolean to indicate if retry was involved</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7743">**LanguageCode** – Šifra jezika klijenta koja se šalje DSC–u za klijentov zahtev za iskorišćavanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7743">**LanguageCode** - Client language code that is sent to DSC for client redemption request</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7744">**ProductIdentifier** – MJ ime koje klijent pokušava da kupi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7744">**ProductIdentifier** - SKU name that the client is trying to purchase</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7745">**ProvisioningHttpStatusCode** - obezbeđivanje HTTP statusnog kôda obezbeđivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7745">**ProvisioningHttpStatusCode** - Provisioning http status code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7748">**RedemptionTaskHR** - HRezultat za povraćaj pretplate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7748">**RedemptionTaskHR** - HResult for redemption task of subscription</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7750">**SubscriptionPurchaseHR** - Hrezultat za kupovinu pretplate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7750">**SubscriptionPurchaseHR** - Hresult for subscription purchase task</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7751">**SubscriptionType** - nabrajanje za tip pretplate ili MJ-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7751">**SubscriptionType** - enumeration for subscription type or SKUs.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroiddbfailurecause"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7753">Office.Android.DBFailureCause</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7753">Office.Android.DBFailureCause</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7754">Telemetrija kritičnih grešaka za otkazivanje baze podataka dok se datoteke pregledaju i dodaju mesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7754">Critical Error telemetry for Database Failure while file browsing and adds places.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7755">Microsoft koristi ovo za identifikovanje problema sa oštećenjem baze podatake u aplikacijama koje može da spreči korisnika da dodaje mesta ili da ih pretražuje iz aplikacija Word, Excel ili PowerPoint.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7755">Microsoft uses this to identify DB corruption issues in the apps which might hinder user to add places or browse through them from within the app in Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7756">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7756">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7757">**ErrorAt** - Vrednost oznake: podaci o mestu na kome je došlo do otkazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7757">**ErrorAt** - Tag Value: Information about the place where the Failure happened</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7758">**ExceptionErrorMessage** - detaljna poruka o grešci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7758">**ExceptionErrorMessage** - verbose error message</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetryexpansionfileserrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7759">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExpansionFilesErrors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7759">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExpansionFilesErrors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7760">Android Package Kit (APK) datoteke proširenja za Office aplikaciju za mobilne uređaje su dodatne datoteke resursa koje projektanti Android aplikacija mogu da objave uz svoju aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7760">Android Package Kit (APK) expansion files for the Office mobile app are supplementary resource files that Android app developers can publish along with their app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7761">Da bismo mehanizme preuzimanja datoteka proširenja učinili pouzdanijim, evidentiramo uzroke grešaka do kojih dolazi pri preuzimanju datoteka proširenja ili prilikom čitanja preuzetih datoteka proširenja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7761">To make our Expansion files download mechanism more reliable, we are logging the cause of errors that occur either in downloading the expansion files or while reading the downloaded expansion files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7762">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7762">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7763">**Data_ClassName** – Tekst koji predstavlja ime datoteke izvornog koda tamo gde postoji greška.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7763">**Data_ClassName** - Text representing the source code file name where there is an error.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7764">**Data_ErrorMessage** – Tekst koji predstavlja operaciju koja nije uspela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7764">**Data_ErrorMessage** - Text representing the operation that has failed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7765">**Data_ExceptionMessage** – Opcionalno tekstualno polje koje predstavlja uzrok izuzetka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7765">**Data_ExceptionMessage** - An optional text field representing the cause of the exception.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7766">**Data_ExceptionType** – Opcionalno tekstualno polje koje predstavlja ime izuzetka koji se izbacuje iz izvornog koda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7766">**Data_ExceptionType** - An optional text field representing the name of the exception thrown from source code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7767">**Data_MethodName** – Tekst koji predstavlja ime metoda u izvornom kodu tamo gde postoji greška.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7767">**Data_MethodName** - Text representing the method name in source code where there is an error.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetryextractionerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7768">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExtractionError</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7768">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.ExtractionError</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7769">Da bismo smanjili veličinu Office Android aplikacija, primenjujemo kompresiju na resurse u završnom paketu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7769">To reduce the size of Office Android apps, we apply compression to the resources in the final package.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7770">Za vreme izvršavanja, pre korišćenja prvo izvlačimo ove resurse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7770">At run time, we first extract these resources before using them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7771">Ponekad postoje neočekivane greške prilikom izvršavanja izdvajanja, što dovodi do pada aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7771">Sometimes there are unexpected errors while performing extractions, which leads to app crashes.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7772">Kroz ovaj događaj prikupljamo neke dijagnostičke informacije povezane sa izdvajanjem, kao što je ime resursa koji se izdvaja, putanja gde se izdvaja itd., dostupan slobodan prostor na disku itd. Ovi podaci se prikupljaju samo kada postoje greške pri izdvajanju.  </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7772">Through this event we are collecting some diagnostic information related to extraction, like name of the resource being extracted, path where its extracted etc., free disk space available etc. This data is collected only when there are extraction errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7773">Ove podatke koristimo da bismo razumeli uzrok grešaka u izdvajanju i poboljšali korisničko iskustvo naših aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7773">We use this data to understand the cause of extraction failures, and to improve the user experience of our apps.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7774">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7774">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7775">**Data_ArchiveName** – ime resursa koji se izdvaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7775">**Data_ArchiveName** - Name of the resource that is being extracted.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7776">**Data_ArchivePath** – putanja u kojoj je resurs privremeno keširan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7776">**Data_ArchivePath** - Path where the resource is temporarily cached.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7777">**Data_ArchiveSizeKB** – veličina resursa koji se izdvaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7777">**Data_ArchiveSizeKB** - Size of the resource that is being extracted.</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7778">**Data_ClassName** – Ime datoteke u izvornom kodu gde je došlo do greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7778">**Data_ClassName** - File name in source code where the error is encountered.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7779">**Data_ErrorDetail** – Tekst koji opisuje više detalja o uzroku greške, kao što je kod greške itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7779">**Data_ErrorDetail** - Text describing more details about the cause of the error, like the error code etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7780">**Data_ErrorMessage** – Tekst koji opisuje vrstu greške do koje je došlo prilikom izdvajanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7780">**Data_ErrorMessage** - Text describing the type of error encountered during extraction.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7781">**Data_ExtractionDestinationPath** – Putanja na kojoj će resurs biti sačuvan nakon izdvajanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7781">**Data_ExtractionDestinationPath** - Path where the resource is to be saved after extraction.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7782">**Data_FreeDiskSpaceMB** – količina slobodnog prostora na disku dostupna na uređaju, merena u megabajtima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7782">**Data_FreeDiskSpaceMB** - The amount of free disk space available on the device measured in Mega Bytes.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7783">**Data_ItemToExtract** – ime resursa koji se izdvaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7783">**Data_ItemToExtract** - Name of the resource that is being extracted.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7784">**Data_MethodName** – Ime metode u izvornom kodu gde je došlo do greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7784">**Data_MethodName** - Method name in source code where the error is encountered.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetryregistryerrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7785">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.RegistryErrors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7785">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.RegistryErrors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7786">Ovaj događaj hvata sve greške na koje se naišlo tokom pristupa Android registratoru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7786">This event captures any errors faced during Android registry access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7787">Ovi podaci o događaju nam pomažu da razumemo korisničke greške i ojačamo funkciju registratora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7787">This event data helps us in understanding the user errors and making the registry feature more robust.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7788">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7788">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7789">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7789">**App** – The application process sending the event.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7790">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7790">**AppVersionLong** – The application version.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7791">**Data_StackTrace** – Praćenje steka greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7791">**Data_StackTrace** – The stacktrace of the error.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidearlytelemetrysharedlibraryloadersearchandloadlibraryerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7792">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.SharedLibraryLoadersearchAndloadLibraryError</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7792">Office.Android.EarlyTelemetry.SharedLibraryLoadersearchAndloadLibraryError</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7793">Evidentiramo ovaj događaj u slučaju da dođe do grešaka pri učitavanju deljenih biblioteka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7793">We log this event in case there are errors while loading shared libraries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7794">Do grešaka pri učitavanju biblioteka može da dođe iz dva razloga 1) instalirana aplikacija nije kompatibilna sa uređajem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7794">There can be library loading errors for two reasons 1) Installed Apk is incompatible with the device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7795">2) Biblioteka koju pokušavamo da učitamo možda je oštećena zbog grešaka pri izdvajanju koje su posledica nedostatka prostora na disku ili nedovoljne količine dostupne memorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7795">2) The library that we are trying to load may be corrupt, because of errors in extracting it due to low disk space, or low memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7796">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7796">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7797">**Data_ExceptionMessage** - Poruka o grešci koja potiče od Android API System.loadlibrary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7797">**Data_ExceptionMessage** - Exception message thrown by Android API System.loadlibrary</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7798">**Data_FreeSpaceInMB** - Dostupan slobodni prostor na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7798">**Data_FreeSpaceInMB** - Free space available on device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7799">**Data_nickName** – Ime biblioteke koju nije moguće učitati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7799">**Data_nickName** - Name of the library that couldn't be loaded.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidintuneintunejavacopyfailedattempts"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7800">Office.Android.Intune.IntuneJavaCopyFailedAttempts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7800">Office.Android.Intune.IntuneJavaCopyFailedAttempts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7801">Telemetrija kritičnih grešaka koja služi za praćenje padova pojedinačnih Intune API-ja; Ova telemetrija se evidentira u slučaju grešaka da bi se sačuvala lokalna kopija dokumenata u oblaku koji su zaštićeni putem Intune-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7801">Critical Error telemetry to track failures for individual Intune APIs; This telemetry gets logged in case of errors to save local copy of Intune protected Cloud documents.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7802">Microsoft koristi ove podatke za identifikovanje grešaka tokom i posle upisivanja u okviru aplikacije, nakon prijavljivanja u aplikaciju pomoću poslovnog naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7802">Microsoft uses this data to identify errors during and after Intune enrollment within the app, post signing into the app with a work account</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7806">Telemetrija kritičnih grešaka koja služi za praćenje padova pojedinačnih Intune API-ja; Ova telemetrija se evidentira u slučaju grešaka da bi se pribavio ADAL token za Intune resurse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7806">Critical Error telemetry to track failures for individual Intune APIs; This telemetry gets logged in case of errors to obtain the ADAL token for Intune resources.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7807">Microsoft koristi ove podatke za identifikovanje grešaka tokom Intune upisivanja podataka unutar aplikacije, nakon prijavljivanja u aplikaciju pomoću poslovnog naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7807">Microsoft uses this data to identify errors during Intune enrollment within the app, post signing into the app with a work account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7809">**Data_ErrorCode** - kôd greške povezan sa tokom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7809">**Data_ErrorCode** - Error code associated with the flow</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidintuneintunejavaexceptionauthenticationcallback"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7820">Office.Android.Intune.IntuneJavaExceptionAuthenticationCallback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7820">Office.Android.Intune.IntuneJavaExceptionAuthenticationCallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7821">Telemetrija kritičnih grešaka koja služi za praćenje padova pojedinačnih Intune API-ja; Ova telemetrija se evidentira u slučaju grešaka da bi pozvala Intune API-je povezane sa registracijom povratnih poziva potvrde identiteta za kontrolisane naloge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7821">Critical Error telemetry to track failures for individual Intune APIs; This telemetry gets logged in case of errors to call Intune APIs related to registering for authentication callbacks for managed accounts.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7822">Microsoft koristi ove podatke za identifikovanje grešaka tokom i posle upisivanja u okviru aplikacije, nakon prijavljivanja u aplikaciju pomoću poslovnog naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7822">Microsoft uses this data to identify errors during and after Intune enrollment within the app, post signing into the app with a work account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7901">**IsGallatin** - Logička vrednost koja proverava da li se radi o Gallatin nalogu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7901">**IsGallatin** - Boolean to check if it is a Gallatin account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7903">**PreviousEntryPoint** - Nabrajanje ulaznih tačaka za pokretanje toka aktiviranja licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7903">**PreviousEntryPoint** - Entrypoint enumeration for triggering the license activation flow</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7904">**StateAfterActivation** - Nabrajanje da označi stanje licenciranja aplikacije pre početka toka aktivacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7904">**StateAfterActivation** - enumeration to indicate licensing state of the app before the activation flow started</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7905">**StateBeforeActivation** - Nabrajanje da označi stanje licenciranja aplikacije pre početka toka aktivacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7905">**StateBeforeActivation** - enumeration to indicate licensing state of the app before the activation flow started</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7906">**UserAccountType** - nabrajanje da bi se ukazalo na to da li se radi o ličnom ili poslovnom nalogu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7906">**UserAccountType** - enumeration to indicate whether personal account or enterprise account.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeandroidmsasigninuiprompts"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7907">Office.Android.MSASignInUIPrompts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7907">Office.Android.MSASignInUIPrompts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7908">Ovaj događaj označava da je korisniku prikazan zahtev za prijavljivanje za lični ili poslovni nalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7908">This event denotes that sign-in prompt came to the user, for personal account.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7909">Ovaj događaj nam pomaže da razumemo ispravnost stanja prijavljivanja aplikacija i preduzmemo odgovarajuće radnje kada primetimo neočekivane ponovne zahteve za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7909">This event helps in understanding the health of signed in state of our apps and take appropriate actions, when we notice unexpected sign-in re-prompts.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7910">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7910">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7911">**ExternalCacheRefreshError** - Kôd greške pokušaja osvežavanja tokena, pre nego što prikaže zahtev za prijavljivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7911">**ExternalCacheRefreshError** - Error code of token refresh attempt, before showing sign-in prompt.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7912">**LastLoginDelta** - Vreme proteklo od poslednjeg uspešnog prijavljivanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7912">**LastLoginDelta** - The time delta from last successful login.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7913">**MSAserverUAID** – ID korelacije sa podacima o telemetriji usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7913">**MSAserverUAID** - Correlation ID with service telemetry data.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7914">**PreviousIdentityState** - Označava stanje naloga, npr. istekla sesija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7914">**PreviousIdentityState** - Indicates state of the account, like session expired.</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7915">**SignInResultCode** - Označava kod rezultata kraja zahteva za prijavljivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7915">**SignInResultCode** - Indicates the result code of sign-in prompt end.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7916">**UseCache** - Označava da li smo naterali korisnika da ponovo unese lozinku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7916">**UseCache** - Indicates if we force prompted the user to provide the password again.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7917">**UserType** - Označava da li je nalog postojeći ili nov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7917">**UserType** - Indicates whether it is existing account or new account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7918">**WasIdentitySignedOut** – Označava da li je nalog u odjavljenim stanjem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7918">**WasIdentitySignedOut** - Indicates if account was in signed out state.</span></span>


#### <a name="officeapplelicensingmacdractivationfailures"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7919">Office.Apple.Licensing.Mac.DRActivationFailures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7919">Office.Apple.Licensing.Mac.DRActivationFailures</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7923">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7923">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7924">**Data_DigitalRiverID** – ID Digital River proizvoda koji se mapira na ovaj Office proizvod – SKY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7924">**Data_DigitalRiverID** - Digital River product ID that maps to this Office product SKY</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7925">**Data_Error** - niska koja predstavlja kôd greške aktivacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7925">**Data_Error** - A string representing an activation error code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7926">**Data_ProductKey** - šifra proizvoda koja je pokušana da se aktivira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7926">**Data_ProductKey** - Product key that was attempted to be activated</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7927">**Data_ProductKeyHash** - aktivirana je kodirana šifra proizvoda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7927">**Data_ProductKeyHash** - An encoded product key being activated</span></span>

#### <a name="officeapplelicensingmacgetmachinestatuserrors"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7928">Office.Apple.Licensing.Mac.GetMachineStatusErrors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7928">Office.Apple.Licensing.Mac.GetMachineStatusErrors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7929">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7929">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7930">Događaj prikuplja kod greške vraćen tokom periodične provere valjanosti licence pretplate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7930">The event collects the error code returned while periodically checking the validity of a subscription license.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7931">Kôd greške može da označava nedostupnost servera, ali i isticanje licence, ograničenje broja računara, nevažeći ID hardvera, itd. Ovaj događaj se koristi za nadgledanje stanja usluge Office licenciranja, ali i za istraživanje problema vezanih za upravljanje mašinom pretplate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7931">The error code can signify server unavailability but also license expiration, machine count limit, invalid hardware ID, etc.  This event is used to monitor the health of the Office Licensing Service but also to investigate issues related to subscription machine management.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7932">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7932">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7933">**Data_Error** - prikupljamo nisku koja predstavlja kod greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7933">**Data_Error** - We collect a string representing an error code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7946">**Data_FirstRunCollectionTime** - vremenska oznaka koja registruje vreme kad je tok pokrenut.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7946">**Data_FirstRunCollectionTime** - A timestamp registering the time at which the flow was started.</span></span>

#### <a name="officegraphicsarcexceptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7947">Office.Graphics.ARCExceptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7947">Office.Graphics.ARCExceptions</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7948">Ove informacije koje izveštavaju o izuzecima su bitne da bi se procenila celokupna ispravnost grafičkog niza, kao i za identifikovanje delova koda u kojima često dolazi do grešaka kako bi se odredio prioritet istrage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7948">This exception reporting information is important for assessing the overall health of the graphics stack, as well as identifying parts of the code where failures are occurring at high frequency, in order to prioritize investigation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7949">Ove informacije koje izveštavaju o izuzecima su bitne da bi se procenila celokupna ispravnost grafičkog niza, kao i za identifikovanje delova koda u kojima često dolazi do grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7949">This exception reporting information is important for assessing the overall health of the graphics stack, and identifying parts of the code where failures are occurring at high frequency.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7950">Ovo pomaže inženjeru da odredi koje greške u prikazivanju utiču na najveći broj korisnika, što nam omogućava da kao prioritet istrage postavimo otklanjanje problema posle kojih će najveći broj korisnika imati koristi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7950">This helps an engineer to determine which rendering failures are impacting the most users, enabling us to prioritize our investigations toward fixing issues that will have the greatest user benefit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7951">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7951">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7952">**Data\_HResult** - Kôd greške koji je vraćen iz otkazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7952">**Data\_HResult** - The error code returned from failure</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7953">**Data\_TagCount** - Broj svih grešaka do kojih je došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7953">**Data\_TagCount** - The count of each failure that occurred</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7954">**Data\_TagID** - Identifikator greške do koje je došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7954">**Data\_TagID** - The identifier of the failure that occurred</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopcalendaracceptcalsharenavigatetosharedfoldererror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7955">Office.Outlook.Desktop.Calendar.AcceptCalShareNavigateToSharedFolder.Error</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7955">Office.Outlook.Desktop.Calendar.AcceptCalShareNavigateToSharedFolder.Error</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7956">Prikuplja informacije o greškama koje se javljaju prilikom navigacije kroz deljeni kalendar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7956">Collects information when any failure occurs when while Navigation to shared Calendar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7957">Ti podaci se koriste za praćenje ispravnosti API–ja deljenog kalendara, kao i za interakciju programa Outlook sa deljenim kalendarima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7957">This data is used to monitor the health of the calendar sharing API and Outlooks interaction with shared calendars.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7958">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7958">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7959">**FailedCaseHResult** - Kôd greške koji je vraćen iz otkazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7959">**FailedCaseHResult** - The error code returned from Failure</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopedpedpopenstorefailure"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7960">Office.Outlook.Desktop.EDP.EDPOpenStoreFailure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7960">Office.Outlook.Desktop.EDP.EDPOpenStoreFailure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7961">Uspeh ili neuspeh otvaranja skladišta pošte koje je zaštićeno „Zaštitom podataka preduzeća“, što zavisi od mogućnosti Windows API poziva da dobavi ključ za dešifrovanje skladišta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7961">Success or failure to open the Enterprise Data Protection protected mail store based on result of Windows API call to get the key to decrypt the store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7962">Ovo koristimo da bismo dijagnostikovali jedan od glavnih problema „Zaštite podataka preduzeća“ koji spečava prokretanje programa Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7962">We use this diagnose one of the top Enterprise Data Protection issues, which can prevent Outlook from booting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7963">Primarni uzrok greške je interakcija programa Outlook sa Windows API-jem koji se koristi za dešifrovanje ključa skladišta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7963">Primary cause of failure is Outlooks interaction with Windows APIs used to decrypt the store key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7964">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7964">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7965">**HVA aktivnost** **-** sa prilagođenim poljima sa podacima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7965">**HVA Activity** **-** with custom data fields</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7966">**IsFlightOn** - ukazuje na to da li je omogućen „Let EDP dešifrovanja“ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7966">**IsFlightOn** – Indicates whether the EDPDecryption Flight is enabled</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopndbcorruptionresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7967">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7967">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7968">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult (rezultat oštećenja) i Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning (upozorenje o oštećenju skladišta) se prikupljaju kada otkrijemo oštećenje u korisničkoj PST/OST datoteci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7968">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult and Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning are collected when we detect corruption in a user's PST/OST.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7969">Kada otkrijemo oštećenje, korporacija Microsoft prikuplja informacije o formatu baze podataka, mestu na kom je oštećenje primećeno i malu količinu konteksta o oštećenju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7969">When we detect corruption, Microsoft collects the format of the database, the place where detected it, and a small amount of context about the corruption.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7970">Oštećenje OST/PST datoteke sprečava korisnike da pristupe svojoj e-pošti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7970">OST/PST corruption prevents users from accessing their emails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7971">Aktivno pratimo ove podatke da bismo primetili neuobičajene aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7971">We actively monitor this data for anomalous activity.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7972">Cilj nam je da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme da bismo ograničili gubitak korisničkih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7972">We aim to investigate and diagnose issues to limit loss of customer data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7973">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7973">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7974">**0 –** Ime procesa koji je prijavio oštećenje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7974">**0 -** The Process name that reported corruption</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7975">**1 –** Bool koji ukazuje na to da li korisnik bira novu datoteku ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7975">**1 -** Bool indicating if the user chooses new file or not</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7976">**2 –** Broj drugih procesa u kojima je otvorena baza podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7976">**2 -** the number of other processes that have the database open</span></span>

#### <a name="officeoutlookdesktopndbcorruptstorewarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7977">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7977">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7978">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult (rezultat oštećenja) i Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning (upozorenje o oštećenju skladišta) se prikupljaju kada otkrijemo oštećenje u korisničkoj PST/OST datoteci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7978">Office.Outlook.Desktop.NdbCorruptionResult and Office.Outlook.Desktop.NDBCorruptStore.Warning are collected when we detect corruption in a user's PST/OST.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7979">Kada otkrijemo oštećenje, korporacija Microsoft prikuplja informacije o formatu baze podataka, mestu na kom je oštećenje primećeno i malu količinu konteksta o oštećenju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7979">When we detect corruption, Microsoft collects the format of the database, the place where detected it, and a small amount of context about the corruption.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7980">Oštećenje OST/PST datoteke sprečava korisnike da pristupe svojoj e-pošti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7980">OST/PST corruption prevents users from accessing their emails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7981">Aktivno pratimo ove podatke da bismo primetili neuobičajene aktivnosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7981">We actively monitor this data for anomalous activity.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7982">Cilj nam je da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme da bismo ograničili gubitak korisničkih podataka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7982">We aim to investigate and diagnose issues to limit loss of customer data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7983">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7983">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7984">**VremePrikupljanja** - vreme prikupljanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7984">**CollectionTime** - collection time</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7985">**Kontekst** - Kontekst oštećenog skladišta, gde je primećeno oštećenje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7985">**Context** - Corrupt Store Context, where corruption was detected</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7986">**KreiranoPomoćuVerzije** - (opciono) polje sa podacima o verziji skladišta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7986">**CreatedWithVersion** – (Optional) field with version of store</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7987">**Detalji** - detalji o padu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7987">**Details** – Details about the crash</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7988">**NdbTip** - Tip skladišta, može biti 0 = NdbNedefinisano, 1 = NdbMalo, 2 = NdbVeliko, 3 = NdbTardis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7988">**NdbType** - Store Type, can be 0 = NdbUndefined, 1 = NdbSmall, 2 = NdbLarge, 3 = NdbTardis</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7989">**ImeProcesa** - Ime procesa koji je izazvao oštećenje skladišta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7989">**ProcessName** - Process Name causing the store to get corrupted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7990">**PstVerzija** - Verzija MSPST32.DLL-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7990">**PstVersion** - Version of the MSPST32.DLL</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-7991">**Verzija** - Verzija formata datoteke skladišta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-7991">**Version** - Version of store file format</span></span>

#### <a name="officesystemsystemhealthasserts"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8049">Office.System.SystemHealthAsserts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8049">Office.System.SystemHealthAsserts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8050">Greške koje ovaj događaj identifikuje nam pomažu da razumemo kada je korisničko iskustvo ugroženo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8050">The errors this event identifies help us understand when the customer experience is degrading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8051">Mnoge od ovih otprema potvrde (ShipAsserts) dovode do padova i te informacije nam omogućavaju da ispravimo mnoge greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8051">Many of these ShipAsserts lead to crashes and this information makes it possible to fix many of those.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8052">Prikupljaju se informacije o otpremama potvrde (ShipAsserts), što nam pomaže u identifikovanju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8052">Collects ShipAsserts from the product, which helps to identify errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8053">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8053">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8054">**Broj** - Broj svih prijavljenih potvrda (assert-a)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8054">**Count** – The count of each assert reported</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8055">**VremeZavršetka** - Vreme kada se dogodila poslednja potvrda koja je prijavljena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8055">**EndTime** – Time at which the last assert reported occurred</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8056">**GrupaGreške** - Identifikator grupe za svaku potvrdu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8056">**ErrorGroup** – A bucketing identifier for each assert</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8057">**PrvaVremenskaOznaka** - Kada je prvi put došlo do potvrde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8057">**FirstTimeStamp** – The first time at which the assert occurred</span></span>
