#### <a name="renewidentityfailure"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8107">RenewIdentityFailure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8107">RenewIdentityFailure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8108">Sakuplja se kada korisnik pokuša da otvori IRM zaštićeni dokument ili primeni IRM zaštitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8108">Collected when a user attempts to open an IRM protected doc or apply IRM protections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8109">Sadrži informacije koje su potrebne da bismo mogli pravilno da istražimo i dijagnostikujemo probleme koji se događaju prilikom neuspešnog obnavljanja korisničkih certifikata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8109">It contains the information needed to be able to properly investigate and diagnose issues that happen when failed to renew user certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8110">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8110">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8111">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** – Hijerarhija klijenata koja označava da aplikacija radi u proizvodnom okruženju ili razvojnom okruženju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8111">**AppInfo.ClientHierarchy** - Client hierarchy, which indicates the application runs in production environment or developer environment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8112">**AppInfo.Name** – Ime aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8112">**AppInfo.Name** - Application name.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8113">**AppInfo.Version** - Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8113">**AppInfo.Version** - Application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8114">**Failure.Category** – Kategorija greške „UnhandledError”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8114">**Failure.Category** - The category of the failure "UnhandledError"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8115">**Failure.Detail** - Detaljne informacije o grešci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8115">**Failure.Detail** - The detailed info of the failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8116">**Failure.Id** – Id greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8116">**Failure.Id** - Failure ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8117">**Failure.Signature** – Potpis greške, koji je isti kao ime događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8117">**Failure.Signature** - The signature of the failure, which is same as the event name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8118">**iKey** – ID servera usluge vođenja evidencije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8118">**iKey** - Logging service server ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8119">**RMS.HRESULT** – Rezultat obnavljanja korisničkog certifikata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8119">**RMS.HRESULT** - The result of renewing user certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8120">**RMS.ScenarioId** – ID scenarija definisan klijentom Usluge upravljanja pravima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8120">**RMS.ScenarioId** - Scenario ID defined by Rights Management Service Client</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8121">**RMS.SDKVersion** - Verzija klijenta usluge Rights Management</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8121">**RMS.SDKVersion** - The version of Rights Management Service Client</span></span>

#### <a name="saveerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8122">save.error</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8122">save.error</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8123">Dozvoljava nam da otkrijemo i popravimo situacije u kojima je došlo do greške kada ste pokušali da sačuvate datoteku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8123">Allows us to detect and fix situations where there was an error when you attempted to save a file.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8124">On prati greške izazvane neuspesima pri čuvanju datoteke, uključujući i opisnu poruku o grešci kako bi nam pomogao da rešimo problem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8124">It tracks errors caused by failures to save a file, including a descriptive error message to help us resolve the issue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8125">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8125">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8126">**error** - tip greške koji se dogodio da bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo i rešimo probleme u vezi sa određenim tipom greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8126">**error** - The type of error that happened to help us detect and resolve issues related to a specific error type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8127">**file_type** - tip datoteke koji je korisnik pokušao da sačuva (na primer. doc)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8127">**file_type** - The type of file the user tried to save (such as .doc)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8128">**origin** - odakle potiče pokušaj čuvanja datoteke, (na primer, iz e-poruke) kako bismo mogli da otkrijemo probleme koje se odnose na čuvanje datoteke sa određenog mesta u aplikaciji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8128">**origin** - Where the file save attempt originated from (such as from an email) so we can detect issues associated with saving a file from a specific place in the app</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8129">**token_type** - tip simbola koji se koristi za potvrdu identiteta naloga da biste sačuvali datoteku kako bi nam pomogao u otkrivanju problema potvrde identiteta povezanog sa čuvanjem datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8129">**token_type** - the type of token used to authenticate the account in order to save the file to help us detect authentication issues associated with saving a file</span></span>

#### <a name="wkwebviewerror"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8130">wkwebview.error</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8130">wkwebview.error</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8131">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo kada su nastale greške u prikazu na vebu prilikom sastavljanja ili čitanja e-poruke kako bismo mogli da sprečimo probleme koji mogu da dovedu do toga da aplikacija ne može da sastavi e-poruku ili da čita e-poruku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8131">This event lets us detect when web view errors occurred when composing or reading email so that we can prevent issues that could cause your app can’t compose email or read email.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8132">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8132">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8133">**description** – opis za grešku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8133">**description** - description for the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8134">**error_code** – kôd greške za WKError</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8134">**error_code** - error code for WKError</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8135">**function_name** – JavaScript ime funkcije kada je došlo do greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8135">**function_name** - JavaScript function name when error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8136">**js_exception_column_number** – broj kolone u kojoj je došlo do JavaScript izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8136">**js_exception_column_number** - The column number where JavaScript exception occurred</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8137">**js_exception_line_number** – broj reda u kome je došlo do JavaScript izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8137">**js_exception_line_number** - The line number where JavaScript exception occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8138">**js_exception_message** – poruka izuzetka kada je došlo do JavaScript izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8138">**js_exception_message** - The exception message when JavaScript exception occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8139">**js_exception_source_url** – izvorna URL adresa gde je došlo do JavaScript izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8139">**js_exception_source_url** - The source URL where JavaScript exception occurred</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8140">**scenario** – gde je došlo do greške.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8140">**scenario** - where the error occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8141">To je prebrojavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8141">It’s an enum.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8142">Moguće vrednosti su old_renderer, react_renderer i sastavljanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8142">Possible values are old_renderer, react_renderer, and composing.</span></span>

#### <a name="wkwebviewterminate"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8143">wkwebview.terminate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8143">wkwebview.terminate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8144">Ovaj događaj nam omogućava da otkrijemo kada sistem prekida veb prikaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8144">This event allows us to detect when web view is terminated by the system.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8145">Ovi podaci nam omogućavaju da nadgledamo grešku koju je korisnik naišao prilikom sastavljanja ili čitanja e-poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8145">This data allows us to monitor the error user encountered when composing or reading an email.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8146">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8146">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8147">**is_foreground** – da li je aplikacija u prvom planu kada se ovaj događaj dešava.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8147">**is_foreground** - whether app is in foreground when this event happens.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8148">**Scenario** – gde je došlo do greške, prilikom prikazivanja ili sastavljanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8148">**Scenario** - where the error occurred, when rendering or composing.</span></span>


## <a name="device-connectivity-and-configuration-data-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8149">Podaci dobijeni iz povezivanja uređaja i konfiguracije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8149">Device connectivity and configuration data events</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8150">Podtipovi podataka koji spadaju u ovu kategoriji su:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8150">The following are the data subtypes in this category:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8151">Povezivanje uređaja i konfiguracija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8151">Device connectivity and configuration</span></span>](#device-connectivity-and-configuration-subtype)


### <a name="device-connectivity-and-configuration-subtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8152">*Podtip povezivanja uređaja i konfiguracije*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8152">*Device connectivity and configuration subtype*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8153">Stanje mrežne veze i podešavanje uređaja, kao što je memorija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8153">Network connection state and device settings, such as memory.</span></span>

#### <a name="applicationdidreceivememorywarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8154">application.did.receive.memory.warning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8154">application.did.receive.memory.warning</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8155">Ovaj događaj se šalje kada nam Apple saopštava da je aplikaciji ponestaje memorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8155">This event is sent when Apple tells us that the application is running out of memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8156">Govori nam da smo uvezli problem sa menadžmentom memorije na uređaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8156">It tells us that we have introduced an issue with memory management on your device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8157">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8157">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8158">**current_memory_used** - objašnjava količinu memorije koju aplikacija koristi u trenutku kada aplikacija nema više memorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8158">**current_memory_used** - Tells us the amount of memory used by the application at the point the application has run out of memory.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8159">**current_memory_used_percentage** – govori nam procenat memorije koji aplikacija koristi od ukupne raspoložive memorije na tački na kojoj je aplikaciji ponestalo memorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8159">**current_memory_used_percentage** - Tell us the percentage of memory used by the application out of the total memory available at the point the application has run out of memory.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8160">**currentVC** - saopštava nam prikaz koji se trenutno prikazuje kada aplikaciji ponestane memorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8160">**currentVC** - Tells us the view that is currently showing when the application has run out of memory.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8161">**has_hx** - govori nam da nalog koristi našu novu uslugu sinhronizacije kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme izazvane uslugom sinhronizacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8161">**has_hx** - Tells us the account is using our new sync service to help us detect issues caused by our sync service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8162">**is_watch_app_installed** – saopštava nam da li korisnik trenutno koristi Apple Watch i da li je instaliran da biste nam pomogli da shvatimo uticaj negativnih performansi zahvaljujući usluzi Watch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8162">**is_watch_app_installed** - Tells us if the user is currently using an Apple Watch and whether it is installed to help us understand the negative performance impact due to the Watch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8163">**is_watch_paired** – saopštava nam da li korisnik trenutno koristi Apple Watch i da li je uparen sa uređajem da biste nam pomogli da shvatimo uticaj negativnih performansi zahvaljujući usluzi Watch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8163">**is_watch_paired** - Tells us if the user is currently using an Apple Watch and whether it is paired with the device to help us understand the negative performance impact due to the Watch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8164">**is_watch_supported_and_active** – saopštava nam da li korisnik trenutno koristi Apple Watch i da li je aktivan da biste nam pomogli da shvatimo uticaj negativnih performansi zahvaljujući usluzi Watch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8164">**is_watch_supported_and_active** - Tells us if the user is currently using an Apple Watch and whether it is active to help us understand the negative performance impact due to the Watch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8165">**rn_initialized** - recite nam da li je React Native pokrenut u trenutku kada je aplikaciji ponestalo memorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8165">**rn_initialized** - Tell us if React Native has been initialized at the point the application has run out of memory.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8166">**running_time** - saopštava nam koliko vremena je aplikacija potrošila radeći u trenutku kada je aplikacija ostala bez memorije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8166">**running_time** - Tell us the amount of time that app has spent running at the time the application has run out of memory.</span></span>

#### <a name="conversationmemoryleak"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8167">conversation.memory.leak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8167">conversation.memory.leak</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8168">Dozvoljava nam da otkrijemo situacije u kojima nas prikaz razgovora e-pošte tera da iskoristimo više memorije na uređaju nego što se očekuje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8168">Allows us to detect situations where our email conversation view is causing us to use up more memory on your device that expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8169">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8169">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8170">Ne sakuplja se polja ili dodatni podaci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8170">No fields or added data are collected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8171">Samo evidencije se sakupljaju ako postoji curenje memorije koje se odnosi na nit razgovora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8171">Only logs are collected if there is a memory leak related to a conversation thread.</span></span>

#### <a name="coredatacorruption"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8172">core.data.corruption</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8172">core.data.corruption</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8173">Omogućava nam da otkrijemo situacije u kojima ne možemo da vam pokažemo vašu e-poštu ili kalendar zato što je mesto gde skladištimo vašu e-poruku na uređaju oštećeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8173">Allows us to detect situations where we cannot show you your email or calendar because where we store your email on your device has become corrupted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8174">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8174">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8175">**errorSource** - ukazuje na to da li je došlo iz radnje čuvanja ili kreiranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8175">**errorSource** - indicates whether it came from a save or create action</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8176">**sqlError** - numerički kôd greške na navedenoj lokacijihttps://www.sqlite.org/c3ref/c_abort.html</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8176">**sqlError** - numerical error code listed at https://www.sqlite.org/c3ref/c_abort.html</span></span>

#### <a name="coredatacorruptionuserreset"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8177">core.data.corruption.user.reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8177">core.data.corruption.user.reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8178">Dozvoljava nam da otkrijemo situacije u kojima ste izbrisali ili poništili uspostavljanje naloga u našoj aplikaciji i to uzrokovano oštećenjem podataka e-pošte koje smo uskladištili na uređaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8178">Allows us to detect situations where you have deleted or reset your account in our app and it was caused by a corruption in email data we've stored on your device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8179">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8179">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8180">**errorSource** - diktira mesto na kojem se oštećenje dogodilo tokom čuvanja ili kreiranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8180">**errorSource** - dictates where the corruption occurred whether during save or create</span></span>

#### <a name="coredatadiagnostics"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8181">core.data.diagnostics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8181">core.data.diagnostics</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8182">Omogućava nam da otkrijemo i rešimo situacije u kojima skladište e-pošte koristi previše prostora za skladištenje uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8182">Allows us to detect and fix situations where our email storage is using up too much of your device storage space</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8183">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8183">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8184">**db_size_megabytes** - prati veličinu osnovne baze podataka zaokruženu na najbližih 25 megabajta i maksimalnih 500 megabajta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8184">**db_size_megabytes** - tracks the size of the core data database rounded to the nearest 25 megabytes and with a maximum megabyte of 500</span></span>

#### <a name="generalpropertieslog"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8185">general.properties.log</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8185">general.properties.log</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8186">Ovaj događaj prikuplja informacije koje nam omogućavaju da razvrstavamo i klasifikujemo probleme unutar Outlook aplikacije koje su u vezi sa postavkama pristupačnosti i uređaja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8186">This event collects information that allows us to categorize and classify issues within the Outlook app that are related to accessibility and device settings.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8187">Ova kategorizacija je neophodna da biste odredili određivanje prioriteta uticaja problema na korisnike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8187">This categorization is necessary to prioritize the impact of issues on customers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8188">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja samo za iOS:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8188">The following fields are collected for iOS only:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8189">**bold_text** - saopštava nam da li uređaj ima uključen podebljani tekst kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo problem koji se odnosi na podebljani tekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8189">**bold_text** - Tells us if the device has bold text turned on to help us detect issues related to bold text</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8190">**closed_caption** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio pomoćni titl na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa pomoćnim titlovima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8190">**closed_captioning** - Tells us if the user has turned on closed captioning on their device to help us detect issues related to closed captioning</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8191">**darker_system_colors** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio zamračenje sistemskih boja na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8191">**darker_system_colors** - Tells us if the user has turned on darkening of system colors on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8192">**gray_scale** - saopštava nam da li je korisnik uključio sivu skalu na svom uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme vezane za ovu postavku </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8192">**gray_scale** - Tells us if the user has turned on gray scale on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8193">**guided_access** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio vođeni pristup na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8193">**guided_access** - Tells us if the user has turned on guided access on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8194">**invert_colors** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku da obrne boje na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8194">**invert_colors** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting to invert colors on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8195">**mono_audio** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za mono audio na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8195">**mono_audio** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for mono audio on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8196">**reduce_motion** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za smanjivanje kretanja na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8196">**reduce_motion** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for reducing motion on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8197">**reduce_transparency** - saopštava nam da li je korisnik uključio postavku radi smanjenja transparentnosti na svom uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme vezane za ovu postavku </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8197">**reduce_transparency** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting to reduce transparency on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8198">**speak_screen** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za mono audio na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8198">**speak_screen** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for mono audio on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8199">**speak_selection** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za početak izbora na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8199">**speak_selection** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for Speak Selection on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8200">**switch_control** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za prebacivanje kontrole na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8200">**switch_control** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for Switch Control on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8201">**voice_over** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za glasove na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8201">**voice_over** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for voiceover on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8202">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja samo za Android:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8202">The following fields are collected for Android only:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8203">**braille** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku da obrne boje na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8203">**braille** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting to invert colors on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8204">**caption** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio pomoćni titl na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa pomoćnim titlovima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8204">**caption** - Tells us if the user has turned on closed captioning on their device to help us detect issues related to closed captioning</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8205">**color_inversion** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku da obrne boje na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8205">**color_inversion** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting to invert colors on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8206">**high_contrast** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za veliki kontrast na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8206">**high_contrast** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for high contrast on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8207">**large_text** - saopštava nam da li uređaj ima uključene postavke za veliki tekst kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo problem u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8207">**large_text** - Tells us if the device has large text setting turned on to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8208">**oem_preinstall** - saopštava nam da li je aplikacija unapred instalirana na uređaju (ovo se odnosi samo na Samsung uređaje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8208">**oem_preinstall** - Tells us if our app was pre-installed on the device (this applies to Samsung devices only)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8209">**supported_abis** - govori nam koju vrstu binarnog interfejsa aplikacije (ABIs) podržava platforma uređaja kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8209">**supported_abis** - Tells us what kind of application binary interfaces (ABIs) are supported by the device platform to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8210">**switch_access** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za prebacivanje pristupa na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8210">**switch_access** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for Switch Access on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8211">**talkbalk** – saopštava nam ako je korisnik uključio postavku za vezu na uređaju kako bi nam pomogao da otkrijemo probleme u vezi sa ovom postavkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8211">**talkback** - Tells us if the user has turned on the setting for talkback on their device to help us detect issues related to this setting</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8212">**theme_color** – prilagođena (izabrana od strane korisnika) boja teme koju aplikacija trenutno koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8212">**theme_color** - The custom (user-selected) theme color currently in use by the application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8213">**webview_kernel_version**: verzija jezgra sistema Chromium veb prikaza na uređaju koja nam pomaže da prepoznamo probleme sa kompatibilnošću povezane sa verzijom veb prikaza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8213">**webview_kernel_version**: The Chromium kernel version of webview on the device to help us detect compatibility issues related to the version of webview.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8214">**webview_package_name**: naziv paketa veb prikaza na uređaju koji nam pomaže da prepoznamo probleme sa kompatibilnošću povezane sa verzijom veb prikaza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8214">**webview_package_name**: The package name of webview on the device to help us detect compatibility issues related to the version of webview.</span></span>

#### <a name="officeairspaceairspacelocalblocklistdriverupdated"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8220">Office.AirSpace.AirSpaceLocalBlocklistDriverUpdated</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8220">Office.AirSpace.AirSpaceLocalBlocklistDriverUpdated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8221">Korisnik je ažurirao upravljački program grafičke kartice koja je prethodno uzrokovala padove sistema Office zbog čega se ona više ne koristi za prikazivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8221">User has updated a video card driver that was previously causing Office crashes and thus no longer being used to render.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8222">Obaveštava korporaciju Microsoft da se korisnici, koji su se nalazili u stanju prikazivanja koje je ispod optimalnog, ponovo nalaze u preporučenom stanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8222">Informs Microsoft that users who were once in a suboptimal rendering state are once again in the recommended rendering state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8223">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8223">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8224">**Data\_BlockedDriverVersion** - Verzija upravljačkog programa koja se nalazi na listi blokiranih.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8224">**Data\_BlockedDriverVersion** - Version of the driver that was blocklisted.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8225">**Data\_DeviceId** - identifikator grafičke kartice uređaja koji se nalazi na listi blokiranih.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8225">**Data\_DeviceId** -identifier of the video card device that was blocklisted.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8226">**Data\_UpdatedDriverVersion** - Verzija ažuriranog upravljačkog programa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8226">**Data\_UpdatedDriverVersion** - Version of the updated driver</span></span>

#### <a name="officeairspaceairspacelocalblocklistinfo"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8227">Office.AirSpace.AirSpaceLocalBlocklistInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8227">Office.AirSpace.AirSpaceLocalBlocklistInfo</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8228">Detalji o upravljačkom programu grafičke kartice koji je nedavno izazvao višestruke padove Office aplikacija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8228">Details on the user's video card driver that has caused multiple recent crashes of Office applications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8229">Sistem Office neće koristiti datu grafičku karticu u sesijama dok se upravljački program ne ažurira (umesto toga će koristiti softver za prikazivanje).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8229">Office will not use this video card in this Office session (using software rendering instead) until the driver is updated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8230">Obaveštava Microsoft o upravljačkim programima grafičke kartice koji uzrokuju probleme u sistemu Office, tako da ti trendovi mogu biti identifikovani, a uticaj takvih upravljačkih programa analiziran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8230">Informs Microsoft of video card drivers that are causing problems in Office so trends can be identified and the user of impact of such drivers can be analyzed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8231">Govori korporaciji Microsoft koliko korisnika se nalazi u stanju koje je ispod optimalnog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8231">Tell Microsoft how many users are in this suboptimal state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8232">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8232">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8233">**Data\_AllAppsBlocked** - Da li se sve Office aplikacije nalaze na listi blokiranih</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8233">**Data\_AllAppsBlocked** - Whether all Office apps are blocklisted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8234">**Data\_BlockedDeviceId** - identifikator grafičke kartice uređaja koji se nalazi na listi blokiranih</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8234">**Data\_BlockedDeviceId** - identifier of the video card device that was blocklisted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8235">**Data\_BlockedDriverVersion** - Verzija upravljačkog programa koja se nalazi na listi blokiranih</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8235">**Data\_BlockedDriverVersion** - Version of the driver that was blocklisted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8236">**Data\_CrashHistory** - Niska koja predstavlja istoriju padova koji su izazvani upravljačkim programom grafičke kartice i služi za analizu </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8236">**Data\_CrashHistory** - A string that represents the history of video card driver caused crashes for analysis</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8237">**Data\_SecsBetweenCrashes** - Koliko često dolazi do padova upravljačkog programa kartice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8237">**Data\_SecsBetweenCrashes** - How frequently driver card crashes are occurring</span></span>

#### <a name="officeairspaceairspacewincompisenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8238">Office.AirSpace.AirSpaceWinCompIsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8238">Office.AirSpace.AirSpaceWinCompIsEnabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8239">Da li se koristi najnovija Office platforma za prikazivanje niskog nivoa koja se zasniva na Windows kompoziciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8239">Whether the latest Office low-level rendering platform based on Windows Composition is being used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8240">Ovo omogućava korporaciji Microsoft da, tokom razvijanja najnovije Office platforme za prikazivanje niskog nivoa i njenog objavljivanja za korisnike, vidi koliko korisnika ima na svakoj verziji da bi obezbedila platformu bez grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8240">As the latest Office low-level rendering platform is developed and begins to be released to customers, this allows Microsoft to see how many users are on each version to ensure the platform remains bug-free.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8241">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8241">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

#### <a name="officeairspacebackendwin32graphicsdriverhangdetectorblocklistapp"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8243">Office.AirSpace.Backend.Win32.GraphicsDriverHangDetectorBlocklistApp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8243">Office.AirSpace.Backend.Win32.GraphicsDriverHangDetectorBlocklistApp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8244">Otkriveno je da grafička kartica korisnika uzrokuje duge ili nepopravljive prekide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8244">User's video card has been detected as causing long or unrecoverable hangs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8245">Sistem Office neće koristiti datu grafičku karticu u sesijama dok se upravljački program ne ažurira (umesto toga će koristiti softver za prikazivanje).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8245">Office will not use this video card in this Office session (using software rendering instead) until the driver is updated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8246">Obaveštava Microsoft o upravljačkim programima grafičke kartice koji uzrokuju probleme u sistemu Office, tako da ti trendovi mogu biti identifikovani, a uticaj takvih upravljačkih programa analiziran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8246">Informs Microsoft of video card drivers that are causing problems in Office so trends can be identified and the user of impact of such drivers can be analyzed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8247">Pomaže i u informisanju koliko korisnika se nalazi u stanju koje je ispod optimalnog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8247">Also helps in informing how many users are in this suboptimal state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8248">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8248">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8249">**Data\_AppName** - Koja aplikacija je naišla na prekide u upravljačkom programu grafičke kartice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8249">**Data\_AppName** - Which app has encountered video card driver hangs</span></span>

#### <a name="officeairspacebackendwin32graphicsdriverhangdetectorregistrywrite"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8250">Office.AirSpace.Backend.Win32.GraphicsDriverHangDetectorRegistryWrite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8250">Office.AirSpace.Backend.Win32.GraphicsDriverHangDetectorRegistryWrite</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8251">Sistem Office je prepoznao da je upravljački program grafičke kartice korisnika uzrokovao prekid koji bi trebalo da bude analiziran prilikom sledećeg pokretanja Office aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8251">Office has identified that the user's video card driver has caused a hang that should be analyzed at the next Office application boot.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8252">Koristi se da bi se odredilo da li korišćenje drugog upravljačkog programa grafičke kartice ili adaptera može ponuditi bolje korisničko iskustvo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8252">Used to determine whether using a different video card driver or adapter would offer a better user experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8253">Tokom javljanja obrazaca, Microsoft može izvršiti prilagođavanja da bi osigurao što bolje iskustvo. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8253">As patterns occur, Microsoft may make adjustments to keep the Office experience as smooth as possible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8254">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8254">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8255">**Data\_HangDetected** - Da li je otkriven prekid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8255">**Data\_HangDetected** - Whether a hang was detected</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8256">**Data\_InDeviceCall** - U kom pozivu prikazivanja pomoću grafičke kartice se nalazio Office kada je došlo do prekida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8256">**Data\_InDeviceCall** - Which video card rendering call Office was in when the hang occurred</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8257">**Data\_Timeout** - Koliko dugo je trajao prekid ako je došlo do oporavka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8257">**Data\_Timeout** - How long the hang lasted, if it recovered</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8258">**Data\_UnrecoverableCommand** - Da li se prekid u komandi prikazivanja pomoću grafičke kartice obično može ispraviti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8258">**Data\_UnrecoverableCommand** - Whether the hang in this video card rendering command is typically recoverable.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8268">**Data.CrashHistory System.String** - Niska koja predstavlja istoriju padova koji su izazvani upravljačkim programom grafičke kartice i služi za analizu </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8268">**Data.CrashHistory System.String** - A string that represents the history of video card driver caused crashes for analysis</span></span>

#### <a name="officepowerpointpptsharednointernetconnectivity"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8285">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Shared.NoInternetConnectivity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8285">Office.PowerPoint.PPT.Shared.NoInternetConnectivity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8289">**Data\_IsNexusDetected:bool** - prikazuje da li imamo vezu sa internetom prilikom pozivanja usluge Nexus (vrednost tačno) ili prilikom pozivanja generičke veb usluge API (vrednost netačno)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8289">**Data\_IsNexusDetected:bool** - shows whether we got the Internet connectivity status when calling Nexus service (value true) or when calling generic web service API call (value false)</span></span>

#### <a name="officeserviceabilitymanagerofficesvcmgrprofile"></a><span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8290">Office.ServiceabilityManager.OfficeSvcMgrProfile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8290">Office.ServiceabilityManager.OfficeSvcMgrProfile</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8291">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada se pokrene Office funkcija Upravljač servisiranja, i od izuzetne je važnosti za obezbeđivanje tačnih uvida vezanih za status primene kao i padove aplikacija i dodataka u okviru korisnikovog zakupca time što nam omogućava da IT administratoru obezbedimo uvid na osnovu koga će moći da sa lakoćom da ažurira računare svog preduzeća.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8291">This event is triggered when Office Serviceability Manager starts, and is critical for providing accurate insights related to Deployment Status and Application and Add-in crashes within customer's tenant by allowing us to generate insights for the IT Admin to be able to confidently roll out updates for their enterprise machines.</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8292">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8292">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8293">**DeviceIdJoinToken** – koristi se za pridruživanje telemetrijskih podataka o statusu ispravnosti i primene i drugih funkcionalnih podataka koji se prikupljaju pomoću kanala usluga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8293">**DeviceIdJoinToken** - used to join Telemetry data from Health and Deployment Status with other Functional Data, which is collected via the Services pipeline.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a6ade-8294">**TenantAssociationKeyStamped** - Logička oznaka koja se koristi za utvrđivanje broja kontrolisanih uređaja u okviru Office ekosistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a6ade-8294">**TenantAssociationKeyStamped** - a Boolean flag used to determine the number of Managed devices in the Office eco-system.</span></span>
